datasets.name: AbsenteesDataset
datasets.query:
--declare @dateto datetime,
--        @datefrom datetime
        
--set @dateto = '2021-03-31';
--set @datefrom = '2021-03-01'; 
 
 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#xo_jc_lavi_temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #xo_jc_lavi_temp;

SELECT     ABSENCES.PERSON_CD, PERSONS.LAST_NAME, PERSONS.FIRST_NAME, ABSENCES.DATE_INI, ABSENCES.DATE_FIN, ABSENCES.PERIOD
into #xo_jc_lavi_temp
FROM         cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PRSDAT AS PERSONDATA INNER JOIN
			 cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PERSON AS PERSONS ON PERSONDATA.PERSON_CD = PERSONS.CODE INNER JOIN
			 cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T9X_PRSABS AS ABSENCES ON PERSONS.CODE = ABSENCES.PERSON_CD
WHERE PERSONDATA.NOTICE_DATE > DATEADD(year, 10, @dateto)
AND (DATE_INI >= @datefrom  or DATE_FIN >= @datefrom  )
AND (DATE_INI <= @dateto  or DATE_FIN <= @dateto  )

 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#xo_jc_badd_temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #xo_jc_badd_temp;
select distinct Code, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME 
into #xo_jc_badd_temp
from cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PERSON AS PERSONS


select [Personnel Number], xo_jc_badd.LAST_NAME, xo_jc_badd.FIRST_NAME,   DayAbsent 
from (
select [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME,   DayAbsent 
from (	
	select distinct [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, cast(Day as datetime) as DayAbsent,
	max(case when cast(xo_jc_nonpres.Day as datetime) >= cast(xo_jc_lavi.DATE_INI  as datetime) AND cast(xo_jc_nonpres.Day  as datetime) <= cast(xo_jc_lavi.DATE_FIN  as datetime) then 1 else 0 end ) as maxflag
	from
	(
		select sentoni.[Personnel Number], sentoni.Day,  max(sentoni.presence) as mpr from (
			select distinct [Personnel Number], Day,  presence  from 
			(
				select distinct workers.[Personnel Number], working_days.Day, 0 as presence
				from 
				(
					select  distinct   
					ca.tIdentification AS [Personnel Number], ev.dtEventReal
					from 
					dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN
					dbo.tblEmployees as ca
					ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum
					where 
					ev.dtEventReal >=	@datefrom  
					and ev.dtEventReal <= DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) 
					and ca.tIdentification <> ''
				) as workers,
				(
					select  distinct   
					'20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
						+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) 
						+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) AS Day
					from 
					dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN
					dbo.tblEmployees as ca
					ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum
					where 
					ev.dtEventReal >=	@datefrom  
					and ev.dtEventReal <=		DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) 
					and datepart(weekday, 
						SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2)
						+ '/' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2)
						+ '/' + '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
					) not in (1,7)
				) as working_days
			) as a
			union all
			(
				select  distinct   
				ca.tIdentification AS [Personnel Number], 
				'20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
					+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) 
					+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) AS Day, 1 as presence
				from 
				dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN
				dbo.tblEmployees as ca
					ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum
				where 
				ev.dtEventReal >=	@datefrom  
				and ev.dtEventReal <=		DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) 
				and ca.tIdentification <> ''
				and datepart(weekday, 
					SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2)
					+ '/' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2)
					+ '/' + '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
				) not in (1,7)
			) 
		) as sentoni
		group by sentoni.[Personnel Number], sentoni.Day
		having max(sentoni.presence) = 0
	) as xo_jc_nonpres								
	LEFT OUTER JOIN  #xo_jc_lavi_temp xo_jc_lavi										
	on  xo_jc_nonpres.[Personnel Number] = xo_jc_lavi.PERSON_CD
	--where xo_jc_nonpres.[Personnel Number] not in (select * from  dbo.XO_Excepted_AMYs)
	group by  [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, Day 
) as outter_rim
where maxflag = 0
) as even_outter,#xo_jc_badd_temp as xo_jc_badd				
where even_outter.[Personnel Number] = xo_jc_badd.Code
--and [Personnel Number] not in (select * from  dbo.XO_Excepted_AMYs)
order by DayAbsent

drop table #xo_jc_lavi_temp
drop table #xo_jc_badd_temp

--declare @dateto datetime,
--        @datefrom datetime
        
--set @dateto = '2021-03-31';
--set @datefrom = '2021-03-01'; 
 
 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#xo_jc_lavi_temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #xo_jc_lavi_temp;

SELECT     ABSENCES.PERSON_CD, PERSONS.LAST_NAME, PERSONS.FIRST_NAME, ABSENCES.DATE_INI, ABSENCES.DATE_FIN, ABSENCES.PERIOD
into #xo_jc_lavi_temp
FROM         cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PRSDAT AS PERSONDATA INNER JOIN
			 cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PERSON AS PERSONS ON PERSONDATA.PERSON_CD = PERSONS.CODE INNER JOIN
			 cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T9X_PRSABS AS ABSENCES ON PERSONS.CODE = ABSENCES.PERSON_CD
WHERE PERSONDATA.NOTICE_DATE > DATEADD(year, 10, @dateto)
AND (DATE_INI >= @datefrom  or DATE_FIN >= @datefrom  )
AND (DATE_INI <= @dateto  or DATE_FIN <= @dateto  )

 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#xo_jc_badd_temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #xo_jc_badd_temp;
select distinct Code, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME 
into #xo_jc_badd_temp
from cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PERSON AS PERSONS


select [Personnel Number], xo_jc_badd.LAST_NAME, xo_jc_badd.FIRST_NAME,   DayAbsent 
from (
select [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME,   DayAbsent 
from (	
	select distinct [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, cast(Day as datetime) as DayAbsent,
	max(case when cast(xo_jc_nonpres.Day as datetime) >= cast(xo_jc_lavi.DATE_INI  as datetime) AND cast(xo_jc_nonpres.Day  as datetime) <= cast(xo_jc_lavi.DATE_FIN  as datetime) then 1 else 0 end ) as maxflag
	from
	(
		select sentoni.[Personnel Number], sentoni.Day,  max(sentoni.presence) as mpr from (
			select distinct [Personnel Number], Day,  presence  from 
			(
				select distinct workers.[Personnel Number], working_days.Day, 0 as presence
				from 
				(
					select  distinct   
					ca.tIdentification AS [Personnel Number], ev.dtEventReal
					from 
					dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN
					dbo.tblEmployees as ca
					ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum
					where 
					ev.dtEventReal >=	@datefrom  
					and ev.dtEventReal <= DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) 
					and ca.tIdentification <> ''
				) as workers,
				(
					select  distinct   
					'20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
						+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) 
						+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) AS Day
					from 
					dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN
					dbo.tblEmployees as ca
					ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum
					where 
					ev.dtEventReal >=	@datefrom  
					and ev.dtEventReal <=		DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) 
					and datepart(weekday, 
						SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2)
						+ '/' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2)
						+ '/' + '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
					) not in (1,7)
				) as working_days
			) as a
			union all
			(
				select  distinct   
				ca.tIdentification AS [Personnel Number], 
				'20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
					+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) 
					+ '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) AS Day, 1 as presence
				from 
				dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN
				dbo.tblEmployees as ca
					ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum
				where 
				ev.dtEventReal >=	@datefrom  
				and ev.dtEventReal <=		DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) 
				and ca.tIdentification <> ''
				and datepart(weekday, 
					SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2)
					+ '/' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2)
					+ '/' + '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) 
				) not in (1,7)
			) 
		) as sentoni
		group by sentoni.[Personnel Number], sentoni.Day
		having max(sentoni.presence) = 0
	) as xo_jc_nonpres								
	LEFT OUTER JOIN  #xo_jc_lavi_temp xo_jc_lavi										
	on  xo_jc_nonpres.[Personnel Number] = xo_jc_lavi.PERSON_CD
	--where xo_jc_nonpres.[Personnel Number] not in (select * from  dbo.XO_Excepted_AMYs)
	group by  [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, Day 
) as outter_rim
where maxflag = 0
) as even_outter,#xo_jc_badd_temp as xo_jc_badd				
where even_outter.[Personnel Number] = xo_jc_badd.Code
--and [Personnel Number] not in (select * from  dbo.XO_Excepted_AMYs)
order by DayAbsent

drop table #xo_jc_lavi_temp
drop table #xo_jc_badd_temp

datasets.name: WeeklyReportForGeorgatosDataSet
datasets.query:
SELECT	[t9].[Code] AS [BPCode] ,
		[t9].[TaxCode] AS [VAT] ,
		[t9].[BrandName] ,
		[t9].ID AS [ContractID] ,
		[t9].[SignedDate] AS [SignedOn] ,
		[t9].[value] AS [Amount] ,
		[t9].[value2] AS [Campaign] ,
		[t9].CreatedOn ,
		[t9].OrigionalContractID
FROM	( SELECT	[t4].[Code] ,
					[t4].[TaxCode] ,
					[t4].[BrandName] ,
					[t4].ID ,
					[t4].[SignedDate] ,
					[t4].[value] ,
					( CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT	NULL AS [EMPTY]
										 FROM	[TargetGroupItemValue] AS [t5]
										 WHERE	( [t5].[ContractID] = ( [t4].[ID] ) )
												AND ( [t5].[ContractID] = [t4].[ID] ) )
						   THEN CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), ( SELECT
															  [t8].[Name]
														 FROM [TargetGroupItemValue]
															  AS [t6]
															  INNER JOIN [TargetGroupItem]
															  AS [t7] ON [t7].[ID] = [t6].[TargetGroupItemID]
															  INNER JOIN [Campaign]
															  AS [t8] ON [t8].[ID] = [t7].[CampaignID]
														 WHERE
															  ( [t6].[ContractID] = ( [t4].[ID] ) )
															  AND ( [t6].[ContractID] = [t4].[ID] )
													   ))
						   ELSE NULL
					  END ) AS [value2] ,
					[t4].[State] ,
					[t4].CreatedOn ,
					[t4].OrigionalContractID
		  FROM		( SELECT	[t1].[Code] ,
								[t2].[TaxCode] ,
								[t1].[BrandName] ,
								[t0].[SignedDate] ,
								( (CAST(( SELECT	SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (
															  3, 4 )
															  AND cp1.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL
															 THEN cp1.AlteredAmount
															 ELSE cp1.Price
															  - cp1.Discount
															  - cp1.RulesDiscount
														END)
										  FROM		dbo.ContractProduct cp1
										  WHERE		RelatedContractID = [t0].id
										) AS MONEY)) ) AS [value] ,
								[t0].[ID] ,
								[t0].[State] ,
								[t0].CreatedOn ,
								[t0].OrigionalContractID
					  FROM		[Contract] AS [t0]
								INNER JOIN [BusinessPoint] AS [t1] ON [t1].[ID] = [t0].[BillingPointID]
															  AND ( [t0].type IN ( 0, 2, 4 ) )
								LEFT OUTER JOIN [TaxCode] AS [t2] ON [t2].[ID] = [t1].[ID]
					) AS [t4]
		) AS [t9]
WHERE	( [t9].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
		AND ( ( ( [t9].[SignedDate] >= @p0 )
				AND ( [t9].[SignedDate] <= @p1 )
				AND [t9].OrigionalContractID IS NULL
			  )
			  OR ( ( [t9].CreatedOn >= @p0 )
				   AND ( [t9].CreatedOn <= @p1 )
				   AND [t9].OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL
				 )
			)
		AND ( [t9].[State] = 1 )
ORDER BY [t9].[SignedDate]
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  [t9].[Code] AS [BPCode],
  [t9].[TaxCode] AS [VAT],
  [t9].[BrandName],
  [t9].ID AS [ContractID],
  [t9].[SignedDate] AS [SignedOn],
  [t9].[value] AS [Amount],
  [t9].[value2] AS [Campaign],
  [t9].CreatedOn,
  [t9].OrigionalContractID
FROM (
  SELECT
    [t4].[Code] AS [Code],
    [t4].[TaxCode] AS [TaxCode],
    [t4].[BrandName] AS [BrandName],
    [t4].ID AS ID,
    [t4].[SignedDate] AS [SignedDate],
    [t4].[value] AS [value],
    (
      CASE
        WHEN EXISTS(
          SELECT
            NULL AS [EMPTY]
          FROM [TargetGroupItemValue] AS [t5]
          WHERE
            (
              [t5].[ContractID] = (
                [t4].[ID]
              )
            )
            AND (
              [t5].[ContractID] = [t4].[ID]
            )
        )
        THEN CONVERT(
          NVARCHAR(MAX),
          (
            SELECT
              [t8].[Name]
            FROM [TargetGroupItemValue] AS [t6]
            INNER JOIN [TargetGroupItem] AS [t7]
              ON [t7].[ID] = [t6].[TargetGroupItemID]
            INNER JOIN [Campaign] AS [t8]
              ON [t8].[ID] = [t7].[CampaignID]
            WHERE
              (
                [t6].[ContractID] = (
                  [t4].[ID]
                )
              )
              AND (
                [t6].[ContractID] = [t4].[ID]
              )
          )
        )
        ELSE NULL
      END
    ) AS [value2],
    [t4].[State] AS [State],
    [t4].CreatedOn AS CreatedOn,
    [t4].OrigionalContractID AS OrigionalContractID
  FROM (
    SELECT
      [t1].[Code] AS [Code],
      [t2].[TaxCode] AS [TaxCode],
      [t1].[BrandName] AS [BrandName],
      [t0].[SignedDate] AS [SignedDate],
      (
        (
          CAST((
            SELECT
              SUM(
                CASE
                  WHEN cp1.state IN (3, 4) AND NOT cp1.AlteredAmount IS NULL
                  THEN cp1.AlteredAmount
                  ELSE cp1.Price - cp1.Discount - cp1.RulesDiscount
                END
              )
            FROM dbo.ContractProduct AS cp1
            WHERE
              RelatedContractID = [t0].id
          ) AS MONEY)
        )
      ) AS [value],
      [t0].[ID] AS [ID],
      [t0].[State] AS [State],
      [t0].CreatedOn AS CreatedOn,
      [t0].OrigionalContractID AS OrigionalContractID
    FROM [Contract] AS [t0]
    INNER JOIN [BusinessPoint] AS [t1]
      ON [t1].[ID] = [t0].[BillingPointID] AND (
        [t0].type IN (0, 2, 4)
      )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [TaxCode] AS [t2]
      ON [t2].[ID] = [t1].[ID]
  ) AS [t4]
) AS [t9]
WHERE
  (
    NOT [t9].[SignedDate] IS NULL
  )
  AND (
    (
      (
        [t9].[SignedDate] >= @p0
      )
      AND (
        [t9].[SignedDate] <= @p1
      )
      AND [t9].OrigionalContractID IS NULL
    )
    OR (
      (
        [t9].CreatedOn >= @p0
      )
      AND (
        [t9].CreatedOn <= @p1
      )
      AND NOT [t9].OrigionalContractID IS NULL
    )
  )
  AND (
    [t9].[State] = 1
  )
ORDER BY
  [t9].[SignedDate]

		  FROM		( SELECT	[t1].[Code] ,
								[t2].[TaxCode] ,

															  - cp1.Discount

										  WHERE		RelatedContractID = [t0].id

								[t0].[ID] ,
								[t0].[State] ,

					  FROM		[Contract] AS [t0]

ORDER BY [t9].[SignedDate]

datasets.name: DataSet1
datasets.query:
--συγκεντρωτικό

select   count(distinct bp.id) as cnt--'Πελάτες με Customer Constraints'
	  ,a.CampaignId
	  ,'['+cm.code+'] '+cm.name as 'Καμπάνια'
	  , case when cast(cm.ClosedOn as date) > cast(getdate() as date) then 'Ενεργή' else 'Ανενεργή' end as CStatus
  from
  BusinessPoint bp --on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.id
  join dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
  JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID
  JOIN dbo.Classifier clr ON cl.ClassifierID = clr.ID
  join (select max(tgi.CampaignID) as campaignId,bp.id as bpId
		from BusinessPoint bp
		join TargetGroupItem tgi on bp.id = tgi.BusinessPointID
		where bp.IsActive = 1
		group by bp.id 
	    )a on a.bpId = bp.id
  join Campaign cm on cm.id = a.campaignId 
 where clr.id = 6
   --and cast(cm.ClosedOn as date) > cast(getdate() as date) 
      and cm.id in (@CampaignID)
   group by a.campaignId,
	  '['+cm.code+'] '+cm.name,
	  case when cast(cm.ClosedOn as date) > cast(getdate() as date) then 'Ενεργή' else 'Ανενεργή' end
 order by 4 desc

datasets.name: DataSet1
datasets.query:
--declare @PrefectureParam nvarchar(50),@date date ,@cusIndicator nvarchar(50), @option nvarchar(50);

--set @PrefectureParam = 'Αιτωλοακαρνανίας';
--set @date = '2013/02/26';
--set @cusIndicator = 'Regular';
--set @option = 'ΝΑΙ';

--select distinct
-- Prefecture = (case   WHEN da.BroaderAreaID ='E2' THEN 'Αττικής'
--                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E5' THEN 'Αττικής'
--                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E20' THEN 'Αττικής'
--                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E4' THEN 'Αττικής'
--                      ELSE da.AreaName
--               END)
--from BroaderAreaLookUp da where BroaderAreaID like 'E%'
--select BusinessPointID from pointemail
if object_id('tempdb..#basicPoint') is not null
drop table #basicPoint

SELECT  distinct 
bp.id, 
[Κωδικός] = cast(bp.Code as bigint) ,
[Διακριτικός] = bp.Name, 
[Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName, 
[CusIndicator] = cn.name, 
[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] = (SELECT a.name FROM dbo.ClassifierNode a JOIN dbo.Classification b ON a.id = b.ClassifierNodeID AND b.ClassifierID = 3 AND b.BusinessPointID = bp.id),
Νομός = adr.Prefecture,
[Συμβόλαιο]=case when (select count(distinct ct.id) from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) and ((ct.SignedDate >= @date and ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR (ct.createdon >= @date and ct.OrigionalContractID IS not null)) ) = 0 
					then 'ΟΧΙ' ELSE 'ΝΑΙ' END,
[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] = (select top 1 id from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] = (select top 1 SignedDate from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] =(select top 1 adv.AdvEndDate from Contract ct
									join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									order by adv.AdvEndDate desc),
[Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής] =(select top 1 cp.InterruptionDate from Contract ct
									join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									order by adv.AdvEndDate desc),

[Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1),
[Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2),
[Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7)
INTO #basicPoint
FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
join FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837
join Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 
join ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 
AND adr.Prefecture IN ( @PrefectureParam )
and cn.name in( @cusIndicator)
AND (
	(EXISTS (select  1 from dbo.PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 4) AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ'  )
	OR
    (EXISTS (select  1 from dbo.PointEmail pe where pe.BusinessPointID = bp.id  ) AND @option2 = 'EMAIL')
	)


if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not null
drop table #emails

SELECT * , 	RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Email )
into #emails
from
	(	select distinct pe.BusinessPointID ,pe.Email
		from #basicPoint bp
		join dbo.PointEmail pe on bp.ID = pe.BusinessPointID 
	)aa

if object_id('tempdb..#mobiles') is not null
drop table #mobiles

SELECT * , 	RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Number )
into #mobiles
from
	(	select distinct pp.BusinessPointID ,pp.Number
		from #basicPoint bp
		join dbo.PointPhone pp on bp.ID = pp.BusinessPointID 
		WHERE pp.IsActive = 1 AND pp.Usage = 4
	)aa
	

 select distinct
 bp.[Κωδικός]
,bp.[Διακριτικός]
,bp.[Επωνυμία]
,bp.[CusIndicator]
,bp.[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα]
,bp.[Νομός]
,bp.[Συμβόλαιο]
,bp.[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο]
,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής], 103) as [Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής]
,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής], 103) as [Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής]
,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής], 103) as [Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής]
,bp.[Τηλέφωνο1]
,bp.[Τηλέφωνο2]
,Κινητό = m1.Number
--,Κινητό2 = m2.Number
--,Κινητό3 = m3.Number
,bp.[Φαξ]
,email1	= e1.email
,email2 = e2.email
,email3	= e3.email
,email4	= e4.email
,email5	= e5.email
 --into #result
 from #basicPoint bp
left join #emails e1 on bp.ID = e1.BusinessPointID and e1.RankID =1 
left join #emails e2 on bp.ID = e2.BusinessPointID and e2.RankID =2 
left join #emails e3 on bp.ID = e3.BusinessPointID and e3.RankID =3 
left join #emails e4 on bp.ID = e4.BusinessPointID and e4.RankID =4 
left join #emails e5 on bp.ID = e5.BusinessPointID and e5.RankID =5 
left join #mobiles m1 on bp.ID = m1.BusinessPointID and m1.RankID =1 
left join #mobiles m2 on bp.ID = m2.BusinessPointID and m2.RankID =2 
left join #mobiles m3 on bp.ID = m3.BusinessPointID and m3.RankID =3 
where 
(
	(e1.Email is not null AND @option2 = 'EMAIL')
OR  (m1.number is not null AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ')
)

and bp.[Συμβόλαιο] in (@option )
order by bp.[Κωδικός]

Λήξης Προβολής] =(select top 1 adv.AdvEndDate from Contract ct join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by adv.AdvEndDate desc), [Ημερ. ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by adv.AdvEndDate desc), [Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1), [Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2), [Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7) INTO #basicPoint FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp join FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837 join Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 join ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND adr.Prefecture IN ( @PrefectureParam ) and cn.name in( @cusIndicator) AND ( (EXISTS (select 1 from dbo.PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 4) AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ' ) OR (EXISTS (select 1 from dbo.PointEmail pe ,bp.[Νομός] ,bp.[Συμβόλαιο] ,bp.[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] ,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. datasets.name: Prefectures
datasets.query:
select distinct
 Prefecture = (case   WHEN da.BroaderAreaID ='E2' THEN 'Αττικής'
                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E5' THEN 'Αττικής'
                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E20' THEN 'Αττικής'
                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E4' THEN 'Αττικής'
                      ELSE da.AreaName
               END)
from BroaderAreaLookUp da where BroaderAreaID like 'E%'
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  (
    CASE
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E2'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E5'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E20'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E4'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      ELSE da.AreaName
    END
  ) AS Prefecture
FROM BroaderAreaLookUp AS da
WHERE
  BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'

[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] = (select top 1 id from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] = (select top 1 SignedDate from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] =(select top 1 adv.AdvEndDate from Contract ct
									join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									order by adv.AdvEndDate desc),
[Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής] =(select top 1 cp.InterruptionDate from Contract ct
									join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									order by adv.AdvEndDate desc),

[Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1),
[Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2),
[Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7)
INTO #basicPoint
FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
join FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837
join Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 
join ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 
AND adr.Prefecture IN ( @PrefectureParam )
and cn.name in( @cusIndicator)
AND (
	(EXISTS (select  1 from dbo.PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 4) AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ'  )
	OR
    (EXISTS (select  1 from dbo.PointEmail pe where pe.BusinessPointID = bp.id  ) AND @option2 = 'EMAIL')
	)


if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not null
drop table #emails

SELECT * , 	RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Email )
into #emails
from
	(	select distinct pe.BusinessPointID ,pe.Email
		from #basicPoint bp
		join dbo.PointEmail pe on bp.ID = pe.BusinessPointID 
	)aa

if object_id('tempdb..#mobiles') is not null
drop table #mobiles

SELECT * , 	RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Number )
into #mobiles
from
	(	select distinct pp.BusinessPointID ,pp.Number
		from #basicPoint bp
		join dbo.PointPhone pp on bp.ID = pp.BusinessPointID 
		WHERE pp.IsActive = 1 AND pp.Usage = 4
	)aa
	

 select distinct
 bp.[Κωδικός]
,bp.[Διακριτικός]
,bp.[Επωνυμία]
,bp.[CusIndicator]
,bp.[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα]
,bp.[Νομός]
,bp.[Συμβόλαιο]
,bp.[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο]
,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής], 103) as [Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής]
,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής], 103) as [Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής]
,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής], 103) as [Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής]
,bp.[Τηλέφωνο1]
,bp.[Τηλέφωνο2]
,Κινητό = m1.Number
--,Κινητό2 = m2.Number
--,Κινητό3 = m3.Number
,bp.[Φαξ]
,email1	= e1.email
,email2 = e2.email
,email3	= e3.email
,email4	= e4.email
,email5	= e5.email
 --into #result
 from #basicPoint bp
left join #emails e1 on bp.ID = e1.BusinessPointID and e1.RankID =1 
left join #emails e2 on bp.ID = e2.BusinessPointID and e2.RankID =2 
left join #emails e3 on bp.ID = e3.BusinessPointID and e3.RankID =3 
left join #emails e4 on bp.ID = e4.BusinessPointID and e4.RankID =4 
left join #emails e5 on bp.ID = e5.BusinessPointID and e5.RankID =5 
left join #mobiles m1 on bp.ID = m1.BusinessPointID and m1.RankID =1 
left join #mobiles m2 on bp.ID = m2.BusinessPointID and m2.RankID =2 
left join #mobiles m3 on bp.ID = m3.BusinessPointID and m3.RankID =3 
where 
(
	(e1.Email is not null AND @option2 = 'EMAIL')
OR  (m1.number is not null AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ')
)

and bp.[Συμβόλαιο] in (@option )
order by bp.[Κωδικός]

named_assets.name: Email-Κινητά Πελατολογίου.Prefectures
named_assets.sql_raw:
select distinct
 Prefecture = (case   WHEN da.BroaderAreaID ='E2' THEN 'Αττικής'
                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E5' THEN 'Αττικής'
                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E20' THEN 'Αττικής'
                     WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E4' THEN 'Αττικής'
                      ELSE da.AreaName
               END)
from BroaderAreaLookUp da where BroaderAreaID like 'E%'
named_assets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  (
    CASE
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E2'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E5'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E20'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E4'
      THEN 'Αττικής'
      ELSE da.AreaName
    END
  ) AS Prefecture
FROM BroaderAreaLookUp AS da
WHERE
  BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'

datasets.name: UdacsDS
datasets.query:
SELECT  CampaignID = cm.id
      , CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
      , Product = '[' + p.Code + '] ' + p.name
      , CountOfProducts = COUNT(DISTINCT cp.id)
      , CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT ct.id)
FROM    Task t
        JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                AND tt.ID = 154	---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη
        JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID
        JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON C.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID
                                              AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
        JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID
        JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID
        JOIN dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID
        JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
        JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
WHERE   cm.ID = @CampaignID
        AND ct.State not in (3,5,10) 
		and ct.type in (0,2,3,4)
		AND cp.State <> 3
        AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @Enddate)
GROUP BY cm.id
      , cm.Code
      , cm.Name
      , p.Code
      , p.name
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  cm.id AS CampaignID,
  '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name AS CampaignDesc,
  '[' + p.Code + '] ' + p.name AS Product,
  COUNT(DISTINCT cp.id) AS CountOfProducts,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ct.id) AS CountOfContracts
FROM Task AS t
JOIN dbo.TaskType AS tt
  ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
  AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
  AND tt.ID = 154 /* -TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON C.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignID AND ct.State not in (3,5,10) and ct.type in (0,2,3,4) AND cp.State <> 3 AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @Enddate) GROUP BY cm.id , cm.Code , cm.Name , p.Code , p.name */

datasets.name: VisitsDS
datasets.query:
--DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT
--SET @startdate = '20121001'
--SET @enddate = '20121024'
--SET @Campaignid = 13

;
WITH  YPSData AS 
(
SELECT DISTINCT CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
                      , SupervisorId = su.id
                      , SalesManID = u.id
                      , SupervisorName = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName
                      , SalesmanName = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName
                      , CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew  WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END
                      , cn.Name MainActivity
                      , cn.ID MAId
                      , OfferId = ct.id
					  , TaskOutcome = t.Outcome
FROM dbo.Campaign cm 
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
			JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv'
			JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID
			--JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID
			JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313) --146--Προγραμματισμός πώλησης --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη
                 
			JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.type in (0,2,3,4)
			/**/JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID
			JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint BP ON tgi.BusinessPointID = BP.ID
            JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON BP.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
            JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.ID AND cl.ClassifierID = 3
	
	WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId 
			AND ct.State not in (3,5,10)
			AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
)
,
   GroupOfferData AS
           (
			   SELECT CampaignDesc
						  , SupervisorId 
						  , SalesManID 
						  , SupervisorName
						  , SalesmanName 
						  , CustomerIndicator 
						  , MainActivity
						  , MAId
						  , CountOfOffers = COUNT(DISTINCT OfferId)
			   FROM YPSData
			   GROUP BY CampaignDesc
						  , SupervisorId 
						  , SalesManID 
						  , SupervisorName
						  , SalesmanName 
						  , CustomerIndicator 
						  , MainActivity
						  , MAId
           ),           
       GroupContractData
          AS ( SELECT   SalesManId
                      , SupervisorId
                      , CustomerIndicator
                      , MainActivity
                      , MAId
                      , CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT OfferId)
               FROM     YPSData cd
               WHERE (TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας') OR TaskOutcome IS NULL) --in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας')
               GROUP BY SalesManId
                      , SupervisorId
                      , SalesmanId
                      , CustomerIndicator
                      , MainActivity
                      , MAId
             )
               
             
    SELECT  cod.SupervisorId
          , cod.SupervisorName
          , cod.SalesManID
          , cod.SalesmanName
          , cod.MainActivity
          , CustomerIndicator = CASE cod.CustomerIndicator
                                  WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ'
                                  ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ'
                                END
          , SumOffers = ISNULL(CountOfOffers, 0)
          , SumContracts = ISNULL(CountOfContracts, 0)
    FROM    GroupOfferData cod
            LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gcd ON cod.SalesManID = gcd.SalesManId
                                                 AND cod.CustomerIndicator = gcd.CustomerIndicator
                                                 AND cod.supervisorid = gcd.supervisorid
                                                 AND cod.MAId = gcd.maid
datasets.sql_normalized: --DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT --SET @startdate = '20121001' --SET @enddate = '20121024' --SET @Campaignid = 13 ; WITH YPSData AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name , SupervisorId = su.id , SalesManID = u.id , SupervisorName = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName , SalesmanName = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName , CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END , cn.Name MainActivity , cn.ID MAId , OfferId = ct.id , TaskOutcome = t.Outcome FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND named_assets.name: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Κύρια Δραστηριότητα Ανά Καμπάνια.VisitsDS
named_assets.source_file: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Κύρια Δραστηριότητα Ανά Καμπάνια.rdl
named_assets.sql_raw:
--DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT
--SET @startdate = '20121001'
--SET @enddate = '20121024'
--SET @Campaignid = 13

;
WITH  YPSData AS 
(
SELECT DISTINCT CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
                      , SupervisorId = su.id
                      , SalesManID = u.id
                      , SupervisorName = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName
                      , SalesmanName = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName
                      , CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew  WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END
                      , cn.Name MainActivity
                      , cn.ID MAId
                      , OfferId = ct.id
					  , TaskOutcome = t.Outcome
FROM dbo.Campaign cm 
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
			JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv'
			JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID
			--JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID
			JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313) --146--Προγραμματισμός πώλησης --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη
                 
			JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.type in (0,2,3,4)
			/**/JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID
			JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint BP ON tgi.BusinessPointID = BP.ID
            JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON BP.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
            JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.ID AND cl.ClassifierID = 3
	
	WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId 
			AND ct.State not in (3,5,10)
			AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
)
,
   GroupOfferData AS
           (
			   SELECT CampaignDesc
						  , SupervisorId 
						  , SalesManID 
						  , SupervisorName
						  , SalesmanName 
						  , CustomerIndicator 
						  , MainActivity
						  , MAId
						  , CountOfOffers = COUNT(DISTINCT OfferId)
			   FROM YPSData
			   GROUP BY CampaignDesc
						  , SupervisorId 
						  , SalesManID 
						  , SupervisorName
						  , SalesmanName 
						  , CustomerIndicator 
						  , MainActivity
						  , MAId
           ),           
       GroupContractData
          AS ( SELECT   SalesManId
                      , SupervisorId
                      , CustomerIndicator
                      , MainActivity
                      , MAId
                      , CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT OfferId)
               FROM     YPSData cd
               WHERE (TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας') OR TaskOutcome IS NULL) --in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας')
               GROUP BY SalesManId
                      , SupervisorId
                      , SalesmanId
                      , CustomerIndicator
                      , MainActivity
                      , MAId
             )
               
             
    SELECT  cod.SupervisorId
          , cod.SupervisorName
          , cod.SalesManID
          , cod.SalesmanName
          , cod.MainActivity
          , CustomerIndicator = CASE cod.CustomerIndicator
                                  WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ'
                                  ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ'
                                END
          , SumOffers = ISNULL(CountOfOffers, 0)
          , SumContracts = ISNULL(CountOfContracts, 0)
    FROM    GroupOfferData cod
            LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gcd ON cod.SalesManID = gcd.SalesManId
                                                 AND cod.CustomerIndicator = gcd.CustomerIndicator
                                                 AND cod.supervisorid = gcd.supervisorid
                                                 AND cod.MAId = gcd.maid

datasets.name: CampaignDS
datasets.query:
IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers )

SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id,
					CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
					FROM dbo.Campaign cm
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID

else

SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id,
					CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
					FROM dbo.Campaign cm
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
				WHERE tgiv.Supervisor IN (@UserIds)
datasets.sql_normalized: IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN ( SELECT UserName FROM ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id, CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID else SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id, CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID WHERE tgiv.Supervisor IN (@UserIds)

datasets.name: Visits
datasets.query:
----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign
--DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT
--SET @startdate = '20130628'
--SET @enddate = '20130628'
--SET @Campaignid = 24

--SELECT * FROM dbo.TaskType WHERE Description LIKE 'επίσκε%'

;WITH

CustomerVisits AS
(
SELECT  TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id,
				CampaignID = cm.ID ,
				CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME,
				SupervisorId = su.ID,
				SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''),
				SalesManId = U.ID,
				SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''),
				VisitDate =  DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, t.CompletedOn), 0),
				CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END,
				TaskOutcome = t.Outcome
				
FROM dbo.Campaign cm 
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
			JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv'
			JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID
			JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη	select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313)
            JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id		
            
            LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID 
									
	WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId 
			AND t.CompletedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
			AND ISNULL(ct.State,0) not in (3,5,10) and ISNULL(ct.type,0) in (0,2,3,4)

UNION  --Neo Rantebou

SELECT  TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id,
				CampaignID = cm.ID ,
				CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME,
				SupervisorId = su.ID,
				SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''),
				SalesManId = U.ID,
				SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''),
				VisitDate =  DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, tl.Timestamp), 0),
				CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END,
				TaskOutcome = tl.Outcome
				
FROM dbo.Campaign cm 
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
			JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv'
			JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID
			JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη	
            JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id
            JOIN dbo.TaskLog tl ON t.ID = tl.TaskID AND tl.Outcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' 
            
	WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId 
			AND tl.Timestamp  BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
			
)			
,
 WorkingDays AS
 (
	SELECT CampaignId = ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID),
				CampaignDesc = ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME),
				SupervisorId = ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID) ,
				SupervisorName=ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')),				
				SalesManId = ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID),
				SalesmanName = ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName),
				WorkingDays = COUNT(DISTINCT  DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, wdct.WorkingDate), 0))
				
	FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign wdct
			JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = wdct.CampaignId 
			JOIN dbo.[User] u ON wdct.UserId = u.ID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON wdct.SupervisorId = su.ID
			FULL OUTER JOIN CustomerVisits yd ON wdct.CampaignId = yd.CampaignID
									AND wdct.UserId = yd.SalesManId
									AND wdct.SupervisorId = yd.SupervisorId
									AND wdct.WorkingDate = yd.VisitDate
			
			
	WHERE (cm.ID = @CampaignId  OR cm.ID IS NULL)
			AND (wdct.WorkingDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
					OR
				wdct.WorkingDate IS NULL)

	GROUP BY ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID),
				ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME),		
				ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID),
				ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')),
				ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID),
				ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName)
 ) 
,
GroupVisitData AS 
(
SELECT SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator,
		CountOfVisits = COUNT(*)   
FROM CustomerVisits
GROUP BY SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator
) 
,
GroupContractData AS  --Apodoxh Protashs kai Ekptvwsh pou den anhkei se Apodoxh Protashs
(
SELECT SalesManId ,
		 SupervisorId ,
		 CustomerIndicator ,
         CountOfSales = COUNT(*)
FROM 
(
SELECT *
from CustomerVisits cd
WHERE TaskOutcome IN ('Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΠΟΔΠ' , 'ΕΚΠΤ')  --'Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας',ΠΡΟΣΦ,ΝΕΟΡ,ΑΡΝ,ΕΚΠΤ
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CustomerVisits cv WHERE cv.TgivId = cd.tgivid AND cv.TaskOutcome = 'ΕΚΠΤ' AND cd.TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας'))
) a
GROUP BY SalesManId ,
		 SupervisorId ,
		 SalesmanId ,
		 CustomerIndicator		 
)   --select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) select * from yps1902.dbo.tasktype where id in(154,312,313)
,
GroupPostponeData AS 
(
SELECT SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator,
		CountOfPostp = COUNT(*)   
FROM CustomerVisits
WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ'
GROUP BY SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator
)  
,
GroupLossesData AS 
(
SELECT SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator,
		CountOfLosses = COUNT(*)   
FROM CustomerVisits
WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΑΡΝ'
GROUP BY SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator
) 

                  
SELECT  distinct
		A.SupervisorId,
		A.SupervisorName,
		A.SalesManID,
		A.SalesmanName,
		CustomerIndicator = CASE A.CustInd WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ'
												ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END,
		A.WorkingDays,
		SumOfVisits = ISNULL(CountOfVisits,0),
		SumOfSales = ISNULL(CountOfSales,0),
		SumOfPostp = ISNULL(CountOfPostp,0),
		SumOfLosses = ISNULL(CountOfLosses,0)
into #tmp		
		
FROM (SELECT swd.supervisorid
							, swd.SalesManID 
							, swd.SupervisorName
							, swd.SalesmanName
							, swd.WorkingDays 
							, B.CustInd
					FROM WorkingDays swd 
							CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 CustInd
										UNION
										SELECT 1 CustInd) B
					) A
		LEFT JOIN GroupVisitData gv ON A.SalesManID = gv.SalesManID 
											AND gv.supervisorid = A.supervisorid
											AND A.CustInd = gv.CustomerIndicator
		LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gc ON A.SalesManID = gc.SalesManId 
										AND A.CustInd = gc.CustomerIndicator 
										AND A.supervisorid = gc.supervisorid
		LEFT JOIN GroupPostponeData gp ON A.SalesManID = gp.SalesManId 
										AND A.CustInd = gp.CustomerIndicator 
										AND A.supervisorid = gp.supervisorid	
		LEFT JOIN GroupLossesData gl ON A.SalesManID = gl.SalesManId 
										AND A.CustInd = gl.CustomerIndicator 
										AND A.supervisorid = gl.supervisorid												


select *
from #tmp 								
WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds)


if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null drop table #tmp

DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) ) , WorkingDays AS ( SELECT CampaignId = ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), CampaignDesc = ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), SupervisorId = wdct.WorkingDate), 0)) FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign wdct JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = wdct.CampaignId JOIN dbo.[User] u ON wdct.UserId = u.ID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON wdct.SupervisorId = su.ID FULL OUTER JOIN CustomerVisits yd ON wdct.CampaignId = yd.CampaignID AND wdct.UserId = yd.SalesManId AND wdct.SupervisorId = yd.SupervisorId AND wdct.WorkingDate = yd.VisitDate WHERE (cm.ID = @CampaignId OR cm.ID IS NULL) AND (wdct.WorkingDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) OR wdct.WorkingDate IS NULL) GROUP BY ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + A.SalesmanName, CustomerIndicator = CASE A.CustInd WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ' ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END, A.WorkingDays, SumOfVisits = ISNULL(CountOfVisits,0), SumOfSales = ISNULL(CountOfSales,0), SumOfPostp = ISNULL(CountOfPostp,0), SumOfLosses = ISNULL(CountOfLosses,0) into #tmp FROM (SELECT swd.supervisorid , swd.SalesManID , swd.SupervisorName , swd.SalesmanName , swd.WorkingDays , B.CustInd FROM WorkingDays swd CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 CustInd UNION SELECT 1 CustInd) B ) A LEFT JOIN GroupVisitData gv ON A.SalesManID = gv.SalesManID AND gv.supervisorid = A.supervisorid AND A.CustInd = A.SalesManID = gp.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gp.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gp.supervisorid LEFT JOIN GroupLossesData gl ON A.SalesManID = gl.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gl.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gl.supervisorid select * from #tmp WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds) if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null drop table #tmp

datasets.name: Users
datasets.query:
IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) 
   
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56
OR [4parentunit].ID = 56
OR [3parentunit].ID = 56
OR [2parentunit].ID = 56
OR [1parentunit].ID = 56
OR [un].ID = 56
   
    
ELSE	
    
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))

named_assets.name: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Καμπάνια.CampaignDS
named_assets.sql_raw:
IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers )

SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id,
					CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
					FROM dbo.Campaign cm
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID

else

SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id,
					CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name
					FROM dbo.Campaign cm
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID
					JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
				WHERE tgiv.Supervisor IN (@UserIds)
named_assets.sql_normalized: IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN ( SELECT UserName FROM ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id, CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID else SELECT distinct CampaingId = cm.id, CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID WHERE tgiv.Supervisor IN (@UserIds)

named_assets.name: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Καμπάνια.Visits
named_assets.sql_raw:
----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign
--DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT
--SET @startdate = '20130628'
--SET @enddate = '20130628'
--SET @Campaignid = 24

--SELECT * FROM dbo.TaskType WHERE Description LIKE 'επίσκε%'

;WITH

CustomerVisits AS
(
SELECT  TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id,
				CampaignID = cm.ID ,
				CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME,
				SupervisorId = su.ID,
				SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''),
				SalesManId = U.ID,
				SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''),
				VisitDate =  DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, t.CompletedOn), 0),
				CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END,
				TaskOutcome = t.Outcome
				
FROM dbo.Campaign cm 
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
			JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv'
			JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID
			JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη	select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313)
            JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id		
            
            LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID 
									
	WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId 
			AND t.CompletedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
			AND ISNULL(ct.State,0) not in (3,5,10) and ISNULL(ct.type,0) in (0,2,3,4)

UNION  --Neo Rantebou

SELECT  TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id,
				CampaignID = cm.ID ,
				CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME,
				SupervisorId = su.ID,
				SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''),
				SalesManId = U.ID,
				SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''),
				VisitDate =  DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, tl.Timestamp), 0),
				CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END,
				TaskOutcome = tl.Outcome
				
FROM dbo.Campaign cm 
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID
			JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
			JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv'
			JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID
			JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη	
            JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id
            JOIN dbo.TaskLog tl ON t.ID = tl.TaskID AND tl.Outcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' 
            
	WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId 
			AND tl.Timestamp  BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
			
)			
,
 WorkingDays AS
 (
	SELECT CampaignId = ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID),
				CampaignDesc = ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME),
				SupervisorId = ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID) ,
				SupervisorName=ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')),				
				SalesManId = ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID),
				SalesmanName = ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName),
				WorkingDays = COUNT(DISTINCT  DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, wdct.WorkingDate), 0))
				
	FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign wdct
			JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = wdct.CampaignId 
			JOIN dbo.[User] u ON wdct.UserId = u.ID
			JOIN dbo.[User] su ON wdct.SupervisorId = su.ID
			FULL OUTER JOIN CustomerVisits yd ON wdct.CampaignId = yd.CampaignID
									AND wdct.UserId = yd.SalesManId
									AND wdct.SupervisorId = yd.SupervisorId
									AND wdct.WorkingDate = yd.VisitDate
			
			
	WHERE (cm.ID = @CampaignId  OR cm.ID IS NULL)
			AND (wdct.WorkingDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate)
					OR
				wdct.WorkingDate IS NULL)

	GROUP BY ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID),
				ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME),		
				ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID),
				ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')),
				ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID),
				ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName)
 ) 
,
GroupVisitData AS 
(
SELECT SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator,
		CountOfVisits = COUNT(*)   
FROM CustomerVisits
GROUP BY SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator
) 
,
GroupContractData AS  --Apodoxh Protashs kai Ekptvwsh pou den anhkei se Apodoxh Protashs
(
SELECT SalesManId ,
		 SupervisorId ,
		 CustomerIndicator ,
         CountOfSales = COUNT(*)
FROM 
(
SELECT *
from CustomerVisits cd
WHERE TaskOutcome IN ('Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΠΟΔΠ' , 'ΕΚΠΤ')  --'Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας',ΠΡΟΣΦ,ΝΕΟΡ,ΑΡΝ,ΕΚΠΤ
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CustomerVisits cv WHERE cv.TgivId = cd.tgivid AND cv.TaskOutcome = 'ΕΚΠΤ' AND cd.TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας'))
) a
GROUP BY SalesManId ,
		 SupervisorId ,
		 SalesmanId ,
		 CustomerIndicator		 
)   --select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) select * from yps1902.dbo.tasktype where id in(154,312,313)
,
GroupPostponeData AS 
(
SELECT SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator,
		CountOfPostp = COUNT(*)   
FROM CustomerVisits
WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ'
GROUP BY SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator
)  
,
GroupLossesData AS 
(
SELECT SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator,
		CountOfLosses = COUNT(*)   
FROM CustomerVisits
WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΑΡΝ'
GROUP BY SupervisorId,
		SalesManID,
		CustomerIndicator
) 

                  
SELECT  distinct
		A.SupervisorId,
		A.SupervisorName,
		A.SalesManID,
		A.SalesmanName,
		CustomerIndicator = CASE A.CustInd WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ'
												ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END,
		A.WorkingDays,
		SumOfVisits = ISNULL(CountOfVisits,0),
		SumOfSales = ISNULL(CountOfSales,0),
		SumOfPostp = ISNULL(CountOfPostp,0),
		SumOfLosses = ISNULL(CountOfLosses,0)
into #tmp		
		
FROM (SELECT swd.supervisorid
							, swd.SalesManID 
							, swd.SupervisorName
							, swd.SalesmanName
							, swd.WorkingDays 
							, B.CustInd
					FROM WorkingDays swd 
							CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 CustInd
										UNION
										SELECT 1 CustInd) B
					) A
		LEFT JOIN GroupVisitData gv ON A.SalesManID = gv.SalesManID 
											AND gv.supervisorid = A.supervisorid
											AND A.CustInd = gv.CustomerIndicator
		LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gc ON A.SalesManID = gc.SalesManId 
										AND A.CustInd = gc.CustomerIndicator 
										AND A.supervisorid = gc.supervisorid
		LEFT JOIN GroupPostponeData gp ON A.SalesManID = gp.SalesManId 
										AND A.CustInd = gp.CustomerIndicator 
										AND A.supervisorid = gp.supervisorid	
		LEFT JOIN GroupLossesData gl ON A.SalesManID = gl.SalesManId 
										AND A.CustInd = gl.CustomerIndicator 
										AND A.supervisorid = gl.supervisorid												


select *
from #tmp 								
WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds)


if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null drop table #tmp
named_assets.sql_normalized: ----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign --DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT --SET @startdate = '20130628' --SET @enddate = '20130628' --SET @Campaignid = 24 --SELECT * FROM dbo.TaskType WHERE Description LIKE 'επίσκε%' ;WITH CustomerVisits AS ( SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME, SupervisorId = su.ID, SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''), SalesManId = U.ID, SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''), VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, t.CompletedOn), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = t.Outcome FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId AND t.CompletedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) AND ISNULL(ct.State,0) not in (3,5,10) and ISNULL(ct.type,0) in (0,2,3,4) UNION --Neo Rantebou SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME, SupervisorId = su.ID, SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''), SalesManId = U.ID, SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''), VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, tl.Timestamp), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = tl.Outcome FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id JOIN dbo.TaskLog tl ON t.ID = tl.TaskID AND tl.Outcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId AND tl.Timestamp BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) ) , WorkingDays AS ( SELECT CampaignId = ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), CampaignDesc = ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), SupervisorId = ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID) , SupervisorName=ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')), SalesManId = ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID), SalesmanName = ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName), WorkingDays = COUNT(DISTINCT DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, wdct.WorkingDate), 0)) FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign wdct JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = wdct.CampaignId JOIN dbo.[User] u ON wdct.UserId = u.ID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON wdct.SupervisorId = su.ID FULL OUTER JOIN CustomerVisits yd ON wdct.CampaignId = yd.CampaignID AND wdct.UserId = yd.SalesManId AND wdct.SupervisorId = yd.SupervisorId AND wdct.WorkingDate = yd.VisitDate WHERE (cm.ID = @CampaignId OR cm.ID IS NULL) AND (wdct.WorkingDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) OR wdct.WorkingDate IS NULL) GROUP BY ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID), ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')), ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID), ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName) ) , GroupVisitData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator, CountOfVisits = COUNT(*) FROM CustomerVisits GROUP BY SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator ) , GroupContractData AS --Apodoxh Protashs kai Ekptvwsh pou den anhkei se Apodoxh Protashs ( SELECT SalesManId , SupervisorId , CustomerIndicator , CountOfSales = COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * from CustomerVisits cd WHERE TaskOutcome IN ('Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΠΟΔΠ' , 'ΕΚΠΤ') --'Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας',ΠΡΟΣΦ,ΝΕΟΡ,ΑΡΝ,ΕΚΠΤ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CustomerVisits cv WHERE cv.TgivId = cd.tgivid AND cv.TaskOutcome = 'ΕΚΠΤ' AND cd.TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας')) ) a GROUP BY SalesManId , SupervisorId , SalesmanId , CustomerIndicator ) --select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) select * from yps1902.dbo.tasktype where id in(154,312,313) , GroupPostponeData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator, CountOfPostp = COUNT(*) FROM CustomerVisits WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' GROUP BY SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator ) , GroupLossesData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator, CountOfLosses = COUNT(*) FROM CustomerVisits WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΑΡΝ' GROUP BY SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator ) SELECT distinct A.SupervisorId, A.SupervisorName, A.SalesManID, A.SalesmanName, CustomerIndicator = CASE A.CustInd WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ' ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END, A.WorkingDays, SumOfVisits = ISNULL(CountOfVisits,0), SumOfSales = ISNULL(CountOfSales,0), SumOfPostp = ISNULL(CountOfPostp,0), SumOfLosses = ISNULL(CountOfLosses,0) into #tmp FROM (SELECT swd.supervisorid , swd.SalesManID , swd.SupervisorName , swd.SalesmanName , swd.WorkingDays , B.CustInd FROM WorkingDays swd CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 CustInd UNION SELECT 1 CustInd) B ) A LEFT JOIN GroupVisitData gv ON A.SalesManID = gv.SalesManID AND gv.supervisorid = A.supervisorid AND A.CustInd = gv.CustomerIndicator LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gc ON A.SalesManID = gc.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gc.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gc.supervisorid LEFT JOIN GroupPostponeData gp ON A.SalesManID = gp.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gp.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gp.supervisorid LEFT JOIN GroupLossesData gl ON A.SalesManID = gl.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gl.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gl.supervisorid select * from #tmp WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds) if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null drop table #tmp

named_assets.name: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Καμπάνια.Users
named_assets.sql_raw:
IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) 
   
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56
OR [4parentunit].ID = 56
OR [3parentunit].ID = 56
OR [2parentunit].ID = 56
OR [1parentunit].ID = 56
OR [un].ID = 56
   
    
ELSE	
    
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
OR [un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))

datasets.name: DailyActivityDS
datasets.query:
;WITH    ContractData
          AS (
           SELECT   CampaignID = cm.id,
                        CampaignCode = cm.Code,
                        CampaignDescription = cm.Name,
                        SalesManId = ct.SalesManID,
                        SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor,
                        Supervisor = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName,
                        Salesman = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName,
                        CustomerIndicator = CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE LossPrintedNew END,
                        ContractId = ct.id,
                        bp.ID BPId,
                        ContractPrice =  (SELECT   CAST(SUM( CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL 
													THEN cp.AlteredAmount 
													ELSE (cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount) END ) AS money)
													
                                          FROM      dbo.ContractProduct cp
										  JOIN dbo.Contract ct1 ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct1.id
                                          WHERE     cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id AND cp.State <> 3)
                                       
               FROM     dbo.Campaign cm
						JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID
						JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
						JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
						JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID
						JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313,300,309,311)	---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη, νέο ραντεβού --,Απάντηση Αιτήματος Έκπτωσης added on 20130724 
                        --JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID
                        JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.State not in (3,5,10) and ct.type in (0,3,2,4)		---Not cancelled	
						JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID
                        JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
                        JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
               WHERE                            															
                         ISNULL(t.Outcome, 'ΑΠΟΔΠ') IN ( 'ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΕΚΠΤ')--ΑΕΚΠΤ added on 20130724 
                        AND cm.ID = @CampaignID
						--AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @EndDate) 	
						AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @EndDate) --DEV3848		
GROUP BY cm.id ,
        cm.Code ,
        cm.Name ,
        su.SalesCode ,
        su.LastName ,
        su.FirstName ,
        u.SalesCode ,
        u.LastName ,
        u.FirstName ,
        (CASE LossPrintedNew
            WHEN 2 THEN 0
            ELSE LossPrintedNew
            END) ,
        ct.id ,
        bp.id ,
        ct.SalesManID ,
        tgiv.Supervisor 

             ) ,
        PreprintedFilteredData
          AS ( SELECT   SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor,
						tgiv.HandlerUserID,
                        tgiv.LossPrintedNew,
                        SumPreprintedValue = SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) 
               FROM    dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv 
                        JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
                        ---only selected allocation plan
                        JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID AND  tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
               WHERE    EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ContractData fcd 
									WHERE tgi.businesspointid = fcd.bpid AND tgi.CampaignID = fcd.campaignid
											AND CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END = fcd.CustomerIndicator
                        )
                        AND tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1 ---mono protupwmenoi
               GROUP BY tgiv.Supervisor,
						tgiv.HandlerUserID,
                        tgiv.LossPrintedNew
             )
              ,
         ReportData
          AS ( 
         SELECT   CampaignDesc = '[' + CampaignCode + '] ' + CampaignDescription,
                        Supervisor,
                        SupervisorId,
                        Salesman,
                        SalesManId,
                        CustomerIndicator = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ'
												ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END ,
                        CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT ContractId),
                        SumOfContractPrice = SUM(ContractPrice),
                        SumPreprintedValue = 
	
	----edw einai olh thn protupwmenh tou pelath pou exei anatethei ston pwlhth kai oxi tou sugkekrimenou case
                        ISNULL(( SELECT SumPreprintedValue
                                 FROM   PreprintedFilteredData pfd
                                 WHERE  pfd.HandlerUserID = cd.SalesmanId
										AND pfd.SupervisorId = cd.SupervisorId
                                        AND pfd.LossPrintedNew = cd.CustomerIndicator
                               ), 0)
               FROM     ContractData cd
               GROUP BY CampaignId,
                        CampaignCode,
                        CampaignDescription,
                        Supervisor,
                        SupervisorId,
                        Salesman,
                        CustomerIndicator,
                        SalesManId,
                        cd.SupervisorId
             )
             
    SELECT  rd.CampaignDesc,
            rd.Supervisor,
            rd.SupervisorId,
            rd.Salesman,
            CustomerIndicator,
            CountOfContracts,
            SumOfContractPrice,
            SumPreprintedValue,
            Raised = CASE WHEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue > 0 THEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue ELSE 0 END,
            Reduced = CASE WHEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue < 0 THEN ABS(SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue) ELSE 0 END
    INTO #tmp
    FROM    ReportData RD
    
    SELECT CampaignDesc,
            Supervisor,
            Salesman,
            CustomerIndicator,
            CountOfContracts,
            SumOfContractPrice,
            SumPreprintedValue,
            Raised ,
            Reduced 
    FROM #tmp
    WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds)
    
    IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp
