u.SalesCode , u.LastName , u.FirstName , (CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE LossPrintedNew END) , ct.id , bp.id , ct.SalesManID , tgiv.Supervisor ) , PreprintedFilteredData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.LossPrintedNew, SumPreprintedValue = SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID ---only selected allocation plan JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1 ---mono protupwmenoi GROUP BY tgiv.Supervisor, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.LossPrintedNew ) , ReportData AS ( SELECT CampaignDesc = '[' + CampaignCode + '] ' + #tmp

datasets.name: CampaignDS
datasets.query:
IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers )

datasets.name: Users
datasets.query:
IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) 
   
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56
OR [4parentunit].ID = 56
OR [3parentunit].ID = 56
OR [2parentunit].ID = 56
OR [1parentunit].ID = 56
OR [un].ID = 56
   
    
ELSE	
    
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description

named_assets.name: Premise - Ημερήσια Δραστηριότητα Ανά Καμπάνια.DailyActivityDS
named_assets.sql_raw:
;WITH    ContractData
          AS (
           SELECT   CampaignID = cm.id,
                        CampaignCode = cm.Code,
                        CampaignDescription = cm.Name,
                        SalesManId = ct.SalesManID,
                        SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor,
                        Supervisor = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName,
                        Salesman = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName,
                        CustomerIndicator = CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE LossPrintedNew END,
                        ContractId = ct.id,
                        bp.ID BPId,
                        ContractPrice =  (SELECT   CAST(SUM( CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL 
													THEN cp.AlteredAmount 
													ELSE (cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount) END ) AS money)
													
                                          FROM      dbo.ContractProduct cp
										  JOIN dbo.Contract ct1 ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct1.id
                                          WHERE     cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id AND cp.State <> 3)
                                       
               FROM     dbo.Campaign cm
						JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID
						JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
						JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
						JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID
						JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
                                                AND TT.ActivityType = 'H'
                                                AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313,300,309,311)	---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη, νέο ραντεβού --,Απάντηση Αιτήματος Έκπτωσης added on 20130724 
                        --JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID
                        JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.State not in (3,5,10) and ct.type in (0,3,2,4)		---Not cancelled	
						JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID
                        JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
                        JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID
               WHERE                            															
                         ISNULL(t.Outcome, 'ΑΠΟΔΠ') IN ( 'ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΕΚΠΤ')--ΑΕΚΠΤ added on 20130724 
                        AND cm.ID = @CampaignID
						--AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @EndDate) 	
						AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @EndDate) --DEV3848		
GROUP BY cm.id ,
        cm.Code ,
        cm.Name ,
        su.SalesCode ,
        su.LastName ,
        su.FirstName ,
        u.SalesCode ,
        u.LastName ,
        u.FirstName ,
        (CASE LossPrintedNew
            WHEN 2 THEN 0
            ELSE LossPrintedNew
            END) ,
        ct.id ,
        bp.id ,
        ct.SalesManID ,
        tgiv.Supervisor 

             ) ,
        PreprintedFilteredData
          AS ( SELECT   SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor,
						tgiv.HandlerUserID,
                        tgiv.LossPrintedNew,
                        SumPreprintedValue = SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) 
               FROM    dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv 
                        JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
                        ---only selected allocation plan
                        JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID AND  tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID
               WHERE    EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ContractData fcd 
									WHERE tgi.businesspointid = fcd.bpid AND tgi.CampaignID = fcd.campaignid
											AND CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0
												ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END = fcd.CustomerIndicator
                        )
                        AND tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1 ---mono protupwmenoi
               GROUP BY tgiv.Supervisor,
						tgiv.HandlerUserID,
                        tgiv.LossPrintedNew
             )
              ,
         ReportData
          AS ( 
         SELECT   CampaignDesc = '[' + CampaignCode + '] ' + CampaignDescription,
                        Supervisor,
                        SupervisorId,
                        Salesman,
                        SalesManId,
                        CustomerIndicator = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ'
												ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END ,
                        CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT ContractId),
                        SumOfContractPrice = SUM(ContractPrice),
                        SumPreprintedValue = 
	
	----edw einai olh thn protupwmenh tou pelath pou exei anatethei ston pwlhth kai oxi tou sugkekrimenou case
                        ISNULL(( SELECT SumPreprintedValue
                                 FROM   PreprintedFilteredData pfd
                                 WHERE  pfd.HandlerUserID = cd.SalesmanId
										AND pfd.SupervisorId = cd.SupervisorId
                                        AND pfd.LossPrintedNew = cd.CustomerIndicator
                               ), 0)
               FROM     ContractData cd
               GROUP BY CampaignId,
                        CampaignCode,
                        CampaignDescription,
                        Supervisor,
                        SupervisorId,
                        Salesman,
                        CustomerIndicator,
                        SalesManId,
                        cd.SupervisorId
             )
             
    SELECT  rd.CampaignDesc,
            rd.Supervisor,
            rd.SupervisorId,
            rd.Salesman,
            CustomerIndicator,
            CountOfContracts,
            SumOfContractPrice,
            SumPreprintedValue,
            Raised = CASE WHEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue > 0 THEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue ELSE 0 END,
            Reduced = CASE WHEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue < 0 THEN ABS(SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue) ELSE 0 END
    INTO #tmp
    FROM    ReportData RD
    
    SELECT CampaignDesc,
            Supervisor,
            Salesman,
            CustomerIndicator,
            CountOfContracts,
            SumOfContractPrice,
            SumPreprintedValue,
            Raised ,
            Reduced 
    FROM #tmp
    WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds)
    
    IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp

UnitDescription = un.Description, [1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description FROM dbo.[User] u JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id WHERE [5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))

datasets.name: DataSet1
datasets.query:
;with products as
    (SELECT DISTINCT
    code ProductCode,
    pt.id TypeID,
    pt.Description TypeDescription ,
    CASE
    WHEN pt.ID IN (35,36,73,74) THEN 'PROFILE'
    WHEN pt.ID IN (38,39,70,71) THEN 'BANNER'
    WHEN pt.ID IN (40,75,76,85,86,87,88) THEN 'SPONSOR'
    ELSE 'GENERIC'
    END as [Type]
    FROM yps.dbo.Product pr JOIN yps.dbo.ProductType pt ON pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID
    WHERE pr.MediumVersionID = 36
    ),
    sourcedata as
    (
    SELECT
    [AdId] = UniqID ,
    [BranchCode] = CustomerCode ,
    [Contracts] = ContractIDs,
    [Category] = CAST(CategoryID as NVARCHAR(255)) + ' - ' + CategoryGr,
    [Name] = NameGr ,
    [Address]= ISNULL(AddressGr + ', ', '') + ISNULL(Address2Gr + ', ', '') + ISNULL('T.K. ' + ZipCode, '') ,
    [Municipality]= MunicipalityGr ,
    [Prefecture]= PrefectureGr ,
    [Rank]=isnull([rank],0),
    [StartDate] = PaidListingStartDate ,
    [Udacs]= ContractUdacs ,
    [BillingScore] = ContractBilling,

    [Type]= ltrim(rtrim(case when len(isnull(ContractUdacs,'')) = 0 then 'FREE' else '' end + isnull(' ' + p.[Type] , '')))

    from xoupdate.XoListing l
    cross apply dbo.SplitString(',',ContractUdacs) a
    left join products p on p.ProductCode = ltrim(rtrim(a.s))

   where
   (
	(CategoryID = @categoryid AND CustomerCode = @customercode ) 
	OR
	(@categoryid is null AND CustomerCode = @customercode ) 
	OR 
	(CategoryID = @categoryid AND @customercode is null) 
	
   )
  
 	AND AdType <> 0
   )

    SELECT  distinct [AdId],
    [BranchCode],
    [Contracts],
    [Category],
    [Name],
    [Address],
    [Municipality],
    [Prefecture],
    [Rank],
    [StartDate],
    [Udacs],
    [BillingScore],

    [Type] = LTRIM( REPLACE( (SELECT DISTINCT ' ' + din.Type
    FROM sourcedata din
    WHERE din.AdId = d.adid
    FOR XML PATH(''))
    ,'GENERIC', '')
    )

    from sourcedata d
    group by [AdId], [BranchCode], [Contracts], [Category], [Name],
    [Address],
    [Municipality],
    [Prefecture],
    [Rank],
    [StartDate],
    [Udacs],
    [BillingScore]

	order by [AdId]

datasets.name: OnlineContractsSpecificCampaignsDataSet
datasets.query:
--DECLARE @CampaignID INT, @DateFrom DATETIME, @DateTo DATETIME, @DateType BIT, @User1 NVARCHAR(30);
--SET @DateType =1;
--SET @CampaignID =60;
--SET @DateFrom ='2013-07-01';
--SET @DateTo ='2015-07-16';
--SET @User1 ='';
----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign
--if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null
--drop table #tmp

SELECT vw.[Καμπάνια]
      ,vw.[Κωδ. Πελάτη]
      ,vw.[Επωνυμία]
      ,vw.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
      ,vw.[Αξία]
       ,vw.[Εκπτωση Τρόπου πληρωμής]
      , CASE 
			WHEN vw.[ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] <> vw.[Αξία] 
			THEN vw.[ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] 
			ELSE NULL 
		END [ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία]
      ,vw.[Περιέχει Συνδρομητική Προβολή]
      ,vw.[Περιέχει Προβολή Προς Ανανέωση]
      ,vw.[Πωλητής]
      ,vw.[Ημ. Υπογραφής]
      ,vw.[Ημ. Δημιουργίας]
      ,vw.[State ( Συμβολαίου )]
	  ,tgiv.id tgivID
    , tgiv.LossPrintedNew
INTO #tmp
 FROM ITApps.[dbo].[vwContractsPerCampaign] vw
 JOIN yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID) = vw.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
 LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] u ON tgiv.Supervisor = u.id
WHERE vw.CampaignID in ( @CampaignID) AND u.id in (@User1)
AND (
      (@DateType=0 and  [Ημ. Υπογραφής] BETWEEN isnull(@DateFrom,'2005-01-01') AND isnull(@DateTo,'2099-01-01')) or
      (@DateType=1 and  cast([Ημ. Δημιουργίας] as DATE) BETWEEN isnull(@DateFrom,'2005-01-01') AND isnull(@DateTo,'2099-01-01'))
   
   )
  --AND ('HEADQUARTERS\'+ +u.UserName in( @User)

if object_id('tempdb..#contractTasks') is not null
drop table #contractTasks

  SELECT tmp.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου],t.id taskID,isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-') tDescription
  INTO #contractTasks
  FROM #tmp tmp
  JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.ContextEntityID = tmp.tgivID AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
  JOIN YPS.dbo.[case] c ON mc.ID = c.MasterCaseID
  JOIN YPS.dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID
  JOIN YPS.dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'H'
  WHERE t.Status = 0 AND c.state = 0 
  ORDER BY t.id desc


if object_id('tempdb..#contractproducts') is not null
drop table #contractproducts

if object_id('tempdb..#tmpPr') is not null
drop table #tmpPr

  SELECT cp.RelatedContractID ctid,pr.code prcode
  into #tmpPr
  FROM #tmp tmp
  JOIN YPS.dbo.ContractProduct cp on tmp.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]=cp.RelatedContractID
  join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID=cp.ID
  join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID
  where pr.IsComposite=0

SELECT p1.ctid,
      ( SELECT p2.prcode + ',' 
          FROM #tmpPr p2
         WHERE p2.ctid = p1.ctid
         ORDER BY p2.prcode
           FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Products
 into #contractproducts          
  FROM #tmpPr p1
 GROUP BY ctid
 
 

if object_id('tempdb..#tmpm') is not null
drop table #tmpm
select  distinct '[' + mv.Code + ']-'+m.name as medium
       ,t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] 
  into #tmpm
  from #tmp t
  join yps.dbo.Contract ct on t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ct.ID
  join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID
  join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID
  join yps.dbo.Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.id
  join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
  join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
  join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID
  where pr.IsComposite = 0
  
  if object_id('tempdb..#medium') is not null
drop table #medium
  select t1.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ,
      ( SELECT t2.medium + ',' 
          FROM #tmpm t2
         WHERE t2.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = t1.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
         ORDER BY t2.medium
           FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Mediums
    into #medium       
    from #tmpm t1
    group by [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] 

  SELECT Καμπάνια ,
case  LossPrintedNew when 0 then 'Νέος' when 1 then 'Προτυπωμένος' when 2 then 'Απώλεια' end [Κατηγορία Πελάτη],
  		[Κωδ. Πελάτη] ,
  		Επωνυμία ,
  		[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ,
  		Αξία ,
                                     [Εκπτωση Τρόπου πληρωμής] ,
  		ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία ,
  		[Περιέχει Συνδρομητική Προβολή] ,
  		[Περιέχει Προβολή Προς Ανανέωση] ,
  		Πωλητής ,
  		[Ημ. Υπογραφής] ,
  		[Ημ. Δημιουργίας] ,
  		[State ( Συμβολαίου )] ,
		isnull((SELECT TOP 1 tDescription FROM #contractTasks c WHERE c.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ORDER BY taskID desc),'-') tDescription,
        [Προϊόντα Συμβολαίου]=(select SUBSTRING(pr.Products,1,LEN(pr.products)-1) from #contractproducts pr where pr.ctid=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]),
        [Μέσο]=(select SUBSTRING(m.Mediums,1,LEN(m.Mediums)-1) from #medium m where m.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]) ,
        [Τρόπος Πληρωμής]=tt.Description,
		[Activity] = cln.Name,
		[Πόλη] = a.GeoModelLocText

 
  FROM #tmp t
  join yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on t.[Κωδ. Πελάτη] = bp.code
  JOIN yps.dbo.Classification cl ON bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
  JOIN yps.dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID
  join yps.dbo.Address a on bp.LocationAddressID = a.id
  left join yps.dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.id=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
  left join yps.dbo.PaymentMethodType tt on tt.id=pm.PaymentMethodTypeID
  where cl.ClassifierID = 3

datasets.name: Users
datasets.query:
IF SUBSTRING(@user, CHARINDEX('\', @user) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) 
   
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56
OR [4parentunit].ID = 56
OR [3parentunit].ID = 56
OR [2parentunit].ID = 56
OR [1parentunit].ID = 56
OR [un].ID = 56

   else if sUBSTRING(@user, CHARINDEX('\', @user) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  u.username
    FROM    YPS.dbo.[user] u
	join    YPS.dbo.[UserRole] ur on u.id=ur.UserID
	where ur.roleid=42
	 )  

SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
   FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 55
OR [4parentunit].ID = 55
OR [3parentunit].ID = 55
OR [2parentunit].ID = 55
OR [1parentunit].ID = 55
OR [un].ID = 55



    
ELSE	
    
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description--,  
	--[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].DESCRIPTION, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, 
	--[5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE --[5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR 
--[1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR 
[un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@user, CHARINDEX('\', @user) + 1, 50)) AND u.IsUnitManager = 1

named_assets.name: Report Παρασκευής - Contracts Campaigns.OnlineContractsSpecificCampaignsDataSet
named_assets.sql_raw:
--DECLARE @CampaignID INT, @DateFrom DATETIME, @DateTo DATETIME, @DateType BIT, @User1 NVARCHAR(30);
--SET @DateType =1;
--SET @CampaignID =60;
--SET @DateFrom ='2013-07-01';
--SET @DateTo ='2015-07-16';
--SET @User1 ='';
----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign
--if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null
--drop table #tmp

SELECT vw.[Καμπάνια]
      ,vw.[Κωδ. Πελάτη]
      ,vw.[Επωνυμία]
      ,vw.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
      ,vw.[Αξία]
       ,vw.[Εκπτωση Τρόπου πληρωμής]
      , CASE 
			WHEN vw.[ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] <> vw.[Αξία] 
			THEN vw.[ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] 
			ELSE NULL 
		END [ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία]
      ,vw.[Περιέχει Συνδρομητική Προβολή]
      ,vw.[Περιέχει Προβολή Προς Ανανέωση]
      ,vw.[Πωλητής]
      ,vw.[Ημ. Υπογραφής]
      ,vw.[Ημ. Δημιουργίας]
      ,vw.[State ( Συμβολαίου )]
	  ,tgiv.id tgivID
    , tgiv.LossPrintedNew
INTO #tmp
 FROM ITApps.[dbo].[vwContractsPerCampaign] vw
 JOIN yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID) = vw.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
 LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] u ON tgiv.Supervisor = u.id
WHERE vw.CampaignID in ( @CampaignID) AND u.id in (@User1)
AND (
      (@DateType=0 and  [Ημ. Υπογραφής] BETWEEN isnull(@DateFrom,'2005-01-01') AND isnull(@DateTo,'2099-01-01')) or
      (@DateType=1 and  cast([Ημ. Δημιουργίας] as DATE) BETWEEN isnull(@DateFrom,'2005-01-01') AND isnull(@DateTo,'2099-01-01'))
   
   )
  --AND ('HEADQUARTERS\'+ +u.UserName in( @User)

if object_id('tempdb..#contractTasks') is not null
drop table #contractTasks

  SELECT tmp.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου],t.id taskID,isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-') tDescription
  INTO #contractTasks
  FROM #tmp tmp
  JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.ContextEntityID = tmp.tgivID AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
  JOIN YPS.dbo.[case] c ON mc.ID = c.MasterCaseID
  JOIN YPS.dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID
  JOIN YPS.dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'H'
  WHERE t.Status = 0 AND c.state = 0 
  ORDER BY t.id desc


if object_id('tempdb..#contractproducts') is not null
drop table #contractproducts

if object_id('tempdb..#tmpPr') is not null
drop table #tmpPr

  SELECT cp.RelatedContractID ctid,pr.code prcode
  into #tmpPr
  FROM #tmp tmp
  JOIN YPS.dbo.ContractProduct cp on tmp.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]=cp.RelatedContractID
  join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID=cp.ID
  join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID
  where pr.IsComposite=0

SELECT p1.ctid,
      ( SELECT p2.prcode + ',' 
          FROM #tmpPr p2
         WHERE p2.ctid = p1.ctid
         ORDER BY p2.prcode
           FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Products
 into #contractproducts          
  FROM #tmpPr p1
 GROUP BY ctid
 
 

if object_id('tempdb..#tmpm') is not null
drop table #tmpm
select  distinct '[' + mv.Code + ']-'+m.name as medium
       ,t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] 
  into #tmpm
  from #tmp t
  join yps.dbo.Contract ct on t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ct.ID
  join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID
  join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID
  join yps.dbo.Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.id
  join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
  join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
  join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID
  where pr.IsComposite = 0
  
  if object_id('tempdb..#medium') is not null
drop table #medium
  select t1.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ,
      ( SELECT t2.medium + ',' 
          FROM #tmpm t2
         WHERE t2.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = t1.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
         ORDER BY t2.medium
           FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Mediums
    into #medium       
    from #tmpm t1
    group by [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] 

  SELECT Καμπάνια ,
case  LossPrintedNew when 0 then 'Νέος' when 1 then 'Προτυπωμένος' when 2 then 'Απώλεια' end [Κατηγορία Πελάτη],
  		[Κωδ. Πελάτη] ,
  		Επωνυμία ,
  		[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ,
  		Αξία ,
                                     [Εκπτωση Τρόπου πληρωμής] ,
  		ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία ,
  		[Περιέχει Συνδρομητική Προβολή] ,
  		[Περιέχει Προβολή Προς Ανανέωση] ,
  		Πωλητής ,
  		[Ημ. Υπογραφής] ,
  		[Ημ. Δημιουργίας] ,
  		[State ( Συμβολαίου )] ,
		isnull((SELECT TOP 1 tDescription FROM #contractTasks c WHERE c.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ORDER BY taskID desc),'-') tDescription,
        [Προϊόντα Συμβολαίου]=(select SUBSTRING(pr.Products,1,LEN(pr.products)-1) from #contractproducts pr where pr.ctid=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]),
        [Μέσο]=(select SUBSTRING(m.Mediums,1,LEN(m.Mediums)-1) from #medium m where m.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]) ,
        [Τρόπος Πληρωμής]=tt.Description,
		[Activity] = cln.Name,
		[Πόλη] = a.GeoModelLocText

 
  FROM #tmp t
  join yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on t.[Κωδ. Πελάτη] = bp.code
  JOIN yps.dbo.Classification cl ON bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
  JOIN yps.dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID
  join yps.dbo.Address a on bp.LocationAddressID = a.id
  left join yps.dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.id=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
  left join yps.dbo.PaymentMethodType tt on tt.id=pm.PaymentMethodTypeID
  where cl.ClassifierID = 3

named_assets.name: Report Παρασκευής - Contracts Campaigns.CampaignsDataSet
named_assets.sql_raw: SELECT code + ' - ' + Name as Name, ID FROM dbo.Campaign
named_assets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  code + ' - ' + Name AS Name,
  ID
FROM dbo.Campaign

named_assets.name: Report Παρασκευής - Contracts Campaigns.Users
named_assets.sql_raw:
IF SUBSTRING(@user, CHARINDEX('\', @user) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  UserName
    FROM    ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) 
   
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56
OR [4parentunit].ID = 56
OR [3parentunit].ID = 56
OR [2parentunit].ID = 56
OR [1parentunit].ID = 56
OR [un].ID = 56

   else if sUBSTRING(@user, CHARINDEX('\', @user) + 1, 50) IN (
    SELECT  u.username
    FROM    YPS.dbo.[user] u
	join    YPS.dbo.[UserRole] ur on u.id=ur.UserID
	where ur.roleid=42
	 )  

SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description,  
	[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
   FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 55
OR [4parentunit].ID = 55
OR [3parentunit].ID = 55
OR [2parentunit].ID = 55
OR [1parentunit].ID = 55
OR [un].ID = 55



    
ELSE	
    
SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, 
	UnitDescription = un.Description--,  
	--[1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].DESCRIPTION, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, 
	--[5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description
	
FROM dbo.[User] u
JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID 
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id
--LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id
WHERE --[5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR 
--[1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))
--OR 
[un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@user, CHARINDEX('\', @user) + 1, 50)) AND u.IsUnitManager = 1

datasets.name: BundleReportDounisBetweenVersionRRRDataSet
datasets.query:
SELECT 
		[t99].BusinessPointCode AS [Κωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου],
		[t99].[ID] AS [Συμβόλαιο] ,
        CONVERT(VARCHAR,[t99].[value],103) AS [Ημ. Υπογ. Συμβολαίου] ,
        CONVERT(VARCHAR, [t99].[value2], 103) AS [Ημ. Δημ. Σμβολαίου] ,
        [t99].[value3] AS [Ποσό Συμβολαίου] ,
        [t99].[value4] AS [Τελικό Ποσό Συμβολαίου] ,
        [t99].[value5] AS [Ποσό Internet] ,
        [t99].[value6] AS [Ποσό Print] ,
        [t99].[value7] AS [Bundle] ,
        CONVERT(VARCHAR,[t99].[value8],103) AS [Ημ. Έναρξης Προβολής] ,
        [t99].[value9] AS [Έκδοση] ,
        [t99].[value10] AS [Μέσο] ,
        [t99].[value11] AS [Καμπάνια]
FROM    ( SELECT    [t4].[ID] ,
							[t4].BusinessPointCode,
                    ( SELECT    [t10].[SignedDate]
                      FROM      ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                                            [t5].[RelatedContractID]
                                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t5]
                                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t6] ON [t6].[ID] = [t5].[RelatedContractID] and [t6].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t7] ON [t7].[ID] = [t5].[ProductID]
                                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t8]
                                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t6].[ID] )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t5].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                            AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1)
                                            --AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] <  )
                                            AND ( [t7].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                            AND ( [t6].[State] = @p2 )
                                            AND ( [t8].[ContractProductID] = [t5].[ID] )
                                ) AS [t9]
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t10] ON [t10].[ID] = [t9].[RelatedContractID] and [t10].type in (0,2,3,4)
                    ) AS [value] ,
                    ( SELECT    [t16].[CreatedOn]
                      FROM      ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                                            [t11].[RelatedContractID]
                                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t11]
                                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t12] ON [t12].[ID] = [t11].[RelatedContractID] and [t12].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t13] ON [t13].[ID] = [t11].[ProductID]
                                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t14]
                                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t12].[ID] )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t11].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t12].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                            AND ( [t12].[SignedDate] BETWEEN  @p0 AND @p1)
                                           -- AND ( [t12].[SignedDate] <  )
                                            AND ( [t13].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                            AND ( [t12].[State] = @p2 )
                                            AND ( [t14].[ContractProductID] = [t11].[ID] )
                                ) AS [t15]
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t16] ON [t16].[ID] = [t15].[RelatedContractID] and [t16].type in (0,2,3,4)
                    ) AS [value2] ,
                    ( SELECT    SUM([t23].[Price])
                      FROM      ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                                            [t17].[RelatedContractID]
                                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t17]
                                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t18] ON [t18].[ID] = [t17].[RelatedContractID] and [t18].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t19] ON [t19].[ID] = [t17].[ProductID]
                                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t20]
                                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t18].[ID] )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t17].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t18].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                            AND ( [t18].[SignedDate] BETWEEN  @p0 AND @p1)
                                            --AND ( [t18].[SignedDate] < @p1 )
                                            AND ( [t19].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                            AND ( [t18].[State] = @p2 )
                                            AND ( [t20].[ContractProductID] = [t17].[ID] )
                                ) AS [t21]
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t22] ON [t22].[ID] = [t21].[RelatedContractID] and [t22].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                CROSS JOIN [ContractProduct] AS [t23]
                      WHERE     [t23].[RelatedContractID] = [t22].[ID]
                    ) AS [value3] ,
                    ( SELECT    SUM(CASE WHEN [t30].state IN (3,4) AND [t30].AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN [t30].AlteredAmount else [t30].Price - [t30].Discount - [t30].RulesDiscount end)
                      FROM      ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                                            [t24].[RelatedContractID]
                                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t24]
                                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t25] ON [t25].[ID] = [t24].[RelatedContractID]
                                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t26] ON [t26].[ID] = [t24].[ProductID]
                                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t27]
                                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t25].[ID] )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t24].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t25].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                            AND ( [t25].[SignedDate] BETWEEN  @p0 AND @p1)
                                         --   AND ( [t25].[SignedDate] <  )
                                            AND ( [t26].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                            AND ( [t25].[State] = @p2 )
                                            AND ( [t27].[ContractProductID] = [t24].[ID] )
                                ) AS [t28]
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t29] ON [t29].[ID] = [t28].[RelatedContractID] and [t29].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                CROSS JOIN [ContractProduct] AS [t30]
                      WHERE     [t30].[RelatedContractID] = [t29].[ID]
                    ) AS [value4] ,
                    ( SELECT    SUM(CASE WHEN [t31].state IN (3,4) AND [t34].AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN [t34].AlteredAmount else [t34].Price - [t34].Discount - [t34].RulesDiscount end)
                      FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t31]
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t32] ON [t32].[ID] = [t31].[RelatedContractID]
                                INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t33] ON [t33].[ID] = [t31].[ProductID]
                                CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t34]
                                INNER JOIN [VersionSection] AS [t35] ON [t35].[ID] = [t34].[VersionSectionID]
                                INNER JOIN [MediumVersion] AS [t36] ON [t36].[ID] = [t35].[MediumVersionID]
                                INNER JOIN [Medium] AS [t37] ON [t37].[ID] = [t36].[MediumID]
                      WHERE     ( [t37].[MediumTypeID] = @p3 )
                                AND ( [t4].[ID] = [t32].[ID] )
                                AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t31].[ProductID] )
                                AND ( [t32].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                AND ( [t32].[SignedDate] BETWEEN  @p0 AND @p1)
                               -- AND ( [t32].[SignedDate] <  )
                                AND ( [t33].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                AND ( [t32].[State] = @p2 )
                                AND ( [t34].[ContractProductID] = [t31].[ID] )
                    ) AS [value5] ,
                    ( SELECT    SUM(CASE WHEN [t38].state IN (3,4) AND [t41].AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN [t41].AlteredAmount else [t41].Price - [t41].Discount - [t41].RulesDiscount end)
                      FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t38]
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t39] ON [t39].[ID] = [t38].[RelatedContractID] and [t39].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t40] ON [t40].[ID] = [t38].[ProductID]
                                CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t41]
                                INNER JOIN [VersionSection] AS [t42] ON [t42].[ID] = [t41].[VersionSectionID]
                                INNER JOIN [MediumVersion] AS [t43] ON [t43].[ID] = [t42].[MediumVersionID]
                                INNER JOIN [Medium] AS [t44] ON [t44].[ID] = [t43].[MediumID]
                      WHERE     ( [t44].[MediumTypeID] = @p4 )
                                AND ( [t4].[ID] = [t39].[ID] )
                                AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t38].[ProductID] )
                                AND ( [t39].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                AND ( [t39].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1)
                                --AND ( [t39].[SignedDate] <  )
                                AND ( [t40].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                AND ( [t39].[State] = @p2 )
                                AND ( [t41].[ContractProductID] = [t38].[ID] )
                    ) AS [value6] ,
                    ( ( (
        SELECT  [t50].[Code]
        FROM    ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                            [t45].[ProductID]
                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t45]
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t46] ON [t46].[ID] = [t45].[RelatedContractID] and [t46].type in (0,2,3,4)
                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t47] ON [t47].[ID] = [t45].[ProductID]
                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t48]
                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t46].[ID] )
                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t45].[ProductID] )
                            AND ( [t46].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                            AND ( [t46].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1)
                           -- AND ( [t46].[SignedDate] <  )
                            AND ( [t47].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                            AND ( [t46].[State] = @p2 )
                            AND ( [t48].[ContractProductID] = [t45].[ID] )
                ) AS [t49]
                INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t50] ON [t50].[ID] = [t49].[ProductID]   )                ) + ' - ' + @p5 )   
                + ( (
        SELECT  [t56].[Name]
        FROM    ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                            [t51].[ProductID]
                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t51]
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t52] ON [t52].[ID] = [t51].[RelatedContractID] and [t52].type in (0,2,3,4)
                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t53] ON [t53].[ID] = [t51].[ProductID]
                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t54]
                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t52].[ID] )
                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t51].[ProductID] )
                            AND ( [t52].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                            AND ( [t52].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1)
                          --  AND ( [t52].[SignedDate] <  )
                            AND ( [t53].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                            AND ( [t52].[State] = @p2 )
                            AND ( [t54].[ContractProductID] = [t51].[ID] )
                ) AS [t55]
                INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t56] ON [t56].[ID] = [t55].[ProductID]
        )
                      ) AS [value7] ,
                    ( SELECT    [t61].[AdvBeginDate]
                      FROM      ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                                            [t60].[AdvBeginDate]
                                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t57]
                                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t58] ON [t58].[ID] = [t57].[RelatedContractID] and [t58].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t59] ON [t59].[ID] = [t57].[ProductID]
                                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t60]
                                  WHERE     ( [t60].[ProductID] = [t4].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t60].[ProductKitID] IS NULL )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ID] = [t58].[ID] )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t57].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t58].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                                            AND ( [t58].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1)
                                          --  AND ( [t58].[SignedDate] <  )
                                            AND ( [t59].[IsComposite] = 1 )
                                            AND ( [t58].[State] = @p2 )
                                            AND ( [t60].[ContractProductID] = [t57].[ID] )
                                ) AS [t61]
                    ) AS [value8] ,
                    ( ( /*@p6
                        +*/ ( (
        SELECT  [t68].[Code]
        FROM    ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                            [t62].[VersionSectionID]
                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t62]
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t63] ON [t63].[ID] = [t62].[RelatedContractID] and [t63].type in (0,2,3,4)
                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t64] ON [t64].[ID] = [t62].[ProductID]
                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t65]
                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t63].[ID] )
                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t62].[ProductID] )
                            AND ( [t63].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )
                            AND ( [t63].[SignedDate]   BETWEEN @p0 and @p1)

named_assets.name: Report Πωλήσεων Bundle Προϊόντων.BundleReportDounisBetweenVersionRRRDataSet
named_assets.sql_raw:
SELECT 
		[t99].BusinessPointCode AS [Κωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου],
		[t99].[ID] AS [Συμβόλαιο] ,
        CONVERT(VARCHAR,[t99].[value],103) AS [Ημ. Υπογ. Συμβολαίου] ,
        CONVERT(VARCHAR, [t99].[value2], 103) AS [Ημ. Δημ. Σμβολαίου] ,
        [t99].[value3] AS [Ποσό Συμβολαίου] ,
        [t99].[value4] AS [Τελικό Ποσό Συμβολαίου] ,
        [t99].[value5] AS [Ποσό Internet] ,
        [t99].[value6] AS [Ποσό Print] ,
        [t99].[value7] AS [Bundle] ,
        CONVERT(VARCHAR,[t99].[value8],103) AS [Ημ. Έναρξης Προβολής] ,
        [t99].[value9] AS [Έκδοση] ,
        [t99].[value10] AS [Μέσο] ,
        [t99].[value11] AS [Καμπάνια]
FROM    ( SELECT    [t4].[ID] ,
							[t4].BusinessPointCode,
                    ( SELECT    [t10].[SignedDate]
                      FROM      ( SELECT TOP ( 1 )
                                            [t5].[RelatedContractID]
                                  FROM      [ContractProduct] AS [t5]
                                            LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t6] ON [t6].[ID] = [t5].[RelatedContractID] and [t6].type in (0,2,3,4)
                                            INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t7] ON [t7].[ID] = [t5].[ProductID]
                                            CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t8]
                                  WHERE     ( [t4].[ID] = [t6].[ID] )
                                            AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t5].[ProductID] )
                                            AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL )

datasets.name: MainDataSet
datasets.query:
select distinct
BpCode = bp.Code
,ContractId = cn.ID
,Campaign = cm.Description
,Salesman = usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName
,Udac = u.Code
,UdacPart = upd.Code
,cp.Quantity
,AdId = a.ID
,AdvBeginDate = cast(a.AdvBeginDate as DATE)
,AdvEndDate = cast(a.AdvEndDate as DATE)
from Advertisement a
join Product p on a.ProductID = p.id
join Udac u on p.UdacID = u.ID
--join UdacPart up on up.UdacID = u.ID and up.IsAddon = 1
--join UdacPartDefinition upd on up.UdacPartDefinitionID = upd.ID
join ContractProduct cp on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID
join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on cp.ID = cav.ContractProductID and a.ID = cav.AdvertisementID
join ProductPart pp on pp.ID  = cav.ProductPartID and pp.IsAddon = 1 
join ProductPartDefinition ppd on ppd.ID = pp.ProductPartDefinitionID
join UdacPartDefinition upd on upd.id = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID
join Contract cn on cp.RelatedContractID = cn.ID
join Campaign cm on cn.CampaignID = cm.ID
join [user] usr on cn.SalesManID = usr.ID
join BusinessPoint bp on cp.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
where u.code in (@Udacs)
and a.AdvBeginDate <= GETDATE() and a.AdvEndDate >= GETDATE()
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  bp.Code AS BpCode,
  cn.ID AS ContractId,
  cm.Description AS Campaign,
  usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName AS Salesman,
  u.Code AS Udac,
  upd.Code AS UdacPart,
  cp.Quantity,
  a.ID AS AdId,
  CAST(a.AdvBeginDate AS DATE) AS AdvBeginDate,
  CAST(a.AdvEndDate AS DATE) AS AdvEndDate
FROM Advertisement AS a
JOIN Product AS p
  ON a.ProductID = p.id
JOIN Udac AS u
  ON p.UdacID = u.ID /* join UdacPart up on up.UdacID = u.ID and up.IsAddon = 1 --join UdacPartDefinition upd on up.UdacPartDefinitionID = upd.ID join ContractProduct cp on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on cp.ID = cav.ContractProductID and a.ID = cav.AdvertisementID join ProductPart pp on pp.ID = cav.ProductPartID and pp.IsAddon = 1 join ProductPartDefinition ppd on ppd.ID = pp.ProductPartDefinitionID join UdacPartDefinition upd on upd.id = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID join Contract cn on cp.RelatedContractID = cn.ID join Campaign cm on cn.CampaignID = cm.ID join [user] usr on cn.SalesManID = usr.ID join BusinessPoint bp on cp.BusinessPointID = bp.ID where u.code in (@Udacs) and a.AdvBeginDate <= GETDATE() and a.AdvEndDate >= GETDATE() */

datasets.name: MainDataset
datasets.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#user') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #user;
SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], un.[ParentID] as 'ParentUnitID', (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName'
INTO #user
FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u
JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[Unit] un ON un.ID = u.UnitID
where u.[isActive] = 1 

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#manager') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #manager;
SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName'
INTO #manager 
FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u
JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[UserRole] ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID
WHERE u.[isUnitManager] = 1 and ur.[RoleID] IN (41,42) and u.UnitID <> 56


IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#managerleveluser') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #managerleveluser;
SELECT m.UserName as 'manager', u.UserName as 'salesman', u.UnitID as 'UnitID', m.FullName as 'ManagerFullName', u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName'
INTO #managerleveluser
FROM #manager m
JOIN #user u on m.UnitID = u.UnitID AND m.UserName <> u.UserName


;with UnderManagerUser as(
SELECT UserName as 'manager', UserName as 'salesman', UnitID as 'UnitID', FullName as 'ManagerFullName', FullName as 'SalesmanFullName'
FROM #manager 
UNION ALL
SELECT umu.manager, u.UserName, u.UnitID, umu.ManagerFullName, u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName'
FROM #user u
JOIN UnderManagerUser umu ON u.ParentUnitID = umu.UnitID
)


,
UserManager as(
SELECT * FROM UnderManagerUser
UNION ALL 
SELECT * FROM #managerleveluser
)


SELECT 
	[Product] = case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end
 ,[AreaManager] = um.ManagerFullName
 ,[Salesman] = um.SalesmanFullName
 ,[TotalBookings] = Count(*)

  FROM [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlotStatus s
  join [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlot ss on s.SlotId = ss.Id
  join [XODB].ypsonline.Enumerations en on en.id = ss.ProductCategoryId
	left join UserManager um on um.salesman = case LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) when 'amatzorou' then 'amantzorou' else LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) END
  
	where statusid = 13 
	and case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end IN (@pProductType)
	and EndDate > case @pActive when 'true' then GETDATE() else '1753-01-01' END
	group by  case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end, um.ManagerFullName, um.SalesmanFullName
datasets.sql_normalized: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#user') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #user; SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], un.[ParentID] as 'ParentUnitID', (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName' INTO #user FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[Unit] un ON un.ID = u.UnitID where u.[isActive] = 1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#manager') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #manager; SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName' INTO #manager FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[UserRole] ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID WHERE u.[isUnitManager] = 1 and ur.[RoleID] IN (41,42) and u.UnitID <> 56 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#managerleveluser') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #managerleveluser; SELECT m.UserName as 'manager', u.UserName as 'salesman', u.UnitID as 'UnitID', m.FullName as 'ManagerFullName', u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' INTO #managerleveluser FROM #manager m JOIN #user u on m.UnitID = u.UnitID AND m.UserName <> u.UserName ;with UnderManagerUser as( SELECT UserName as 'manager', UserName as 'salesman', UnitID as 'UnitID', FullName as 'ManagerFullName', FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' FROM #manager UNION ALL SELECT umu.manager, u.UserName, u.UnitID, umu.ManagerFullName, u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' FROM #user u JOIN UnderManagerUser umu ON u.ParentUnitID = umu.UnitID ) , UserManager as( SELECT * FROM UnderManagerUser UNION ALL SELECT * FROM #managerleveluser ) SELECT [Product] = case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end ,[AreaManager] = um.ManagerFullName ,[Salesman] = um.SalesmanFullName ,[TotalBookings] = Count(*) FROM [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlotStatus s join [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlot ss on s.SlotId = ss.Id join [XODB].ypsonline.Enumerations en on en.id = ss.ProductCategoryId left join UserManager um on um.salesman = case LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) when 'amatzorou' then 'amantzorou' else LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) END where statusid = 13 and case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end IN (@pProductType) and EndDate > case @pActive when 'true' then GETDATE() else '1753-01-01' END group by case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end, um.ManagerFullName, um.SalesmanFullName

INTO #user
FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u
JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[Unit] un ON un.ID = u.UnitID
where u.[isActive] = 1 

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#manager') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #manager;
SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName'
INTO #manager 
FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u
JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[UserRole] ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID
WHERE u.[isUnitManager] = 1 and ur.[RoleID] IN (41,42) and u.UnitID <> 56


IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#managerleveluser') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #managerleveluser;
SELECT m.UserName as 'manager', u.UserName as 'salesman', u.UnitID as 'UnitID', m.FullName as 'ManagerFullName', u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName'
INTO #managerleveluser
FROM #manager m
JOIN #user u on m.UnitID = u.UnitID AND m.UserName <> u.UserName


;with UnderManagerUser as(
SELECT UserName as 'manager', UserName as 'salesman', UnitID as 'UnitID', FullName as 'ManagerFullName', FullName as 'SalesmanFullName'
FROM #manager 
UNION ALL
SELECT umu.manager, u.UserName, u.UnitID, umu.ManagerFullName, u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName'
FROM #user u
JOIN UnderManagerUser umu ON u.ParentUnitID = umu.UnitID
)


,
UserManager as(
SELECT * FROM UnderManagerUser
UNION ALL 
SELECT * FROM #managerleveluser
)


SELECT 
	[Product] = case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end
 ,[AreaManager] = um.ManagerFullName
 ,[Salesman] = um.SalesmanFullName
 ,[TotalBookings] = Count(*)

  FROM [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlotStatus s
  join [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlot ss on s.SlotId = ss.Id
  join [XODB].ypsonline.Enumerations en on en.id = ss.ProductCategoryId
	left join UserManager um on um.salesman = case LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) when 'amatzorou' then 'amantzorou' else LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) END
  
	where statusid = 13 
	and case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end IN (@pProductType)
	and EndDate > case @pActive when 'true' then GETDATE() else '1753-01-01' END
	group by  case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end, um.ManagerFullName, um.SalesmanFullName

SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName' INTO #manager FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[UserRole] ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID WHERE u.[isUnitManager] = 1 and ur.[RoleID] IN (41,42) and u.UnitID <> 56 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#managerleveluser') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #managerleveluser; SELECT m.UserName as 'manager', u.UserName as 'salesman', u.UnitID as 'UnitID', m.FullName as 'ManagerFullName', u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' INTO #managerleveluser FROM #manager m JOIN #user u on m.UnitID = u.UnitID AND m.UserName <> u.UserName ;with UnderManagerUser as( SELECT UserName as 'manager', UserName as 'salesman', UnitID as 'UnitID', FullName as 'ManagerFullName', FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' FROM #manager UNION ALL SELECT umu.manager, u.UserName, u.UnitID, umu.ManagerFullName, u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' FROM #user u JOIN UnderManagerUser umu ON u.ParentUnitID = umu.UnitID ) , UserManager as( SELECT * FROM UnderManagerUser UNION ALL SELECT * FROM #managerleveluser ) SELECT [Product] = case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end ,[AreaManager] = um.ManagerFullName ,[Salesman] = um.SalesmanFullName ,[TotalBookings] = Count(*) FROM [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlotStatus s join [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlot ss on s.SlotId = ss.Id join [XODB].ypsonline.Enumerations en on en.id = ss.ProductCategoryId left join UserManager um on um.salesman = case LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) when 'amatzorou' then 'amantzorou' else LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) END where statusid = 13 and case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end IN (@pProductType) and EndDate > case @pActive when 'true' then GETDATE() else '1753-01-01' END group by case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end, um.ManagerFullName, um.SalesmanFullName

datasets.name: MainDataset
datasets.query:
--declare @psalesman nvarchar(50),
--@pDatefrom datetime,
--@pDateto datetime;

--set @psalesman = '2306'
--set @pDatefrom = '20211117'
--set @pDateto = '20211118'

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#final') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #final;
select 
isnull(man.LastName + ' ' + man.FirstName,'') as Manager
,isnull(sup.LastName + ' ' + sup.FirstName,'') as Supervisor
,isnull(sd.LastName + ' ' + sd.FirstName,'') as Salesman
,app.BusinessPointCodePhone
,app.BusinessPointName
,isnull(app.MainActivity,'') as MainActivity
,cast(app.AppointmentDate as date) as AppointmentDate
,typ.AliasName as [Type] 
,src.AliasName as [Source]
,isnull(STUFF((SELECT ', ' + CAST(prop.AliasName AS VARCHAR(20)) [text()]
         FROM [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.AppointmentProposalType apt 
				 join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations prop on prop.id = apt.ProposalTypeId
         WHERE apt.AppointmentId = app.ID
         FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE)
        .value('.','NVARCHAR(MAX)'),1,2,''),'') as Proposal
,stat.AliasName as [Status]
,app.[Contract]
,(select --sum(ct.finalPrice) as finalPrice
		 SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATE IN (3,4)  THEN cp.AlteredAmount 
                                           ELSE  cp.Price - cp.Discount -cp.RulesDiscount
                                       END) as finalPrice
	from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment appp
	cross apply fn_SplitString(appp.Contract,';') fn
	join Yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on ct.ID = fn.FieldValue
	join Yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID
	where appp.Contract = app.Contract and app.AppointmentDate = appp.AppointmentDate) as [FinalPrice]
,app.Comments
into #final
from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment app
left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations typ on typ.id = app.TypeId
left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations src on src.id = app.SourceId
left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations stat on stat.id = app.StatusId
join Yps.dbo.[User] sd on sd.Email = (CASE WHEN app.CreatedBy not like '%@%' THEN CONCAT(app.CreatedBy, '@xo.gr') ELSE app.CreatedBy END) 
left join Yps.dbo.[Contract] c on app.[Contract] = c.ID
left join Yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = sd.ID and sth.Year = year(app.AppointmentDate)  and sth.SegmentID = month(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.isDeleted = 0
left join Yps.dbo.[User] man on sth.ManagerID = man.ID 
left join Yps.dbo.[User] sup on sth.SupervisorID = sup.ID 
where sd.ID in (@pSalesman)
and app.AppointmentDate between @pDatefrom and @pDateto
and isnull(typ.AliasName,'') in (@pType)	 --OR typ.AliasName is null)
and isnull(src.AliasName,'') in (@pSource)	 --OR src.AliasName is null)
and isnull(stat.AliasName,'') in (@pStatus) --OR stat.AliasName is null)
and isnull(MainActivity,'') in (@pActivity) --OR MainActivity is null)
--(@ypsusersids) or sd.ID =  @ypscurrentuserid


select distinct f.* from #final f
cross apply ItApps.dbo.SplitString(',', REPLACE(f.Proposal,', ',',') )  as ss
where ss.s in (@pProposal) or f.Proposal = ''
--and Manager like '%' + @pManager + '%' 
--and Supervisor like '%' + @pSupervisor + '%' 
--and Salesman like '%' + @pSalesman + '%' 
--and MainActivity like '%' + @pActivity  + '%'
datasets.sql_normalized: --declare @psalesman nvarchar(50), --@pDatefrom datetime, --@pDateto datetime; --set @psalesman = '2306' --set @pDatefrom = '20211117' --set @pDateto = '20211118' IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#final') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #final; select isnull(man.LastName + ' ' + man.FirstName,'') as Manager ,isnull(sup.LastName + ' ' + sup.FirstName,'') as Supervisor ,isnull(sd.LastName + ' ' + sd.FirstName,'') as Salesman ,app.BusinessPointCodePhone ,app.BusinessPointName ,isnull(app.MainActivity,'') as MainActivity ,cast(app.AppointmentDate as date) as AppointmentDate ,typ.AliasName as [Type] ,src.AliasName as [Source] ,isnull(STUFF((SELECT ', ' + CAST(prop.AliasName AS VARCHAR(20)) [text()] FROM [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.AppointmentProposalType apt join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations prop on prop.id = apt.ProposalTypeId WHERE apt.AppointmentId = app.ID FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE) .value('.','NVARCHAR(MAX)'),1,2,''),'') as Proposal ,stat.AliasName as [Status] ,app.[Contract] ,(select --sum(ct.finalPrice) as finalPrice SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATE IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount -cp.RulesDiscount END) as finalPrice from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment appp cross apply fn_SplitString(appp.Contract,';') fn join Yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on ct.ID = fn.FieldValue join Yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID where appp.Contract = app.Contract and app.AppointmentDate = appp.AppointmentDate) as [FinalPrice] ,app.Comments into #final from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment app left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations typ on typ.id = app.TypeId left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations src on src.id = app.SourceId left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations stat on stat.id = app.StatusId join Yps.dbo.[User] sd on sd.Email = (CASE WHEN app.CreatedBy not like '%@%' THEN CONCAT(app.CreatedBy, '@xo.gr') ELSE app.CreatedBy END) left join Yps.dbo.[Contract] c on app.[Contract] = c.ID left join Yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = sd.ID and sth.Year = year(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.SegmentID = month(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.isDeleted = 0 left join Yps.dbo.[User] man on sth.ManagerID = man.ID left join Yps.dbo.[User] sup on sth.SupervisorID = sup.ID where sd.ID in (@pSalesman) and app.AppointmentDate between @pDatefrom and @pDateto and isnull(typ.AliasName,'') in (@pType) --OR typ.AliasName is null) and isnull(src.AliasName,'') in (@pSource) --OR src.AliasName is null) and isnull(stat.AliasName,'') in (@pStatus) --OR stat.AliasName is null) and isnull(MainActivity,'') in (@pActivity) --OR MainActivity is null) --(@ypsusersids) or sd.ID = @ypscurrentuserid select distinct f.* from #final f cross apply ItApps.dbo.SplitString(',', REPLACE(f.Proposal,', ',',') ) as ss where ss.s in (@pProposal) or f.Proposal = '' --and Manager like '%' + @pManager + '%' --and Supervisor like '%' + @pSupervisor + '%' --and Salesman like '%' + @pSalesman + '%' --and MainActivity like '%' + @pActivity + '%'

datasets.name: AreaManager
datasets.query:
--declare @username nvarchar(50)
--set @username = 'spitsaris';
--declare @ypscurrentuserid int = 2503;


IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tt') IS NOT NULL drop table #tt;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin;




	SELECT u.*
		into #area
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
		join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
	where ur.RoleID in (41,42)
	and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/

	select u.*
		into #supervisor
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
where ur.RoleID in (43,44)
and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area )
and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/


	select id=0, 
			u.USERNAME, 
			UserFullName = 'Admin',
			YpsUserId=0,
			SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'),
			ShortName = '',
			AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE,
			UserID = usr.Id
	   into #admin 
	   from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r
			join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID
			join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID
			--join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME
			join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME 
			where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep'


   select Salesman = u.YPSUserId, SalesmanName = u.UserFullName,  AreaManager = area.YPSUserId, AreaManagerName = '['+area.UserSalesCode+'] ' + area.UserFullName,u.Username,area.UserFullName
	 into #tt
	 from [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll]  u
left join #area area on u.FullUnitId like area.FullUnitId + '%' 
	where area.Level = (select max(ain.level) from #area ain where  u.FullUnitId like ain.FullUnitId + '%' )
 order by 3  

 --select * from YPS.dbo.[user] u where username = 'araptis'


	if  (@ypscurrentuserid  in (select UserID from #admin ) or @ypscurrentuserid = 1189 /*araptis*/) and @ypscurrentuserid not in (select YPSUserID from #area)-- Admin
	 begin
	 select distinct t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t order by t.UserFullName
	 end
	  else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #area) and @ypscurrentuserid <> 1189 -- Area Manager
	  begin 
     select  YPSUserId as AreaManager ,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName,UserFullName from #area a where a.YPSUserID = @ypscurrentuserid order by UserFullName
	 end
	 else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) -- Supervisor
	  begin 
		 select distinct YPSUserId as AreaManager, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName, UserFullName 
			from YPS.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth
			join #area a on sth.ManagerID = a.YPSUserId
			where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate())  and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
	 end
	 else-- if @username in (select t.salesman from #tt t) and  @username <> 'araptis' and @username not in (select Username from #area)
	  begin 
	  select t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t where t.AreaManager = @ypscurrentuserid order by t.UserFullName
	 end

	 --else     -- Sup or SR
	 


	

	--select * from #tt where salesman = 1185

--	select * from [user] u where u.id in (718)(1303) (1185,
--1189,
--1306,
--1330,
--1378,
--1385,
--2024)
--	--

datasets.name: Supervisor
datasets.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor;

	

	SELECT u.*
		into #area
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
		join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
	where ur.RoleID in (41,42)
	and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/

	select u.*
		into #supervisor
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
where ur.RoleID in (43,44)
and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area )
and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/


if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) 
begin 
	select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName 
	from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth
	join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId
	where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate())  and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
end

else
begin
	select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName
		from  [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth
		join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll]  sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID
		where sth.ManagerID in (@pManager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
	order by UserFullName
end
datasets.sql_normalized: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) begin select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else begin select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID where sth.ManagerID in (@pManager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) order by UserFullName end

datasets.name: SalesRep
datasets.query:
select distinct sth.SalesmanID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as SalesRep,UserFullName
  from  [YPS].dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth
  join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll]  sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID
  where sth.SupervisorID in (@pSupervisor) 
    and sth.year  = year(getdate()) 
	and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
	order by UserFullName
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  sth.SalesmanID,
  '[' + UserSalesCode + '] ' + UserFullName AS SalesRep,
  UserFullName
FROM [YPS].dbo.SalesTreeHistory AS sth
JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS sup
  ON sup.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID
WHERE
  sth.SupervisorID IN (@pSupervisor)
  AND sth.year = YEAR(GETDATE())
  AND sth.SegmentID = MONTH(GETDATE())
ORDER BY
  UserFullName

named_assets.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού.MainDataset
named_assets.sql_raw:
--declare @psalesman nvarchar(50),
--@pDatefrom datetime,
--@pDateto datetime;

--set @psalesman = '2306'
--set @pDatefrom = '20211117'
--set @pDateto = '20211118'

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#final') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #final;
select 
isnull(man.LastName + ' ' + man.FirstName,'') as Manager
,isnull(sup.LastName + ' ' + sup.FirstName,'') as Supervisor
,isnull(sd.LastName + ' ' + sd.FirstName,'') as Salesman
,app.BusinessPointCodePhone
,app.BusinessPointName
,isnull(app.MainActivity,'') as MainActivity
,cast(app.AppointmentDate as date) as AppointmentDate
,typ.AliasName as [Type] 
,src.AliasName as [Source]
,isnull(STUFF((SELECT ', ' + CAST(prop.AliasName AS VARCHAR(20)) [text()]
         FROM [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.AppointmentProposalType apt 
				 join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations prop on prop.id = apt.ProposalTypeId
         WHERE apt.AppointmentId = app.ID
         FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE)
        .value('.','NVARCHAR(MAX)'),1,2,''),'') as Proposal
,stat.AliasName as [Status]
,app.[Contract]
,(select --sum(ct.finalPrice) as finalPrice
		 SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATE IN (3,4)  THEN cp.AlteredAmount 
                                           ELSE  cp.Price - cp.Discount -cp.RulesDiscount
                                       END) as finalPrice
	from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment appp
	cross apply fn_SplitString(appp.Contract,';') fn
	join Yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on ct.ID = fn.FieldValue
	join Yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID
	where appp.Contract = app.Contract and app.AppointmentDate = appp.AppointmentDate) as [FinalPrice]
,app.Comments
into #final
from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment app
left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations typ on typ.id = app.TypeId
left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations src on src.id = app.SourceId
left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations stat on stat.id = app.StatusId
join Yps.dbo.[User] sd on sd.Email = (CASE WHEN app.CreatedBy not like '%@%' THEN CONCAT(app.CreatedBy, '@xo.gr') ELSE app.CreatedBy END) 
left join Yps.dbo.[Contract] c on app.[Contract] = c.ID
left join Yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = sd.ID and sth.Year = year(app.AppointmentDate)  and sth.SegmentID = month(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.isDeleted = 0
left join Yps.dbo.[User] man on sth.ManagerID = man.ID 
left join Yps.dbo.[User] sup on sth.SupervisorID = sup.ID 
where sd.ID in (@pSalesman)
and app.AppointmentDate between @pDatefrom and @pDateto
and isnull(typ.AliasName,'') in (@pType)	 --OR typ.AliasName is null)
and isnull(src.AliasName,'') in (@pSource)	 --OR src.AliasName is null)
and isnull(stat.AliasName,'') in (@pStatus) --OR stat.AliasName is null)
and isnull(MainActivity,'') in (@pActivity) --OR MainActivity is null)
--(@ypsusersids) or sd.ID =  @ypscurrentuserid


select distinct f.* from #final f
cross apply ItApps.dbo.SplitString(',', REPLACE(f.Proposal,', ',',') )  as ss
where ss.s in (@pProposal) or f.Proposal = ''
--and Manager like '%' + @pManager + '%' 
--and Supervisor like '%' + @pSupervisor + '%' 
--and Salesman like '%' + @pSalesman + '%' 
--and MainActivity like '%' + @pActivity  + '%'
named_assets.sql_normalized: --declare @psalesman nvarchar(50), --@pDatefrom datetime, --@pDateto datetime; --set @psalesman = '2306' --set @pDatefrom = '20211117' --set @pDateto = '20211118' IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#final') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #final; select isnull(man.LastName + ' ' + man.FirstName,'') as Manager ,isnull(sup.LastName + ' ' + sup.FirstName,'') as Supervisor ,isnull(sd.LastName + ' ' + sd.FirstName,'') as Salesman ,app.BusinessPointCodePhone ,app.BusinessPointName ,isnull(app.MainActivity,'') as MainActivity ,cast(app.AppointmentDate as date) as AppointmentDate ,typ.AliasName as [Type] ,src.AliasName as [Source] ,isnull(STUFF((SELECT ', ' + CAST(prop.AliasName AS VARCHAR(20)) [text()] FROM [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.AppointmentProposalType apt join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations prop on prop.id = apt.ProposalTypeId WHERE apt.AppointmentId = app.ID FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE) .value('.','NVARCHAR(MAX)'),1,2,''),'') as Proposal ,stat.AliasName as [Status] ,app.[Contract] ,(select --sum(ct.finalPrice) as finalPrice SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATE IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount -cp.RulesDiscount END) as finalPrice from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment appp cross apply fn_SplitString(appp.Contract,';') fn join Yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on ct.ID = fn.FieldValue join Yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID where appp.Contract = app.Contract and app.AppointmentDate = appp.AppointmentDate) as [FinalPrice] ,app.Comments into #final from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment app left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations typ on typ.id = app.TypeId left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations src on src.id = app.SourceId left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations stat on stat.id = app.StatusId join Yps.dbo.[User] sd on sd.Email = (CASE WHEN app.CreatedBy not like '%@%' THEN CONCAT(app.CreatedBy, '@xo.gr') ELSE app.CreatedBy END) left join Yps.dbo.[Contract] c on app.[Contract] = c.ID left join Yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = sd.ID and sth.Year = year(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.SegmentID = month(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.isDeleted = 0 left join Yps.dbo.[User] man on sth.ManagerID = man.ID left join Yps.dbo.[User] sup on sth.SupervisorID = sup.ID where sd.ID in (@pSalesman) and app.AppointmentDate between @pDatefrom and @pDateto and isnull(typ.AliasName,'') in (@pType) --OR typ.AliasName is null) and isnull(src.AliasName,'') in (@pSource) --OR src.AliasName is null) and isnull(stat.AliasName,'') in (@pStatus) --OR stat.AliasName is null) and isnull(MainActivity,'') in (@pActivity) --OR MainActivity is null) --(@ypsusersids) or sd.ID = @ypscurrentuserid select distinct f.* from #final f cross apply ItApps.dbo.SplitString(',', REPLACE(f.Proposal,', ',',') ) as ss where ss.s in (@pProposal) or f.Proposal = '' --and Manager like '%' + @pManager + '%' --and Supervisor like '%' + @pSupervisor + '%' --and Salesman like '%' + @pSalesman + '%' --and MainActivity like '%' + @pActivity + '%'
