named_assets.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού.AreaManager
named_assets.sql_raw:
--declare @username nvarchar(50)
--set @username = 'spitsaris';
--declare @ypscurrentuserid int = 2503;


IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tt') IS NOT NULL drop table #tt;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin;




	SELECT u.*
		into #area
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
		join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
	where ur.RoleID in (41,42)
	and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/

	select u.*
		into #supervisor
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
where ur.RoleID in (43,44)
and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area )
and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/


	select id=0, 
			u.USERNAME, 
			UserFullName = 'Admin',
			YpsUserId=0,
			SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'),
			ShortName = '',
			AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE,
			UserID = usr.Id
	   into #admin 
	   from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r
			join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID
			join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID
			--join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME
			join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME 
			where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep'


   select Salesman = u.YPSUserId, SalesmanName = u.UserFullName,  AreaManager = area.YPSUserId, AreaManagerName = '['+area.UserSalesCode+'] ' + area.UserFullName,u.Username,area.UserFullName
	 into #tt
	 from [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll]  u
left join #area area on u.FullUnitId like area.FullUnitId + '%' 
	where area.Level = (select max(ain.level) from #area ain where  u.FullUnitId like ain.FullUnitId + '%' )
 order by 3  

 --select * from YPS.dbo.[user] u where username = 'araptis'


	if  (@ypscurrentuserid  in (select UserID from #admin ) or @ypscurrentuserid = 1189 /*araptis*/) and @ypscurrentuserid not in (select YPSUserID from #area)-- Admin
	 begin
	 select distinct t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t order by t.UserFullName
	 end
	  else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #area) and @ypscurrentuserid <> 1189 -- Area Manager
	  begin 
     select  YPSUserId as AreaManager ,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName,UserFullName from #area a where a.YPSUserID = @ypscurrentuserid order by UserFullName
	 end
	 else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) -- Supervisor
	  begin 
		 select distinct YPSUserId as AreaManager, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName, UserFullName 
			from YPS.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth
			join #area a on sth.ManagerID = a.YPSUserId
			where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate())  and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
	 end
	 else-- if @username in (select t.salesman from #tt t) and  @username <> 'araptis' and @username not in (select Username from #area)
	  begin 
	  select t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t where t.AreaManager = @ypscurrentuserid order by t.UserFullName
	 end

	 --else     -- Sup or SR
	 


	

	--select * from #tt where salesman = 1185

--	select * from [user] u where u.id in (718)(1303) (1185,
--1189,
--1306,
--1330,
--1378,
--1385,
--2024)
--	--

named_assets.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού.Supervisor
named_assets.sql_raw:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor;

	

	SELECT u.*
		into #area
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
		join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
	where ur.RoleID in (41,42)
	and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/

	select u.*
		into #supervisor
	FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u
join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID
where ur.RoleID in (43,44)
and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area )
and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/


if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) 
begin 
	select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName 
	from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth
	join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId
	where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate())  and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
end

else
begin
	select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName
		from  [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth
		join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll]  sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID
		where sth.ManagerID in (@pManager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
	order by UserFullName
end
named_assets.sql_normalized: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) begin select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else begin select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID where sth.ManagerID in (@pManager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) order by UserFullName end

named_assets.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού.SalesRep
named_assets.sql_raw:
select distinct sth.SalesmanID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as SalesRep,UserFullName
  from  [YPS].dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth
  join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll]  sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID
  where sth.SupervisorID in (@pSupervisor) 
    and sth.year  = year(getdate()) 
	and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) 
	order by UserFullName
named_assets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  sth.SalesmanID,
  '[' + UserSalesCode + '] ' + UserFullName AS SalesRep,
  UserFullName
FROM [YPS].dbo.SalesTreeHistory AS sth
JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS sup
  ON sup.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID
WHERE
  sth.SupervisorID IN (@pSupervisor)
  AND sth.year = YEAR(GETDATE())
  AND sth.SegmentID = MONTH(GETDATE())
ORDER BY
  UserFullName

datasets.name: Main
datasets.query:
--report Query
--DECLARE @FromDate DATE, @ToDate DATE, @option bit;
--SET @FromDate = '2014-01-01';
--SET @ToDate = '2014-04-25';
--SET @option = 1;

/*--ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΑ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/		
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika1') IS NOT NULL 
DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika1

SELECT  GID,code ,
        netvalue ,
		ADRegistrationDate
INTO    #ebsPistwtika1
FROM    ITApps.dbo.CRM_Ticket_Data_EBS_Pist_Offline
WHERE   ( ( [ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate
                                 AND     DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
          OR @option = 0
        )
;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika') IS NOT NULL 
DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika

SELECT	code ,
		SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue ,
		REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT	DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103) AS [text()]
					FROM	#ebsPistwtika1 dt1
					WHERE	dt1.code = aa.code
					ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103)--dt1.[date]
					FOR
					XML	PATH('')
					), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates]
INTO #ebsPistwtika
FROM	#ebsPistwtika1 aa
GROUP BY aa.code
					  
/*--ΑΚΥΡΩΣΕΙΣ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/	
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika1') IS NOT NULL 
    DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika1										
SELECT  GID,code ,
        netvalue ,
		ADRegistrationDate
INTO    #ebsAkurwtika1
FROM    ITApps.dbo.CRM_Ticket_Data_EBS_Akyr_Offline
WHERE   ( ( [ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate
                                 AND     DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
          OR @option = 0
        )
;
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika') IS NOT NULL 
DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika

SELECT	code ,
		SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue ,
		REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT	DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103) AS [text()]
					FROM	#ebsAkurwtika1 dt1
					WHERE	dt1.code = aa.code
					ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103)--dt1.[date]
					FOR
					XML	PATH('')
					), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates]
INTO    #ebsAkurwtika
FROM	#ebsAkurwtika1 aa
GROUP BY aa.code
;


SELECT  m.* ,
		pis.netvalue AS pistwtika ,
		pis.dates pistwtika_dates,
		ak.netvalue AS akurwtika ,
		ak.dates akurwtika_dates
FROM    ITApps.dbo.CRM_Ticket_Data_Offline m
        LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20))  ------********
        LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20))	------********
WHERE   ( ( ( m.dateParam BETWEEN @FromDate
                          AND     DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
          OR @option = 1
          )
          --AND DATEDIFF(month, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 2
          
        )
        AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL
              OR ak.code IS NOT NULL
              OR @option = 0
            )
        AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId )
        AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId )
        AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId )
        AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId )
        AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID )
        AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID )
        AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId )
        AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture )
		AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN (@state)


DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika
DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika

datasets.name: Main
datasets.query:
--report Query

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Last_ticket_task') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #Last_ticket_task

SELECT	t.ID ,
		MAX(tr.id) AS tr_id
INTO	#Last_ticket_task
FROM	ticket t
		JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON t.ID = tr.TicketID
GROUP BY t.ID;

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#LastCrmCustomerResult') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #LastCrmCustomerResult
SELECT	T.id ,
		tr.ResultCustomer
INTO	#LastCrmCustomerResult
FROM	ticket t
		JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON t.ID = tr.TicketID
		JOIN [user] u ON tr.PerformedByID = u.ID
		JOIN dbo.UserRole ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID
		JOIN [role] r ON ur.RoleID = r.ID
						 AND r.id IN ( 101, 103 ) -- 101 Agent 103 Handler
WHERE	tr.id = ( SELECT	MAX(itr.id)
				  FROM		ticket it
							JOIN dbo.TicketResult itr ON it.ID = itr.TicketID
							JOIN [user] iu ON itr.PerformedByID = iu.ID
							JOIN dbo.UserRole iur ON iu.ID = iur.UserID
							JOIN [role] ir ON iur.RoleID = ir.ID
											  AND ir.id IN ( 101, 103 )
				  WHERE		it.id = t.id
				);



 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#users') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #users
SELECT	*
INTO	#users
FROM	( SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					un1.Description AS [Ομάδα] ,
					srv.UserName AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Supervisor] ,
					ISNULL(arm1.username, arm2.UserName) AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					( ISNULL(arm1.LastName, arm2.LastName) + ' ' + ISNULL(arm1.FirstName, arm2.FirstName) ) AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[User] usr
					JOIN [Unit] un1 ON usr.unitID = un1.ID
					LEFT JOIN [user] srv ON srv.UnitID = un1.ID
											AND srv.IsUnitManager = 1
					LEFT JOIN [unit] un2 ON un1.ParentID = un2.id
					LEFT JOIN [unit] un3 ON un2.ParentID = un3.id
					LEFT JOIN [user] arM1 ON arM1.UnitID = un2.ID
											 AND arM1.IsUnitManager = 1
					LEFT JOIN [user] arM2 ON arM2.UnitID = un3.ID
											 AND arM2.IsUnitManager = 1
		  WHERE		un1.ParentID IN ( 55, 69, 75, 79, 81, 84, 87, 99, 102 )
		  UNION
		  SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					un1.Description AS [Ομάδα] ,
					srv.UserName AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Supervisor] ,
					srv.UserName AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[User] usr
					JOIN [Unit] un1 ON usr.unitID = un1.ID
					LEFT JOIN [user] srv ON srv.UnitID = un1.ID
											AND srv.IsUnitManager = 1
		  WHERE		un1.id IN ( 55, 69, 77, 87 )
					AND usr.IsUnitManager = 1
		  UNION
		  SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Ομάδα] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Supervisor] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[user] usr
		  WHERE		unitid = 96
		  UNION
		  SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Ομάδα] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Supervisor] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[user] usr
		  WHERE		unitid = 97
		) a

IF ( @option = 1 ) 
	BEGIN  

         /*--ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΑ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/                                                                             
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika1') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika1  
		                                                                              
		SELECT	DISTINCT
				dt.GID ,
				dt.adstringfield3 AS code ,
				CONVERT(FLOAT, dt.netvalue) AS netvalue,
				dt.ADRegistrationDate AS [date]
				INTO #ebsPistwtika1
		FROM	[cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttrade dt
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttype dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid
																					 AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001'
				LEFT JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].ESFITradeAccountContract ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code
																						  AND ec.fcompanycode = '001'
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfitradeaccount es ON es.gid = dt.ftradeaccountgid
																				  AND es.fcompanycode = '001'
		WHERE	dtype.code = 'ΠΤΥ'
				AND dt.fcompanycode = '001'
				AND dt.adstringfield3 IS NOT NULL
				AND dt.adstringfield3 <> 'ΑΝΕΥ'
				AND ( ( dt.[ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
					  OR @option = 0
					);

		INSERT	INTO #ebsPistwtika
		SELECT	code ,
				SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue ,
				REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT	DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103) AS [text()]
							FROM	#ebsPistwtika1 dt1
							WHERE	dt1.code = aa.code
							ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103)--dt1.[date]
						  FOR
							XML	PATH('')
						  ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates]
		FROM	#ebsPistwtika1 aa
		GROUP BY aa.code




         /*--ΑΚΥΡΩΣΕΙΣ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika1') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika1  
		                                                                              
		SELECT	DISTINCT
				dt.GID ,
				dt.adstringfield3 AS code ,
				CONVERT(FLOAT, dt.netvalue) AS netvalue,
				dt.ADRegistrationDate AS [date]
				INTO #ebsAkurwtika1
		FROM	[cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttrade dt
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttype dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid
																					 AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001'
				LEFT JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].ESFITradeAccountContract ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code
																						  AND ec.fcompanycode = '001'
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfitradeaccount es ON es.gid = dt.ftradeaccountgid
																				  AND es.fcompanycode = '001'
		WHERE	dtype.code = 'ΠΑΑ'
				AND dt.fcompanycode = '001'
				AND dt.adstringfield3 IS NOT NULL
				AND dt.adstringfield3 <> 'ΑΝΕΥ'
				AND ( ( dt.[ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
					  OR @option = 0
					);

		INSERT	INTO #ebsAkurwtika
		SELECT	code ,
				SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue ,
				REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT	DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103) AS [text()]
							FROM	#ebsAkurwtika1 dt1
							WHERE	dt1.code = aa.code
							ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103)--dt1.[date]
						  FOR
							XML	PATH('')
						  ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates]
		FROM	#ebsAkurwtika1 aa
		GROUP BY aa.code
	END;

IF OBJECT_ID('itapps.dbo.product', 'U') IS NOT NULL 
  DROP TABLE itapps.dbo.product; 

select distinct ct.id as ContractID,
       '[' + pr.code +'] '+pr.Name as Product,
       pt.Description as ProductCategory,
	   ctp.Description as Channel,
	  '('+ m.Code + ') '+m.name as Medium

  into itapps.dbo.product 
  from yps.dbo.Ticket t 
  join yps.dbo.Contract ct on t.RelatedContractID = ct.id 
  join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id and cp.state in (0,1,5,6,7)
  join yps.dbo.Advertisement a on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID
  join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on a.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
  join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
  join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID
  join yps.dbo.Product pr on a.ProductID = pr.ID
  join yps.dbo.ProductType pt on pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID
  join yps.dbo.ChannelType ctp on ctp.ID = ct.ChannelTypeID


use ITApps;

/****** Object:  Index [NonClusteredIndex-20180327-131804]    Script Date: 27/03/2018 13:18:29 ******/
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20180327-131804] ON itapps.[dbo].[product]
(
	[ContractID] ASC,
	[Product] ASC,
	[ProductCategory] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON)

use YPS;

 	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#productDelimited') IS NOT NULL 
			DROP TABLE #productDelimited 
select distinct st2.ContractID ,
                st2.Channel,
				STUFF((Select ', '+ST1.Product  AS [text()]
					From itapps.dbo.product  ST1
					Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID
					group by ST1.Product,ST1.ContractID
					ORDER BY ST1.ContractID
					For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') products
			 , STUFF((Select ', '+ST1.ProductCategory  AS [text()]
                From itapps.dbo.product  ST1
                Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID
				group by ST1.ProductCategory,ST1.ContractID
                ORDER BY ST1.ContractID
                For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') productCategories
			  ,STUFF((Select  ', '+ ST1.Medium  AS [text()]
                From itapps.dbo.product  ST1
                Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID
				group by ST1.Medium,ST1.ContractID
                ORDER BY ST1.ContractID
                For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') Medium
            into #productDelimited
			from itapps.dbo.product  st2

		IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#main') IS NOT NULL 
			DROP TABLE #main  
		SELECT	DISTINCT
				t.id AS 'Κωδ. Αιτήματος' ,
				t.code AS 'Παλιός Κωδικός' ,
				bp.code AS 'Kωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου' ,
				bp.Name AS 'Επιχ.Σημείο' ,
				t.[status] ,
				CASE WHEN t.Status = 1 THEN 'Κλειστό'
					 ELSE 'Ανοιχτό'
				END AS 'Κατάσταση Αιτήματος' ,
				cmpn.Description + ' ' + cmpn.Code AS 'Καμπάνια' ,
				adrv2.Prefecture AS 'Νομός' ,
				tp.Description AS 'Προτεραιότητα' ,
				tt.Description AS 'Τύπος Αιτήματος' ,
				uSalesPerson.LastName + ' ' + uSalesPerson.FirstName AS 'Πωλητής' ,
				uSalesPerson.SalesCode AS 'Κωδ. Πωλητή' ,
				t.RelatedContractID AS 'Σχετικό συμβόλαιο' ,
				c.SignedDate AS 'Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου' ,
				tst.Description AS 'Προέλευση' ,
				t.CreatedOn AS 'Ημ. Εισαγωγής' ,
				t.ReceivedOn AS 'Ημ. Παραλαβής' ,
				t.CompletedOn AS 'Ημ. Επίλυσης' ,
				ucreated.LastName + ' ' + ucreated.FirstName AS 'Χρήστης Εισαγωγής' ,
				uhandler.LastName + ' ' + uhandler.FirstName AS 'Τελευταίος CRM Χρήστης' ,
				ucompleted.LastName + ' ' + ucompleted.FirstName AS 'Χρήστης' ,
				ulastAssign.LastName + ' ' + ulastAssign.FirstName AS 'Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης1' ,
				rlastAssign.Description AS 'Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης2' ,
				trm.Description AS 'Επίλυση' ,
				CASE WHEN tr.Result = 1 THEN 'ΕΠΙΛΥΣΗ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα' ,
				CASE WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ'
					 WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη' ,
				tcor.Description AS 'Καταλογισμός Ευθύνης' ,
				t.ContactName AS 'Άτομο Επικοινωνίας' ,
				trr.Description AS 'Αιτία Αιτήματος' ,
				tcr.Description AS 'Λόγος Ακύρωσης'/*rct.Description*/ ,
				CASE WHEN tr.ResultComm = 1 THEN 'ΝΑΙ'
					 WHEN tr.ResultComm = 0 THEN 'ΟΧΙ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Επικοινωνία με πελάτη' ,
				tr.ResultCommDate AS 'Ημ. Επικοινωνίας' ,
				tst.ID AS TicketSourceTypeId ,
				tt.ID AS TicketTypeID ,
				trr.ID AS TicketRequestReasonId ,
				tcr.ID AS TicketCancellationReasonId ,
				tcor.ID AS TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ,
				uSalesPerson.ID AS uSalesPersonID ,
				CASE WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ'
					 WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη CRM' ,
				cmpn.ID AS CampaignId,
				pd.Channel,-- DEV11005 addition
				pd.Medium,-- DEV11005 addition
				pd.products,-- DEV11005 addition
				Pd.productCategories-- DEV11005 addition
		INTO #main
		FROM	ticket t
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketRequestReason trr ON t.RequestReasonID = trr.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketPriority tp ON t.PriorityID = tp.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketSourceType tst ON t.SourceTypeID = tst.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResolutionMethod trm ON t.ResolutionMethodID = trm.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.[Contract] c ON t.RelatedContractID = c.ID
											  AND c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 )
				LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign cmpn ON c.CampaignID = cmpn.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] uSalesPerson ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = uSalesPerson.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] ulastAssign ON t.LastAssignUserID = ulastAssign.ID 
				LEFT JOIN dbo.Role rlastAssign ON t.LastAssignRoleID = rlastAssign.id
				LEFT JOIN [user] uhandler ON t.HandlerID = uhandler.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] ucreated ON t.CreatedByID = ucreated.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] ucompleted ON t.CompletedByID = ucompleted.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON t.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adrv2 ON adrv2.ID = bp.LocationAddressID
				LEFT JOIN #Last_ticket_task ltt ON ltt.id = t.id
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON ltt.tr_id = tr.id /*AND tr.ResolutionMethodID IS NOT NULL*/
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResultCommType trct ON tr.ResultCommTypeID = trct.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] utr ON tr.PerformedByID = utr.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketChargeOfResponsibility tcor ON t.ChargeOfResponsibilityID = tcor.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCancellationReason tcr ON t.CancellationResonID = tcr.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketType tt ON t.TicketTypeID = tt.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCommunication tc ON t.ID = tc.TicketID/*WHERE t.CreatedOn BETWEEN '2012-09-01' AND '2012-09-30'*/
				LEFT JOIN #LastCrmCustomerResult lccr ON lccr.id = t.id
				left join #ProductDelimited pd on Pd.ContractID = c.id-- DEV11005 addition
				WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM dbo.[Case] c WHERE c.ContextEntityID = t.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET')
			    AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #tmp  
SELECT DISTINCT
		ti.id ticketID ,
		ti.Status ticketStatus ,
		mc.id caseId ,
		mt.id taskID ,
		u.LastName potentialUser ,
		r.Description potentialRole ,
		ISNULL(u.LastName, r.Description) potentialUserRole
INTO	#tmp
--select *
FROM	dbo.Ticket ti
		JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = ti.id 
							 AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET'
		JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON c.MasterCaseID = mc.MasterCaseID 
		JOIN dbo.Task mt ON mc.ID = mt.CaseID 
		LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment taa ON mt.id = taa.TaskID
		LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON taa.RoleID = r.ID
		LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ISNULL(mt.ActualOwnerID, taa.UserID) = u.id
								  --AND UnitID <> 40
WHERE	mt.Status = 0
		AND ti.status = 0
		AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #main m WHERE m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = ti.id)
		AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8


IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#flow2') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #flow2  
SELECT	DISTINCT
		ticketID Tid ,
		STUFF((SELECT	CHAR(13) + CHAR(10) + [potentialUserRole]
			   FROM		#tmp
			   WHERE	( ticketID = Results.ticketID )
			   ORDER BY	#tmp.[potentialUserRole]
		FOR	  XML PATH('') ,
				  TYPE).value('(./text())[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '') AS OM
INTO	#flow2
FROM	#tmp Results
GROUP BY Results.ticketID

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SV_task_dates') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #SV_task_dates  

SELECT 
COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) ct_id, 
MAX(t.CompletedOn) t_CompletedOn 
INTO #SV_task_dates
FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv 
JOIN #main ct ON ct.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] = COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID)
JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id AND c.ContextEntitytype = 'TGIV'
JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID
WHERE TaskTypeID IN ( 164, 259, 261 ) and Outcome = 'Δεν απαιτούνται διορθώσεις'
--AND COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) = 1679657
GROUP BY COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID)

				pis.netvalue AS pistwtika ,
				pis.dates pistwtika_dates,
				ak.netvalue AS akurwtika ,
				ak.dates akurwtika_dates,
				contractValue = ( SELECT	SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.alteredamount IS NOT NULL THEN alteredamount ELSE Price - Discount - RulesDiscount END)
								  FROM		dbo.ContractProduct cp1
								  WHERE		cp1.RelatedContractID = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο]
								)
				--,c.Comments
		--INTO	#result
		FROM	#main m
				LEFT JOIN #flow2 f ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = f.Tid
									AND m.[status] = 0
				--LEFT JOIN #comm c ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = c.Tid
				LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20))
				LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20))
				LEFT JOIN #users us ON us.SalesCode = m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή]
									   AND us.SalesCode IS NOT NULL
				LEFT JOIN #SV_task_dates d ON   d.ct_id = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο]                                   
		WHERE	DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8
				AND ( m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) 
					  OR @option = 1				  				  
					)
				AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL
					  OR ak.code IS NOT NULL
					  OR @option = 0
					)
				AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId )
				AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId )
				AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId )
				AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId )
				AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID )
				AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID )
				AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId )
				AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture )
				AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN ( @state )

Επικοινωνίας] , f.OM AS 'OM Ανοιχτών Αιτημάτων' , m.TicketSourceTypeId , m.TicketTypeID , m.TicketRequestReasonId , m.TicketCancellationReasonId , m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID , m.uSalesPersonID , m.CampaignId , m.Channel, m.Medium, m.products, m.productCategories, pis.netvalue AS pistwtika , pis.dates pistwtika_dates, ak.netvalue AS akurwtika , ak.dates akurwtika_dates, contractValue = ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.alteredamount IS NOT NULL THEN alteredamount ELSE Price - Discount - RulesDiscount END) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp1 WHERE cp1.RelatedContractID = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] ) --,c.Comments --INTO #result FROM #main m LEFT JOIN #flow2 f ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = f.Tid AND m.[status] = 0 --LEFT JOIN #comm c ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = c.Tid LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) LEFT JOIN #users us ON us.SalesCode = m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή] AND us.SalesCode IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN #SV_task_dates d ON d.ct_id = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] WHERE DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 AND ( m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) OR @option = 1 ) AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL OR ak.code IS NOT NULL OR @option = 0 ) AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId ) AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ) AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID ) AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId ) AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture ) AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN ( @state ) --SELECT * --FROM #result --WHERE [Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = 573968

datasets.query:
select -1 as id ,'Κενό' as description,1 as tp
union
select id,description,2 as tp from TicketRequestReason
order by 3,2

  'Κενό' AS description,
  1 AS tp

  description,
  2 AS tp
FROM TicketRequestReason
ORDER BY

  2

union

from [User] usr join Ticket  t ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = usr.ID  
order by 3,2

named_assets.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online).Main
named_assets.sql_raw:
--report Query

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Last_ticket_task') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #Last_ticket_task

SELECT	t.ID ,
		MAX(tr.id) AS tr_id
INTO	#Last_ticket_task
FROM	ticket t
		JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON t.ID = tr.TicketID
GROUP BY t.ID;

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#LastCrmCustomerResult') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #LastCrmCustomerResult
SELECT	T.id ,
		tr.ResultCustomer
INTO	#LastCrmCustomerResult
FROM	ticket t
		JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON t.ID = tr.TicketID
		JOIN [user] u ON tr.PerformedByID = u.ID
		JOIN dbo.UserRole ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID
		JOIN [role] r ON ur.RoleID = r.ID
						 AND r.id IN ( 101, 103 ) -- 101 Agent 103 Handler
WHERE	tr.id = ( SELECT	MAX(itr.id)
				  FROM		ticket it
							JOIN dbo.TicketResult itr ON it.ID = itr.TicketID
							JOIN [user] iu ON itr.PerformedByID = iu.ID
							JOIN dbo.UserRole iur ON iu.ID = iur.UserID
							JOIN [role] ir ON iur.RoleID = ir.ID
											  AND ir.id IN ( 101, 103 )
				  WHERE		it.id = t.id
				);



 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#users') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #users
SELECT	*
INTO	#users
FROM	( SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					un1.Description AS [Ομάδα] ,
					srv.UserName AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Supervisor] ,
					ISNULL(arm1.username, arm2.UserName) AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					( ISNULL(arm1.LastName, arm2.LastName) + ' ' + ISNULL(arm1.FirstName, arm2.FirstName) ) AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[User] usr
					JOIN [Unit] un1 ON usr.unitID = un1.ID
					LEFT JOIN [user] srv ON srv.UnitID = un1.ID
											AND srv.IsUnitManager = 1
					LEFT JOIN [unit] un2 ON un1.ParentID = un2.id
					LEFT JOIN [unit] un3 ON un2.ParentID = un3.id
					LEFT JOIN [user] arM1 ON arM1.UnitID = un2.ID
											 AND arM1.IsUnitManager = 1
					LEFT JOIN [user] arM2 ON arM2.UnitID = un3.ID
											 AND arM2.IsUnitManager = 1
		  WHERE		un1.ParentID IN ( 55, 69, 75, 79, 81, 84, 87, 99, 102 )
		  UNION
		  SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					un1.Description AS [Ομάδα] ,
					srv.UserName AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Supervisor] ,
					srv.UserName AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[User] usr
					JOIN [Unit] un1 ON usr.unitID = un1.ID
					LEFT JOIN [user] srv ON srv.UnitID = un1.ID
											AND srv.IsUnitManager = 1
		  WHERE		un1.id IN ( 55, 69, 77, 87 )
					AND usr.IsUnitManager = 1
		  UNION
		  SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Ομάδα] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Supervisor] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[user] usr
		  WHERE		unitid = 96
		  UNION
		  SELECT	usr.SalesCode ,
					usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] ,
					( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Ομάδα] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Username Supervisor] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Supervisor] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Username Area Manager] ,
					'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Area Manager]
		  FROM		[user] usr
		  WHERE		unitid = 97
		) a
/*set @option = 0;*/

 BEGIN 

	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika  
	SELECT	( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(100)) ) AS code ,
			( CAST(0 AS FLOAT) ) AS netvalue
			,( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(1000)) ) AS dates 
	INTO	#ebsPistwtika
	TRUNCATE TABLE #ebsPistwtika
		  
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika  
	SELECT	( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(100)) ) AS code ,
			( CAST(0 AS FLOAT) ) AS netvalue
			,( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(1000)) ) AS dates 
	INTO	#ebsAkurwtika
	TRUNCATE TABLE #ebsAkurwtika

 END


IF ( @option = 1 ) 
	BEGIN  

         /*--ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΑ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/                                                                             
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika1') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika1  
		                                                                              
		SELECT	DISTINCT
				dt.GID ,
				dt.adstringfield3 AS code ,
				CONVERT(FLOAT, dt.netvalue) AS netvalue,
				dt.ADRegistrationDate AS [date]
				INTO #ebsPistwtika1
		FROM	[cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttrade dt
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttype dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid
																					 AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001'
				LEFT JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].ESFITradeAccountContract ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code
																						  AND ec.fcompanycode = '001'
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfitradeaccount es ON es.gid = dt.ftradeaccountgid
																				  AND es.fcompanycode = '001'
		WHERE	dtype.code = 'ΠΤΥ'
				AND dt.fcompanycode = '001'
				AND dt.adstringfield3 IS NOT NULL
				AND dt.adstringfield3 <> 'ΑΝΕΥ'
				AND ( ( dt.[ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
					  OR @option = 0
					);

		INSERT	INTO #ebsPistwtika
		SELECT	code ,
				SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue ,
				REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT	DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103) AS [text()]
							FROM	#ebsPistwtika1 dt1
							WHERE	dt1.code = aa.code
							ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103)--dt1.[date]
						  FOR
							XML	PATH('')
						  ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates]
		FROM	#ebsPistwtika1 aa
		GROUP BY aa.code




         /*--ΑΚΥΡΩΣΕΙΣ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika1') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika1  
		                                                                              
		SELECT	DISTINCT
				dt.GID ,
				dt.adstringfield3 AS code ,
				CONVERT(FLOAT, dt.netvalue) AS netvalue,
				dt.ADRegistrationDate AS [date]
				INTO #ebsAkurwtika1
		FROM	[cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttrade dt
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttype dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid
																					 AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001'
				LEFT JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].ESFITradeAccountContract ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code
																						  AND ec.fcompanycode = '001'
				JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfitradeaccount es ON es.gid = dt.ftradeaccountgid
																				  AND es.fcompanycode = '001'
		WHERE	dtype.code = 'ΠΑΑ'
				AND dt.fcompanycode = '001'
				AND dt.adstringfield3 IS NOT NULL
				AND dt.adstringfield3 <> 'ΑΝΕΥ'
				AND ( ( dt.[ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) )
					  OR @option = 0
					);

		INSERT	INTO #ebsAkurwtika
		SELECT	code ,
				SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue ,
				REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT	DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103) AS [text()]
							FROM	#ebsAkurwtika1 dt1
							WHERE	dt1.code = aa.code
							ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103)--dt1.[date]
						  FOR
							XML	PATH('')
						  ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates]
		FROM	#ebsAkurwtika1 aa
		GROUP BY aa.code
	END;








-- -- DEV11005 addition-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF OBJECT_ID('itapps.dbo.product', 'U') IS NOT NULL 
  DROP TABLE itapps.dbo.product; 

select distinct ct.id as ContractID,
       '[' + pr.code +'] '+pr.Name as Product,
       pt.Description as ProductCategory,
	   ctp.Description as Channel,
	  '('+ m.Code + ') '+m.name as Medium

  into itapps.dbo.product 
  from yps.dbo.Ticket t 
  join yps.dbo.Contract ct on t.RelatedContractID = ct.id 
  join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id and cp.state in (0,1,5,6,7)
  join yps.dbo.Advertisement a on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID
  join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on a.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
  join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
  join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID
  join yps.dbo.Product pr on a.ProductID = pr.ID
  join yps.dbo.ProductType pt on pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID
  join yps.dbo.ChannelType ctp on ctp.ID = ct.ChannelTypeID


use ITApps;

/****** Object:  Index [NonClusteredIndex-20180327-131804]    Script Date: 27/03/2018 13:18:29 ******/
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20180327-131804] ON itapps.[dbo].[product]
(
	[ContractID] ASC,
	[Product] ASC,
	[ProductCategory] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON)

use YPS;

 	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#productDelimited') IS NOT NULL 
			DROP TABLE #productDelimited 
select distinct st2.ContractID ,
                st2.Channel,
				STUFF((Select ', '+ST1.Product  AS [text()]
					From itapps.dbo.product  ST1
					Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID
					group by ST1.Product,ST1.ContractID
					ORDER BY ST1.ContractID
					For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') products
			 , STUFF((Select ', '+ST1.ProductCategory  AS [text()]
                From itapps.dbo.product  ST1
                Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID
				group by ST1.ProductCategory,ST1.ContractID
                ORDER BY ST1.ContractID
                For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') productCategories
			  ,STUFF((Select  ', '+ ST1.Medium  AS [text()]
                From itapps.dbo.product  ST1
                Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID
				group by ST1.Medium,ST1.ContractID
                ORDER BY ST1.ContractID
                For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') Medium
            into #productDelimited
			from itapps.dbo.product  st2


------------- DEV11005 addition---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------







		IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#main') IS NOT NULL 
			DROP TABLE #main  
		SELECT	DISTINCT
				t.id AS 'Κωδ. Αιτήματος' ,
				t.code AS 'Παλιός Κωδικός' ,
				bp.code AS 'Kωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου' ,
				bp.Name AS 'Επιχ.Σημείο' ,
				t.[status] ,
				CASE WHEN t.Status = 1 THEN 'Κλειστό'
					 ELSE 'Ανοιχτό'
				END AS 'Κατάσταση Αιτήματος' ,
				cmpn.Description + ' ' + cmpn.Code AS 'Καμπάνια' ,
				adrv2.Prefecture AS 'Νομός' ,
				tp.Description AS 'Προτεραιότητα' ,
				tt.Description AS 'Τύπος Αιτήματος' ,
				uSalesPerson.LastName + ' ' + uSalesPerson.FirstName AS 'Πωλητής' ,
				uSalesPerson.SalesCode AS 'Κωδ. Πωλητή' ,
				t.RelatedContractID AS 'Σχετικό συμβόλαιο' ,
				c.SignedDate AS 'Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου' ,
				tst.Description AS 'Προέλευση' ,
				t.CreatedOn AS 'Ημ. Εισαγωγής' ,
				t.ReceivedOn AS 'Ημ. Παραλαβής' ,
				t.CompletedOn AS 'Ημ. Επίλυσης' ,
				ucreated.LastName + ' ' + ucreated.FirstName AS 'Χρήστης Εισαγωγής' ,
				uhandler.LastName + ' ' + uhandler.FirstName AS 'Τελευταίος CRM Χρήστης' ,
				ucompleted.LastName + ' ' + ucompleted.FirstName AS 'Χρήστης' ,
				ulastAssign.LastName + ' ' + ulastAssign.FirstName AS 'Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης1' ,
				rlastAssign.Description AS 'Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης2' ,
				trm.Description AS 'Επίλυση' ,
				CASE WHEN tr.Result = 1 THEN 'ΕΠΙΛΥΣΗ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα' ,
				CASE WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ'
					 WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη' ,
				tcor.Description AS 'Καταλογισμός Ευθύνης' ,
				t.ContactName AS 'Άτομο Επικοινωνίας' ,
				trr.Description AS 'Αιτία Αιτήματος' ,
				tcr.Description AS 'Λόγος Ακύρωσης'/*rct.Description*/ ,
				CASE WHEN tr.ResultComm = 1 THEN 'ΝΑΙ'
					 WHEN tr.ResultComm = 0 THEN 'ΟΧΙ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Επικοινωνία με πελάτη' ,
				tr.ResultCommDate AS 'Ημ. Επικοινωνίας' ,
				tst.ID AS TicketSourceTypeId ,
				tt.ID AS TicketTypeID ,
				trr.ID AS TicketRequestReasonId ,
				tcr.ID AS TicketCancellationReasonId ,
				tcor.ID AS TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ,
				uSalesPerson.ID AS uSalesPersonID ,
				CASE WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ'
					 WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ'
					 ELSE NULL
				END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη CRM' ,
				cmpn.ID AS CampaignId,
				pd.Channel,-- DEV11005 addition
				pd.Medium,-- DEV11005 addition
				pd.products,-- DEV11005 addition
				Pd.productCategories-- DEV11005 addition
		INTO #main
		FROM	ticket t
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketRequestReason trr ON t.RequestReasonID = trr.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketPriority tp ON t.PriorityID = tp.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketSourceType tst ON t.SourceTypeID = tst.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResolutionMethod trm ON t.ResolutionMethodID = trm.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.[Contract] c ON t.RelatedContractID = c.ID
											  AND c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 )
				LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign cmpn ON c.CampaignID = cmpn.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] uSalesPerson ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = uSalesPerson.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] ulastAssign ON t.LastAssignUserID = ulastAssign.ID 
				LEFT JOIN dbo.Role rlastAssign ON t.LastAssignRoleID = rlastAssign.id
				LEFT JOIN [user] uhandler ON t.HandlerID = uhandler.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] ucreated ON t.CreatedByID = ucreated.ID
				LEFT JOIN [user] ucompleted ON t.CompletedByID = ucompleted.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON t.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adrv2 ON adrv2.ID = bp.LocationAddressID
				LEFT JOIN #Last_ticket_task ltt ON ltt.id = t.id
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON ltt.tr_id = tr.id /*AND tr.ResolutionMethodID IS NOT NULL*/
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResultCommType trct ON tr.ResultCommTypeID = trct.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] utr ON tr.PerformedByID = utr.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketChargeOfResponsibility tcor ON t.ChargeOfResponsibilityID = tcor.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCancellationReason tcr ON t.CancellationResonID = tcr.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketType tt ON t.TicketTypeID = tt.ID
				LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCommunication tc ON t.ID = tc.TicketID/*WHERE t.CreatedOn BETWEEN '2012-09-01' AND '2012-09-30'*/

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #tmp  
SELECT DISTINCT
		ti.id ticketID ,
		ti.Status ticketStatus ,
		mc.id caseId ,
		mt.id taskID ,
		u.LastName potentialUser ,
		r.Description potentialRole ,
		ISNULL(u.LastName, r.Description) potentialUserRole
INTO	#tmp
--select *
FROM	dbo.Ticket ti
		JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = ti.id 
							 AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET'
		JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON c.MasterCaseID = mc.MasterCaseID 
		JOIN dbo.Task mt ON mc.ID = mt.CaseID 
		LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment taa ON mt.id = taa.TaskID
		LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON taa.RoleID = r.ID
		LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ISNULL(mt.ActualOwnerID, taa.UserID) = u.id
								  --AND UnitID <> 40
WHERE	mt.Status = 0
		AND ti.status = 0
		AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #main m WHERE m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = ti.id)
		AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8


IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#flow2') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #flow2  
SELECT	DISTINCT
		ticketID Tid ,
		STUFF((SELECT	CHAR(13) + CHAR(10) + [potentialUserRole]
			   FROM		#tmp
			   WHERE	( ticketID = Results.ticketID )
			   ORDER BY	#tmp.[potentialUserRole]
		FOR	  XML PATH('') ,
				  TYPE).value('(./text())[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '') AS OM
INTO	#flow2
FROM	#tmp Results
GROUP BY Results.ticketID

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SV_task_dates') IS NOT NULL 
	DROP TABLE #SV_task_dates  

SELECT 
COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) ct_id, 
MAX(t.CompletedOn) t_CompletedOn 
INTO #SV_task_dates
FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv 
JOIN #main ct ON ct.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] = COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID)
JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id AND c.ContextEntitytype = 'TGIV'
JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID
WHERE TaskTypeID IN ( 164, 259, 261 ) and Outcome = 'Δεν απαιτούνται διορθώσεις'
--AND COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) = 1679657
GROUP BY COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID)


		IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#result') IS NOT NULL 
			DROP TABLE #result  

		SELECT DISTINCT
				m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] ,
				m.[Παλιός Κωδικός] ,
				m.[Kωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου] ,
				m.[Επιχ.Σημείο] ,
				m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] ,
				m.[Καμπάνια] ,
				m.[Νομός] ,
				m.[Προτεραιότητα] ,
				m.[Τύπος Αιτήματος] ,
				m.[Πωλητής] ,
				m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή] ,
				us.Supervisor ,
				us.[Area Manager] ,
				m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] ,
				CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου], 103) AS [Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου] ,
				CONVERT(NVARCHAR, d.t_CompletedOn, 103) AS [Ημ. Ελέγχου Επιθ] ,
				m.[Προέλευση] ,
				CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής], 103) AS [Ημ. Εισαγωγής] ,
				CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Παραλαβής], 103) AS [Ημ. Παραλαβής] ,
				CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Επίλυσης], 103) AS [Ημ. Επίλυσης] ,
				m.[Χρήστης Εισαγωγής] ,
				m.[Τελευταίος CRM Χρήστης] ,
				m.[Χρήστης] ,
				ISNULL(m.[Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης1],m.[Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης2]) [Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης],
				m.[Επίλυση] ,
				m.[Αποτέλεσμα] ,
				m.[Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη] ,
				m.[Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη CRM] ,
				m.[Καταλογισμός Ευθύνης] ,
				m.[Άτομο Επικοινωνίας] ,
				m.[Αιτία Αιτήματος] ,
				m.[Λόγος Ακύρωσης] ,
				m.[Επικοινωνία με πελάτη] ,
				CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Επικοινωνίας], 103) AS [Ημ. Επικοινωνίας] ,
				f.OM AS 'OM Ανοιχτών Αιτημάτων' ,
				m.TicketSourceTypeId ,
				m.TicketTypeID ,
				m.TicketRequestReasonId ,
				m.TicketCancellationReasonId ,
				m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ,
				m.uSalesPersonID ,
				m.CampaignId ,
				m.Channel,
				m.Medium,
				m.products,
				m.productCategories,
				pis.netvalue AS pistwtika ,
				pis.dates pistwtika_dates,
				ak.netvalue AS akurwtika ,
				ak.dates akurwtika_dates,
				contractValue = ( SELECT	SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.alteredamount IS NOT NULL THEN alteredamount ELSE Price - Discount - RulesDiscount END)
								  FROM		dbo.ContractProduct cp1
								  WHERE		cp1.RelatedContractID = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο]
								)
				--,c.Comments
		--INTO	#result
		FROM	#main m
				LEFT JOIN #flow2 f ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = f.Tid
									AND m.[status] = 0
				--LEFT JOIN #comm c ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = c.Tid
				LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20))
				LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20))
				LEFT JOIN #users us ON us.SalesCode = m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή]
									   AND us.SalesCode IS NOT NULL
				LEFT JOIN #SV_task_dates d ON   d.ct_id = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο]                                   
		WHERE	DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8
				AND ( m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) 
					  OR @option = 1				  				  
					)
				AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL
					  OR ak.code IS NOT NULL
					  OR @option = 0
					)
				AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId )
				AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId )
				AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId )
				AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId )
				AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID )
				AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID )
				AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId )
				AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture )
				AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN ( @state )

--SELECT * 
--FROM #result
--WHERE [Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = 573968

Ρόλος/Χρήστης2' , trm.Description AS 'Επίλυση' , CASE WHEN tr.Result = 1 THEN 'ΕΠΙΛΥΣΗ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα' , CASE WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ' WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη' , tcor.Description AS 'Καταλογισμός Ευθύνης' , t.ContactName AS 'Άτομο Επικοινωνίας' , trr.Description AS 'Αιτία Αιτήματος' , tcr.Description AS 'Λόγος Ακύρωσης'/*rct.Description*/ , CASE WHEN tr.ResultComm = 1 THEN 'ΝΑΙ' WHEN tr.ResultComm = 0 THEN 'ΟΧΙ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Επικοινωνία με πελάτη' , tr.ResultCommDate AS 'Ημ. Επικοινωνίας' , tst.ID AS TicketSourceTypeId , tt.ID AS TicketTypeID , trr.ID AS TicketRequestReasonId , tcr.ID AS TicketCancellationReasonId , tcor.ID AS TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID , uSalesPerson.ID AS uSalesPersonID , CASE WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ' WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη CRM' , cmpn.ID AS CampaignId, pd.Channel,-- DEV11005 addition pd.Medium,-- DEV11005 addition pd.products,-- DEV11005 addition Pd.productCategories-- DEV11005 addition INTO #main FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketRequestReason trr ON t.RequestReasonID = trr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketPriority tp ON t.PriorityID = tp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketSourceType tst ON t.SourceTypeID = tst.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResolutionMethod trm ON t.ResolutionMethodID = trm.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[Contract] c ON t.RelatedContractID = c.ID AND c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign cmpn ON c.CampaignID = cmpn.ID LEFT JOIN [user] uSalesPerson ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = uSalesPerson.ID LEFT JOIN [user] ulastAssign ON t.LastAssignUserID = ulastAssign.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role rlastAssign ON t.LastAssignRoleID = rlastAssign.id LEFT JOIN [user] uhandler ON t.HandlerID = uhandler.ID LEFT JOIN [user] ucreated ON t.CreatedByID = ucreated.ID LEFT JOIN [user] ucompleted ON t.CompletedByID = ucompleted.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON t.BusinessPointID = bp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adrv2 ON adrv2.ID = bp.LocationAddressID LEFT JOIN #Last_ticket_task ltt ON ltt.id = t.id LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON ltt.tr_id = tr.id /*AND tr.ResolutionMethodID IS NOT NULL*/ LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResultCommType trct ON tr.ResultCommTypeID = trct.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] utr ON tr.PerformedByID = utr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketChargeOfResponsibility tcor ON t.ChargeOfResponsibilityID = tcor.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCancellationReason tcr ON t.CancellationResonID = tcr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketType tt ON t.TicketTypeID = tt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCommunication tc ON t.ID = tc.TicketID/*WHERE t.CreatedOn BETWEEN '2012-09-01' AND '2012-09-30'*/ LEFT JOIN #LastCrmCustomerResult lccr ON lccr.id = t.id left join #ProductDelimited pd on Pd.ContractID = c.id-- DEV11005 addition WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM dbo.[Case] c WHERE c.ContextEntityID = t.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET') AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 --IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#flow') IS NOT NULL -- DROP TABLE #flow --SELECT t.ID AS Tid , -- c.id AS Cid , -- tsk.id AS tsk_id , -- r.[Description] AS OM --INTO #flow --FROM dbo.Ticket AS t -- INNER JOIN dbo.[Case] AS c ON t.ID = c.ContextEntityID -- INNER JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON t.BusinessPointID = bp.ID -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[Case] AS c2 ON t.ID = c2.ContextEntityID -- AND c2.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' -- AND c2.CaseTypeID IN ( 88, 91, 86 ) -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Task AS tsk ON ( c2.ID = tsk.CaseID ) -- AND ( tsk.TaskTypeID IN ( 227, 243, 242 ) ) -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment AS ta ON ( tsk.ID = ta.TaskID ) -- AND ( 0 = ta.AssignmentType ) -- AND ( ta.UserID IS NULL ) -- AND ( ta.RoleID IS NOT NULL ) -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[Role] AS r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID --WHERE /*r.[Description] = 'Προϊστάμενος Οργανωτικής Μονάδας FINANCE' AND*/ -- c.[State] = 0 -- AND t.[Status] = 0 -- AND r.[Description] IS NOT NULL -- AND EXISTS ( SELECT MAX(itsk.id) , -- it.id , -- ic.id -- FROM dbo.Ticket it -- JOIN dbo.[Case] ic ON it.ID = ic.ContextEntityID -- AND ic.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' -- AND ic.CaseTypeID IN ( 88, 91, 86 ) -- LEFT JOIN dbo.Task itsk ON ic.ID = itsk.CaseID -- AND itsk.TaskTypeID IN ( 227, 243, 242 ) -- WHERE it.id = t.id -- AND ic.id = c.id -- GROUP BY it.id , -- ic.id -- HAVING MAX(itsk.id) = tsk.id ) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp SELECT DISTINCT ti.id ticketID , ti.Status ticketStatus , mc.id caseId , mt.id taskID , u.LastName potentialUser , r.Description potentialRole , ISNULL(u.LastName, r.Description) potentialUserRole INTO #tmp --select * FROM dbo.Ticket ti JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = ti.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON c.MasterCaseID = mc.MasterCaseID JOIN dbo.Task mt ON mc.ID = mt.CaseID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment taa ON mt.id = taa.TaskID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON taa.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ISNULL(mt.ActualOwnerID, taa.UserID) = u.id --AND UnitID <> 40 WHERE mt.Status = 0 AND ti.status = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #main m WHERE m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = ti.id) AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#flow2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #flow2 SELECT DISTINCT ticketID Tid , STUFF((SELECT CHAR(13) + CHAR(10) + [potentialUserRole] FROM #tmp WHERE ( ticketID = Results.ticketID ) ORDER BY #tmp.[potentialUserRole] FOR XML PATH('') , TYPE).value('(./text())[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '') AS OM INTO #flow2 FROM #tmp Results GROUP BY Results.ticketID ------------------- --case Comments ------------------- /* IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp6') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp6 SELECT DISTINCT ti.id ticketID , cc.CaseID , cc.CommentText , cc.CreatedOn , cc.CreatedBy INTO #tmp6 FROM dbo.Ticket ti JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = ti.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.CaseComment cc ON c.ID = cc.CaseID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #main m WHERE m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = ti.id) AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#comm') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #comm SELECT DISTINCT ticketID Tid , STUFF((SELECT CHAR(13) + CHAR(10) + '[' + [CreatedBy] + '] - ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(25), CreatedOn, 120) + ' - ' + CommentText FROM #tmp6 WHERE ( ticketID = Results.ticketID ) ORDER BY #tmp6.CreatedOn FOR XML PATH('') , TYPE).value('(./text())[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '') AS Comments INTO #comm FROM #tmp6 Results GROUP BY Results.ticketID */ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SV_task_dates') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SV_task_dates SELECT COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) ct_id, MAX(t.CompletedOn) t_CompletedOn INTO #SV_task_dates FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN #main ct ON ct.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] = COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id AND c.ContextEntitytype = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID WHERE TaskTypeID IN ( 164, 259, 261 ) and Outcome = 'Δεν απαιτούνται διορθώσεις' --AND COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) = 1679657 GROUP BY COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#result') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #result SELECT DISTINCT m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή] , us.Supervisor , us.[Area Manager] , m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου], 103) AS [Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, d.t_CompletedOn, 103) AS [Ημ. Ελέγχου Επιθ] , m.[Προέλευση] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής], 103) AS [Ημ. Εισαγωγής] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Παραλαβής], 103) AS [Ημ. Παραλαβής] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Επίλυσης], 103) AS [Ημ. Επίλυσης] , m.[Χρήστης Εισαγωγής] , m.[Τελευταίος CRM Χρήστης] , m.[Χρήστης] , ISNULL(m.[Τελ. Επικοινωνίας], 103) AS [Ημ. Επικοινωνίας] , f.OM AS 'OM Ανοιχτών Αιτημάτων' , m.TicketSourceTypeId , m.TicketTypeID , m.TicketRequestReasonId , m.TicketCancellationReasonId , m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID , m.uSalesPersonID , m.CampaignId , m.Channel, m.Medium, m.products, m.productCategories, pis.netvalue AS pistwtika , pis.dates pistwtika_dates, ak.netvalue AS akurwtika , ak.dates akurwtika_dates, contractValue = ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.alteredamount IS NOT NULL THEN alteredamount ELSE Price - Discount - RulesDiscount END) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp1 WHERE cp1.RelatedContractID = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] ) --,c.Comments --INTO #result FROM #main m LEFT JOIN #flow2 f ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = f.Tid AND m.[status] = 0 --LEFT JOIN #comm c ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = c.Tid LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) LEFT JOIN #users us ON us.SalesCode = m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή] AND us.SalesCode IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN #SV_task_dates d ON d.ct_id = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] WHERE DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 AND ( m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) OR @option = 1 ) AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL OR ak.code IS NOT NULL OR @option = 0 ) AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId ) AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ) AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID ) AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId ) AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture ) AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN ( @state ) --SELECT * --FROM #result --WHERE [Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = 573968

union
select id,description,2 as tp from TicketRequestReason
order by 3,2

  'Κενό' AS description,
  1 AS tp
UNION

  description,
  2 AS tp
FROM TicketRequestReason
ORDER BY
  3,
  2

named_assets.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online).SalesMan
named_assets.sql_raw:
select -1 as id ,'Κενό' as lastname,1 as tp
union
select distinct usr.ID,usr.LastName,2 as tp
from [User] usr join Ticket  t ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = usr.ID  
order by 3,2

  -1 AS id,
  'Κενό' AS lastname,
  1 AS tp

  usr.ID,
  usr.LastName,
  2 AS tp
FROM [User] AS usr

  ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = usr.ID
ORDER BY

datasets.name: Year
datasets.query:
with yearlist as 
(
    select 2018 as year
    union all
    select yl.year + 1 as year
    from yearlist yl
    where yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GetDate())
)

select year from yearlist order by year desc;
datasets.sql_normalized:
WITH yearlist AS (
  SELECT
    2018 AS year
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    yl.year + 1 AS year
  FROM yearlist AS yl
  WHERE
    yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE())
)
SELECT
  year
FROM yearlist
ORDER BY
  year DESC

datasets.name: Heading
datasets.query:
select -1 as ID,'null' as name, 'κενό' as Name2
union all

select cast(Replace(h.Code, 'H', '') as int) as id, h.NameGR as name , cast(Replace(h.Code, 'H', '') as varchar) as Name2
from heading.Heading h
where isActive=1
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  -1 AS ID,
  'null' AS name,
  'κενό' AS Name2
UNION ALL
SELECT
  CAST(REPLACE(h.Code, 'H', '') AS INTEGER) AS id,
  h.NameGR AS name,
  CAST(REPLACE(h.Code, 'H', '') AS VARCHAR) AS Name2
FROM heading.Heading AS h
WHERE
  isActive = 1

datasets.name: BroaderArea
datasets.query:
select '(κενό)'  as 'BroaderArea', '-1' as BroaderAreaID 
union all
select distinct ba.AreaName as 'BroaderArea',
				ba.BroaderAreaID 
from ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations r 
join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
where r.region_id in (@region)
order by 1
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  '(κενό)' AS [BroaderArea],
  '-1' AS BroaderAreaID
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT
  ba.AreaName AS [BroaderArea],
  ba.BroaderAreaID
FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r
JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS ba
  ON r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
WHERE
  r.region_id IN (@region)
ORDER BY
  1

datasets.name: Prefecture
datasets.query:
select distinct pre.AreaName as 'Prefecture'
      ,pre.BroaderAreaID as 'PrefectureId'
  from ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations r
  left join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
  left join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID
where (r.broader_area_id in (@broaderarea) or r.region_id in (@region)) and pre.AreaName is not null and pre.BroaderAreaID is not null
order by 1
datasets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  pre.AreaName AS [Prefecture],
  pre.BroaderAreaID AS [PrefectureId]
FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r
LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS ba
  ON r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS pre
  ON r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID
WHERE
  (
    r.broader_area_id IN (@broaderarea) OR r.region_id IN (@region)
  )
  AND NOT pre.AreaName IS NULL
  AND NOT pre.BroaderAreaID IS NULL
ORDER BY
  1

datasets.name: Municipality
datasets.query:
select distinct mun.AreaName as 'Municipality'
	  ,mun.BroaderAreaID as 'MunicipalityId' 
 from ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations r 
  --join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp reg on r.region_id = reg.BroaderAreaID 
--  join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID 
  join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID 
  join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp mun on r.municipality_id = mun.BroaderAreaID 
 -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp loc on r.location_id = loc.BroaderAreaID and left--(loc.BroaderAreaID,1)='L'
where pre.BroaderAreaID in (@prefecture) order by 1

datasets.name: City

	  ,loc.BroaderAreaID as 'CityId'  
from ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations r 
 -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp reg on r.region_id = reg.BroaderAreaID

 -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID

  SELECT
    yl.year + 1 AS year
  FROM yearlist AS yl
  WHERE
    yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE())
)
SELECT
  year
FROM yearlist
ORDER BY
  year DESC

named_assets.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018.Heading
named_assets.sql_raw:
select -1 as ID,'null' as name, 'κενό' as Name2
union all

select cast(Replace(h.Code, 'H', '') as int) as id, h.NameGR as name , cast(Replace(h.Code, 'H', '') as varchar) as Name2
from heading.Heading h
where isActive=1
named_assets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  -1 AS ID,
  'null' AS name,
  'κενό' AS Name2
UNION ALL
SELECT
  CAST(REPLACE(h.Code, 'H', '') AS INTEGER) AS id,
  h.NameGR AS name,
  CAST(REPLACE(h.Code, 'H', '') AS VARCHAR) AS Name2
FROM heading.Heading AS h
WHERE
  isActive = 1

named_assets.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018.BroaderArea
named_assets.sql_raw:
select '(κενό)'  as 'BroaderArea', '-1' as BroaderAreaID 
union all
select distinct ba.AreaName as 'BroaderArea',
				ba.BroaderAreaID 
from ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations r 
join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
where r.region_id in (@region)
order by 1
named_assets.sql_normalized:
SELECT
  '(κενό)' AS [BroaderArea],
  '-1' AS BroaderAreaID
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT
  ba.AreaName AS [BroaderArea],
  ba.BroaderAreaID
FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r
JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS ba
  ON r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
WHERE
  r.region_id IN (@region)
ORDER BY
  1

named_assets.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018.Prefecture
named_assets.sql_raw:
select distinct pre.AreaName as 'Prefecture'
      ,pre.BroaderAreaID as 'PrefectureId'
  from ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations r
  left join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
  left join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID
where (r.broader_area_id in (@broaderarea) or r.region_id in (@region)) and pre.AreaName is not null and pre.BroaderAreaID is not null
order by 1
named_assets.sql_normalized:
SELECT DISTINCT
  pre.AreaName AS [Prefecture],
  pre.BroaderAreaID AS [PrefectureId]
FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r
LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS ba
  ON r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID
LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS pre
  ON r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID
WHERE
  (
    r.broader_area_id IN (@broaderarea) OR r.region_id IN (@region)
  )
  AND NOT pre.AreaName IS NULL
  AND NOT pre.BroaderAreaID IS NULL
ORDER BY
  1

CREATE view [dbo].[BusinessPointIdentificationWithThirdPartyDataAttribute] as 
		SELECT f.[BusinessPointIdentificationID],a.ClassifierNodeID as [ClassifierNodeID],f.attributeID as AttributeID,f.[AttributeValueID],f.AttributeValueIDOld
		  FROM  ItApps.[rae].ReportErrorFormAttribute f
		  JOIN  ItApps.[rae].ReportErrorForm ff on ff.id = f.[ErrorFormID]

union 
		SELECT f.[BusinessPointIdentificationID],a.ClassifierNodeID as [ClassifierNodeID],f.attributeID as AttributeID,f.[AttributeValueID],NULL as AttributeValueIDOld
		  FROM  ItApps.[rae].FreeListingFormAttribute f
		  JOIN  ItApps.[rae].FreeListingForm ff on ff.id = f.[FreeListingFormID] 
		  JOIN  ItApps.[heading].Activity a on a.id = ff.ActivityID

named_assets.name: dbo.CampaignAnalsysisPerProductView
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignAnalsysisPerProductView] AS 
SELECT 
CCP.CampaignID as CurrentCampaignID,
CurrentCampaign.Code + ' ' + CurrentCampaign.Name as CurrentCampaignName,
CCP.ContractProductID as ContractProductID,
CCP.AdvertisementID as AdvertisementID,
CCP.PreviousCampaignID AS PreviousCampaignID,
PreviousCampaign.Code + ' ' + PreviousCampaign.Name AS Campaign,
CS1BP.BusinessPointCode AS BranchCode,
CS1BP.Name as Customer,
CS1BP.BrandName as BrandName,
case when CS1BP.IsActive = 0 then 'InActive' else 'Active' end as BusinessPointStatus,	
CLN.Name as customerCategory,
CS1BP.LocationPrefecture +',' + CS1BP.LocationGeoModelZipCode as Prefecture,
CS1BP.LocationPrefecture as ActualPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesPrefecture +',' + CS1BP.SalesGeoModelZipCode as SalesPointPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesPrefecture as SalesPointActualPrefecture,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
	 WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 1 THEN 'Approved'
	 WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
	 WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
	 ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.ContractState)
	 END AS ContractStatus,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 1 THEN 'Accepted'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 4 THEN 'Interrupted'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 5 THEN 'Completed'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS'	 
	 ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.CPState)
	 END AS ContractProductStatus,
ISNULL(CS1CD.MigratedCode,CS1CD.ContractID) AS ContractCode,
CS1CD.CreatedBy AS ContractInsertionUser,
CS1CD.SignedDate AS SignDate,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanCode,CS1CD.SubrSalesmanCode) AS SaleRepCode,

ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorCode,CS1CD.SubrSupervisorCode) AS SupervisorCode,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisor,CS1CD.SubrSupervisor) AS Supervisor,
isnull(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) AS ContractAmount, --TODO: Get this from CS1CD.ContractAmount
CS1CD.IsCPRenewable AS Syndromitiko_Flag,
CS1CD.IsCPSubscriptionBased AS Syndromhtiko_Old,
CS1CD.CreatedOn AS Contract_Creation_Date,
CS1CD.AdvBeginDate AS Start_Date,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CreatedBy = 'SubScriptionRenewalAll' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Auto_Renewal,
CS1CD.IsBundle as IsBundle,
CS1CD.CPCode AS ProductCode,
CS1CD.CPName AS ProductName,
CS1CD.AdvProductCode AS AdvertisementProductCode,
CS1CD.AdvProductName AS AdvertisementProductName,
CS1CD.AdvHeadingCode + ' - ' + CS1CD.AdvHeadingName AS SHeading,
CS1CD.MediumVersionName AS Medium,
CS1CD.MediumVersionCode AS MediumVersion,
CS1CD.VersionSectionName AS VersionSection,
CS1CD.CPInterruptionDate AS AdvertisementInterruptionDate,
CS1CD.AdvEndDate AS AdvertisementEndDate,
CS1CD.AdvPrice AS Price,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) + ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS Discount,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS PriceAfterDiscount,
CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount AS AlteredAmount,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount, (ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0))) AS FinalPriceAfterDiscount,
CS1CD.ContractPaymentMethodName AS PaymentMethod,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50),NULL) AS ContractState, --CS1CD. AS AutoRenewalContractStatus, -- TODO: MAKE CASE FROM CS1CD.ContractState
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50),NULL) AS AutoRenewalContractRenewStatus,
CS1CD.ContractID AS AutoRenewalContractId,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(100), NULL) as OldCtr,  --TODO: GET THIS FROM CS1CD.AutoRenewalContractStatus  AS OldCtr,
CONVERT(int, NULL) AS SourceContractProductID, --TODO: GET THIS FROM CS1CD.SourceContractProductID  AS SourceContractProductID,
CS1CD.ContractReleaseDate AS ReleasedDate
FROM CanvasStage1ContractDetail AS CS1CD
JOIN CampaignContractProduct as CCP ON CS1CD.ContractProductID = CCP.ContractProductID
JOIN CanvasStage1BusinessPoint as CS1BP ON CCP.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID
JOIN Campaign as PreviousCampaign ON CCP.PreviousCampaignID  = PreviousCampaign.ID
JOIN Campaign as CurrentCampaign ON CCP.CampaignID  = CurrentCampaign.ID
LEFT JOIN Classification CLF on CLF.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID AND CLF.ClassifierID = 7
LEFT JOIN ClassifierNode CLN on CLF.ClassifierNodeID = CLN.ID

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignAnalsysisPerProductView] AS 
SELECT 
CCP.CampaignID as CurrentCampaignID,
CurrentCampaign.Code + ' ' + CurrentCampaign.Name as CurrentCampaignName,
CCP.ContractProductID as ContractProductID,
CCP.AdvertisementID as AdvertisementID,
CCP.PreviousCampaignID AS PreviousCampaignID,
PreviousCampaign.Code + ' ' + PreviousCampaign.Name AS Campaign,
CS1BP.BusinessPointCode AS BranchCode,
CS1BP.Name as Customer,
CS1BP.BrandName as BrandName,
case when CS1BP.IsActive = 0 then 'InActive' else 'Active' end as BusinessPointStatus,	
CLN.Name as customerCategory,
CS1BP.LocationPrefecture +',' + CS1BP.LocationGeoModelZipCode as Prefecture,
CS1BP.LocationPrefecture as ActualPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesPrefecture +',' + CS1BP.SalesGeoModelZipCode as SalesPointPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesPrefecture as SalesPointActualPrefecture,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
	 WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 1 THEN 'Approved'
	 WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
	 WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
	 ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.ContractState)
	 END AS ContractStatus,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 1 THEN 'Accepted'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 4 THEN 'Interrupted'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 5 THEN 'Completed'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
	 WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS'	 
	 ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.CPState)
	 END AS ContractProductStatus,
ISNULL(CS1CD.MigratedCode,CS1CD.ContractID) AS ContractCode,
CS1CD.CreatedBy AS ContractInsertionUser,
CS1CD.SignedDate AS SignDate,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanCode,CS1CD.SubrSalesmanCode) AS SaleRepCode,

ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorCode,CS1CD.SubrSupervisorCode) AS SupervisorCode,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisor,CS1CD.SubrSupervisor) AS Supervisor,
isnull(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) AS ContractAmount, --TODO: Get this from CS1CD.ContractAmount
CS1CD.IsCPRenewable AS Syndromitiko_Flag,
CS1CD.IsCPSubscriptionBased AS Syndromhtiko_Old,
CS1CD.CreatedOn AS Contract_Creation_Date,
CS1CD.AdvBeginDate AS Start_Date,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CreatedBy = 'SubScriptionRenewalAll' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Auto_Renewal,
CS1CD.IsBundle as IsBundle,
CS1CD.CPCode AS ProductCode,
CS1CD.CPName AS ProductName,
CS1CD.AdvProductCode AS AdvertisementProductCode,
CS1CD.AdvProductName AS AdvertisementProductName,
CS1CD.AdvHeadingCode + ' - ' + CS1CD.AdvHeadingName AS SHeading,
CS1CD.MediumVersionName AS Medium,
CS1CD.MediumVersionCode AS MediumVersion,
CS1CD.VersionSectionName AS VersionSection,
CS1CD.CPInterruptionDate AS AdvertisementInterruptionDate,
CS1CD.AdvEndDate AS AdvertisementEndDate,
CS1CD.AdvPrice AS Price,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) + ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS Discount,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS PriceAfterDiscount,
CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount AS AlteredAmount,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount, (ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0))) AS FinalPriceAfterDiscount,
CS1CD.ContractPaymentMethodName AS PaymentMethod,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50),NULL) AS ContractState, --CS1CD. AS AutoRenewalContractStatus, -- TODO: MAKE CASE FROM CS1CD.ContractState
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50),NULL) AS AutoRenewalContractRenewStatus,
CS1CD.ContractID AS AutoRenewalContractId,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(100), NULL) as OldCtr,  --TODO: GET THIS FROM CS1CD.AutoRenewalContractStatus  AS OldCtr,
CONVERT(int, NULL) AS SourceContractProductID, --TODO: GET THIS FROM CS1CD.SourceContractProductID  AS SourceContractProductID,
CS1CD.ContractReleaseDate AS ReleasedDate
FROM CanvasStage1ContractDetail AS CS1CD
JOIN CampaignContractProduct as CCP ON CS1CD.ContractProductID = CCP.ContractProductID
JOIN CanvasStage1BusinessPoint as CS1BP ON CCP.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID
JOIN Campaign as PreviousCampaign ON CCP.PreviousCampaignID  = PreviousCampaign.ID
JOIN Campaign as CurrentCampaign ON CCP.CampaignID  = CurrentCampaign.ID
LEFT JOIN Classification CLF on CLF.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID AND CLF.ClassifierID = 7
LEFT JOIN ClassifierNode CLN on CLF.ClassifierNodeID = CLN.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.CampaignAnalsysisPreviousCampaignView
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignAnalsysisPreviousCampaignView] AS 

	select 
				cs1bp.BusinessPointCode
				,cs1bp.CustomerSolvencyID
				,cs1bp.CustomerSolvency
				,camp.ID CampaignID
				,camp.Name CampaignName
				,cs1bp.Name
				,cs1bp.LocationPrefectureID
				,cs1bp.LocationPrefecture
				,cs1bp.LocationMunicipalityID
				,cs1bp.LocationMunicipality
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1ID
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1Text
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelZipCode
				,cs1bp.BrandName
				,cs1bp.Profession
				,cs1bp.MainActivityID
				,cs1bp.MainActivity
				,cs1bp.Seniority
				,PreviousMediumID = mv.MediumID 
				,PreviousMediumName = me.Name
				,PreviousChannelTypID = cc.ChannelTypeID
				,PreviousSubChannelTypeID = cc.SubChannelID
				,PreviousChannelTypeName = ct.[Description]
				,PreviousSubchannelName = sch.[Description]	
				,PreviousSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN cp.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 THEN cp.Price- cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,PreviousNoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN cp.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 
						THEN cp.Price- cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,PreviousFinalPrice = CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL  THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END
				,CurrentChannelTypeID = currContract.ChannelTypeID
				,CurrentSubchannelId = currContract.SubChannelID
				,CurrentChannelTypeName = currChannelType.[Description]
				,CurrentSubchannelName = currSubchannel.[Description]
				,CurrentFinalPrice = currContract.Price

			from CampaignBusinessPoint cbp
			join Campaign camp on cbp.CampaignID = camp.ID
			join CanvasStage1BusinessPoint cs1bp on cbp.BusinessPointID = cs1bp.BusinessPointID
			left join CampaignContractProduct ccp on ccp.BusinessPointID = cbp.BusinessPointID and ccp.CampaignID = cbp.CampaignID
			left join ContractProduct cp on ccp.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			left join VersionSection vs on cp.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			left join [Contract] cc on cc.ID = ccp.ContractID			
			left join 
				(
				select con.CampaignID CampaignID, con.ActualBPOwnerID BusinessPointID, con.ID ContractID, con.ChannelTypeID, con.SubChannelID, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL  THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END) Price
				from [Contract] con 
				join ContractProduct cp on con.ID = cp.RelatedContractID
				group by con.CampaignID,con.ActualBPOwnerID, con.ID, con.ChannelTypeID, con.SubChannelID
				) currContract on currContract.BusinessPointID = ccp.BusinessPointID and currContract.CampaignID = camp.ID
				
			left join ChannelType ct on cc.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID
			left join SubChannel sch on cc.SubChannelID = sch.ID
			left join ChannelType currChannelType on currContract.ChannelTypeID = currChannelType.ID
			left join SubChannel currSubchannel on currContract.SubChannelID = currSubchannel.ID
