				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1ID
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1Text
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelZipCode
				,cs1bp.BrandName
				,cs1bp.Profession
				,cs1bp.MainActivityID
				,cs1bp.MainActivity
				,cs1bp.Seniority
				,PreviousMediumID = mv.MediumID 
				,PreviousMediumName = me.Name
				,PreviousChannelTypID = cc.ChannelTypeID
				,PreviousSubChannelTypeID = cc.SubChannelID
				,PreviousChannelTypeName = ct.[Description]
				,PreviousSubchannelName = sch.[Description]	
				,PreviousSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN cp.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 THEN cp.Price- cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,PreviousNoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN cp.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 
						THEN cp.Price- cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,PreviousFinalPrice = CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL  THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END
				,CurrentChannelTypeID = currContract.ChannelTypeID
				,CurrentSubchannelId = currContract.SubChannelID
				,CurrentChannelTypeName = currChannelType.[Description]
				,CurrentSubchannelName = currSubchannel.[Description]
				,CurrentFinalPrice = currContract.Price

			from CampaignBusinessPoint cbp
			join Campaign camp on cbp.CampaignID = camp.ID
			join CanvasStage1BusinessPoint cs1bp on cbp.BusinessPointID = cs1bp.BusinessPointID
			left join CampaignContractProduct ccp on ccp.BusinessPointID = cbp.BusinessPointID and ccp.CampaignID = cbp.CampaignID
			left join ContractProduct cp on ccp.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			left join VersionSection vs on cp.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			left join [Contract] cc on cc.ID = ccp.ContractID			
			left join 
				(
				select con.CampaignID CampaignID, con.ActualBPOwnerID BusinessPointID, con.ID ContractID, con.ChannelTypeID, con.SubChannelID, 
				SUM(CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL  THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END) Price
				from [Contract] con 
				join ContractProduct cp on con.ID = cp.RelatedContractID
				group by con.CampaignID,con.ActualBPOwnerID, con.ID, con.ChannelTypeID, con.SubChannelID
				) currContract on currContract.BusinessPointID = ccp.BusinessPointID and currContract.CampaignID = camp.ID
				
			left join ChannelType ct on cc.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID
			left join SubChannel sch on cc.SubChannelID = sch.ID
			left join ChannelType currChannelType on currContract.ChannelTypeID = currChannelType.ID
			left join SubChannel currSubchannel on currContract.SubChannelID = currSubchannel.ID

				,CurrentMediumName = null						
				,CurrentChannelTypeID = cht.ID
				,CurrentGroupId = grp.ID
				,CurrentChannelTypeName = cht.[Description]
				,CurrentGroupName = grp.Name
				,CurrentFinalPrice = null
				,SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = null
				,NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = null
				,AutoRenewableAmountAfterDiscount = null
				,tgiv.id as tgivid
				,camp.Code CampaignCode
			from TargetGroupItem tgi
			join Campaign camp on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID
			join CampaignInfo ci on ci.id = camp.id
			join CanvasStage1BusinessPoint cs1bp on tgi.BusinessPointID = cs1bp.BusinessPointID
			join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID and tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = camp.SelectedAllocationPlanID
			--left join TargetGroupItemPeriod tgip on tgip.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID and tgip.Period = 1
			--left join ContractProduct cp on tgip.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			--left join [Contract] cc on cc.ID = cp.RelatedContractID	and cc.[State] <> 3 and cc.[Type] <> 5
			--left join TargetGroupItemValue prevTGIV on cc.ID = prevTGIV.ContractID
			left join CampaignGroup grp on tgiv.GroupID = grp.ID
			left join ChannelType cht on grp.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID
			where tgiv.TargetValue is not null and (tgiv.TargetValue <> 0.000 or (tgiv.TargetValue = 0.000 and tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1))
UNION
select 
				cs1bp.BusinessPointCode
				,PreviousCPid = null
				,CurrCPid = currCp.ID
				,cs1bp.CustomerSolvencyID
				,cs1bp.CustomerSolvency
				,camp.ID CampaignID
				,camp.Name CampaignName
				,cs1bp.Name
				,cs1bp.LocationPrefectureID
				,cs1bp.LocationPrefecture
				,cs1bp.LocationMunicipalityID
				,cs1bp.LocationMunicipality
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1ID
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1Text
				,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelZipCode
				,cs1bp.BrandName
				,cs1bp.Profession
				,cs1bp.MainActivityID
				,cs1bp.MainActivity
				,cs1bp.Seniority
				--,PreviousSubChannelTypeID = null
				--,PreviousSubchannelName = null
				
				,PreviousFinalPrice = null
				,CurrentMediumID = mv.MediumID 
				,CurrentMediumName = me.Name						
				,CurrentChannelTypeID = cht.ID
				,CurrentGroupId = grp.ID
				,CurrentChannelTypeName = cht.[Description]
				,CurrentGroupName = grp.Name
				,CurrentFinalPrice = CASE WHEN currCp.[State] not in (3,4) THEN currCp.Price - currCp.Discount - currCp.RulesDiscount ELSE currCp.AlteredAmount END
				,SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN currCp.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 and currCon.OrigionalContractID IS null THEN currCp.Price- currCp.Discount - currCp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN currCp.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 THEN currCp.Price- currCp.Discount - currCp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,AutoRenewableAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN currCp.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 and currCon.OrigionalContractID IS NOT null THEN currCp.Price- currCp.Discount - currCp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END
				,tgiv.id as tgivid
				,camp.Code CampaignCode
			from TargetGroupItem tgi
			join Campaign camp on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID
			join CampaignInfo ci on ci.id = camp.id
			join CanvasStage1BusinessPoint cs1bp on tgi.BusinessPointID = cs1bp.BusinessPointID
			join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID and tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = camp.SelectedAllocationPlanID			
			join [Contract] currCon on currCon.ID = tgiv.ContractID and currCon.[State] <> 3 and currCon.[Type] <> 5
			left join ContractProduct currCp on currCp.RelatedContractID = currCon.ID
			left join VersionSection vs on currCp.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID					
			left join CampaignGroup grp on tgiv.GroupID = grp.ID
			left join ChannelType cht on grp.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignAnalysisPerProductView] AS 
SELECT distinct
CCP.CampaignID as CurrentCampaignID,
CurrentCampaign.Code + ' ' + CurrentCampaign.Name as CurrentCampaignName,
CCP.ContractProductID as ContractProductID,
CCP.AdvertisementID as AdvertisementID,
conCampaign.ID AS PreviousCampaignID,
conCampaign.Code + ' ' + conCampaign.Name AS Campaign,
CS1BP.BusinessPointCode AS BranchCode,
CS1BP.Name as Customer,
CS1BP.BrandName as BrandName,
case when CS1BP.IsActive = 0 then 'InActive' else 'Active' end as BusinessPointStatus,      
CLN.Name as customerCategory,
CS1BP.LocationLine3 as Prefecture,
CS1BP.LocationPrefecture as ActualPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesLine3 as SalesPointPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesPrefecture as SalesPointActualPrefecture,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 1 THEN 'Approved'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
      ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.ContractState)
      END AS ContractStatus,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 1 THEN 'Accepted'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 4 THEN 'Interrupted'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 5 THEN 'Completed'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS'   
       ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.CPState)
      END AS ContractProductStatus,
ISNULL(CS1CD.MigratedCode,CS1CD.ContractID) AS ContractCode,
CS1CD.CreatedBy AS ContractInsertionUser,
CS1CD.SignedDate AS SignDate,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanID, CS1CD.SubrSalesmanID) as SalesRepID,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanCode,CS1CD.SubrSalesmanCode) AS SaleRepCode,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesman,CS1CD.SubrSalesman) AS SaleRepName,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorID,os.OriginalSupervisorID) AS SupervisorID,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorCode,os.OriginalSupervisorCode) AS SupervisorCode,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisor,os.OriginalSupervisorName) AS Supervisor,
isnull(CS1CD.ContractAmount,0) AS ContractAmount,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS Syndromitiko_Flag,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS Syndromhtiko_Old,
CS1CD.CreatedOn AS Contract_Creation_Date,
CS1CD.AdvBeginDate AS Start_Date,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CreatedBy = 'SubScriptionRenewalAll' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Auto_Renewal,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsBundle = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS IsBundle,
CS1CD.CPCode AS ProductCode,
CS1CD.CPName AS ProductName,
CS1CD.AdvProductCode AS AdvertisementProductCode,
CS1CD.AdvProductName AS AdvertisementProductName,
CS1CD.AdvHeadingCode + ' - ' + CS1CD.AdvHeadingName AS SHeading,
me.Name AS Medium,
mv.Code AS MediumVersion,
vs.Name AS VersionSection,
CS1CD.CPInterruptionDate AS AdvertisementInterruptionDate,
CS1CD.AdvEndDate AS AdvertisementEndDate,
CS1CD.AdvPrice AS Price,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) + ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS Discount,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS PriceAfterDiscount,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState in (3,4) THEN CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount ELSE NULL END AS AlteredAmount,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState in (3,4) THEN CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount ELSE (ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0)) END AS FinalPriceAfterDiscount,
CS1CD.ContractPaymentMethodName AS PaymentMethod,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.ContractState IN (3, 5, 10) THEN 'Cancelled'
     WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.CPState IN (3, 4) THEN 'Cancelled'
     WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  AND CS1CDRenewals.CPState NOT IN (3, 4) AND CS1CDRenewals.ContractState NOT IN (3, 5, 10) THEN 'Valid'
     ELSE '' END as AutoRenewalContractStatus,
CASE 
      WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 'True' 
      WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.IsCPRenewable = 0 THEN 'False' 
      WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  THEN ''
      END  AS AutoRenewalContractRenewStatus,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  THEN CS1CDRenewals.ContractID END AS AutoRenewalContractId,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID THEN  CS1CD.ContractID END AS OldCtr,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  THEN CS1CDRenewals.SourceContractProductID END AS SourceContractProductID,
CS1CD.ContractReleaseDate AS ReleasedDate
FROM CanvasStage1ContractDetail AS CS1CD
JOIN CampaignContractProduct as CCP ON CS1CD.ContractProductID = CCP.ContractProductID and CS1CD.Advertisementid = CCP.AdvertisementID
left JOIN CanvasStage1ContractDetail as CS1CDRenewals on CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID and CS1CDRenewals.SourceContractProductID = CS1CD.ContractProductID
JOIN CanvasStage1BusinessPoint as CS1BP ON CCP.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID
JOIN Campaign as PreviousCampaign ON CCP.PreviousCampaignID  = PreviousCampaign.ID
JOIN Campaign as CurrentCampaign ON CCP.CampaignID  = CurrentCampaign.ID 
join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = CS1CD.Advertisementid 
join Product pr on pr.id = adv.Productid and pr.IsComposite = 0 
left join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
left join Campaign conCampaign on CS1CD.ContractCampaignID = conCampaign.ID
LEFT JOIN Classification CLF on CLF.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID AND CLF.ClassifierID = 7
LEFT JOIN ClassifierNode CLN on CLF.ClassifierNodeID = CLN.ID
outer apply fn_GetOriginalSupervisor(CS1CD.ContractID) os 

WHERE CurrentCampaign.State = 1

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignAnalysisPerProductView] AS 
SELECT distinct
CCP.CampaignID as CurrentCampaignID,
CurrentCampaign.Code + ' ' + CurrentCampaign.Name as CurrentCampaignName,
CCP.ContractProductID as ContractProductID,
CCP.AdvertisementID as AdvertisementID,
conCampaign.ID AS PreviousCampaignID,
conCampaign.Code + ' ' + conCampaign.Name AS Campaign,
CS1BP.BusinessPointCode AS BranchCode,
CS1BP.Name as Customer,
CS1BP.BrandName as BrandName,
case when CS1BP.IsActive = 0 then 'InActive' else 'Active' end as BusinessPointStatus,      
CLN.Name as customerCategory,
CS1BP.LocationLine3 as Prefecture,
CS1BP.LocationPrefecture as ActualPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesLine3 as SalesPointPrefecture,
CS1BP.SalesPrefecture as SalesPointActualPrefecture,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 1 THEN 'Approved'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled'
      WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
      ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.ContractState)
      END AS ContractStatus,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 0 THEN 'Pending'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 1 THEN 'Accepted'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 2 THEN 'Rejected'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 4 THEN 'Interrupted'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 5 THEN 'Completed'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 6 THEN 'Modified'
      WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS'   
       ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.CPState)
      END AS ContractProductStatus,
ISNULL(CS1CD.MigratedCode,CS1CD.ContractID) AS ContractCode,
CS1CD.CreatedBy AS ContractInsertionUser,
CS1CD.SignedDate AS SignDate,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanID, CS1CD.SubrSalesmanID) as SalesRepID,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanCode,CS1CD.SubrSalesmanCode) AS SaleRepCode,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesman,CS1CD.SubrSalesman) AS SaleRepName,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorID,os.OriginalSupervisorID) AS SupervisorID,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorCode,os.OriginalSupervisorCode) AS SupervisorCode,
ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisor,os.OriginalSupervisorName) AS Supervisor,
isnull(CS1CD.ContractAmount,0) AS ContractAmount,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS Syndromitiko_Flag,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS Syndromhtiko_Old,
CS1CD.CreatedOn AS Contract_Creation_Date,
CS1CD.AdvBeginDate AS Start_Date,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CreatedBy = 'SubScriptionRenewalAll' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Auto_Renewal,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsBundle = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS IsBundle,
CS1CD.CPCode AS ProductCode,
CS1CD.CPName AS ProductName,
CS1CD.AdvProductCode AS AdvertisementProductCode,
CS1CD.AdvProductName AS AdvertisementProductName,
CS1CD.AdvHeadingCode + ' - ' + CS1CD.AdvHeadingName AS SHeading,
me.Name AS Medium,
mv.Code AS MediumVersion,
vs.Name AS VersionSection,
CS1CD.CPInterruptionDate AS AdvertisementInterruptionDate,
CS1CD.AdvEndDate AS AdvertisementEndDate,
CS1CD.AdvPrice AS Price,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) + ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS Discount,
ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS PriceAfterDiscount,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState in (3,4) THEN CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount ELSE NULL END AS AlteredAmount,
CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState in (3,4) THEN CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount ELSE (ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0)) END AS FinalPriceAfterDiscount,
CS1CD.ContractPaymentMethodName AS PaymentMethod,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.ContractState IN (3, 5, 10) THEN 'Cancelled'
     WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.CPState IN (3, 4) THEN 'Cancelled'
     WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  AND CS1CDRenewals.CPState NOT IN (3, 4) AND CS1CDRenewals.ContractState NOT IN (3, 5, 10) THEN 'Valid'
     ELSE '' END as AutoRenewalContractStatus,
CASE 
      WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 'True' 
      WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.IsCPRenewable = 0 THEN 'False' 
      WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  THEN ''
      END  AS AutoRenewalContractRenewStatus,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  THEN CS1CDRenewals.ContractID END AS AutoRenewalContractId,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID THEN  CS1CD.ContractID END AS OldCtr,
CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID  THEN CS1CDRenewals.SourceContractProductID END AS SourceContractProductID,
CS1CD.ContractReleaseDate AS ReleasedDate
FROM CanvasStage1ContractDetail AS CS1CD
JOIN CampaignContractProduct as CCP ON CS1CD.ContractProductID = CCP.ContractProductID and CS1CD.Advertisementid = CCP.AdvertisementID
left JOIN CanvasStage1ContractDetail as CS1CDRenewals on CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID and CS1CDRenewals.SourceContractProductID = CS1CD.ContractProductID
JOIN CanvasStage1BusinessPoint as CS1BP ON CCP.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID
JOIN Campaign as PreviousCampaign ON CCP.PreviousCampaignID  = PreviousCampaign.ID
JOIN Campaign as CurrentCampaign ON CCP.CampaignID  = CurrentCampaign.ID 
join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = CS1CD.Advertisementid 
join Product pr on pr.id = adv.Productid and pr.IsComposite = 0 
left join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
left join Campaign conCampaign on CS1CD.ContractCampaignID = conCampaign.ID
LEFT JOIN Classification CLF on CLF.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID AND CLF.ClassifierID = 7
LEFT JOIN ClassifierNode CLN on CLF.ClassifierNodeID = CLN.ID
outer apply fn_GetOriginalSupervisor(CS1CD.ContractID) os 

WHERE CurrentCampaign.State = 1

named_assets.name: dbo.CampaignBucketFileUploadHistoryStatusView
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignBucketFileUploadHistoryStatusView] AS
select  h.CampaignID AS CampaignID
		,h.ID AS FileID
	   ,h.FileName AS FileName
	   ,h.CreatedOn AS CreatedOn
	   ,h.CreatedByUserID AS CreatedByUserID
	   ,u.FirstName AS CreatedByUserFirstName
	   ,u.LastName AS CreatedByUserLastName
       ,CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucketFileUploadHistoryDetail AS hd WHERE h.ID = hd.FileID) THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS HasFileHistoryDetail
       ,CASE WHEN  (EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucket AS cb 
							JOIN CampaignSegmentStatus as css on cb.CampaignID = css.CampaignID AND cb.SegmentID = css.SegmentID
							WHERE cb.CampaignID = h.CampaignID
							  AND cb.FileID = h.ID
							  AND css.SegmentStatusID = 0
							  AND cb.ItemStatus = 0
					) OR EXISTS( SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucket AS cb   --FYI: Must permit the ability to delete from current 'RUNNING' Segment.
							JOIN CampaignSegmentStatus as css on cb.CampaignID = css.CampaignID AND cb.SegmentID = css.SegmentID
							WHERE cb.CampaignID = h.CampaignID
							  AND cb.FileID = h.ID
							  AND css.SegmentStatusID = 1
							  AND cb.ItemStatus = 0
							  AND cb.SegmentID = MONTH(GETDATE()) 
       )) THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS CanDeleteFromBucket
FROM CampaignBucketFileUploadHistory as h 
JOIN [User] as u on h.CreatedByUserID = u.id
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignBucketFileUploadHistoryStatusView] AS

		,h.ID AS FileID
	   ,h.FileName AS FileName
	   ,h.CreatedOn AS CreatedOn
	   ,h.CreatedByUserID AS CreatedByUserID
	   ,u.FirstName AS CreatedByUserFirstName
	   ,u.LastName AS CreatedByUserLastName
       ,CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucketFileUploadHistoryDetail AS hd WHERE h.ID = hd.FileID) THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS HasFileHistoryDetail
       ,CASE WHEN  (EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucket AS cb 
							JOIN CampaignSegmentStatus as css on cb.CampaignID = css.CampaignID AND cb.SegmentID = css.SegmentID
							WHERE cb.CampaignID = h.CampaignID
							  AND cb.FileID = h.ID
							  AND css.SegmentStatusID = 0
							  AND cb.ItemStatus = 0
					) OR EXISTS( SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucket AS cb   --FYI: Must permit the ability to delete from current 'RUNNING' Segment.
							JOIN CampaignSegmentStatus as css on cb.CampaignID = css.CampaignID AND cb.SegmentID = css.SegmentID
							WHERE cb.CampaignID = h.CampaignID
							  AND cb.FileID = h.ID
							  AND css.SegmentStatusID = 1
							  AND cb.ItemStatus = 0
							  AND cb.SegmentID = MONTH(GETDATE()) 
       )) THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS CanDeleteFromBucket
FROM CampaignBucketFileUploadHistory as h 
JOIN [User] as u on h.CreatedByUserID = u.id

named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignNewLossPremiseCustomerView] AS
with a as
(
SELECT r.CampaignID as CampaignID,
		r.ID as RuleID,
		r.Name as RuleName,
		cp.Code as CampaignCode,
		cp.[Description] as CampaignDescription,
		cp.[State] as CampaignState,
		cp.StartedOn as CampaignStartedOn,
		cp.ClosedOn as CampaignClosedOn,
		s.SalesmanID as SalesmanID,
		r.CreatorUserID as CreatorUserID,
		cu.FirstName as CreatorFistName,
		cu.LastName as CreatorLastName,	   
		bp.ID as BusinessPointID,
		bp.Code as BuisnessPointCode,
		bp.Brandname as BusinessPointBrandName,
		bp.Name as BusinessPointName,
		cn.Name as MainActivityName,
		--baup.AreaName as City,
		bp.HasCRMTicket as HasCRMTicket,
		cuso.[Description] as ReliabilityStatus,
		ISNULL(cuso.ID,0) as ReliabilityID,
		bp.LocationAddressID,
		CASE WHEN EXISTS(
		SELECT NULL FROM [case] cs
JOIN task t on t.CaseID = cs.id
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue tgiv with (nolock) on cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
JOIN TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgi.id = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
		WHERE c.BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID AND tgi.CampaignID = r.CampaignID
		) THEN 1 else 0 END as HasSalesMarketCase
FROM CampaignNewLossCustomerRule as r
JOIN Campaign as cp with (nolock) on r.CampaignID = cp.ID
JOIN CampaignNewLossCustomer as c with (nolock) ON r.ID = c.RuleID
JOIN CampaignNewLossCustomerRuleSalesman as s with (nolock) ON r.ID = s.RuleID
JOIN [User] as cu with (nolock) on r.CreatorUserID = cu.ID
JOIN [User] as sd with (nolock) on s.SalesmanID = sd.ID
JOIN BusinessPoint as bp with (nolock) on c.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
join ClassifierNode cn on bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID = cn.ID
--left join BroaderArea ba on ba.AddressID = bp.LocationAddressID and LEFT(ba.BroaderAreaID,1) = 'B' and ba.BroaderAreaID <> 'B1' 
--left join BroaderAreaLookUp baup on ba.BroaderAreaID = baup.BroaderAreaID
left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID
WHERE r.IsActive = 1 
AND r.ChannelTypeID = 0  --Premis Channel Type = 0
AND cp.[State] = 2
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignNewLossSalesmenCustomer as sc where r.ID = sc.RuleID and c.BusinessPointID = sc.BusinessPointID)
)
select  a.*, min(adr.GeoModelLocText) as City
from a 
--left join BroaderArea ba on ba.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID and LEFT(ba.BroaderAreaID,1) = 'B' and ba.BroaderAreaID <> 'B1' 
--left join BroaderAreaLookUp baup on ba.BroaderAreaID = baup.BroaderAreaID
left join address adr on  a.LocationAddressID = adr.ID
group by a.CampaignID,
		a.RuleID,
		a.RuleName,
		a.CampaignCode,
		a.CampaignDescription,
		a.CampaignState,
		a.CampaignStartedOn,
		a.CampaignClosedOn,
		a.SalesmanID,
		a.CreatorUserID,
		a.CreatorFistName,
		a.CreatorLastName,	   
		a.BusinessPointID,
		a.BuisnessPointCode,
		a.BusinessPointBrandName,
		a.BusinessPointName,
		a.MainActivityName,
		a.HasCRMTicket,
		a.ReliabilityStatus,
		a.ReliabilityID,
		a.LocationAddressID,
		a.HasSalesMarketCase

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignNewLossPremiseCustomerView] AS
with a as
(
SELECT r.CampaignID as CampaignID,
		r.ID as RuleID,
		r.Name as RuleName,
		cp.Code as CampaignCode,
		cp.[Description] as CampaignDescription,
		cp.[State] as CampaignState,
		cp.StartedOn as CampaignStartedOn,
		cp.ClosedOn as CampaignClosedOn,
		s.SalesmanID as SalesmanID,
		r.CreatorUserID as CreatorUserID,
		cu.FirstName as CreatorFistName,
		cu.LastName as CreatorLastName,	   
		bp.ID as BusinessPointID,
		bp.Code as BuisnessPointCode,
		bp.Brandname as BusinessPointBrandName,
		bp.Name as BusinessPointName,
		cn.Name as MainActivityName,
		--baup.AreaName as City,
		bp.HasCRMTicket as HasCRMTicket,
		cuso.[Description] as ReliabilityStatus,
		ISNULL(cuso.ID,0) as ReliabilityID,
		bp.LocationAddressID,
		CASE WHEN EXISTS(
		SELECT NULL FROM [case] cs
JOIN task t on t.CaseID = cs.id
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue tgiv with (nolock) on cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
JOIN TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgi.id = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
		WHERE c.BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID AND tgi.CampaignID = r.CampaignID
		) THEN 1 else 0 END as HasSalesMarketCase
FROM CampaignNewLossCustomerRule as r
JOIN Campaign as cp with (nolock) on r.CampaignID = cp.ID
JOIN CampaignNewLossCustomer as c with (nolock) ON r.ID = c.RuleID
JOIN CampaignNewLossCustomerRuleSalesman as s with (nolock) ON r.ID = s.RuleID
JOIN [User] as cu with (nolock) on r.CreatorUserID = cu.ID
JOIN [User] as sd with (nolock) on s.SalesmanID = sd.ID
JOIN BusinessPoint as bp with (nolock) on c.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
join ClassifierNode cn on bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID = cn.ID
--left join BroaderArea ba on ba.AddressID = bp.LocationAddressID and LEFT(ba.BroaderAreaID,1) = 'B' and ba.BroaderAreaID <> 'B1' 
--left join BroaderAreaLookUp baup on ba.BroaderAreaID = baup.BroaderAreaID
left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID
WHERE r.IsActive = 1 
AND r.ChannelTypeID = 0  --Premis Channel Type = 0
AND cp.[State] = 2
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignNewLossSalesmenCustomer as sc where r.ID = sc.RuleID and c.BusinessPointID = sc.BusinessPointID)
)
select  a.*, min(adr.GeoModelLocText) as City
from a 
--left join BroaderArea ba on ba.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID and LEFT(ba.BroaderAreaID,1) = 'B' and ba.BroaderAreaID <> 'B1' 
--left join BroaderAreaLookUp baup on ba.BroaderAreaID = baup.BroaderAreaID
left join address adr on  a.LocationAddressID = adr.ID
group by a.CampaignID,
		a.RuleID,
		a.RuleName,
		a.CampaignCode,
		a.CampaignDescription,
		a.CampaignState,
		a.CampaignStartedOn,
		a.CampaignClosedOn,
		a.SalesmanID,
		a.CreatorUserID,
		a.CreatorFistName,
		a.CreatorLastName,	   
		a.BusinessPointID,
		a.BuisnessPointCode,
		a.BusinessPointBrandName,
		a.BusinessPointName,
		a.MainActivityName,
		a.HasCRMTicket,
		a.ReliabilityStatus,
		a.ReliabilityID,
		a.LocationAddressID,
		a.HasSalesMarketCase

named_assets.name: dbo.CampaignPivotReportViewItem
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignPivotReportViewItem] AS 
 /****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT 
	  REP.ID 
      ,REP.CampaignID
      ,CAMP.Code as CampaignCode
	  ,CAMP.Name as CampaignName
      ,REP.CampaignSegmentID
      ,CS.Name AS CampaignSegmentName
      ,REP.CampaignChannelTypeID
      ,CT.Description AS CampaignChannelTypeName
      ,REP.CampaignGroupID
      ,CG.Name As CampaignGroupName
      ,REP.CampaignSupervisorID      
      ,SUPERVISOR.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName
      ,SUPERVISOR.LastName AS SupervisorLastName
      ,REP.CampaignSalesmanID
      ,SALESMAN.FirstName AS SalesmanFirstName
      ,SALESMAN.LastName AS SalesmanLastName
      ,REP.NumberOfCases
      ,REP.LossQuantity
      ,REP.NewQuantity
      ,REP.COQuantity
      ,REP.LossQuantityPercentage
      ,REP.NewQuantityPercentage
      ,REP.COQuantityPercentage
      ,REP.ContractAmount
      ,REP.SubscriptionAmount
      ,REP.RenewalAmount
      ,REP.NonSubscriptionAmount
      ,REP.SubscriptionAmountPercentage
      ,REP.RenewalAmountPercentage
      ,REP.NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage
      ,REP.PivotType
  FROM CampaignPivotReport AS REP
  JOIN Campaign AS CAMP ON REP.CampaignID = CAMP.ID
  JOIN CampaignSegment AS CS ON REP.CampaignSegmentID = CS.ID
--  JOIN CampaignChannelType AS CCT on REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CCT.ID
  LEFT JOIN ChannelType AS CT ON REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CT.ID
  LEFT JOIN CampaignGroup AS CG ON REP.CampaignGroupID = CG.ID
  LEFT JOIN [User] AS SALESMAN ON REP.CampaignSalesmanID = SALESMAN.ID
  LEFT JOIN [User] AS SUPERVISOR ON REP.CampaignSuperVisorID = SUPERVISOR.ID
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignPivotReportViewItem] AS 
 /****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT 
	  REP.ID 
      ,REP.CampaignID
      ,CAMP.Code as CampaignCode
	  ,CAMP.Name as CampaignName
      ,REP.CampaignSegmentID
      ,CS.Name AS CampaignSegmentName
      ,REP.CampaignChannelTypeID
      ,CT.Description AS CampaignChannelTypeName
      ,REP.CampaignGroupID
      ,CG.Name As CampaignGroupName
      ,REP.CampaignSupervisorID      
      ,SUPERVISOR.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName
      ,SUPERVISOR.LastName AS SupervisorLastName
      ,REP.CampaignSalesmanID
      ,SALESMAN.FirstName AS SalesmanFirstName
      ,SALESMAN.LastName AS SalesmanLastName
      ,REP.NumberOfCases
      ,REP.LossQuantity
      ,REP.NewQuantity
      ,REP.COQuantity
      ,REP.LossQuantityPercentage
      ,REP.NewQuantityPercentage
      ,REP.COQuantityPercentage
      ,REP.ContractAmount
      ,REP.SubscriptionAmount
      ,REP.RenewalAmount
      ,REP.NonSubscriptionAmount
      ,REP.SubscriptionAmountPercentage
      ,REP.RenewalAmountPercentage
      ,REP.NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage
      ,REP.PivotType
  FROM CampaignPivotReport AS REP
  JOIN Campaign AS CAMP ON REP.CampaignID = CAMP.ID
  JOIN CampaignSegment AS CS ON REP.CampaignSegmentID = CS.ID
--  JOIN CampaignChannelType AS CCT on REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CCT.ID
  LEFT JOIN ChannelType AS CT ON REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CT.ID
  LEFT JOIN CampaignGroup AS CG ON REP.CampaignGroupID = CG.ID
  LEFT JOIN [User] AS SALESMAN ON REP.CampaignSalesmanID = SALESMAN.ID
  LEFT JOIN [User] AS SUPERVISOR ON REP.CampaignSuperVisorID = SUPERVISOR.ID

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[CampaignScoreReportView] AS
select 
	   csr.ID,	   
	   csr.CampaignID AS CampaignID,
	   csr.SegmentID AS SegmentID,
	   csr.SalesmanID AS SalesmanID,
	   sdu.FirstName AS SalesmanFirstName,
	   sdu.LastName AS SalesmanLastName,
	   
	   csr.SupervisorID AS SupervisorID,
	   su.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName,
	   su.LastName AS SupervisorLastName,
	   csr.MangerID AS ManagerID,
	   csr.NumberOfCustomers AS NumberOfCustomers,
	   csr.TotalCoAmount AS TotalCoAmount,
	   csr.TotalRoCoAmount AS TotalRoCoAmount,
	   csr.TotalNew AS TotalNew
from CampaignScoreReport AS csr
join [user] AS sdu on csr.SalesmanID = sdu.ID
join [User] AS su on csr.SupervisorID = su.ID

*/

named_assets.name: dbo.CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic                         */
/*==============================================================*/
create view CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic as
with crv as
(
-- EDRA = not exists PointRelationship that shows another point as BillingPoint
-- and exists PointRelationship that shows the same point as BillingPoint
select MainCustomerID = [targetBP].ID
		,MainCustomerCode = [targetBP].Code
		,CustomerID = [targetBP].ID 
		,CustomerCode = [targetBP].Code 
		,CustomerType =  1 
		,MainCustomerIsActive = [targetBP].IsActive
		,CustomerIsActive = [targetBP].IsActive
		,lvl=0
from dbo.BusinessPoint [targetBP]
WHERE [targetBP].IsPOI = 0
and targetBP.ID not in ( select BusinessPointID
						 from dbo.PointRelationship pr
						 where pr.[Type] = 10
						 and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID )
and targetBP.ID  in ( select BusinessPointID
						 from dbo.PointRelationship pr
						 where pr.[Type] = 10
						 and pr.BusinessPointID = pr.TargetBussinessPointID )						 
union all
-- ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ = BusinessPoint that has BillingPoint one of the EDRAs
SELECT	MainCustomerID =  bp.ID
		,MainCustomerCode = bp.Code
		,CustomerID = sourceBP.ID 
		,CustomerCode = sourceBP.Code 
		,CustomerType = 2 -- ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ
		,MainCustomerIsActive = bp.IsActive
		,CustomerIsActive = sourceBP.IsActive
		,lvl= targetBP.lvl+1
FROM crv [targetBP]
join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on targetBP.CustomerID = bp.ID
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship PR ON bp.ID = PR.TargetBussinessPointID
							and PR.[Type] = 10 								
							and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID					
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint [sourceBP] ON [sourceBP].ID = PR.BusinessPointID	
							AND [sourceBP].IsPOI = 0
)
select 
	MainCustomerID	,MainCustomerCode 
	,CustomerID 	,CustomerCode 
	,CustomerType 	,MainCustomerIsActive
	,CustomerIsActive
	,lvl
from crv
named_assets.sql_raw:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic                         */
/*==============================================================*/
create view CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic as
with crv as
(
-- EDRA = not exists PointRelationship that shows another point as BillingPoint
-- and exists PointRelationship that shows the same point as BillingPoint
select MainCustomerID = [targetBP].ID
		,MainCustomerCode = [targetBP].Code
		,CustomerID = [targetBP].ID 
		,CustomerCode = [targetBP].Code 
		,CustomerType =  1 
		,MainCustomerIsActive = [targetBP].IsActive
		,CustomerIsActive = [targetBP].IsActive
		,lvl=0
from dbo.BusinessPoint [targetBP]
WHERE [targetBP].IsPOI = 0
and targetBP.ID not in ( select BusinessPointID
						 from dbo.PointRelationship pr
						 where pr.[Type] = 10
						 and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID )
and targetBP.ID  in ( select BusinessPointID
						 from dbo.PointRelationship pr
						 where pr.[Type] = 10
						 and pr.BusinessPointID = pr.TargetBussinessPointID )						 
union all
-- ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ = BusinessPoint that has BillingPoint one of the EDRAs
SELECT	MainCustomerID =  bp.ID
		,MainCustomerCode = bp.Code
		,CustomerID = sourceBP.ID 
		,CustomerCode = sourceBP.Code 
		,CustomerType = 2 -- ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ
		,MainCustomerIsActive = bp.IsActive
		,CustomerIsActive = sourceBP.IsActive
		,lvl= targetBP.lvl+1
FROM crv [targetBP]
join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on targetBP.CustomerID = bp.ID
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship PR ON bp.ID = PR.TargetBussinessPointID
							and PR.[Type] = 10 								
							and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID					
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint [sourceBP] ON [sourceBP].ID = PR.BusinessPointID	
							AND [sourceBP].IsPOI = 0
)
select 
	MainCustomerID	,MainCustomerCode 
	,CustomerID 	,CustomerCode 
	,CustomerType 	,MainCustomerIsActive
	,CustomerIsActive
	,lvl
from crv

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[DialerViewReasonsPerTask] AS 
select dt.BusinessPointID as BusinessPointID,dt.CurrentTaskID as CurrentTaskID,
CallResultID =(Case when tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID is null and tgiv.NoCommReasonID is null then 3 --ΕΠΑΝΑΚΛΗΣΗ
					when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID in (select id from NegationReason where NegationType = 1 ) then 5 --ΑΡΝΗΣΗ ΕΠΙΚΟΙΝΩΝΙΑΣ
					when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID in (select id from NegationReason where NegationType = 2 )then 1 --ΑΡΝΗΣΗ ΣΥΝΕΡΓΑΣΙΑΣ
					when tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null then 2 --ΑΔΥΝΑΜΙΑ ΕΥΡΕΣΗΣ ΠΕΛΑΤΗ
				end),
				
ReasonID =	  (Case when tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID is null and tgiv.NoCommReasonID is null then tgiv.PostponeReasonID
					when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null then tgiv.NegationReasonID
					when tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null   then tgiv.NoCommReasonID
				end),
				
ReasonDescription =  (Case when tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID is null and tgiv.NoCommReasonID is null then (select description from PostponeReason where ID=tgiv.PostponeReasonID)
						   when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null then (select description from NegationReason where ID=tgiv.NegationReasonID)
						   when tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null   then (select description from NoCommReason where ID=tgiv.NoCommReasonID)
					  end),dt.ExportDate
from DialerTask dt
	join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.id=dt.TargetGroupItemValueID
	join Task t on t.ID = dt.CurrentTaskID
where (tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null or tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null or tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null )
  and ((year(dt.ExportDate) = YEAR(getdate()))or((year(dt.ExportDate) = year(DATEADD(YEAR, -1, GETDATE()))) and month(dt.ExportDate) =12)) -- 8691 DevOps

-- Για τον έλεγχο 2b από το email
-- Έλεγχος με βάση το classifierNode & το attributevalue
Create VIEW [dbo].[DirProductAttributeValueRelationship] AS
SELECT DirProductId = p.ProductID,
DirProductName = p.NameGr,
ClassifierNodeId = act.ClassifierNodeID,
AttributeValueId = p.AttributeValueId
FROM [ItApps].[dir].[ProductToSyncWithHeadings] p 
JOIN ItApps.heading.ActivityHeading ah ON ah.HeadingID = p.[HeadingId]
JOIN ItApps.heading.Activity act ON act.ID = ah.ActivityID
WHERE PageStatus  != 0 --exclude pending
AND IsCustomAttribute = 1

named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ErpContractsView                                       */
/*==============================================================*/
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[ErpContractsView] AS




WITH basicData AS
(

--------DEV-20040 - Προτιμολόγηση 2025-04-24
SELECT ct.ID AS RelatedContractID
      ,CompanyID = 1--MAX( m.CompanyID )
  FROM dbo.Contract ct
  JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod PM ON PM.ID = Ct.id
   AND PM.PaymentMonth IS NOT NULL
  JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP ON cp.RelatedContractId = ct.id
  JOIN dbo.Product P ON CP.ProductID = P.ID
  JOIN dbo.MediumVersion MV ON P.MediumVersionID = MV.ID
  JOIN dbo.Medium M ON MV.MediumID = M.ID
where 
pm.PreInvoice = 1 --μη ολοκληρωμένα συμβόλαια με προτιμολόγηση
and ct.[State] IN (1, 3, 4, 6) --Μεταβολή Συμβολαίου Modification
AND ct.CreatedOn>='20120101'
and ct.Type not in (1,10)
	----έχει ολοκληρωθεί ο Έλεγχος Πληρότητας με outcome 'Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις' 
AND EXISTS (
	select 1 
	from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv 
	join [Case] mc on mc.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
	join [case] c on c.MasterCaseID = mc.ID
	join [task] t on t.CaseID = c.id and t.TaskTypeID = 189 and t.Status = 1 and t.Outcome = 'Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις'
	where tgiv.ContractID = ct.id
)
AND NOT EXISTS  (SELECT 1       --Εξαίρεση μη συνδρομητικών συμβολάιων franchise
                   FROM dbo.Contract oct
                  WHERE oct.CampaignID IN (select id from itapps.dbo.FranchiseCampaigns) 
                    AND oct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL 
                    AND oct.ID = ct.id                  
                 )
AND NOT EXISTS  (	SELECT 1 
                          FROM dbo.Contract ict
                          JOIN dbo.ContractProduct icp ON ict.ID = icp.RelatedContractID
                          JOIN dbo.Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID
					 where (
							--(ict.State <> 3 and icp.state<>3)
						 --   OR 
						    (ict.State = 6 AND icp.state IN (0,1,2)))
							AND ict.ID = Ct.ID
				   )
and not exists (select 1 from TaxCode t where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = t.id and t.TaxCode = '999999999')
UNION ALL 
--------DEV-20040 - Προτιμολόγηση 2025-04-24

SELECT ct.id AS RelatedContractID 
      ,CompanyID = 1--MAX( m.CompanyID )  
  FROM dbo.Contract ct 
  JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID 
  JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod PM ON PM.ID = CP.PaymentMethodID
   AND PM.PaymentMonth IS NOT NULL
  JOIN dbo.Product P ON CP.ProductID = P.ID
  JOIN dbo.MediumVersion MV ON P.MediumVersionID = MV.ID
  JOIN dbo.Medium M ON MV.MediumID = M.ID
 WHERE NOT EXISTS  (	SELECT 1 
                          FROM dbo.Contract ict
                          JOIN dbo.ContractProduct icp ON ict.ID = icp.RelatedContractID
                          JOIN dbo.Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID
                         WHERE ia.QA =0 
                           AND ict.State <> 3
							and icp.id = cp.ID
                            and icp.state<>3		   
                   	)
and ct.Type not in (1,10)
AND ct.CreatedOn>='20120101'
and ct.[State] IN (1, 3, 4, 6) --Μεταβολή Συμβολαίου Modification
AND NOT EXISTS  (SELECT 1       --Εξαίρεση μη συνδρομητικών συμβολάιων franchise
                   FROM dbo.Contract oct
                  WHERE oct.CampaignID IN (select id from itapps.dbo.FranchiseCampaigns) 
                    AND oct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL 
                    AND oct.ID = ct.id                  
                 )
				 --and ct.ActualBPOwnerID = 2112548
and not exists (select 1 from TaxCode t where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = t.id and t.TaxCode = '999999999')
GROUP BY ct.id	

UNION ALL

SELECT ct.ID AS RelatedContractID
      ,CompanyID = 1--MAX( m.CompanyID )
  FROM dbo.Contract ct
  JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod PM ON PM.ID = Ct.id
   AND PM.PaymentMonth IS NOT NULL
  JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP ON cp.RelatedContractId = ct.id
  JOIN dbo.Product P ON CP.ProductID = P.ID
  JOIN dbo.MediumVersion MV ON P.MediumVersionID = MV.ID
  JOIN dbo.Medium M ON MV.MediumID = M.ID
WHERE NOT EXISTS  (	SELECT 1 
                          FROM dbo.Contract ict
                          JOIN dbo.ContractProduct icp ON ict.ID = icp.RelatedContractID
                          JOIN dbo.Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID
					 where (
							(ia.QA =0 AND ict.State <> 3
						     and icp.state<>3 
							 )
						    OR 
						    (ict.State = 6 AND icp.state IN (0,1,2))
						    )
							AND ict.ID = Ct.ID
				   )
and ct.Type not in (1,10)
AND ct.CreatedOn>='20120101'
and ct.[State] IN (1, 3, 4, 6) --Μεταβολή Συμβολαίου Modification
AND NOT EXISTS  (SELECT 1       --Εξαίρεση μη συνδρομητικών συμβολάιων franchise
                   FROM dbo.Contract oct
                  WHERE oct.CampaignID IN (select id from itapps.dbo.FranchiseCampaigns) 
                    AND oct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL 
                    AND oct.ID = ct.id                  
                 )
and not exists (select 1 from TaxCode t where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = t.id and t.TaxCode = '999999999')
 --and ct.ActualBPOwnerID = 2112548

GROUP BY ct.ID	
)

					
,data AS (

SELECT	BillingPointID	= CASE	WHEN abp.BillingAddressID IS NULL THEN pr.TargetBussinessPointID
                                ELSE c.ActualBPOwnerID 
                          END 
, ContractID	= c.ID
, SignedDate	= c.SignedDate
, SalesmanCode	= USR.SalesCode
, LastModifiedDate = ISNULL( c.ModifiedOn, c.CreatedOn )
,[Status] = CASE WHEN c.[State] = 1 THEN 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
                  WHEN c.[State] = 3 THEN 'ΔΙΑΚΟΠΗ' 
				  WHEN c.[State] = 4 THEN 'ΑΝΤΙΚΑΤΑΣΤΑΣΗ'
				  WHEN c.[state] = 6 then (case when not EXISTS (SELECT 1 
                                                       FROM dbo.ContractProduct icpi
                                                       JOIN dbo.Contract ict ON icpi.RelatedContractID = ict.ID
                                                      WHERE ict.id = c.ID
                                                        AND icpi.[state] IN (3,4,7) 
                                                     ) THEN 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
											else 'ΤΡΟΠΟΠΟΙΗΣΗ' ENd)
			 END 
, CompanyID		= bd.CompanyID	
--Μεταβολή Συμβολαίου
, RelatedTicket = (SELECT MAX(T.id)
					 FROM dbo.ticket t	
					 JOIN dbo.TicketType tt ON T.TicketTypeID = tt.id			
					WHERE T.RelatedContractID = c.id 
					  AND tt.IsEditContractType = 1
				 GROUP BY T.RelatedContractID 
				   )
, ContractAlteredAmount = (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN icp.STATE IN (3,4)  THEN ia.AlteredAmount 
                                           ELSE  ia.Price - ia.Discount -ia.RulesDiscount
                                       END)      
                             FROM dbo.[Contract] ic
                             JOIN ContractProduct icp ON icp.RelatedContractID = ic.id
                             JOIN Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID
                            WHERE ic.id = c.id  
                              AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 
                                            FROM dbo.Contract iic
                                            JOIN dbo.ContractProduct iicp ON iic.ID = iicp.RelatedContractID
                                           WHERE iic.id = ic.id  
                                             AND iicp.state IN (3,4)
                                          ) 
                            )
FROM basicData bd
JOIN dbo.[Contract] c ON bd.RelatedContractID = c.ID
JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID
JOIN dbo.[User] USR ON c.SalesmanID = USR.ID
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint abp ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = abp.ID
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = pr.BusinessPointID
AND pr.[Type] = 10		

						             

)

SELECT  DISTINCT d.*
      ,TicketType = tt.Description 
  FROM DATA d
  LEFT JOIN ticket T ON d.RelatedTicket = t.id
  LEFT JOIN ticketType tt ON t.TicketTypeID = tt.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.FullActiveMediumVersion
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[FullActiveMediumVersion] as
select MediumType= mt.Description
, mv.* 
from dbo.MediumVersion mv
join dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID
join dbo.MediumType mt on m.MediumTypeID =mt.ID
and m.IsActive = 1
and mv.IsActive =1 
and mv.PublishDate is not null
and m.ID not in (11,45)
named_assets.sql_raw:
create view [dbo].[FullActiveMediumVersion] as
select MediumType= mt.Description
, mv.* 
from dbo.MediumVersion mv
join dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID
join dbo.MediumType mt on m.MediumTypeID =mt.ID
and m.IsActive = 1
and mv.IsActive =1 
and mv.PublishDate is not null
and m.ID not in (11,45)

named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: FullAddressView                                        */
/*==============================================================*/
create view FullAddressView as
select adr.*, Prefecture= bal.AreaName,Municipality = bal2.AreaName
from dbo.[Address] adr
left	join dbo.BroaderArea da 
		join dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal on da.BroaderAreaID = bal.BroaderAreaID
							and LEFT(da.BroaderAreaID ,2 ) = 'CB'
on adr.ID = da.AddressID							
left	join dbo.BroaderArea da2 
		join dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal2 on da2.BroaderAreaID = bal2.BroaderAreaID
							and LEFT(da2.BroaderAreaID ,2 ) = 'HB'
on adr.ID = da2.AddressID

named_assets.name: dbo.FullMasterGeoAreaView
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[FullMasterGeoAreaView] as
with MGAs as
(
	select 
	MGAID = MGA.ID
	,MGADESCR = MGA.Description
	,MGACode = MGA.Code
	,ParentMGAID = convert(int,null)
	,ParentMGADescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(100), null)
	,PMGACode = MGA.Code
	,RootMGAID = MGA.ID
	,RootMGADESCR = MGA.Description	
	,Lvl = 0
	from dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup MGA
	where MGA.ParentGeoAreaGroupID is null
union all 
	select 
	MGAID = MGA.ID
	,MGADESCR = MGA.Description
	,MGACode = MGA.Code
	,ParentMGAID = MGAs.MGAID
	,ParentMGADescr = MGAs.MGADESCR
	,PMGACode = MGAs.MGACode
	,RootMGAID = MGAs.RootMGAID
	,RootMGADESCR = MGAs.RootMGADESCR
	,Lvl = MGAs.Lvl+1
	from dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup MGA
	join MGAs on MGA.ParentGeoAreaGroupID = MGAs.MGAID	
	and	MGA.ParentGeoAreaGroupID is not null
)
select MGAs.* 
from MGAs

named_assets.name: dbo.FullMasterHeadingView
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW FullMasterHeadingView as
with MHs as
(
	select 
	MHID = MH.ID
	,MHDESCR = MH.Description 
	,MHCode = mh.Code
	,ParentMHID = convert(int,null)
	,ParentMHDescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(100), null) 
	,PMHCode = mh.Code
	,RootMHID = MH.ID
	,RootMHDESCR = MH.Description	
	,Lvl = 0
	from dbo.MasterHeading MH
	where MH.ParentHeadingID is null
union all 
	select 
	MHID = MH.ID
	,MHDESCR = MH.Description 
	,MHCode = mh.Code
	,ParentMHID = MHs.MHID
	,ParentMHDescr = MHs.MHDESCR 
	,PMHCode = mhs.MHCode
	,RootMHID = MHs.RootMHID
	,RootMHDESCR = MHs.RootMHDESCR 
	,Lvl = MHs.Lvl+1
	from dbo.MasterHeading MH
	join MHs on MH.ParentHeadingID = MHs.MHID	
	and	MH.ParentHeadingID is not null
)
select 
  	MHID 
	,MHDESCR
	,MHCode 
	,ParentMHID 
	,ParentMHDescr 
	,PMHCode 
	,RootMHID 
	,RootMHDESCR 
	,Lvl 
	,ParentIsRoot = case when ParentMHID=RootMHID then 1 else 0 end
	,IsRoot = case when ParentMHID is null then 1 else 0 end
, HasLower = Case when MHDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS = upper(MHDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS)  then 0 else 1 end 
from MHs

named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: FullVGIView                                            */
/*==============================================================*/
create view FullVGIView as

with vgis as
(
	select 
	VGIID = vgi.ID
	,VGIDESCR = vgi.Description 
	,vgi.MediumVersionID
	,ParentVGIID = convert(int,null)
	,ParentVGIDescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(130), null)
	,RootVGIID = vgi.ID
	,RootVGIDESCR = vgi.Description	
	,Lvl = 0
	,VGIType=vgi.[Type]
	,ParentVGIType=CONVERT(int,null)
	,RootVGIType=vgi.[Type]
	,Branch = CONVERT(nvarchar(200),vgi.ID)
	from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi
	where 
	 vgi.ParentID is null
union all 
	select 
	VGIID = vgi.ID
	,VGIDESCR = vgi.Description
	,vgi.MediumVersionID
	,ParentVGIID = vgis.VGIID
	,ParentVGIDescr = vgis.VGIDESCR
	,RootVGIID = vgis.RootVGIID
	,RootVGIDESCR = vgis.RootVGIDESCR
	,Lvl = vgis.Lvl+1
	,VGIType=vgi.[Type]
	,ParentVGIType=vgis.VGIType
	,RootVGIType=RootVGIType
	,Branch = CONVERT(nvarchar(200), vgis.Branch + '-' +  CONVERT(nvarchar(200),vgi.ID))
	from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi
	join vgis on vgi.ParentID = vgis.VGIID
)
select 
VGIID 
,VGIDESCR
,v.MediumVersionID
,ParentVGIID
,ParentVGIDescr
,RootVGIID
,RootVGIDESCR
,Lvl
,VGIType
,ParentVGIType
,RootVGIType
,ParentIsRoot = case when ParentVGIID=RootVGIID then 1 else 0 end
, vgi.SourceHeadingID
, vgi.SourceGeoID
, vgi.DMKey
, vgi.DMTable
, HeadingCode =mh.Code 
, mgag.BroaderAreaID
, HasLower = Case when v.VGIDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS = upper(v.VGIDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS)  then 0 else 1 end 
,Branch
from vgis v
join dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi on v.VGIID = vgi.ID
left join dbo.MasterHeading mh on mh.ID = vgi.SourceHeadingID
left join dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup mgag on mgag.ID = vgi.SourceGeoID

named_assets.name: dbo.Get_Adids
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW dbo.Get_Adids
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT ID, ContractProductID, ProductID, VersionSectionID, GeoAreaID, HeadingID, AdvBeginDate, AdvEndDate, QA, CaseAttachmentID, DMKey, DMTable,
                       DMCharKey, Price, Discount, RulesDiscount, ProductKitID
FROM         dbo.Advertisement AS adv
WHERE     (AdvEndDate > GETDATE()) AND (AdvBeginDate < GETDATE()) AND (ProductID IN
                          (SELECT DISTINCT ProductID
                            FROM          dbo.Internet_Products))
ORDER BY ID
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW dbo.Get_Adids
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT ID, ContractProductID, ProductID, VersionSectionID, GeoAreaID, HeadingID, AdvBeginDate, AdvEndDate, QA, CaseAttachmentID, DMKey, DMTable,
                       DMCharKey, Price, Discount, RulesDiscount, ProductKitID
FROM         dbo.Advertisement AS adv
WHERE     (AdvEndDate > GETDATE()) AND (AdvBeginDate < GETDATE()) AND (ProductID IN
                          (SELECT DISTINCT ProductID
                            FROM          dbo.Internet_Products))
ORDER BY ID

named_assets.name: dbo.Internet_Products
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW dbo.Internet_Products
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT p.ID AS ProductID, pp.ID AS ProductPartID, ppd.ID AS ProductPartDefinitionID, p.Name AS ProductName, ppd.Code AS ProductPartDefinitionCode, 
                      ppd.Name AS ProductPartDefinitionName, ppd.Description AS ProductPartDefinitionDescription, ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID, ppd.MediumVersionID AS Expr9, 
                      ppd.SingleAppearance, ppd.DMKey AS Expr10, ppd.DMTable AS Expr11, ppd.DMCharKey AS Expr12, iu.ID AS Expr13, iu.Code AS Expr14
FROM         dbo.Product AS p INNER JOIN
                      dbo.ProductPart AS pp ON p.ID = pp.ProductID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.ProductPartDefinition AS ppd ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.Internet_Udacs AS iu ON iu.DMKey = ppd.DMKey
ORDER BY ProductID

                      ppd.Name AS ProductPartDefinitionName, ppd.Description AS ProductPartDefinitionDescription, ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID, ppd.MediumVersionID AS Expr9, 
                      ppd.SingleAppearance, ppd.DMKey AS Expr10, ppd.DMTable AS Expr11, ppd.DMCharKey AS Expr12, iu.ID AS Expr13, iu.Code AS Expr14

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: View_FO_FullProductMap                                 */
/*==============================================================*/
create view View_FO_FullProductMap as
select pm.SameUdac
, IsValid = Case when
	 --(cad.DefaultValue is not null and cad.DefaultValue <> ''''UCAD._Type.DLOV'''') or
	  ncad.ID is not null then 1 else 0 end
, pm.NewProductID
, pm.NewProductCode
, pm.OldProductID 
, pm.OldProductCode
, ProductPartID =Pp.ID
, NewPPDID = ppd.ID 
, ppd.Name
, CadID = cad.ID
, CadName = cad.Name
, cad.DefaultValue
, OldPPDID =nppd.ID 
, OldPPDName = nppd.Name
, SourceProductPartID = npp.ID
, SourceCadID = ncad.ID
, SourceCadName = ncad.Name
, TargetCadVisibilityMask = cad.VisibilityMask
from dbo.View_FO_ProductMap pm
join dbo.ProductPart pp on pm.NewProductID = pp.ProductID
join dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd on pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID
join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cad on ppd.ID = cad.ProductPartDefinitionID									
left join dbo.ProductPart npp
	 join dbo.ProductPartDefinition nppd on nppd.ID = npp.ProductPartDefinitionID
	 join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition ncad on nppd.ID = ncad.ProductPartDefinitionID
on	npp.ProductID = pm.OldProductID
and nppd.UdacPartDefinitionID = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID
and ncad.Name = cad.Name
and ncad.[Type] = cad.[Type]

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: View_FO_MVMap                                          */

create view View_FO_MVMap as
with basicMV as
(
select mv.ID 
, Code = Case when ISNUMERIC(mv.code) = 1 then mv.Code else mv.ID end
, mv.Name 
, mv.MediumID
, mv.IsActive
, m.MediumTypeID
from dbo.MediumVersion mv
join dbo.Medium m on mv.MediumID = m.ID
)
select MVID = pre.ID
	, MVCode = pre.Code 
	, MVName =  pre.Name
	, NextMVID = case when pre.MediumTypeID = 2 and pos.ID is null then pre.ID else pos.ID end
	, NextMVCode= case when pre.MediumTypeID = 2 and pos.ID is null then pre.Code else pos.Code end
from basicMV pre 
left join basicMV pos on pre.MediumID = pos.MediumID
				and CONVERT(int, pre.Code) = CONVERT(int,pos.Code) -1

named_assets.name: dbo.View_FO_ProductMap
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: View_FO_ProductMap                                     */
/*==============================================================*/
create view View_FO_ProductMap as
with productMap as
(
select
 OldMVID = m.MVID
,OldProductID = p.ID
,OldProductCode = p.Code
,NewMVID = m.NextMVID
,NewProductID = np.ID 
,NewProductCode= np.Code
,SameUdac=1
from [dbo].[View_FO_MVMap] m
join dbo.Product p on m.MVID = p.MediumVersionID
join dbo.Udac u on p.UdacID = u.ID
				and u.NewUdacID is null
				--and u.IsDeleted = 0
join dbo.Product np on p.UdacID = np.UdacID
					and m.NextMVID = np.MediumVersionID
union
select 
 OldMVID = m.MVID
,OldProductID = p.ID
,OldProductCode = p.Code
,NewMVID = m.NextMVID
,NewProductID = np.ID 
,NewProductCode= np.Code
,SameUdac=0
from [dbo].[View_FO_MVMap] m
join dbo.Product p on m.MVID = p.MediumVersionID
join dbo.Udac u on p.UdacID = u.ID
				and u.NewUdacID is not null
				--and u.IsDeleted = 1
join dbo.Product np on u.NewUdacID = np.UdacID
					and m.NextMVID = np.MediumVersionID
)
select  
OldMVID
,OldProductID
,OldProductCode
,NewMVID 
,NewProductID 
,NewProductCode
,SameUdac 
from productMap

select pm.RenewalDefinition

, SourceProductID = pm.OldProductID 
, TargetProductID = pm.NewProductID
, SourceProductCode = pm.OldProductCode
, TargetProductCode = pm.NewProductCode
, SourceProductPartID = npp.ID
, TargetProductPartID = pp.ID
, TargetProductPartMinOccurence = pp.MinOccurence
, SourceProductPartDefinitionID =nppd.ID 
, TargetProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID 
, SourceProductPartDefinitionName = nppd.Name
, TargetProductPartDefinitionName = ppd.Name
, SourceCadID = ncad.ID
, TargetCadID = cad.ID

on	npp.ProductID = pm.OldProductID
and nppd.UdacPartDefinitionID = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID
and ncad.Name = cad.Name
and ncad.[Type] = cad.[Type]

named_assets.name: dbo.View_SR_ProductMap
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: View_SR_ProductMap                                     */
/*==============================================================*/
create view View_SR_ProductMap as
with 
udacMap as
(
	select SourceUdacID =a.ID
	, TargetUdacID = ISNULL( ISNULL( a.NewSrID	, a.NewUdacID),a.ID)
	, RenewalDefinition = CONVERT( nvarchar(20),  Case when a.NewSrID IS not null then 'RenewalConnection'
		 when a.NewSrID IS null and a.NewUdacID IS not null then 'NewUdacDefined'
		 when a.NewSrID IS null and a.NewUdacID IS  null then 'SameUdac' end		)
	from (
	select U.ID, u.NewUdacID , NewSrID = MAX(ur.TargetUdacID)
	from dbo.Udac u
	left join dbo.UdacRelationship ur on u.ID = ur.SourceUdacID
									and ur.RelationshipType = 1
									and ur.IsActive = 1
	GROUP by U.ID, u.NewUdacID 								
	) a
)
,productMap as
(
select
 OldMVID = m.MVID
,OldProductID = p.ID
,OldProductCode = p.Code
,NewMVID = m.NextMVID
,NewProductID = np.ID 
,NewProductCode= np.Code
,u.RenewalDefinition
from [dbo].[View_SR_MVMap] m
join dbo.Product p on m.MVID = p.MediumVersionID
join udacMap u on p.UdacID = u.SourceUdacID				
join dbo.Product np on u.TargetUdacID = np.UdacID
					and m.NextMVID = np.MediumVersionID
)
select  
OldMVID
,OldProductID
,OldProductCode
,NewMVID 
,NewProductID 
,NewProductCode
,RenewalDefinition
from productMap
named_assets.sql_raw:

/* View: View_SR_ProductMap                                     */

with 
udacMap as
(
	select SourceUdacID =a.ID
	, TargetUdacID = ISNULL( ISNULL( a.NewSrID	, a.NewUdacID),a.ID)
	, RenewalDefinition = CONVERT( nvarchar(20),  Case when a.NewSrID IS not null then 'RenewalConnection'
		 when a.NewSrID IS null and a.NewUdacID IS not null then 'NewUdacDefined'
		 when a.NewSrID IS null and a.NewUdacID IS  null then 'SameUdac' end		)
	from (
	select U.ID, u.NewUdacID , NewSrID = MAX(ur.TargetUdacID)
	from dbo.Udac u
	left join dbo.UdacRelationship ur on u.ID = ur.SourceUdacID
									and ur.RelationshipType = 1
									and ur.IsActive = 1
	GROUP by U.ID, u.NewUdacID 								
	) a

,productMap as

select
 OldMVID = m.MVID

)
select  
OldMVID

,NewProductCode
,RenewalDefinition
from productMap

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewActivityHeader
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE view [dbo].[ViewActivityHeader] as

select a.ClassifierNodeID as ActivityID,
       a.code as ActivityCode,
	   a.nameGR as ActivityName,
	   ps.ID as Sector1ID,
	   ps.code as Sector1Code,
	   ps.NameGR as Sector1Name,
	   s.ID as Sector2ID,
       s.code as Sector2Code,
	   s.NameGR as Sector2Name,
	   --y.MasterHeadingID as HeadingID,
	   h.code as HeadingCode,
	   h.NameGR as HeadingName--,
	
	   --att.id as AttributeID,
	   --att.code as AttributeCode,
	   --att.NameGR as AttributeNameGR,


	  
	   
  from ItApps.heading.Activity a
  join ItApps.heading.ActivityHeading ah on a.id  = ah.ActivityID
  join ItApps.heading.heading h on ah.HeadingID = h.id
  join ItApps.heading.Sector s on s.ID = h.SectorId
  join ItApps.heading.Sector ps on ps.id = s.ParentSectorID
  --join Itapps.heading.HeadingYPSMapping y on y.[HeadingID] = h.id
  where a.IsActive = 1 and h.IsActive = 1 and s.IsActive = 1

  join ItApps.heading.ActivityHeading ah on a.id  = ah.ActivityID
  join ItApps.heading.heading h on ah.HeadingID = h.id
  join ItApps.heading.Sector s on s.ID = h.SectorId
  join ItApps.heading.Sector ps on ps.id = s.ParentSectorID
  --join Itapps.heading.HeadingYPSMapping y on y.[HeadingID] = h.id
  left join ItApps.heading.ThematicCategoryHeading tch on tch.HeadingID = h.id 
  left join ItApps.heading.ThematicCategory tc on tc.id = tch.ThematicCategoryID 
  where a.IsActive = 1 and h.IsActive = 1 and s.IsActive = 1 and tc.IsActive =1
named_assets.sql_raw:
create view [dbo].[ViewActivityHeaderThematic] as

select a.ClassifierNodeID as ActivityID,
       a.code as ActivityCode,
	   a.nameGR as ActivityName,
	   ps.ID as Sector1ID,
	   ps.code as Sector1Code,
	   ps.NameGR as Sector1Name,
	   s.ID as Sector2ID,
       s.code as Sector2Code,
	   s.NameGR as Sector2Name,
	   --y.MasterHeadingID as HeadingID,
	   h.code as HeadingCode,
	   h.NameGR as HeadingName,
	   tch.ThematicCategoryID
	
	   --att.id as AttributeID,
	   --att.code as AttributeCode,
	   --att.NameGR as AttributeNameGR,


	  
	   
  from ItApps.heading.Activity a
  join ItApps.heading.ActivityHeading ah on a.id  = ah.ActivityID
  join ItApps.heading.heading h on ah.HeadingID = h.id
  join ItApps.heading.Sector s on s.ID = h.SectorId
  join ItApps.heading.Sector ps on ps.id = s.ParentSectorID
  --join Itapps.heading.HeadingYPSMapping y on y.[HeadingID] = h.id
  left join ItApps.heading.ThematicCategoryHeading tch on tch.HeadingID = h.id 
  left join ItApps.heading.ThematicCategory tc on tc.id = tch.ThematicCategoryID 
  where a.IsActive = 1 and h.IsActive = 1 and s.IsActive = 1 and tc.IsActive =1

	,Adv_EndDate			= adv.AdvEndDate
	,Adv_HeadingID = Adv.HeadingID 
	,Adv_GeoAreaID = Adv.GeoAreaID
	,Adv_IsSubscriptionBased = Adv.IsSubscriptionBased
	,Adv_QA		= adv.QA
	,Adv_Price	= adv.Price
	,Adv_Discount	= adv.Discount
	,Adv_RulesDiscount = adv.RulesDiscount
	,Adv_VersionSectionID = adv.VersionSectionID

	,Adv_VersionSectionMVID = advVS.MediumVersionID
	,Adv_ProductID = advPr.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewAttributeMetadata
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE view [dbo].[ViewAttributeMetadata] as
select a.ClassifierNodeID as ActivityID,
       att.id as AttributeID,
	   att.code as AttributeCode,
	   /*att.NameGR*/ag.NameGR as AttributeName,
	   att.IsMandatory,
	   isnull(aa.Priority,att.Priority) as priority,
	   att.MaxAllowedFL,
	   att.MaxAllowedProfile as MaxAllowedProfile,
	   att.MaxAllowedYparxo,
	   ag.isMultiSelect as AttributeType
	  
        
  from Itapps.heading.Activity a
  join Itapps.heading.ActivityAttribute aa on aa.ActivityID = a.id
  join Itapps.heading.Attribute att on att.id = aa.AttributeID
  join Itapps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.id = att.AttributeGroupID
  where a.IsActive = 1 and att.IsActive = 1 and ag.IsActive = 1

	   att.MaxAllowedProfile as MaxAllowedProfile,
	   att.MaxAllowedYparxo,
	   ag.isMultiSelect as AttributeType
	  
        
  from Itapps.heading.Activity a
  join Itapps.heading.ActivityAttribute aa on aa.ActivityID = a.id
  join Itapps.heading.Attribute att on att.id = aa.AttributeID
  join Itapps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.id = att.AttributeGroupID

named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[ViewCommunicationActionsFromXO] AS 
	SELECT CustomerCode,
	ContactType,
	Category,
	SentDate,
	Receiver,
	Filename,
	CommResult ,
	FilePath = isnull(FilePath, ''),
	BusinessPointID = bp.ID
	FROM [ITApps].[csm].[CSMToYPSCollectionEmails] e
	join BusinessPoint bp on e.CustomerCode = bp.Code

	UNION ALL

	SELECT CustomerCode COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, 
	ContactType COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, 
	SMSCategory COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, 
	SentDate ,
	MobilePhone COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, 
	SMSText COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, 
	CommResult COLLATE Greek_CI_AI,
	FILEPath COLLATE Greek_CI_AI,
	BsuienssPointId = bp.ID
	FROM [cardinal12].XOEntersoft.dbo.EBSToYPSCollectionSMS e
	join BusinessPoint bp on e.CustomerCode COLLATE Greek_CI_AI = bp.Code

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewContentAttributeValue
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewContentAttributeValue                              */
/*==============================================================*/
CREATE view [dbo].[ViewContentAttributeValue] as
SELECT va.*
      ,PP_ID = pp.ID
      ,PP_FillOrder = pp.FillOrder
      ,PP_IsAddon = pp.IsAddon
      ,PP_MinOccurence = pp.MinOccurence
      ,PP_MaxOccurence = pp.MaxOccurence
      ,PP_PriceMode =  pp.PriceMode
      ,PPD_ID = ppd.ID
      ,PPD_Name = ppd.Name
      ,PPD_Code = ppd.Code
      ,PPD_SingleAppearance = ppd.SingleAppearance
      ,Cad_ID = cad.ID
      ,Cad_FillOrder = cad.FillOrder
      ,Cad_Name = cad.Name
      ,Cad_Type = cad.[Type]
      ,Cad_VisibilityMask = cad.VisibilityMask
      ,Cad_IsRequired = cad.IsRequired
      ,Cad_IsReadonly = cad.IsReadonly
      ,Cav_ID = cav.ID
      ,Cav_SeqNo = Cav.SeqNo
      ,Cav_Value = cav.Value	 	 
      ,Cav_DMKey = cav.DMKey
      ,Cav_DMTable = cav.DMTable
      ,Cav_DMCharKey = cav.DMCharKey
from [dbo].[ViewAdvertisement] va
join dbo.ProductPart pp on va.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID
join dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd on pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID
join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cad on ppd.ID = cad.ProductPartDefinitionID
join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on va.CP_ID = cav.ContractProductID
								and va.Adv_ID = cav.AdvertisementID
								and pp.ID  = cav.ProductPartID
								and cad.ID = cav.ContentAttributeDefinitionID
named_assets.sql_raw:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewContentAttributeValue                              */

CREATE view [dbo].[ViewContentAttributeValue] as
SELECT va.*
      ,PP_ID = pp.ID
      ,PP_FillOrder = pp.FillOrder
      ,PP_IsAddon = pp.IsAddon
      ,PP_MinOccurence = pp.MinOccurence
      ,PP_MaxOccurence = pp.MaxOccurence
      ,PP_PriceMode =  pp.PriceMode
      ,PPD_ID = ppd.ID
      ,PPD_Name = ppd.Name
      ,PPD_Code = ppd.Code
      ,PPD_SingleAppearance = ppd.SingleAppearance
      ,Cad_ID = cad.ID
      ,Cad_FillOrder = cad.FillOrder
      ,Cad_Name = cad.Name
      ,Cad_Type = cad.[Type]
      ,Cad_VisibilityMask = cad.VisibilityMask
      ,Cad_IsRequired = cad.IsRequired
      ,Cad_IsReadonly = cad.IsReadonly
      ,Cav_ID = cav.ID
      ,Cav_SeqNo = Cav.SeqNo
      ,Cav_Value = cav.Value	 	 
      ,Cav_DMKey = cav.DMKey
      ,Cav_DMTable = cav.DMTable
      ,Cav_DMCharKey = cav.DMCharKey
from [dbo].[ViewAdvertisement] va
join dbo.ProductPart pp on va.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID
join dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd on pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID
join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cad on ppd.ID = cad.ProductPartDefinitionID
join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on va.CP_ID = cav.ContractProductID
								and va.Adv_ID = cav.AdvertisementID
								and pp.ID  = cav.ProductPartID
								and cad.ID = cav.ContentAttributeDefinitionID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewContract
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewContract                                           */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewContract as
select
	 C_ID = c.ID
	,A_BPID = aBP.ID
	,A_BPCode = aBP.Code
	,A_BPName = aBP.Name
	,A_BPBrandName = aBP.BrandName
	,A_BPLocationAddressID = aBP.LocationAddressID
	,A_BPBillingAddressID = aBP.BillingAddressID
	,A_BPIsActive = aBP.IsActive
	,C_CreatedBy = c.CreatedBy
	,C_CreatedOn = c.CreatedOn
	,C_Signdate = c.SignedDate
	,C_State = c.[State]
	,C_MigratedCode = c.MigratedCode 
	,C_OriginalContractID = c.OrigionalContractID
	,C_BPID = cBP.ID
	,C_BPCode = cBP.Code
	,C_BPName = cBP.Name
	,C_BPIsActive = cBP.IsActive	
	,C_DMKey = c.DMKey
	,C_DMTable = c.DMTable
	,C_DMCharKey = c.DMCharKey
	,C_CampaignID = c.CampaignID
	,C_SalesManID = c.SalesManID
	,C_SubChannelID = c.SubChannelID
    ,C_OriginalContractType = c.OriginalContractType
    ,C_Type = c.[Type]
    ,C_RenewalNumber = c.RenewalNumber
from dbo.[Contract]			c
join dbo.BusinessPoint		cBP		on c.BillingPointID = cbp.ID
join dbo.BusinessPoint      aBP    ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = aBP.ID

	,A_BPBillingAddressID = aBP.BillingAddressID
	,A_BPIsActive = aBP.IsActive
	,C_CreatedBy = c.CreatedBy
	,C_CreatedOn = c.CreatedOn
	,C_Signdate = c.SignedDate
	,C_State = c.[State]
	,C_MigratedCode = c.MigratedCode 
	,C_OriginalContractID = c.OrigionalContractID
	,C_BPID = cBP.ID
	,C_BPCode = cBP.Code
	,C_BPName = cBP.Name
	,C_BPIsActive = cBP.IsActive	
	,C_DMKey = c.DMKey
	,C_DMTable = c.DMTable
	,C_DMCharKey = c.DMCharKey
	,C_CampaignID = c.CampaignID
	,C_SalesManID = c.SalesManID
	,C_SubChannelID = c.SubChannelID
    ,C_OriginalContractType = c.OriginalContractType
    ,C_Type = c.[Type]
    ,C_RenewalNumber = c.RenewalNumber
from dbo.[Contract]			c
join dbo.BusinessPoint		cBP		on c.BillingPointID = cbp.ID
join dbo.BusinessPoint      aBP    ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = aBP.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewContractProduct
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewContractProduct                                    */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewContractProduct as
with bd as
(select
	c.*
	,CP_ID = cp.ID
	,CP_State = cp.[State]
	,CP_IsSubscriptionBased = cp.IsSubscriptionBased 
	,CP_IsRenewable = cp.IsRenewable
	,CP_IsRenewed = cp.IsRenewed
	,CP_Price = cp.Price
	,CP_Discount = cp.Discount
	,CP_RulesDiscount = cp.RulesDiscount
	,CP_VersionSectionID = cp.VersionSectionID
	,CP_VersionSectionCode = cpVS.Code
	,CP_VersionSectionMVID = cpVS.MediumVersionID
	,CP_BPID = cpBP.ID
	,CP_BPCode = cpbp.Code
	,CP_BPName = cpbp.Name
	,CP_BPIsActive = cpbp.IsActive
	,CP_ProductID = cpPr.ID
	,CP_ProductCode	= cpPr.Code
	,CP_ProductName	= cpPr.Name
	,CP_ProductIsComposite = cpPr.IsComposite
	,CP_ProductMVID = cpPr.MediumVersionID
	,CP_DMCharKey = cp.DMCharKey
	,CP_DMTable = cp.DMTable	
	,CP_SourceContractProductID = cp.SourceContractProductID
	,CP_PaymentMethodID	 = cp.PaymentMethodID	
from [dbo].ViewContract	c
join dbo.ContractProduct	cp		on c.C_ID = cp.RelatedContractID
join dbo.VersionSection		cpVS	on cp.VersionSectionID = cpVS.ID
join dbo.BusinessPoint		cpBP	on cp.BusinessPointID = cpBP.ID
join dbo.Product			cpPr	on cp.ProductID = cpPr.ID
)
select bd.*
	, PM_ID =   pm.ID
	, PM_Type =  pmt.[Description]
	, PM_IsExchangeSale = pm.IsExchangeSale
from bd 
join dbo.PaymentMethod	 pm  on pm.ID = bd.CP_PaymentMethodID
join dbo.PaymentMethodType	pmt	on pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
--where not exists ( select 1 from dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod	ipm where ipm.ID = bd.C_ID )
union
select bd.*
	, PM_ID =   pm.ID
	, PM_Type =  pmt.[Description]
	, PM_IsExchangeSale = pm.IsExchangeSale
from bd 
join dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm  on pm.ID = bd.C_ID
join dbo.PaymentMethodType	pmt	on pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
where bd.CP_PaymentMethodID is null
union
select bd.*
	, PM_ID = CONVERT(int,null)
	, PM_Type = null
	, PM_IsExchangeSale = null
from bd 
where bd.CP_PaymentMethodID is null
and not exists ( select 1 from dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod	ipm where ipm.ID = bd.C_ID )
named_assets.sql_raw:

dbo.ViewDoublePhones
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewDoublePhones                                       */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewDoublePhones as

SELECT   PhoneNumber = c.Number
        ,BusinessPointCode = bp.code
        ,BusinessPointName = bp.Name
        
        ,PhoneUsage = case  c.Usage 
    		when 1 then 'Business'
    		when 4 then 'Mobile'
    		when 5 then 'Home'
    		when 7 then 'Fax'
    		when 9 then 'Billing'
    		when 10 then 'Other' 
		end 
        
        ,PhoneUsageGR = case  c.Usage 
    		when 1 then 'Εταιρικό'
    		when 4 then 'Κινητό'
    		when 5 then 'Οικίας'
    		when 7 then 'Fax'
    		when 9 then 'Χρέωσης'
    		when 10 then 'Άλλο'
		end 
        
        ,BusinessPointType = clnode.Name
  FROM PointPhone c
  JOIN PointPhone x ON (x.Number = c.Number and x.BusinessPointID != c.BusinessPointID)
  JOIN BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID = c.BusinessPointID
  join Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
  join ClassifierNode clnode on clnode.ID = cl.ClassifierNodeID
  where cl.ClassifierNodeID = 3 or cl.ClassifierNodeID = 4
  GROUP BY c.Number
          ,bp.code
          ,bp.Name
          ,c.Usage 
          ,clnode.Name

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewLastBusinessPointIdentification
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewLastBusinessPointIdentification] as
select  bpi.*, ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID) as ContractID
from BusinessPointIdentification bpi
join (select tgiv1.ID tgivID, max(bpih.BusinessPointIdentificationID) BusinessPointIdentificationID
	from BusinessPointConfirmationHistory bpih
	join Task as t on bpih.TaskID = t.id		
	join [case] as c on t.caseid = c.id
	join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv1 on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv1.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
	group by tgiv1.ID) bph on bph.BusinessPointIdentificationID = bpi.ID
join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ID = bph.tgivID
named_assets.sql_raw:
create view [dbo].[ViewLastBusinessPointIdentification] as
select  bpi.*, ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID) as ContractID
from BusinessPointIdentification bpi
join (select tgiv1.ID tgivID, max(bpih.BusinessPointIdentificationID) BusinessPointIdentificationID
	from BusinessPointConfirmationHistory bpih
	join Task as t on bpih.TaskID = t.id		
	join [case] as c on t.caseid = c.id
	join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv1 on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv1.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
	group by tgiv1.ID) bph on bph.BusinessPointIdentificationID = bpi.ID
join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ID = bph.tgivID

/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewMarketItem as

select
 CampaignID  = vtgii.CampaignID
,TaskStatus = task.[Status]
,CaseState = ca.[State]
,ActivityType = tt.ActivityType
,UnitID =actualOwner.UnitID
,TargetGroupValueID = vtgii.TargetGroupItemValueID
,SelectedAllocationPlanID = vtgii.CampaignAllocationPlanID
,TargetGroupItemID = vtgii.ID
,CaseID = task.CaseID
,TaskID = task.ID
,TaskName = task.[Description]
,TaskTypeID = task.TaskTypeID
,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn
,ActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID
,ActualOwner = actualOwner.LastName + ' ' + actualOwner.FirstName 
,SupervisorID = vtgii.Supervisor
,Supervisor = vtgii.SupervisorName
,AppointmentDateTime =  vtgii.AppointmentDateTime
,BusinessPointID = vtgii.BusinessPointID
,BPIdentityConfirmed = vtgii.BPIdentityConfirmed
,CustomerName = vtgii.CustomerName
,CustomerCode = vtgii.Code
,CustomerCodeNumeric = convert(int,isnull(vtgii.Code,0))
,BrandName = vtgii.Brandname
,EndDate = vtgii.EndDate
,StartDate = vtgii.StartDate
,IsReleased = vtgii.IsReleased
,OfferAmount = vtgii.TargetValue
,AddressLine1 = vtgii.StreetName+' '+vtgii.StreetNumber 
,AddressLine3 = vtgii.City
,ContactInfo = convert(nvarchar(250),'') --//Check
,ContactName = convert(nvarchar(50),'') --//Check
,CRM = bp.HasCRMTicket
,MasterClassification = vtgii.MainHeadingName
,MasterHeading = vtgii.MainHeadingName --//Check
,IsRed = case when exists ( select 1 from dbo.CustomerSolvency cs where cs.ID = bp.CustomerSolvencyID and cs.Code= '004') then 1 else 0 end  --//Check
,ReliabilityStatus = vtgii.ReliabilityStatus
,Phones = convert(nvarchar(250),'') --//Check
,LossPrintedNew =  vtgii.LossPrintedNew
,LastSignedDate = vtgii.LastSignedDate
,SubChannel = vtgii.Description
,Prefecture = ISNULL( vtgii.Prefecture,'')
,Municipality = ISNULL(vtgii.Municipality,'')
,City = ISNULL(vtgii.City ,'')
,Street = ISNULL( vtgii.StreetName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(vtgii.StreetNumber,'')
,ZipCode = ISNULL(vtgii.ZipCode,'')
,LastPrintSalesMan = ISNULL( vtgii.LastPrintSalesMan01 , vtgii.LastPrintSalesMan02)
,LastInternetSalesMan = ISNULL( vtgii.LastInternetSalesMan01, vtgii.LastInternetSalesMan02)
,ExpirationDateInternet = vtgii.ExpirationDateInternet
from ViewTargetGroupItemInfo vtgii with (nolock)
inner join BusinessPoint bp on vtgii.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
inner join [Case] ca with (nolock) on vtgii.TargetGroupItemValueID = ca.ContextEntityID
				 and ca.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
inner join Task task on ca.ID = task.CaseID AND task.Status = 0
inner join TaskType tt with (nolock) on task.TaskTypeID = tt.ID
inner join [User] actualOwner with (nolock) on task.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewOteDVPP
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewOteDVPP                                            */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewOteDVPP as
  Select 
 odvpp.OteDirectoryVersionID,
 odvpp.OteProgressPointID,
	odvpp.ID,
	IsRelated = odvpp.RelatedActualFlag,
	EstimatedDate = case when odvpp.RelatedActualFlag=0 then odvpp.EstimatedDate 
	                     else dateadd(dd, isnull(odvpp.RelatedDays,0),
	                      isnull(  odvpp1.EstimatedDate , convert(datetime,'1-1-1900') )) end ,	
	odvpp.ActualDate ,
    odvpp.Comments
    from OteDirectoryVersionProgressPoint odvpp 
    left outer join OteDirectoryVersionProgressPoint odvpp1 on odvpp1.ID = odvpp.RelatedID
