named_assets.name: dbo.ViewOteVersionProgress
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewOteVersionProgress                                 */
/*==============================================================*/
create view [dbo].[ViewOteVersionProgress] as
select
   odv.ID
   ,od.Name
   ,odv.VersionYear
   ,Circulation = (select sum(Amount) from OteDirectoryVersionShipping odvs where odvs.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID)
   ,IsActualPages = cast((case when isnull(odv.ActualPages,0)>0 then 1 else 0  end) as bit)
   ,Pages = case when isnull(odv.ActualPages,0)>0 then odv.ActualPages else odv.EstimatedPages end   
   ,odv.PaperWeight
   ,ca1.ID as ID1,
   ca1.EstimatedDate as ED1,
   ca1.ActualDate as AD1,
   CO1 = ca1.Comments,
   ca2.ID as ID2,
   ca2.EstimatedDate as ED2,
   ca2.ActualDate as AD2,
   CO2 = ca2.Comments,
   ca3.ID as ID3,
   ca3.EstimatedDate as ED3,
   ca3.ActualDate as AD3,
   CO3 = ca3.Comments,
   ca4.ID as ID4,
   ca4.EstimatedDate as ED4,
   ca4.ActualDate as AD4,
   CO4 = ca4.Comments,
   ca5.ID as ID5,
   ca5.EstimatedDate as ED5,
   ca5.ActualDate as AD5,
   CO5 = ca5.Comments,
   ca6.ID as ID6,
   ca6.EstimatedDate as ED6,
   ca6.ActualDate as AD6,
   CO6 = ca6.Comments,
   ca7.ID as ID7,
   ca7.EstimatedDate as ED7,
   ca7.ActualDate as AD7,
   CO7 = ca7.Comments,
   ca8.ID as ID8,
   ca8.EstimatedDate as ED8,
   ca8.ActualDate as AD8,
   CO8 = ca8.Comments
   ,IR1 = ca1.IsRelated
   ,IR2 = ca2.IsRelated
   ,IR3 = ca3.IsRelated
   ,IR4 = ca4.IsRelated
   ,IR5 = ca5.IsRelated
   ,IR6 = ca6.IsRelated
   ,IR7 = ca7.IsRelated
   ,IR8 = ca8.IsRelated
   ,IS1 = case when ca1.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca1.EstimatedDate >= ca1.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS2 = case when ca2.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca2.EstimatedDate >= ca2.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS3 = case when ca3.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca3.EstimatedDate >= ca3.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS4 = case when ca4.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca4.EstimatedDate >= ca4.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS5 = case when ca5.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca5.EstimatedDate >= ca5.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS6 = case when ca6.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca6.EstimatedDate >= ca6.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS7 = case when ca7.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca7.EstimatedDate >= ca7.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS8 = case when ca8.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca8.EstimatedDate >= ca8.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
from
   OteDirectoryVersion odv
   inner join OteDirectory od on  odv.OteDirectoryID = od.ID
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca1 on  ca1.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca1.OteProgressPointID = 1
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca2 on  ca2.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca2.OteProgressPointID = 2
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca3 on  ca3.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca3.OteProgressPointID = 3
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca4 on  ca4.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca4.OteProgressPointID = 4
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca5 on  ca5.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca5.OteProgressPointID = 5
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca6 on  ca6.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca6.OteProgressPointID = 6
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca7 on  ca7.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca7.OteProgressPointID = 7
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca8 on  ca8.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca8.OteProgressPointID = 8

   ,IR6 = ca6.IsRelated
   ,IR7 = ca7.IsRelated
   ,IR8 = ca8.IsRelated
   ,IS1 = case when ca1.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca1.EstimatedDate >= ca1.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS2 = case when ca2.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca2.EstimatedDate >= ca2.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS3 = case when ca3.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca3.EstimatedDate >= ca3.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS4 = case when ca4.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca4.EstimatedDate >= ca4.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS5 = case when ca5.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca5.EstimatedDate >= ca5.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS6 = case when ca6.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca6.EstimatedDate >= ca6.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS7 = case when ca7.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca7.EstimatedDate >= ca7.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
   ,IS8 = case when ca8.ActualDate is null then 0 when  ca8.EstimatedDate >= ca8.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end
from
   OteDirectoryVersion odv
   inner join OteDirectory od on  odv.OteDirectoryID = od.ID
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca1 on  ca1.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca1.OteProgressPointID = 1
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca2 on  ca2.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca2.OteProgressPointID = 2
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca3 on  ca3.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca3.OteProgressPointID = 3
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca4 on  ca4.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca4.OteProgressPointID = 4
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca5 on  ca5.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca5.OteProgressPointID = 5
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca6 on  ca6.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca6.OteProgressPointID = 6
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca7 on  ca7.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca7.OteProgressPointID = 7
   left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca8 on  ca8.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca8.OteProgressPointID = 8

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewPhonesFlatting
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* DBMS name:      Microsoft SQL Server 2008                    */
/* Created on:     29/1/2014 2:47:57 μμ                         */
/*==============================================================*/


--alter table DialerTask
--   add CampaignID int                  null
--go

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPhonesFlatting                                     */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPhonesFlatting as
with bd as
			(
			select pp.BusinessPointID
			, pp.Number
			, RankID = RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY pp.BusinessPointId ORDER BY pp.Number DESC) 
			from PointPhone pp 
			where pp.Usage not in (7,9)
			)			
			
select
BusinessPointID = p1.BusinessPointID, 	
Phone1 = p1.Number,
Phone2 = p2.Number,
Phone3 = p3.Number,
Phone4 = p4.Number,
Phone5 = p5.Number  
from bd p1
left join bd p2 on p1.BusinessPointID = p2.BusinessPointID and p2.RankID = 2
left join bd p3 on p1.BusinessPointID = p3.BusinessPointID and p3.RankID = 3
left join bd p4 on p1.BusinessPointID = p4.BusinessPointID and p4.RankID = 4
left join bd p5 on p1.BusinessPointID = p5.BusinessPointID and p5.RankID = 5
where p1.RankID = 1

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewPointAttributeValues
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE view [dbo].[ViewPointAttributeValues]
as 

select bpl.BusinessPointID as PointID,'' as TableName, '' as FieldName,GroupName  = ag.NameGr, LabelName = a.NameGR, value
  from BusinessPointCustomAttributeValue b
  join BusinessPointListing bpl on bpl.ID = b.BusinessPointListingID
  join itapps.heading.Attribute a on a.id = b.AttributeID
  join itapps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.id = a.AttributeGroupID
  where a.NameGR <> 'ΜΗΤΕ'
union

   select bp.id as PointID
         ,'' as TableName
		 ,'' as FieldName 
         ,GroupName  = 'ΜΗΤΕ'
		 ,LabelName = 'ΜΗΤΕ'
		 ,cav.value as 'Value'

from FreeTemplate as cp 
join BusinessPoint bp on cp.BusinessPointID = bp.id
join FreeTemplateAdvertisement as adv on cp.id = adv.FreeTemplateID 
join Product as p on adv.ProductID = p.ID 
join FreeTemplateAttributeValue as cav on adv.ID = cav.FreeTemplateAdvertisementID 
									  and cav.FreeTemplateID = cp.ID 
join ContentAttributeDefinition cad on cad.id = cav.ContentAttributeDefinitionID
where  cad.name = 'ΜΗΤΕ'--bp.code = 135316 and

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPointAttributeValues                                            */
/*==============================================================*/
CREATE view [dbo].[ViewPointAttributeValuesBck]
as  select  PointID,
            TableName = 'AttrDPS3552',
            FieldName = 'AttrField221',
            GroupName = 'Ενοικιάσεις Αυτοκινήτων ',
            LabelName = 'Ενοικιάσεις Αυτοκινήτων - Υπηρεσίες | Παροχές',
            Value = convert(nvarchar(512), AttrField221)
    from    dbo.[AttrDPS3552]
    union
    select  PointID,
            TableName = 'AttrDPS3552',
            FieldName = 'AttrField222',
            GroupName = 'Ενοικιάσεις Αυτοκινήτων ',

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewPrefectureBPDtls
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPrefectureBPDtls                                   */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPrefectureBPDtls as
SELECT ActiveFlag = a.IsActive,
		BusinessPointID = a.ID,
        BusinessPointCode = a.Code,
		BusinessPointName = a.Name,
		IsPOI = a.IsPOI,
		CustomerSourceID =  a.CustomerSourceID,
		CustomerSourceDesc = b.Description, 
		ActivityClassifierNodeID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID,
		ActivityName = c.Name, 
		AreaName = x.AreaName
		
FROM BusinessPoint a
LEFT OUTER JOIN CustomerSource b ON (b.ID = a.CustomerSourceID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ClassifierNode c ON (c.ID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT d.AddressID,e.AreaName
				 FROM BroaderArea d, BroaderAreaLookUp e
				 WHERE d.BroaderAreaID = e.BroaderAreaID
				   AND d.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'
                   AND isnull(e.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0
			  		  GROUP BY d.AddressID,e.AreaName) x ON (x.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID)
named_assets.sql_raw:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPrefectureBPDtls                                   */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPrefectureBPDtls as
SELECT ActiveFlag = a.IsActive,
		BusinessPointID = a.ID,
        BusinessPointCode = a.Code,
		BusinessPointName = a.Name,
		IsPOI = a.IsPOI,
		CustomerSourceID =  a.CustomerSourceID,
		CustomerSourceDesc = b.Description, 
		ActivityClassifierNodeID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID,
		ActivityName = c.Name, 
		AreaName = x.AreaName
		
FROM BusinessPoint a
LEFT OUTER JOIN CustomerSource b ON (b.ID = a.CustomerSourceID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ClassifierNode c ON (c.ID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT d.AddressID,e.AreaName
				 FROM BroaderArea d, BroaderAreaLookUp e
				 WHERE d.BroaderAreaID = e.BroaderAreaID
				   AND d.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'
                   AND isnull(e.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0
			  		  GROUP BY d.AddressID,e.AreaName) x ON (x.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID)

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewPrefectureBPs
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPrefectureBPs                                      */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPrefectureBPs as
with basicData as
(
SELECT 
	ActiveFlag = bp.IsActive
	,AreaID = Case when  ba.BroaderAreaID IS null then '' else ba.BroaderAreaID end 
	,AreaName =  case when  ba.BroaderAreaID IS null then 'Unknown Prefecture'
		  else bal.AreaName end 	 	
FROM BusinessPoint bp
join dbo.Classification	cl on bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
						and cl.ClassifierID = 5
						and cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (3,4)
left join BroaderArea ba 
	 join BroaderAreaLookUp bal on bal.BroaderAreaID = ba.BroaderAreaID
					and ba.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'
					AND isnull(bal.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0
on bp.LocationAddressID =ba.AddressID				
)
SELECT 
	ActiveFlag 
	,AreaID 
	,AreaName 
	,BPcount = count(*)        
FROM basicData 
GROUP BY 
     	ActiveFlag 
	,AreaID 
	,AreaName
named_assets.sql_raw:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPrefectureBPs                                      */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPrefectureBPs as
with basicData as
(
SELECT 
	ActiveFlag = bp.IsActive
	,AreaID = Case when  ba.BroaderAreaID IS null then '' else ba.BroaderAreaID end 
	,AreaName =  case when  ba.BroaderAreaID IS null then 'Unknown Prefecture'
		  else bal.AreaName end 	 	
FROM BusinessPoint bp
join dbo.Classification	cl on bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
						and cl.ClassifierID = 5
						and cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (3,4)
left join BroaderArea ba 
	 join BroaderAreaLookUp bal on bal.BroaderAreaID = ba.BroaderAreaID
					and ba.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'
					AND isnull(bal.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0
on bp.LocationAddressID =ba.AddressID				
)
SELECT 
	ActiveFlag 
	,AreaID 
	,AreaName 
	,BPcount = count(*)        
FROM basicData 
GROUP BY 
     	ActiveFlag 
	,AreaID 
	,AreaName

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewProductionTaskInfoNew
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewProductionTaskInfoNew] 
as
select vti.ID TaskID,
		c.MasterCaseID MasterCaseID,
		con.ID ContractID,
		inv.PaymentMethodTypeID,
		pmt.Description PaymentMethidType,
		pmt.PaymentWay PaymentMethodWay,
		null PriorityID, 
		cast(null as nvarchar(100)) TicketPriority, 
		cc.DesiredBeginDate DesiredBeginDate,
		cht.Description ChannelDescription, 
		null TicketID,
		cast(null as nvarchar(100)) TicketType,
		'[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName SalesManFullName,
		mtah.AdvertisementID TicketAdvertisementID,
		con.FinalPrice ContractFinalPrice
from task vti
join [case] c on c.ID = vti.CaseID
join [case] cm on c.MasterCaseID = cm.ID
left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on cm.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
left join Ticket tic on tgiv.ContractID = tic.RelatedContractID
left join Contract con on tgiv.ContractID = con.ID
left join InvoicePaymentMethod inv on con.id = inv.Id
left join PaymentMethodType pmt on inv.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
--left join TicketPriority tp on tic.PriorityID = tp.id
left join (select cp.RelatedContractID, min(adv.DesiredBeginDate) as DesiredBeginDate from contractproduct cp
			join advertisement adv on cp.id = adv.contractproductid
			group by cp.RelatedContractID
			) cc on cc.RelatedContractID = con.ID 
			and vti.TaskTypeID in (189,190)
left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID	
--left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID
left join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID
left join (select tah.TicketID TicketID, max(tah.AdvertisementID) AdvertisementID
			
			from TicketAdvertisementHistory tah 
			join Ticket tic1 on tah.TicketID = tic1.ID
			where tah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0 and tic1.Status = 0
			group by tah.TicketID) mtah on mtah.TicketID = tic.ID

as
select vti.ID TaskID,
		c.MasterCaseID MasterCaseID,
		con.ID ContractID,

		'[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName SalesManFullName,

join [case] c on c.ID = vti.CaseID
join [case] cm on c.MasterCaseID = cm.ID
left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on cm.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
left join Ticket tic on tgiv.ContractID = tic.RelatedContractID
left join Contract con on tgiv.ContractID = con.ID
left join InvoicePaymentMethod inv on con.id = inv.Id

			join advertisement adv on cp.id = adv.contractproductid
			group by cp.RelatedContractID
			) cc on cc.RelatedContractID = con.ID 
			and vti.TaskTypeID in (189,190)
left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID	
--left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID
left join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID
left join (select tah.TicketID TicketID, max(tah.AdvertisementID) AdvertisementID

			join Ticket tic1 on tah.TicketID = tic1.ID
			where tah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0 and tic1.Status = 0

		tp.Description TicketPriority, 
		adv.DesiredBeginDate DesiredBeginDate,
		cht.Description ChannelDescription, 
		tic.ID TicketID,
		tt.Description TicketType,
		'[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName SalesManFullName,
		mtah.AdvertisementID TicketAdvertisementID,
		con.FinalPrice ContractFinalPrice
from task vti
join [case] c on c.ID = vti.CaseID
join [case] cm on c.MasterCaseID = cm.ID
left join Ticket tic on cm.ContextEntityID = tic.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET'
left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on cm.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
left join Contract con on COALESCE(tic.RelatedContractID, tgiv.ContractID) = con.ID
left join InvoicePaymentMethod inv on con.id = inv.Id
left join PaymentMethodType pmt on inv.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
left join TicketPriority tp on tic.PriorityID = tp.id
left join Advertisement adv on c.ContextEntityID = adv.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID	
left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID
left join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID
left join Ticket tic1 on tgiv.ContractID = tic1.RelatedContractID and tic1.status = 0 and exists 
	(select 1 from TicketAdvertisementHistory ttah 
		where ttah.TicketID = tic1.ID and adv.ID = ttah.AdvertisementID and ttah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0)
left join TicketAdvertisementHistory mtah on tic1.ID = mtah.TicketID and adv.ID = mtah.AdvertisementID and mtah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0
named_assets.sql_raw:
create view [dbo].[ViewProductionTaskInfoNewADV] 
as
select vti.ID TaskID,
		c.MasterCaseID MasterCaseID,
		con.ID ContractID,
		inv.PaymentMethodTypeID,
		pmt.Description PaymentMethidType,
		pmt.PaymentWay PaymentMethodWay,
		tic.PriorityID, 
		tp.Description TicketPriority, 
		adv.DesiredBeginDate DesiredBeginDate,
		cht.Description ChannelDescription, 
		tic.ID TicketID,
		tt.Description TicketType,
		'[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName SalesManFullName,
		mtah.AdvertisementID TicketAdvertisementID,
		con.FinalPrice ContractFinalPrice
from task vti
join [case] c on c.ID = vti.CaseID
join [case] cm on c.MasterCaseID = cm.ID
left join Ticket tic on cm.ContextEntityID = tic.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET'
left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on cm.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
left join Contract con on COALESCE(tic.RelatedContractID, tgiv.ContractID) = con.ID
left join InvoicePaymentMethod inv on con.id = inv.Id
left join PaymentMethodType pmt on inv.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
left join TicketPriority tp on tic.PriorityID = tp.id
left join Advertisement adv on c.ContextEntityID = adv.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID	
left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID
left join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID
left join Ticket tic1 on tgiv.ContractID = tic1.RelatedContractID and tic1.status = 0 and exists 
	(select 1 from TicketAdvertisementHistory ttah 
		where ttah.TicketID = tic1.ID and adv.ID = ttah.AdvertisementID and ttah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0)
left join TicketAdvertisementHistory mtah on tic1.ID = mtah.TicketID and adv.ID = mtah.AdvertisementID and mtah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewReleaseTaskInfo
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewReleaseTaskInfo                                    */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewReleaseTaskInfo as
select distinct
	TaskID = task.ID
	,TaskStatus = task.[Status]
	,TaskCaseID = task.CaseID 
    ,TaskSenderID = task.SenderID 
	,TaskDynamicCode = task.DynamicCode
	,TaskDynamicDescription = task.DynamicDescription
	,TaskDescription = task.[Description]
	,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn 
    ,TaskActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID 
    ,TaskTypeID = taskType.ID
    ,TaskTypeCode = taskType.Code
    ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType
    ,TaskCaseState = theCase.[State]
    ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID
    ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType 
    ,CaseTypeID = caseType.ID 
    ,TaskCaseTypeCode = caseType.Code 
    ,TaskCaseTypeDescription = caseType.[Description]
    ,CaseTypeContextEntityType = caseType.ContextEntityType 
    ,sender.LastName + ' ' + sender.FirstName as TaskSenderFullName   
    ,TaskSenderFirstName = sender.FirstName
    ,TaskSenderLastName = sender.LastName 
    ,theOwner.LastName + ' ' + theOwner.FirstName as TaskActualOwnerFullName         
    ,TaskActualOwnerFirstName = theOwner.FirstName
    ,TaskActualOwnerLastName = theOwner.LastName
    ,PotentialUserID = null
    ,StakeHolderUserID =null
from Task as task
inner join TaskType taskType on task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID and 1 <> task.[Status]
inner join [Case]  theCase on task.CaseID = theCase.ID
inner join CaseType  caseType on theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID
--inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = task.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 
			--and task.ActualOwnerID is not null and ta.RoleID is not null and ta.UserID is null
inner join [User] theOwner on task.ActualOwnerID = theOwner.ID
left outer join [User] as sender on task.SenderID = sender.ID
where theCase.[State] = 0
and taskType.ActivityType = 'H'
and task.ActualOwnerID is not null -- FYI: BI#85

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewRenewalFailure
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewRenewalFailure                                     */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewRenewalFailure as

select csfh.BatchID 
	, ContractID = vc.C_ID
	, ActualBpOwnerCode = vc.A_BPCode     
	, ErrorType =csfh.[Type]
	, ContractProductID 
	, CP_VersionSectionID	
	, CP_State 
	, CP_Medium = ( select  '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID)
	, CP_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code
					from dbo.MediumVersion mv
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID)
	, CP_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs 
					where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID)
	, Target_CP_VSID
	, Target_CP_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Target_CP_VSID)
	, Target_CP_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code
					from dbo.MediumVersion mv
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Target_CP_VSID)
	, Target_CP_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs 
					where vs.ID = Target_CP_VSID)

	, CP_ProductID 
	, CP_ProductCode 
	, CP_ProductUdacType 
	, Target_CP_ProductID	
	, Target_CP_ProductCode	
	, Target_CP_ProductUdacType 
	, AdvertisementID 
	, Adv_VersionSectionID 
	, Adv_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID)
	, Adv_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code
					from dbo.MediumVersion mv
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID)
	, Adv_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs 
					where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID)
	, Target_ADV_VSID	
	, Target_Adv_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID)
	, Target_Adv_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code
					from dbo.MediumVersion mv
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID)
	, Target_Adv_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs 
					where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID)
	, Adv_ProductID
	, Adv_ProductCode 
	, Target_Adv_ProductKitID 
	, Target_ADV_ProductID	
	, Target_ADV_ProductCode	
	, Adv_HeadingID 
	, ADV_Heading = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = ADV_HeadingID)
	, Target_ADV_HeadingID	
	, Target_ADV_Heading = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = Target_ADV_HeadingID)
	, Adv_GeoAreaID 
	, Adv_GeoArea = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = ADV_GeoAreaID)
	, Target_ADV_GeoAreaID	
	, Target_ADV_GeoArea = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID =Target_ADV_GeoAreaID)
	, Adv_ProductIsComposite 
	, IsCustomerRed 
	, SubChannelUserExists 
	, SalesManID 
	, SalesMan = ( select u.UserName from dbo.[User] u where u.ID = SalesManID)
	, Adv_EndDate 
	, Errors = 
	  case when IsCustomerRed					= 1 then 'Πελάτης Red' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when SubChannelUserExists			= 1 then 'Default Πωλητής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_CP_VSID			= 1 then 'Section Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID		= 1 then 'Προϊόν Προβολής' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID			= 1 then 'Section Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end +'-'
    + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID	= 1 and Target_ADV_ProductID IS null   then 'Προϊόν Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
    + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID	= 1 and Target_Adv_ProductKitID IS null then 'Bundle Member' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID	= 1 then 'Κατηγορία Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID	= 1 then 'GeoArea Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Adv_EndDate				= 1 then 'Ελειπής Ημ/νια Λήξης' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_Bundle_Heading			= 1 then 'Κατηγορία Προϊόντος Ενιαίας Προβολής' else '' end +'-'	
	+ case when Invalid_Target_Prid = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω έλλειψης τιμής προϊόντος' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_BPIsActive = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω Μη Ενεργού Επιχειρηματικού Σημείου' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω Μη Ενεργής Κατηγορίας' else '' end
	+ Case when Invalid_NotPassedQA = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω έλειψης QA' else '' end 
	+ Case when Invalid_MixedPm = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω συνύπαρξης παλιού και νέου τρόπου πληρωμής' else '' end 
	+ Case when Invalid_CP_State = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω μη έγκυρου state προβολής' else '' end 
	, Invalid_Target_CP_VSID
	, Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID	
	, Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID		
    , Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID	
	, Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID	
	, Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID	
	, Invalid_Adv_EndDate 
	, Invalid_Bundle_Heading 
	, Invalid_Target_Prid
	, pd.A_BPIsActive
	, pd.C_BPIsActive
	, pd.CP_BPIsActive
	, pd.Invalid_BPIsActive
	, pd.Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive
	, pd.Invalid_NotPassedQA
	, Invalid_MixedPm 
	, Invalid_CP_State
	, IsInvalid
from dbo.[BatchActionHistoryAnalysis] csfh
join (select distinct  BatchActionID = b.BatchID ,b.BatchActionType from dbo.BatchActionHistory b) as bah on csfh.BatchID = bah.BatchActionID
																									and bah.BatchActionType =1
join dbo.ViewContract vc on csfh.EntityID = vc.C_ID
left join [dbo].[ViewBatchActionAnalysis] pd on csfh.BatchID = pd.BatchID
		and csfh.EntityID = pd.EntityID
where csfh.EntityType =1
named_assets.sql_raw:

/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewRenewalFailure as

select csfh.BatchID 
	, ContractID = vc.C_ID
	, ActualBpOwnerCode = vc.A_BPCode     
	, ErrorType =csfh.[Type]
	, ContractProductID 
	, CP_VersionSectionID	
	, CP_State 
	, CP_Medium = ( select  '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID)

	, CP_VersionSection =( select vs.Name

	, Target_CP_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name

	, Target_CP_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs

	, CP_ProductID 
	, CP_ProductCode 
	, CP_ProductUdacType 
	, Target_CP_ProductID	
	, Target_CP_ProductCode	
	, Target_CP_ProductUdacType 
	, AdvertisementID 
	, Adv_VersionSectionID 
	, Adv_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID)
	, Adv_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code

	, Adv_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs 
					where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID)
	, Target_ADV_VSID	
	, Target_Adv_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name
					from dbo.Medium m
					join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID 
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID)
	, Target_Adv_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code
					from dbo.MediumVersion mv
					join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID
					where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID)
	, Target_Adv_VersionSection =( select vs.Name
					from dbo.VersionSection vs 
					where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID)
	, Adv_ProductID
	, Adv_ProductCode 
	, Target_Adv_ProductKitID 
	, Target_ADV_ProductID	
	, Target_ADV_ProductCode	
	, Adv_HeadingID 
	, ADV_Heading = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = ADV_HeadingID)
	, Target_ADV_HeadingID	
	, Target_ADV_Heading = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = Target_ADV_HeadingID)
	, Adv_GeoAreaID 
	, Adv_GeoArea = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = ADV_GeoAreaID)
	, Target_ADV_GeoAreaID	
	, Target_ADV_GeoArea = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID =Target_ADV_GeoAreaID)
	, Adv_ProductIsComposite 
	, IsCustomerRed 
	, SubChannelUserExists 
	, SalesManID 
	, SalesMan = ( select u.UserName from dbo.[User] u where u.ID = SalesManID)
	, Adv_EndDate 
	, Errors = 
	  case when IsCustomerRed					= 1 then 'Πελάτης Red' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when SubChannelUserExists			= 1 then 'Default Πωλητής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_CP_VSID			= 1 then 'Section Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID		= 1 then 'Προϊόν Προβολής' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID			= 1 then 'Section Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end +'-'
    + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID	= 1 and Target_ADV_ProductID IS null   then 'Προϊόν Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
    + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID	= 1 and Target_Adv_ProductKitID IS null then 'Bundle Member' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID	= 1 then 'Κατηγορία Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID	= 1 then 'GeoArea Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-'
	+ case when Invalid_Adv_EndDate				= 1 then 'Ελειπής Ημ/νια Λήξης' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_Bundle_Heading			= 1 then 'Κατηγορία Προϊόντος Ενιαίας Προβολής' else '' end +'-'	
	+ case when Invalid_Target_Prid = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω έλλειψης τιμής προϊόντος' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_BPIsActive = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω Μη Ενεργού Επιχειρηματικού Σημείου' else '' end +'-'
	+ case when Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω Μη Ενεργής Κατηγορίας' else '' end
	+ Case when Invalid_NotPassedQA = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω έλειψης QA' else '' end 
	+ Case when Invalid_MixedPm = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω συνύπαρξης παλιού και νέου τρόπου πληρωμής' else '' end 
	+ Case when Invalid_CP_State = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω μη έγκυρου state προβολής' else '' end 
	, Invalid_Target_CP_VSID
	, Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID	
	, Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID		
    , Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID	
	, Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID	
	, Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID	
	, Invalid_Adv_EndDate 
	, Invalid_Bundle_Heading 
	, Invalid_Target_Prid
	, pd.A_BPIsActive
	, pd.C_BPIsActive
	, pd.CP_BPIsActive
	, pd.Invalid_BPIsActive
	, pd.Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive
	, pd.Invalid_NotPassedQA
	, Invalid_MixedPm 
	, Invalid_CP_State
	, IsInvalid
from dbo.[BatchActionHistoryAnalysis] csfh
join (select distinct  BatchActionID = b.BatchID ,b.BatchActionType from dbo.BatchActionHistory b) as bah on csfh.BatchID = bah.BatchActionID
																									and bah.BatchActionType =1
join dbo.ViewContract vc on csfh.EntityID = vc.C_ID
left join [dbo].[ViewBatchActionAnalysis] pd on csfh.BatchID = pd.BatchID
		and csfh.EntityID = pd.EntityID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign] as
select 
CampaignID = c.ID 
,CampaignDescription = '['+c.Code+'] ' + c.Name
,ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID 
,CampaignStartedOn = c.StartedOn
,CampaignClosedOn = c.ClosedOn
,TaskTypeId = t.TaskTypeId
,TaskEditorState = t.EditorState
,TgivStartDate = tgiv.StartDate
,TgivEndDate = tgiv.EndDate
,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased
,Supervisor = tgiv.Supervisor
,[Version] = c.[Version]
,CampaignState = c.state
from Campaign c (nolock)
join TargetGroupItem tgi (nolock) on c.ID = tgi.CampaignID
join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
join [Case] cs (nolock) on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
join Task t (nolock) on cs.ID = t.CaseID
where t.Status = 0 and cs.State = 0 and c.state in (2,3)
named_assets.sql_raw:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign] as
select 
CampaignID = c.ID 
,CampaignDescription = '['+c.Code+'] ' + c.Name
,ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID 
,CampaignStartedOn = c.StartedOn
,CampaignClosedOn = c.ClosedOn
,TaskTypeId = t.TaskTypeId
,TaskEditorState = t.EditorState
,TgivStartDate = tgiv.StartDate
,TgivEndDate = tgiv.EndDate
,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased
,Supervisor = tgiv.Supervisor
,[Version] = c.[Version]
,CampaignState = c.state
from Campaign c (nolock)
join TargetGroupItem tgi (nolock) on c.ID = tgi.CampaignID
join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
join [Case] cs (nolock) on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
join Task t (nolock) on cs.ID = t.CaseID
where t.Status = 0 and cs.State = 0 and c.state in (2,3)

create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketAnalysisAnamoniMaketas] as
with pt as
(
	select c.MasterCaseID, CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID, ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID  , UnitID = u.UnitID,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate
	from  TargetGroupItem as tgi  
	join  TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
	join  [Case] c  on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID
	join  Task t  on c.ID = t.CaseID	
		join  [User] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID
		where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' 
		  and t.ActualOwnerID is not null
		  and (t.Outcome = 'Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας'
					OR t.Outcome = 'ΑΠΟΔΠ')
		  and tgiv.NeedPresentation = 1 		  
		  and t.Status = 1
		  and c.State = 1
		  and t.TaskTypeID in (173,154,312,313)
)


select  CampaignID, ActualOwnerID,UnitID,StartDate,EndDate
 from pt as v
 where 
not exists (			select t1.ID
			from [Case] as c1 
			join   Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID
			where c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID
			and t1.TaskTypeID = 169 
			and t1.Status = 0 ) 
and not exists (
			select t1.ID
			from [Case] as c1 
			join   Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID
			where c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID
			and t1.TaskTypeID = 169 
			and t1.Status = 1
			and t1.Outcome <> 'ΑΛΛΑΓ'
			group by t1.ID
			having MAX(t1.ID) = t1.ID )

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketAnalysisCompleted
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketAnalysisCompleted] as


select distinct tgiv.ID
,CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID
,ActualOwnerID =tgiv.HandlerUserID  
, UnitID = u.UnitID
,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate,
		(select sum(cp.Price-cp.Discount-cp.RulesDiscount) from ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID) as TargetValue,
		1 as TargetCount,
		CustomerRating = tgiv.LossPrintedNew
from TargetGroupItem as tgi  
join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
join [Contract] as ct on tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID
join [Case] c  on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID
join Task t  on c.ID = t.CaseID
join [User] u on tgiv.HandlerUserID = u.ID
where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' 		  
	  and t.Status = 1
	  and c.State = 1
	  AND ct.State <> 3
	  AND tgiv.ContractID IS NOT NULL 
	  and ((t.TaskTypeID = 189 AND t.Outcome in ('Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση', 'Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις')) 
	  or (t.TaskTypeID = 195 AND t.Outcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση'))

named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketAnalysisLosings] as
with pt as
(
	select c.MasterCaseID,CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID,ActualOwnerID =t.ActualOwnerID , UnitID = u.UnitID,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate
	from  TargetGroupItem as tgi  
	join    TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
	join  [Case] c  on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID
	join   Task t  on c.ID = t.CaseID
	join  [User] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID
		where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' 
		  and t.ActualOwnerID is not null
		  and t.Outcome in ('ΑΡΝ','ΑΡΝΕ')
		  and t.Status=1
		  and c.State=1
		  and t.TaskTypeID in (146,151,154,173,258,299,307,312,313)
)
select CampaignID, ActualOwnerID,UnitID,StartDate,EndDate
 from pt as v
 where not exists (
			select NULL as Empty
			from [Case] as c1 
			join   Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID			
			left join TaskAssignment as ta1 on ta1.TaskID = t1.ID
			where c1.State = 0 
			and t1.TaskTypeID not in (263,273,155,199) -- FYI: Exclude notifications
			and t1.Status = 0
			and c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID
			and (t1.ActualOwnerID = v.ActualOwnerID or ta1.UserID = v.ActualOwnerID)
 )

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketAnalysisTargetAmount
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketAnalysisTargetAmount] as
select  CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID, 
		ActualOwnerID = tgiv.HandlerUserID,
		UnitID = u.UnitID,
		tgiv.StartDate as FromDate,
		tgiv.EndDate as ToDate,
		SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) as TargetValue,
		COUNT(tgiv.ID)as TargetCount
 from  TargetGroupItem as tgi
 join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID  
 join [User] as u on tgiv.HandlerUserID = u.ID 
where 
tgiv.TargetValue > 0
group by tgi.CampaignID, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate, UnitID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketItem
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewSalesMarketItem                                    */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewSalesMarketItem as
select 
 CampaignID  = tgi.CampaignID
,ActivityType = tst.ActivityType
,UnitID =actualOwner.UnitID
,TargetGroupValueID = tgiv.ID
,SelectedAllocationPlanID = tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID
,TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
,CaseID = ts.CaseID
,ts.ID as TaskID
,TaskName = ts.[Description]
,TaskTypeID = ts.TaskTypeID
,TaskCreatedOn = ts.CreatedOn
,ActualOwnerID = ts.ActualOwnerID
,ActualOwner = actualOwner.LastName + ' ' + actualOwner.FirstName
,SupervisorID = tgiv.Supervisor
,Supervisor = supervisor.LastName + ' ' + supervisor.FirstName
,AppointmentDateTime =  tgiv.AppointmentDateTime
,BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID
,BPIdentityConfirmed = tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed
,CustomerName = tgi.CustomerName
,CustomerCode = tgi.Code
,BrandName = tgi.Brandname
,EndDate = tgiv.EndDate
,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased
,OfferAmount = tgiv.TargetValue
,CRM = bp.HasCRMTicket
,MasterClassification = tgi.MainHeadingName
,MasterHeading = tgi.MainHeadingName --//Check
,ReliabilityStatus = cuso.[Description]
,ReliabilityID = ISNULL(cuso.ID,0)
,LossPrintedNew =  tgiv.LossPrintedNew
,Prefecture = ISNULL( tgi.Prefecture,'')
,Municipality = ISNULL(tgi.Municipality,'')
,City = ISNULL(tgi.City ,'')
,Street = ISNULL( tgi.StreetName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(tgi.StreetNumber,'')
,ZipCode = ISNULL(tgi.ZipCode,'')
,IsSubscription = (Case when exists
(SELECT 1 FROM TargetGroupItemPeriod tgip
join ContractProduct cp on tgip.ContractProductID = cp.ID
where tgip.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID
and cp.IsRenewable = 1)
then 1
else 0 end)
,NoCommReasonID = tgiv.NoCommReasonID
,UDFString01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString01,'')
,UDFString03 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString03,'')
,UDFString05 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString05,'')
,UDFValue01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue01,0)
,UDFValue02 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue02,0)
,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate
,RecallTime =tgiv.RecallTime
,LastSignedDate = tgiv.LastSignedDate
from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv
join [Case] cs with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID
join [Task] ts with (nolock) on cs.ID = ts.CaseID
join [TaskType] tst with (nolock) on ts.TaskTypeID = tst.ID
join TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
join BusinessPoint bp with (nolock) on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
left join [User] actualOwner with (nolock) on ts.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID
left join [User] supervisor with (nolock) on tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID
left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID
left join TargetGroupItemInfo tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID
where cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
and ts.[Status] = 0

 CampaignID  = tgi.CampaignID

,TargetGroupValueID = tgiv.ID

,TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
,CaseID = ts.CaseID
,ts.ID as TaskID
,TaskName = ts.[Description]
,TaskTypeID = ts.TaskTypeID
,TaskCreatedOn = ts.CreatedOn
,ActualOwnerID = ts.ActualOwnerID
,ActualOwner = actualOwner.LastName + ' ' + actualOwner.FirstName
,SupervisorID = tgiv.Supervisor
,Supervisor = supervisor.LastName + ' ' + supervisor.FirstName
,AppointmentDateTime =  tgiv.AppointmentDateTime
,BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID
,BPIdentityConfirmed = tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed
,CustomerName = tgi.CustomerName
,CustomerCode = tgi.Code
,BrandName = tgi.Brandname
,EndDate = tgiv.EndDate
,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased
,OfferAmount = tgiv.TargetValue
,CRM = bp.HasCRMTicket
,MasterClassification = tgi.MainHeadingName
,MasterHeading = tgi.MainHeadingName --//Check
,ReliabilityStatus = cuso.[Description]
,ReliabilityID = ISNULL(cuso.ID,0)
,LossPrintedNew =  tgiv.LossPrintedNew
,Prefecture = ISNULL( tgi.Prefecture,'')
,Municipality = ISNULL(tgi.Municipality,'')
,City = ISNULL(tgi.City ,'')
,Street = ISNULL( tgi.StreetName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(tgi.StreetNumber,'')
,ZipCode = ISNULL(tgi.ZipCode,'')
,IsSubscription = (Case when exists
(SELECT 1 FROM TargetGroupItemPeriod tgip
join ContractProduct cp on tgip.ContractProductID = cp.ID
where tgip.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID
and cp.IsRenewable = 1)
then 1
else 0 end)
,NoCommReasonID = tgiv.NoCommReasonID
,UDFString01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString01,'')
,UDFString03 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString03,'')
,UDFString05 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString05,'')
,UDFValue01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue01,0)
,UDFValue02 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue02,0)
,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate
,RecallTime =tgiv.RecallTime
,LastSignedDate = tgiv.LastSignedDate
from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv
join [Case] cs with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID
join [Task] ts with (nolock) on cs.ID = ts.CaseID
join [TaskType] tst with (nolock) on ts.TaskTypeID = tst.ID
join TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
join BusinessPoint bp with (nolock) on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
left join [User] actualOwner with (nolock) on ts.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID
left join [User] supervisor with (nolock) on tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID
left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID
left join TargetGroupItemInfo tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID
where cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
and ts.[Status] = 0

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketItemPotentialOwnerBasic
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketItemPotentialOwnerBasic] as
select
	vTask.*
    ,PotentialOwnerID = vTask.ActualOwnerID 
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
union
select
	vTask.*     
    ,PotentialOwnerID = urpTa.UserID
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner join TaskAssignment ta (nolock) on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null
inner join UserRole urpTa (nolock) on urpTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID
union
select
	vTask.*       
    ,PotentialOwnerID = ta.UserID
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner join TaskAssignment ta (nolock) on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null and ta.UserID is not null

,Street = ISNULL( tgi.StreetName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(tgi.StreetNumber,'')
,ZipCode = ISNULL(tgi.ZipCode,'')
--,IsSubscription = (Case when exists
--(SELECT 1 FROM TargetGroupItemPeriod tgip
--join ContractProduct cp on tgip.ContractProductID = cp.ID
--where tgip.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID
--and cp.IsRenewable = 1)
--then 1
--else 0 end)
,IsSubscription = 0
,NoCommReasonID = tgiv.NoCommReasonID
--,UDFString01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString01,'')
--,UDFString03 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString03,'')
--,UDFString05 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString05,'')
--,UDFValue01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue01,0)
--,UDFValue02 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue02,0)
,UDFString01 = ''
,UDFString03 = ''
,UDFString05 = ''
,UDFValue01 = 0.0
,UDFValue02 = 0.0
,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate
,RecallTime =tgiv.RecallTime
,CampaignStartedOn = camp.StartedOn
,CampaignClosedOn = camp.ClosedOn
,TaskEditorState = ts.EditorState
,sender.LastName + ' ' + sender.FirstName as TaskSenderFullName
,LastSignedDate = tgiv.LastSignedDate
,NearestBPsAdvEndDate = tgiv.NearestBPsAdvEndDate
,CampaignState = camp.State
from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv
join ViewSalesMarketItemPotentialOwnerBasic as ts on tgiv.ID = ts.CaseContextEntityID
join TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
join Campaign camp with (nolock) on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID
join BusinessPoint bp with (nolock) on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
left join [User] supervisor with (nolock) on tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID
join [User] usr with (nolock) on ts.PotentialOwnerID = usr.ID
left join [User] actUsr (nolock) on ts.ActualOwnerID = actUsr.ID
left outer join [User] as sender with (nolock) on ts.SenderID = sender.ID
left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID
--left join TargetGroupItemInfo tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID
left join ViewSalesMarketItemStakeHolderBasic vStakeHolder on ts.ID = vStakeHolder.TaskID
where ts.CaseContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
and ts.[Status] = 0
and (camp.state = 2 
	or
	(camp.State = 3 and (ts.EditorState > 0 and ts.TaskTypeID in (151,146) OR ts.TaskTypeID not in (151,146))))
--and ((camp.StartedOn <= GETDATE() and camp.ClosedOn >= GETDATE()) OR
--      (camp.ClosedOn < GETDATE() and ts.EditorState > 0 and ts.TaskTypeID in (151,146)) OR
--      (camp.ClosedOn < GETDATE() and ts.TaskTypeID not in (151,146)))

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketItemStakeHolderBasic

create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketItemStakeHolderBasic] as
select
   ta.TaskID TaskID,
   ursTa.UserID StakeHolderUserID
from
   TaskAssignment ta
   inner join UserRole ursTa on  ursTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID
where
   ta.AssignmentType = 1
union
select
   TaskID TaskID,
   UserID StakeHolderUserID
from
   TaskAssignment
where
   AssignmentType = 1
   and UserID is not null

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketTaskAndOwner
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketTaskAndOwner] as
select
	vTask.*
    ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName as ActualOwnerFullName  
    ,ActualOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID
    ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID    
    ,PotentialOwnerID = vTask.ActualOwnerID 
    ,StakeHolderUserID =null
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner join [User] as usr on vTask.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID
union
select
	vTask.*
    ,ActualOwnerFullName = null
    ,ActualOwnerUnitID = null
    ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID         
    ,PotentialOwnerID = urpTa.UserID
    ,StakeHolderUserID =null
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null
inner join UserRole urpTa on urpTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID
inner join [User] usr on urpTa.UserID = usr.ID
union
select
	vTask.*
    ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = null 
    ,ActualOwnerUnitID = null
    ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID        
    ,PotentialOwnerID = ta.UserID
    ,StakeHolderUserID =null
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null and ta.UserID is not null 
inner join [User] usr on ta.UserID = usr.ID
union
select
	vTask.*
    ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName as ActualOwnerFullName 
    ,ActualOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID
    ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = null          
    ,PotentialOwnerID = null
    ,StakeHolderUserID = ursTa.UserID
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner join [User] as usr on vTask.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID
inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 1 
inner join UserRole ursTa on ursTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID
union
select
	vTask.*
    ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = null 
    ,ActualOwnerUnitID = null
    ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = null          
    ,PotentialUserID = null
    ,StakeHolderUserID = ursTa.UserID
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
inner  join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 1 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null
inner join UserRole ursTa on ursTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID
union
select
	vTask.*
    ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName as ActualOwnerFullName 
    ,ActualOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID
    ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = null          
    ,PotentialOwnerID = null
    ,StakeHolderUserID = ta.UserID
from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask
left outer join [User] as usr on vTask.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID
inner  join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 1  and ta.UserID is not null

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic] as
select
    task.ID
	,task.Description
	,task.CreatedOn
	,task.Status
	,task.CaseID
	,task.TaskTypeID
	,task.Outcome
	,task.CompletedOn
	,task.ActualOwnerID
	,task.DynamicCode
	,task.DynamicDescription
	,task.SenderID
	,task.DMKey
	,task.DMTable
	,task.DMCharKey
	,task.SubStatus
	,task.EditorState
	,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType
    ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID
    ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType 
from Task as task (nolock)
inner join TaskType taskType (nolock) on task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID and 1 <> task.[Status]
inner join [Case]  theCase (nolock) on task.CaseID = theCase.ID
where (	0 = theCase.[State] OR ( 1 = theCase.[State] AND 'N' = taskType.ActivityType )	)
	  AND taskType.ActivityType IN (N'N',N'H')

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewSourceBPs
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: [ViewSourceBPs]                                        */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewSourceBPs as
with basicData as
(
SELECT 
	ActiveFlag = bp.IsActive
	,SourceID = Case when  cs.ID IS null then 0 else cs.ID end 
	,SourceName =  case when  cs.ID IS null then 'Unknown Source'
		  else cs.[Description] end 	 	
FROM BusinessPoint bp
join dbo.Classification	cl on bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID
						and cl.ClassifierID = 5
						and cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (3,4)
left join CustomerSource cs on cs.ID = bp.CustomerSourceID
)
SELECT 
	ActiveFlag 
	,SourceID
	,SourceName
	,BPcount = count(*)        
FROM basicData 
GROUP BY 
     ActiveFlag 
	,SourceID
	,SourceName

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewTargetGroupItemInfo                                */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewTargetGroupItemInfo as

with fullUser as
( select ID , FullName = LastName + ' ' + FirstName 
from dbo.[User] with (nolock))
select
	tgi.ID
	,[BusinessPointID]
	,[CampaignID]
	,[SourceCampaignID]
	,[CaseID]
	,[CustomerName]	,[Brandname]	
	,[Prefecture]	,[Municipality]	,[City]	,[StreetName]	,[StreetNumber]	
	,[NumberExtension]	,[ZipCode]	,[Phone]	
	,[CustomerProfession], [ReliabilityStatus]
	,[MainHeadingID]	,[MainHeadingCode]	,[MainHeadingName]
	,[BalanceValue]	,[DueBalanceValue]	,[SettlementBalanceValue]	,[SettlementWay]
	,[HigherSpendingHeadingID]	,[HigherSpendingHeadingCode]	,[HigherSpendingHeadingName]
	,[SubHeadingCode]	,[SubHeadingName]	,[FullHeadingDescription]
	,[HasOnline]
	,[HasGraphicFile]
	,[Y02PSalesChannel]	,[Y02PSalesrep]
	,[Y01PSalesChannel]	,[Y01PSalesrep]
	,[Y02OSalesChannel]	,[Y02OSalesrep]
	,[Y01OSalesChannel]	,[Y01OSalesrep]
	,[Y02PrintSignDate]	,[Y01PrintSignDate]
	,[Y01PBDContractsValue]	,[Y02PBDContractsValue]	,[Y03PBDContractsValue]	,[Y04PBDContractsValue]	,[Y05PBDContractsValue]	,[Y06PBDContractsValue]
	,[Y07PBDContractsValue]	,[Y08PBDContractsValue]	,[Y09PBDContractsValue]	,[Y10PBDContractsValue]	,[Y11PBDContractsValue]	,[Y12PBDContractsValue]
	,[Y01PADContractsValue]	,[Y02PADContractsValue]	,[Y03PADContractsValue]	,[Y04PADContractsValue]	,[Y05PADContractsValue]	,[Y06PADContractsValue]
	,[Y07PADContractsValue]	,[Y08PADContractsValue]	,[Y09PADContractsValue]	,[Y10PADContractsValue]	,[Y11PADContractsValue]	,[Y12PADContractsValue]
	,[Y01InternetSignDate]	,[Y02InternetSignDate]	
	,[Y01IBDContractsValue]	,[Y02IBDContractsValue]	,[Y03IBDContractsValue]	,[Y04IBDContractsValue]	,[Y05IBDContractsValue]	,[Y06IBDContractsValue]	
	,[Y07IBDContractsValue]	,[Y08IBDContractsValue]	,[Y09IBDContractsValue]	,[Y10IBDContractsValue]	,[Y11IBDContractsValue]	,[Y12IBDContractsValue]
	,[Y01IADContractsValue]	,[Y02IADContractsValue]	,[Y03IADContractsValue]	,[Y04IADContractsValue]	,[Y05IADContractsValue]	,[Y06IADContractsValue]
	,[Y07IADContractsValue]	,[Y08IADContractsValue]	,[Y09IADContractsValue]	,[Y10IADContractsValue]	,[Y11IADContractsValue]	,[Y12IADContractsValue]
	,[ExpirationValueInternet]	,[ExpirationDateInternet]
	,[SubscriptionValue]	,[SubscriptionSignDate]
	,[Y02DirectoriesSections]	,[Y01DirectoriesSections]
	,[Y02Entries]	,[Y01Entries]
	,[Y02HasMaketa]	,[Y01HasMaketa]
	,[Y02HasLogo]	,[Y01HasLogo]
	,[Y02HasSpecialPositions]	,[Y01HasSpecialPositions]
	,[Y02EntriesExcludingDepended]	,[Y01EntriesExcludingDepended]
	,[Y01HasROI]	,[Y02HasROI]	,[Y03HasROI]	,[Y04HasROI]	,[Y05HasROI]	,[Y06HasROI]
	,[Y07HasROI]	,[Y08HasROI]	,[Y09HasROI]	,[Y10HasROI]	,[Y11HasROI]	,[Y12HasROI]
	,[Y01HasCancellations]	,[Y01HasDueCancellations]
	,[CancelAmount]	,[CancelContract]	,[CancelDate]
	,[HasCreditInvoice]	,[CreditInvoiceDate]	,[CreditInvoiceValue]
	,[PaymentWays]
	,[IsExchangeSale]	,[ExchangeSaleValue]
	,[LastSaleAssignmentDate]
	,[PrintPreprintedValue]	,[InternetPreprintedValue]	,[TotalPreprintedValue]	,[MultimediaPreprintedValue]
	,Y01BDPrintPreprintedValue	,Y01BDInternetPreprintedValue	,Y01BDTotalPreprintedValue	,Y01BDMultimediaPreprintedValue
	,Y01ADPrintPreprintedValue	,Y01ADInternetPreprintedValue	,Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue	,Y01ADMultimediaPreprintedValue
	,[UDFBit01]	,[UDFBit02]	,[UDFBit03]	,[UDFBit04]	,[UDFBit05]	
	,[UDFDate01]	,[UDFDate02]	,[UDFDate03]	,[UDFDate04]	,[UDFDate05]	
	,[UDFValue01]	,[UDFValue02]	,[UDFValue03]	,[UDFValue04]	,[UDFValue05]
	,[UDFString01]= case	when tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 0 then 'Potential'
						when tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1 then 'PrePrinted'
						when tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 2 then 'Loss'end

	,[UDFString02]=  CONVERT(nvarchar(20), tgi.Code)
	,[UDFString03]	,[UDFString04]	,[UDFString05]
	,[TargetValue]
	,[SubChannelID]
	,SubChannel.[Description]
	,tgiv.HandlerUserID
	,HandlerName = HUser.FullName
	,tgiv.TargetUserID
	,TargetName = TUser.FullName
	,tgiv.ProposedHandlerUserID	,ProposedHandlerName = HPUser.FullName
	,tgiv.ProposedTargetUserID	,ProposedTargetName = TPUser.FullName
	,tgiv.Supervisor			,SupervisorName = SUser.FullName
	,[StartDate]	,[EndDate]	,[IsReleased]
	,TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID 
	,CampaignAllocationPlanID
	,Y01PSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y01OSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02PSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02OSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT)    
	,Y01PSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y01OSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02PSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02OSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,[InitialSubChannelID]
	,InitialSubChannel = InitialSubChannel.[Description]
	,tgiv.InitialHandlerUserID
	,InitialHandlerName = IHUser.FullName
	,tgiv.InitialTargetUserID
	,InitialTargetName = ITUser.FullName
	,ChannelTargetValue
	,UserTargetValue
	,TargetValuesNeedRefresh
	
	,tgiv.AppointmentDateTime
	,tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed
	,tgi.Code
	,tgiv.LossPrintedNew
	,tgiv.LastSignedDate
	
	,LastPrintSalesMan01 = lastPrintSalesMan01.FullName
	,LastPrintSalesMan02 = lastPrintSalesMan02.FullName
	,LastInternetSalesMan01 = lastInternetSalesMan01.FullName
	,LastInternetSalesMan02 = lastInternetSalesMan02.FullName
from
   dbo.[TargetGroupItem] tgi with (nolock)
   Join dbo.[TargetGroupItemValue] tgiv with (nolock) on  tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
   LEFT JOIN dbo.[TargetGroupItemInfo] tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID
   LEFT JOIN dbo.[SubChannel] with (nolock) on  SubChannelID = SubChannel.ID
   LEFT JOIN dbo.[SubChannel] InitialSubChannel with (nolock) on tgiv.InitialSubChannelID = InitialSubChannel.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser HUser on  tgiv.HandlerUserID = HUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser TUser on  tgiv.TargetUserID = TUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser HPUser on tgiv.ProposedHandlerUserID = HPUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser TPUser on tgiv.ProposedTargetUserID = TPUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser SUser on tgiv.Supervisor = SUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser IHUser on tgiv.InitialHandlerUserID = IHUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser ITUser on tgiv.InitialTargetUserID = ITUser.ID
left join fullUser lastPrintSalesMan01 on tgii.Y01PSalesrep = lastPrintSalesMan01.ID
left join fullUser lastPrintSalesMan02 on tgii.Y02PSalesrep = lastPrintSalesMan02.ID
left join fullUser lastInternetSalesMan01 on tgii.Y01OSalesrep = lastInternetSalesMan01.ID
left join fullUser lastInternetSalesMan02 on tgii.Y02OSalesrep = lastInternetSalesMan02.ID

	,[PaymentWays]
	,[IsExchangeSale]	,[ExchangeSaleValue]
	,[LastSaleAssignmentDate]
	,[PrintPreprintedValue]	,[InternetPreprintedValue]	,[TotalPreprintedValue]	,[MultimediaPreprintedValue]
	,Y01BDPrintPreprintedValue	,Y01BDInternetPreprintedValue	,Y01BDTotalPreprintedValue	,Y01BDMultimediaPreprintedValue
	,Y01ADPrintPreprintedValue	,Y01ADInternetPreprintedValue	,Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue	,Y01ADMultimediaPreprintedValue
	,[UDFBit01]	,[UDFBit02]	,[UDFBit03]	,[UDFBit04]	,[UDFBit05]	
	,[UDFDate01]	,[UDFDate02]	,[UDFDate03]	,[UDFDate04]	,[UDFDate05]	
	,[UDFValue01]	,[UDFValue02]	,[UDFValue03]	,[UDFValue04]	,[UDFValue05]
	,[UDFString01]= case	when tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 0 then 'Potential'
						when tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1 then 'PrePrinted'
						when tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 2 then 'Loss'end

	,[UDFString02]=  CONVERT(nvarchar(20), tgi.Code)
	,[UDFString03]	,[UDFString04]	,[UDFString05]
	,[TargetValue]
	,[SubChannelID]
	,SubChannel.[Description]
	,tgiv.HandlerUserID
	,HandlerName = HUser.FullName
	,tgiv.TargetUserID
	,TargetName = TUser.FullName
	,tgiv.ProposedHandlerUserID	,ProposedHandlerName = HPUser.FullName
	,tgiv.ProposedTargetUserID	,ProposedTargetName = TPUser.FullName
	,tgiv.Supervisor			,SupervisorName = SUser.FullName
	,[StartDate]	,[EndDate]	,[IsReleased]
	,TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID 
	,CampaignAllocationPlanID
	,Y01PSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y01OSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02PSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02OSalesChannelID = CAST(NULL AS INT)    
	,Y01PSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y01OSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02PSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,Y02OSalesrepID = CAST(NULL AS INT) 
	,[InitialSubChannelID]
	,InitialSubChannel = InitialSubChannel.[Description]
	,tgiv.InitialHandlerUserID
	,InitialHandlerName = IHUser.FullName
	,tgiv.InitialTargetUserID
	,InitialTargetName = ITUser.FullName
	,ChannelTargetValue
	,UserTargetValue
	,TargetValuesNeedRefresh
	
	,tgiv.AppointmentDateTime
	,tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed
	,tgi.Code
	,tgiv.LossPrintedNew
	,tgiv.LastSignedDate
	
	,LastPrintSalesMan01 = lastPrintSalesMan01.FullName
	,LastPrintSalesMan02 = lastPrintSalesMan02.FullName
	,LastInternetSalesMan01 = lastInternetSalesMan01.FullName
	,LastInternetSalesMan02 = lastInternetSalesMan02.FullName
from
   dbo.[TargetGroupItem] tgi with (nolock)
   Join dbo.[TargetGroupItemValue] tgiv with (nolock) on  tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
   LEFT JOIN dbo.[TargetGroupItemInfo] tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID
   LEFT JOIN dbo.[SubChannel] with (nolock) on  SubChannelID = SubChannel.ID
   LEFT JOIN dbo.[SubChannel] InitialSubChannel with (nolock) on tgiv.InitialSubChannelID = InitialSubChannel.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser HUser on  tgiv.HandlerUserID = HUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser TUser on  tgiv.TargetUserID = TUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser HPUser on tgiv.ProposedHandlerUserID = HPUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser TPUser on tgiv.ProposedTargetUserID = TPUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser SUser on tgiv.Supervisor = SUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser IHUser on tgiv.InitialHandlerUserID = IHUser.ID
   LEFT JOIN fullUser ITUser on tgiv.InitialTargetUserID = ITUser.ID
left join fullUser lastPrintSalesMan01 on tgii.Y01PSalesrep = lastPrintSalesMan01.ID
left join fullUser lastPrintSalesMan02 on tgii.Y02PSalesrep = lastPrintSalesMan02.ID
left join fullUser lastInternetSalesMan01 on tgii.Y01OSalesrep = lastInternetSalesMan01.ID
left join fullUser lastInternetSalesMan02 on tgii.Y02OSalesrep = lastInternetSalesMan02.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewTaskInfoAndContractSalesman
named_assets.sql_normalized:
create view [dbo].[ViewTaskInfoAndContractSalesman] as
select vt.*,ContractSalesman = '['+u.SalesCode +'] ' + u.LastName + ' '+ u.FirstName, Channel = ct.Description, CaseID = vt.TaskCaseID
from ViewTaskInfo vt
left outer join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on vt.[CaseContextEntityID] = tgiv.ID and vt.[CaseContextEntityType] = 'TGIV'
left outer join Ticket tic (nolock) on vt.[CaseContextEntityID] = tic.ID  and vt.[CaseContextEntityType] = 'TICKET'
left outer join [Contract] con (nolock) on COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tic.RelatedContractID) = con.ID
left outer join ChannelType ct (nolock) on con.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID
left outer join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID
named_assets.sql_raw:
create view [dbo].[ViewTaskInfoAndContractSalesman] as
select vt.*,ContractSalesman = '['+u.SalesCode +'] ' + u.LastName + ' '+ u.FirstName, Channel = ct.Description, CaseID = vt.TaskCaseID
from ViewTaskInfo vt
left outer join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on vt.[CaseContextEntityID] = tgiv.ID and vt.[CaseContextEntityType] = 'TGIV'
left outer join Ticket tic (nolock) on vt.[CaseContextEntityID] = tic.ID  and vt.[CaseContextEntityType] = 'TICKET'
left outer join [Contract] con (nolock) on COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tic.RelatedContractID) = con.ID
left outer join ChannelType ct (nolock) on con.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID
left outer join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewTaskInfoBasic
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[ViewTaskInfoBasic] AS
SELECT
	TaskID = task.ID
	,TaskStatus = task.[Status]
	,TaskCaseID = task.CaseID 
    ,TaskSenderID = task.SenderID 
	,TaskDynamicCode = task.DynamicCode
	,TaskDynamicDescription = task.DynamicDescription
	,TaskDescription = task.[Description]
	,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn 
    ,TaskActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID 
    ,TaskTypeID = taskType.ID
    ,TaskTypeCode = taskType.Code
    ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType
    ,TaskCaseState = theCase.[State]
    ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID
    ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType 
    ,CaseTypeID = caseType.ID 
    ,TaskCaseTypeCode = caseType.Code 
    ,TaskCaseTypeDescription = caseType.[Description]
    ,CaseTypeContextEntityType = caseType.ContextEntityType    
    ,TaskSenderFirstName = sender.FirstName
    ,TaskSenderLastName = sender.LastName 
FROM Task AS task
INNER JOIN TaskType taskType ON task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID AND 1 <> task.[Status]
INNER JOIN [Case]  theCase ON task.CaseID = theCase.ID
INNER JOIN CaseType  caseType ON theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID AND caseType.[Version] != 3
LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS sender ON task.SenderID = sender.ID
WHERE (	0 = theCase.[State] OR ( 1 = theCase.[State] AND 'N' = taskType.ActivityType )	)
	  AND taskType.ActivityType IN (N'N',N'H')

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewTaskInfoRoleAssigned
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[ViewTaskInfoRoleAssigned] 
AS
SELECT
	TaskID = task.ID
	,TaskStatus = task.[Status]
	,TaskCaseID = task.CaseID 
    ,TaskSenderID = task.SenderID 
	,TaskDynamicCode = task.DynamicCode
	,TaskDynamicDescription = task.DynamicDescription
	,TaskDescription = task.[Description]
	,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn 
    ,TaskActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID 
    ,TaskTypeID = taskType.ID
    ,TaskTypeCode = taskType.Code
    ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType
    ,TaskCaseState = theCase.[State]
    ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID
    ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType 
    ,CaseTypeID = caseType.ID 
    ,TaskCaseTypeCode = caseType.Code 
    ,TaskCaseTypeDescription = caseType.[Description]
    ,CaseTypeContextEntityType = caseType.ContextEntityType    
    ,TaskSenderFirstName = sender.FirstName
    ,TaskSenderLastName = sender.LastName 
	,TaskSenderFullName = sender.LastName + ' ' + sender.FirstName 
    ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName   
    ,RoleID = ta.RoleID
FROM Task AS task
INNER JOIN TaskType taskType ON task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID 
INNER JOIN [Case]  theCase ON task.CaseID = theCase.ID
INNER JOIN CaseType  caseType ON theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID AND caseType.[Version] != 3
LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS sender ON task.SenderID = sender.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS usr ON task.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID
JOIN TaskAssignment ta ON task.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 AND ta.RoleID IS NOT NULL
WHERE 0 = theCase.[State] AND 'H' = taskType.ActivityType AND task.[status] = 0 AND task.ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL

INNER JOIN CaseType  caseType ON theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID AND caseType.[Version] != 3
LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS sender ON task.SenderID = sender.ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS usr ON task.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID
JOIN TaskAssignment ta ON task.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 AND ta.RoleID IS NOT NULL
WHERE 0 = theCase.[State] AND 'H' = taskType.ActivityType AND task.[status] = 0 AND task.ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL

named_assets.name: dbo.ViewTaskListForDialer
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewTaskListForDialer                                  */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewTaskListForDialer as
select 
	BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID
	,CustomerCode = tgi.Code
	,CustomerName = tgi.CustomerName
	,LossPrintedNew = tgiv.LossPrintedNew
	,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate
	,EndDate = tgiv.EndDate
	,MasterHeading = tgi.MainHeadingName
	,TaskID = t.ID
	,TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID
	,TaskCreatedOn = t.CreatedOn
	,SourceTaskID = t.ID
	,TaskDescription = t.[Description]
	,TaskTypeId = t.TaskTypeID
	,CampaignID = camp.ID
	,CampStartedOn = camp.StartedOn
	,CampClosedOn = camp.ClosedOn
	,ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID
	,Brandname = tgi.Brandname
	,Prefecture = tgi.Prefecture
	,Municipality = tgi.Municipality
	,City = tgi.City
	,StreetName = tgi.StreetName
	,StreetNumber = tgi.StreetNumber
	,NumberExtension = tgi.NumberExtension
	,ZipCode = tgi.ZipCode
	,Phone = tgi.Phone
	,CustomerProfession = tgi.CustomerProfession
	,LastSignedDate = tgiv.LastSignedDate
	,ReliabilityStatus = tgi.ReliabilityStatus
	,SubchannelID = tgiv.SubChannelID

from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv
join TargetGroupItem tgi on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID 
--and tgi.CampaignID = 40 
join Campaign camp on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID and camp.State = 2
join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' 
join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID 
--and t.ActualOwnerID = 891 
and t.TaskTypeID = 151 and t.Status = 0
where 
--camp.StartedOn <= @currDate and camp.ClosedOn >= @currDate 
c.State = 0

	SnapshotFile = CAST(SnapshotPath AS NVARCHAR(3500))

	join BusinessPoint bp on h.CustomerCode = bp.Code

named_assets.name: dbo.vw_LOCACities
named_assets.sql_normalized:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_LOCACities]
AS


 select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	  join  itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 on mlc1.pref = mlc2.pref and mlc1.flag = 'I'
	 where mlc1.LocId <> mlc2.LocId--a.GeoModelGC_Type = 'L' and bp.code = 10001
	 

union

----------LOCA Type2  -- Mainland plus Εύβοια, Κρήτη (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 60Km)

   select  distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city  collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 60 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag='M'


union

----------LOCA Type 3 -- Αττική (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 6Km)

  select  distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' 
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 6 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag = 'A'

----------LOCA Type 4 -- Θεσσαλονίκη


union

  select   distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 10 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag = 'T'

named_assets.name: dbo.vw_RelatedBpBranches
named_assets.sql_normalized:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_RelatedBpBranches]
AS



SELECT 
bp.code AS id,
tbp.Code +','+ CAST(2 AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
tbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+tbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id --and pr.Type in (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint tbp ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = tbp.id AND pr.Type IN (2,4)
WHERE bp.isactive = 1 AND tbp.isactive =1
--and bp.code = 123456
  
UNION

--Επιστρέφει όλα τα related bps της έδρας ενός υποκαταστήματος εκτός της έδρας 
SELECT  bp.code,--sbp.code,--related_bp.code,--,
related_bp.code +','+ CAST(all_pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
related_bp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+related_bp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN all_pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship all_pr ON sbp.id = all_pr.BusinessPointID AND all_pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint related_bp ON related_bp.id = all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID <> bp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 AND related_bp.IsActive = 1
--and bp.code = 123456

 --Επιστρέφει την έδρα ενός υποκαταστήματος

UNION 

SELECT  
bp.code,--related_bp.code,--sbp.code,
sbp.code +','+ CAST(pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
sbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+sbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 
   --and bp.code = 123456
named_assets.sql_raw:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_RelatedBpBranches]
AS



SELECT 
bp.code AS id,
tbp.Code +','+ CAST(2 AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
tbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+tbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id --and pr.Type in (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint tbp ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = tbp.id AND pr.Type IN (2,4)
WHERE bp.isactive = 1 AND tbp.isactive =1
--and bp.code = 123456
  
UNION

--Επιστρέφει όλα τα related bps της έδρας ενός υποκαταστήματος εκτός της έδρας 
SELECT  bp.code,--sbp.code,--related_bp.code,--,
related_bp.code +','+ CAST(all_pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
related_bp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+related_bp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN all_pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship all_pr ON sbp.id = all_pr.BusinessPointID AND all_pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint related_bp ON related_bp.id = all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID <> bp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 AND related_bp.IsActive = 1
--and bp.code = 123456

 --Επιστρέφει την έδρα ενός υποκαταστήματος

UNION 

SELECT  
bp.code,--related_bp.code,--sbp.code,
sbp.code +','+ CAST(pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
sbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+sbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 
   --and bp.code = 123456

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_TopPriorityCities]
AS


SELECT DISTINCT mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc1.LocId as value
		   , mlc1.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc1.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc1.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
FROM itapps.loca.cities mlc1
WHERE LocId not in  ('L1','L2')--pref <> 'E1' AND pref <> 'E3'
