named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToCollectionDocuments
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[YPSToCollectionDocuments] AS (
SELECT --cd.id,reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))
cd.ID as ID, /*2024-03-29*/
cd.ContractID,
co.MainCustomerCode as MainCustomerCode,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(cd.Filename,1,30)<>'\\headquarters.gr\archivedyps\' THEN '\\junco12\YPSDATA\Contract\'+Filename ELSE cd.Filename END AS ContractDocument,
CASE WHEN ins.rnk=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsDefault ,
--cd.CreatedOn,
--Extension = REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('.', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))))),
--[File] = REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) + 1, LEN(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) - CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))))),
DocumentName = CASE WHEN charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) > 1 THEN
Case WHEN CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) > 0 THEN REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))) + 1, LEN(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))) - CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))))) +
 REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('.', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))))))
ELSE reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)) END

ELSE
Filename
END,
DocumentType = 
CASE cd.ContractDocumentType
WHEN 1 THEN 'Contract'
WHEN 2 THEN 'Maketa'
WHEN 3 THEN 'Outbound'
WHEN 4 THEN 'OtherDocuments'
WHEN 5 THEN 'MaketaProject'
WHEN 6 THEN 'Logo'
WHEN 7 THEN 'LogoProject'
WHEN 8 THEN 'Informational'
WHEN 9 THEN 'Inbound'
WHEN 10 THEN 'InformationalProject'
WHEN 11 THEN 'Cancelation'
WHEN 12 THEN 'WebImageReport'
WHEN 13 THEN 'VideoProject'
WHEN 14 THEN 'AnimationProject'
WHEN 15 THEN 'GoldenNumberProject'
ELSE ''
END, 
--ταξινόμηση ανά σύμβαση με την πιο πρόσφατη πάνω πάνω και ύστερα ανά ημερομηνία δημιουργίας του εγγράφου με το πιο πρόσφατο πάνω πάνω
OrderNum = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY co.MainCustomerCode ORDER BY cd.ContractID DESC, cd.CreatedOn desc) /*DEV-20327 2025*-06-04*/
FROM YPS.dbo.ContractDocument cd 
join cardinal12.[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToCollectionContracts co on co.ContractCode = cast(cd.ContractID as nvarchar(50))
--join YPSSTAGE.dbo.Contract ct on ct.id = cd.ContractID
--join YPSSTAGE.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,ContractID,CreatedOn,ContractDocumentType,RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY ContractID  ORDER BY createdon DESC,id DESC) AS rnk 
FROM YPS.dbo.ContractDocument  WHERE ContractDocumentType=1
)ins ON ins.ID=cd.id

             
)

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[YPSToCollectionDocuments] AS (
SELECT --cd.id,reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))
cd.ID as ID, /*2024-03-29*/
cd.ContractID,
co.MainCustomerCode as MainCustomerCode,
CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(cd.Filename,1,30)<>'\\headquarters.gr\archivedyps\' THEN '\\junco12\YPSDATA\Contract\'+Filename ELSE cd.Filename END AS ContractDocument,
CASE WHEN ins.rnk=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsDefault ,
--cd.CreatedOn,
--Extension = REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('.', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))))),
--[File] = REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) + 1, LEN(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) - CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))))),
DocumentName = CASE WHEN charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) > 1 THEN
Case WHEN CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) > 0 THEN REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))) + 1, LEN(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))) - CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))))) +
 REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('.', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))))))
ELSE reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)) END

ELSE
Filename
END,
DocumentType = 
CASE cd.ContractDocumentType
WHEN 1 THEN 'Contract'
WHEN 2 THEN 'Maketa'
WHEN 3 THEN 'Outbound'
WHEN 4 THEN 'OtherDocuments'
WHEN 5 THEN 'MaketaProject'
WHEN 6 THEN 'Logo'
WHEN 7 THEN 'LogoProject'
WHEN 8 THEN 'Informational'
WHEN 9 THEN 'Inbound'
WHEN 10 THEN 'InformationalProject'
WHEN 11 THEN 'Cancelation'
WHEN 12 THEN 'WebImageReport'
WHEN 13 THEN 'VideoProject'
WHEN 14 THEN 'AnimationProject'
WHEN 15 THEN 'GoldenNumberProject'
ELSE ''
END, 
--ταξινόμηση ανά σύμβαση με την πιο πρόσφατη πάνω πάνω και ύστερα ανά ημερομηνία δημιουργίας του εγγράφου με το πιο πρόσφατο πάνω πάνω
OrderNum = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY co.MainCustomerCode ORDER BY cd.ContractID DESC, cd.CreatedOn desc) /*DEV-20327 2025*-06-04*/
FROM YPS.dbo.ContractDocument cd 
join cardinal12.[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToCollectionContracts co on co.ContractCode = cast(cd.ContractID as nvarchar(50))
--join YPSSTAGE.dbo.Contract ct on ct.id = cd.ContractID
--join YPSSTAGE.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,ContractID,CreatedOn,ContractDocumentType,RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY ContractID  ORDER BY createdon DESC,id DESC) AS rnk 
FROM YPS.dbo.ContractDocument  WHERE ContractDocumentType=1
)ins ON ins.ID=cd.id

             
)

named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: YPSToEBSAdvertisementChannels                          */
/*==============================================================*/
create view YPSToEBSAdvertisementChannels as
SELECT  MV.ID,
		MV.Code,
		MV.Name,
		MV.ModifiedOn AS LastModificationDate,
		M.Code AS MediumCode, 
		M.Name AS MediumName,
		M.IsActive as MediumIsActive,
		MT.Description as Category,
		MV.IsActive
  FROM  MediumVersion AS MV
  INNER JOIN Medium AS M ON MV.MediumID = M.ID
  INNER JOIN MediumType AS MT ON M.MediumTypeID = MT.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToEBSPostChecks
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: YPSToEBSPostChecks                                     */
/*==============================================================*/
CREATE view [dbo].[YPSToEBSPostChecks] as
 WITH    Table7
          AS (  
          SELECT   cl.ContractID,
                        cl.AdvertisementID,
                        cl.ParentAdvertisementID,
                        cl.AlteredAmount AS BufferValue,
                        --adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue,
                        --Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end AS SourceValue
                        adv.AlteredAmount AS SourceValue
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
                        JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cl.AdvertisementID = adv.ID
                        JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID
               WHERE cp.State IN (3,4)
                 and cl.AlteredAmount <> adv.AlteredAmount	
               --cl.NetAmount <> Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end
               --WHERE	cl.NetAmount <> adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount 
               UNION
               SELECT   cl.ContractID,
                        cl.AdvertisementID,
                        cl.ParentAdvertisementID,
                        cl.NetAmount AS BufferValue,
                        --adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue,
                       -- Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end AS SourceValue
                        adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
                        JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cl.AdvertisementID = adv.ID
                        JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID
               WHERE	cl.NetAmount <> adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount
               --cl.NetAmount <> Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end
               
               
               
               )
--, Table8 as
--(           SELECT DISTINCT
--                        AdvertisementID ,
--                        ParentAdvertisementID
--               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
--                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
--               WHERE    cl.StartDate >= DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -3, DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, 0, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, GETDATE())) + 1, 0))
--                        AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'    
--)             
,Table9 as
(SELECT DISTINCT
                        AdvertisementID ,
                        ParentAdvertisementID
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
               WHERE    cl.FirstInvoiceDate > = DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -3, DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, 0, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, GETDATE())) + 1, 0))
                        AND ct.Status = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table10 as            
(SELECT DISTINCT
                        AdvertisementID ,
                        ParentAdvertisementID
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
               WHERE    cl.InstallmentSequence = 0 
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table11 as                
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InvoiceQuantity = 0
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table12 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentsPerInvoice = 0
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table13 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentSequence <>1
                                 AND PaymentChannel = 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ'
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table14 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentSequence > 2                                 
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table15 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentSequence <> 2
                                 AND PaymentChannel = 'ΟΤΕ'
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
 
,Table16 as 
(SELECT DISTINCT  c.id as contractid
				FROM    dbo.Contract c 
				JOIN    dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID=c.id
				JOIN    dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID 
				JOIN    dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
				WHERE   c.MigratedCode IS NULL 
				AND   pmt.Description = 'TOTAL_BILLED'
				union 
				SELECT DISTINCT  c.id as contractid
				FROM    dbo.Contract c 
				JOIN    dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.ID=c.id
				JOIN    dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
				WHERE   c.MigratedCode IS NULL 
				AND   pmt.Description = 'TOTAL_BILLED'
             )   
  ,Table17 AS (SELECT ict.id as contractid
			     FROM dbo.Contract ict 
			     JOIN dbo.ContractProduct icp ON ict.ID = icp.RelatedContractID
			     JOIN dbo.Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID
			    WHERE  icp.[state] IN (1,2)
			      AND ia.qa = 1 
			   )    
			                    
select ErrorType = 1
		,ErrorDescr = 'Πελάτες – Λάθος Φορολογικά Στοιχεία'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSCustomerData'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
		SELECT  * FROM    dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData cust
		WHERE  not (KEPYOStatus IS not NULL 
				and VATStatus IS not NULL 
				and GLSeqCode IS not NULL   
				and ( not (TaxRegistrationNumber IS NULL AND GLSeqCode <> 2 and VATStatus<>2 ) ) )
		FOR XML RAW ) )
union all 
select 	ErrorType = 2
		,ErrorDescr = 'Πελάτες – Χωρίς Γραμμή Διεύθυνσης'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSCustomerData'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
SELECT  *
FROM    dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData cd
WHERE   NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                     FROM   dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerAddress ca
                     WHERE  cd.Code = ca.CustomerCode )
				FOR XML RAW ) )
union all 
select 	ErrorType =  3
		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Έλλειψη Πελάτη'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
	SELECT  *
FROM    dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
WHERE   NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                     FROM   dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData cd
                     WHERE  ct.MainCustomerBillingCode = cd.Code )
				FOR XML RAW ) )
union all 
select ErrorType = 4
		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Έλλειψη Διεύθυνσης Πελάτη'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
SELECT  *
FROM    dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
WHERE   NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                     FROM   dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerAddress ca
                     WHERE  ct.CustomerBillingCode = ca.CustomerCode )
				FOR XML RAW ) )

union all 
select ErrorType = 5
		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Αντιστροφή Κωδ. Πελάτη'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
SELECT  ct.*
FROM    dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData ca ON ct.CustomerBillingCode = ca.Code
                                            AND ct.MainCustomerBillingCode <> ca.Code
				FOR XML RAW ) )
union all 
select	ErrorType = 6
		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Advertisements Χωρίς Parent Γραμμές'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
	SELECT  *
FROM    dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines a
WHERE   ParentAdvertisementID IS NOT NULL
        AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1
                         FROM   dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines b
                         WHERE  a.ParentAdvertisementID = b.AdvertisementID )
				FOR XML RAW ) )
union all 
select 	ErrorType = 7
		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Διαφορά Αξίας'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
	select * 	from (	
	SELECT cl.*	FROM  dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
        JOIN Table7 dc ON cl.AdvertisementID = dc.AdvertisementID
    union     
    SELECT cl.*	FROM  dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
        JOIN Table7 dc ON  cl.AdvertisementID = dc.ParentAdvertisementID ) a
				FOR XML RAW ) )
--union all 
--select	ErrorType = 8
--		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Λάθος Ημ. Έναρξης'
--		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContractLines'		
--		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
--	select * 	from (	
--	SELECT cl.*	FROM  dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
--        JOIN Table8 dc ON cl.AdvertisementID = dc.AdvertisementID
--    union     
--    SELECT cl.*	FROM  dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
--        JOIN Table8 dc ON  cl.AdvertisementID = dc.ParentAdvertisementID ) a
--				FOR XML RAW ) )
union all 
select	ErrorType = 9
		,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια  Λάθος Ημ. Τιμολόγησης'
		,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts'		
		,EntityData = convert(xml, (
	select * 	from (	
	SELECT cl.*	FROM  dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
        JOIN Table9 dc ON cl.AdvertisementID = dc.AdvertisementID
    union

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: YPSToEBSPostChecks                                     */
/*==============================================================*/
CREATE view [dbo].[YPSToEBSPostChecks] as
 WITH    Table7
          AS (  
          SELECT   cl.ContractID,
                        cl.AdvertisementID,
                        cl.ParentAdvertisementID,
                        cl.AlteredAmount AS BufferValue,
                        --adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue,
                        --Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end AS SourceValue
                        adv.AlteredAmount AS SourceValue
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
                        JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cl.AdvertisementID = adv.ID
                        JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID
               WHERE cp.State IN (3,4)
                 and cl.AlteredAmount <> adv.AlteredAmount	
               --cl.NetAmount <> Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end
               --WHERE	cl.NetAmount <> adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount 
               UNION
               SELECT   cl.ContractID,
                        cl.AdvertisementID,
                        cl.ParentAdvertisementID,
                        cl.NetAmount AS BufferValue,
                        --adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue,
                       -- Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end AS SourceValue
                        adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl
                        JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cl.AdvertisementID = adv.ID
                        JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID
               WHERE	cl.NetAmount <> adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount
               --cl.NetAmount <> Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end
               
               
               
               )
--, Table8 as
--(           SELECT DISTINCT
--                        AdvertisementID ,
--                        ParentAdvertisementID
--               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
--                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
--               WHERE    cl.StartDate >= DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -3, DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, 0, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, GETDATE())) + 1, 0))
--                        AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'    
--)             
,Table9 as
(SELECT DISTINCT
                        AdvertisementID ,
                        ParentAdvertisementID
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
               WHERE    cl.FirstInvoiceDate > = DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -3, DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, 0, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, GETDATE())) + 1, 0))
                        AND ct.Status = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table10 as            
(SELECT DISTINCT
                        AdvertisementID ,
                        ParentAdvertisementID
               FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
               WHERE    cl.InstallmentSequence = 0 
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table11 as                
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InvoiceQuantity = 0
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table12 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentsPerInvoice = 0
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table13 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentSequence <>1
                                 AND PaymentChannel = 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ'
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table14 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentSequence > 2                                 
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
,Table15 as   
(select AdvertisementID,
						ParentAdvertisementID
				FROM     dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct
                        JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID
				where  InstallmentSequence <> 2
                                 AND PaymentChannel = 'ΟΤΕ'
                         AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ'
             )
 
,Table16 as 
(SELECT DISTINCT  c.id as contractid
				FROM    dbo.Contract c 
				JOIN    dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID=c.id
				JOIN    dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID 
				JOIN    dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
				WHERE   c.MigratedCode IS NULL 
				AND   pmt.Description = 'TOTAL_BILLED'
				union 
				SELECT DISTINCT  c.id as contractid
				FROM    dbo.Contract c 
				JOIN    dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.ID=c.id
				JOIN    dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID
				WHERE   c.MigratedCode IS NULL 
				AND   pmt.Description = 'TOTAL_BILLED'
             )   
  ,Table17 AS (SELECT ict.id as contractid
			     FROM dbo.Contract ict 
			     JOIN dbo.ContractProduct icp ON ict.ID = icp.RelatedContractID
			     JOIN dbo.Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID
			    WHERE  icp.[state] IN (1,2)
			      AND ia.qa = 1 
			   )

AS
SELECT [SystemReceiptID]
      ,[MainCustomerCode]
      ,[CustomerCode]
      ,[BlockSeries]
      ,[BlockReceiptNumber]
      ,[CreatedOn]
      ,[SalesManCode]
      ,[CollectorCode]
      ,[ContractID]
      ,[PaymentChannel]
      ,CreaditCardTransactionID = [TransactionID]
      ,[CreditCardTypeID]
      ,[CreditCardNumber]
      ,[CreditCardEndDate]
      ,[CreditCardOwner]
      ,[CreditCardInstallments]
      ,[CheckNumber]
      ,[BankID]
      ,[CheckPublishDate]
      ,[CheckExpirationDate]
      ,[CheckPublisher]
      ,[CheckTaxCode]
      ,[Amount]
      ,[IsPayoff]
      ,[IsSamePublisher]
      ,[Status]
      ,[ModifiedOn]
      ,BankDepositNumber
      ,BankDepositDate
      ,CompanyId
      ,CollectionDate
  FROM [dbo].[ERPSalesCollectionBridgeBuffer]

named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToEBSServices
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: YPSToEBSServices                                       */
/*==============================================================*/
CREATE view [dbo].[YPSToEBSServices] as
SELECT ID,
       Code,
       Name,
	   case IsDeleted when 1 then 0 else 1 end as IsActive,
       IsComposite as IsBundle,
	   case Characterization when 1 then 'ΥΠΗΡΕΣΙΑ PRINT'
							 when 2 then 'ΥΠΗΡΕΣΙΑ ONLINE'
							 when 3 then 'BUNDLE MORE PRINT'
							 when 4 then 'BUNDLE MORE ONLINE'
						     when 5 then 'BUNDLE CORE'
						else null end as Category,
       ModifiedOn as LastModificationDate
  FROM Udac u
  WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM dbo.Udac u1 WHERE u.Code = u1.Code)

HEADQUARTERS\spitsaris.ViewPrefectureBPDtls
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPrefectureBPDtls                                   */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPrefectureBPDtls as
SELECT ActiveFlag = a.IsActive,
		BusinessPointID = a.ID,
        BusinessPointCode = a.Code,
		BusinessPointName = a.Name,
		IsPOI = a.IsPOI,
		CustomerSourceID =  a.CustomerSourceID,
		CustomerSourceDesc = b.Description, 
		ActivityClassifierNodeID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID,
		ActivityName = c.Name, 
		AreaName = x.AreaName
		
FROM BusinessPoint a
LEFT OUTER JOIN CustomerSource b ON (b.ID = a.CustomerSourceID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN ClassifierNode c ON (c.ID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT d.AddressID,e.AreaName
				 FROM BroaderArea d, BroaderAreaLookUp e
				 WHERE d.BroaderAreaID = e.BroaderAreaID
				   AND d.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'
                   AND isnull(e.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0
			  		  GROUP BY d.AddressID,e.AreaName) x ON (x.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID)

LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT d.AddressID,e.AreaName

				 WHERE d.BroaderAreaID = e.BroaderAreaID
				   AND d.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'

named_assets.name: HEADQUARTERS\spitsaris.ViewPrefectureBPs
named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: ViewPrefectureBPs                                      */
/*==============================================================*/
create view ViewPrefectureBPs as
  SELECT 
  		ActiveFlag = a.IsActive,
  		AreaID = b.BroaderAreaID,
  		AreaName = c.AreaName, 
  		BPcount = count(*)
        
  FROM BusinessPoint a, 
        BroaderArea b, 
        BroaderAreaLookUp c
  WHERE a.LocationAddressID = b.AddressID
    AND b.BroaderAreaID = c.BroaderAreaID
    AND b.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%'
    AND isnull(c.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0
    GROUP BY a.IsActive,b.BroaderAreaID, c.AreaName

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[ActiveCampaignSalesmanInsert] 
(
	@CampaignID							int
)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @currentDate datetime = getdate(), 
			@currYear nvarchar(20) = cast(year(getdate()) as nvarchar(20)), 
			@cdate nvarchar(10) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), getdate(), 101)
    declare @msg nvarchar(200)
	declare @ProcessID nvarchar(50);
	declare @BatchID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER;
	IF @BatchID IS NULL SELECT @BatchID = newid() 
	SET @ProcessID = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), @BatchID);
	BEGIN Try
		SET @msg = 'ActiveCampaignSalesmanInsert - START campaignID = ' + cast(@CampaignID as nvarchar(20));
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		begin tran
			delete a
			from [dbo].[ActiveCampaignSalesman] a
			join Campaign cam (nolock) on a.campaignid = cam.ID
			where cam.ID = @CampaignID
		commit

		begin tran

			-- managers -39,41,42
			insert into ActiveCampaignSalesman (CampaignID, SalesmanID, CreatedOn)
			select camsal.CampaignID, camsal.SalesmanID, @cdate as CreatedOn
			from (
					select distinct campaignID, MangerID as SalesmanID
					from CampaignScoreReport (nolock)	
			) camsal
			join Campaign cam (nolock) on camsal.CampaignID = cam.ID and cam.Code <> @currYear
			join UserRole ur (nolock) on camsal.SalesmanID = ur.UserID
			where ur.RoleID in (39,41,42) and cam.state in (2,3) and cam.ID = @CampaignID
			--and not exists (select null from ActiveCampaignSalesman a where a.campaignID = camsal.CampaignID and a.SalesmanID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			 and exists (
				select null
				from ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign x
				where x.CampaignID = camsal.CampaignID 
				--and (x.CampaignStartedOn <= @currentDate and x.CampaignClosedOn >= @currentDate
				--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskEditorState > 0 and x.TaskTypeId in (146,151)
				--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151))
				 and x.ActualOwnerID != 0 and x.ActualOwnerID is not null
				 and (x.CampaignState = 2 or x.CampaignState = 3 and (x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151) or x.TaskTypeId in (146,151) and x.TaskEditorState > 0))
			 ) 

			-- supervisors - 43,44
			insert into ActiveCampaignSalesman (CampaignID, SalesmanID, CreatedOn)
			select camsal.CampaignID, camsal.SalesmanID, @cdate as CreatedOn
			from CampaignSalesman camsal (nolock)
			join Campaign cam (nolock) on camsal.CampaignID = cam.ID and cam.Code <> @currYear
			join UserRole ur (nolock) on camsal.SalesmanID = ur.UserID
			where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and cam.state in (2,3) and cam.ID = @CampaignID and not exists (select null from ActiveCampaignSalesman a (nolock) where a.campaignID = camsal.CampaignID and a.SalesmanID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			and exists (
				select null
				from ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign x
				where x.CampaignID = camsal.CampaignID 
				--and (x.CampaignStartedOn <= @currentDate and x.CampaignClosedOn >= @currentDate
				--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskEditorState > 0 and x.TaskTypeId in (146,151)
				--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151)) 
				and x.IsReleased = 1 and (x.Supervisor = camsal.SalesmanID or x.ActualOwnerID = camsal.SalesmanID)
				and (x.CampaignState = 2 or x.CampaignState = 3 and (x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151) or x.TaskTypeId in (146,151) and x.TaskEditorState > 0))
			)


			-- sds --
			insert into ActiveCampaignSalesman (CampaignID, SalesmanID, CreatedOn)
			select camsal.CampaignID, camsal.SalesmanID, @cdate as CreatedOn
			from CampaignSalesman camsal (nolock)
			join Campaign cam (nolock) on camsal.CampaignID = cam.ID and cam.Code <> @currYear
			join UserRole ur (nolock) on camsal.SalesmanID = ur.UserID
			where ur.RoleID in (1,47) and cam.state in (2,3) and cam.ID = @CampaignID 
			and not exists (select null from ActiveCampaignSalesman a (nolock) where a.campaignID = camsal.CampaignID and a.SalesmanID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			and exists (
				select null
				from ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign x
				where x.CampaignID = camsal.CampaignID 
				--and (x.CampaignStartedOn <= @currentDate and x.CampaignClosedOn >= @currentDate
				--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskEditorState > 0 and x.TaskTypeId in (146,151)
				--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151)) 
				 and x.ActualOwnerID = camsal.SalesmanID and x.IsReleased = 1  
				 and (x.CampaignState = 2 or x.CampaignState = 3 and (x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151) or x.TaskTypeId in (146,151) and x.TaskEditorState > 0))
			 )

		commit
		SET @msg = 'ActiveCampaignSalesmanInsert - END'
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
	END Try	
	BEGIN CATCH
		DECLARE @errMessage NVARCHAR(512)		    
		DECLARE @ErrorSeverity INT = ERROR_SEVERITY();
		DECLARE @ErrorState INT= ERROR_STATE();
		DECLARE @error_message NVARCHAR(100) = ERROR_MESSAGE()
		select @errMessage = 'Failure ActiveCampaignSalesmanInsert: Error Message: ' +  @error_message +
						' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
						' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
						' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
						' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())
		EXEC usp_timelogger @errMessage , @ProcessID
		RAISERROR (@error_message,@ErrorSeverity,@ErrorState);
		return -1;
	END CATCH;	
END

			join UserRole ur (nolock) on camsal.SalesmanID = ur.UserID
			where ur.RoleID in (39,41,42) and cam.state in (2,3)
			--and not exists (select null from ActiveCampaignSalesman a where a.campaignID = camsal.CampaignID and a.SalesmanID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			 and exists (
			select null
			from ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign x
			where x.CampaignID = camsal.CampaignID 
			--and (x.CampaignStartedOn <= @currentDate and x.CampaignClosedOn >= @currentDate
			--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskEditorState > 0 and x.TaskTypeId in (146,151)
			--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151))
			 and x.ActualOwnerID != 0 and x.ActualOwnerID is not null
			 and (x.CampaignState = 2 or x.CampaignState = 3 and (x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151) or x.TaskTypeId in (146,151) and x.TaskEditorState > 0))
			 ) 

			-- supervisors - 43,44
			insert into ActiveCampaignSalesman (CampaignID, SalesmanID, CreatedOn)
			select camsal.CampaignID, camsal.SalesmanID, @cdate as CreatedOn
			from CampaignSalesman camsal (nolock)
			join Campaign cam (nolock) on camsal.CampaignID = cam.ID and cam.Code <> @currYear
			join UserRole ur (nolock) on camsal.SalesmanID = ur.UserID
			where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and cam.state in (2,3) and not exists (select null from ActiveCampaignSalesman a (nolock) where a.campaignID = camsal.CampaignID and a.SalesmanID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			and exists (
			select null
			from ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign x
			where x.CampaignID = camsal.CampaignID 
			--and (x.CampaignStartedOn <= @currentDate and x.CampaignClosedOn >= @currentDate
			--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskEditorState > 0 and x.TaskTypeId in (146,151)
			--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151)) 
			and x.IsReleased = 1 and (x.Supervisor = camsal.SalesmanID or x.ActualOwnerID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			and (x.CampaignState = 2 or x.CampaignState = 3 and (x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151) or x.TaskTypeId in (146,151) and x.TaskEditorState > 0))
			)


			-- sds --
			insert into ActiveCampaignSalesman (CampaignID, SalesmanID, CreatedOn)
			select camsal.CampaignID, camsal.SalesmanID, @cdate as CreatedOn
			from CampaignSalesman camsal (nolock)
			join Campaign cam (nolock) on camsal.CampaignID = cam.ID and cam.Code <> @currYear
			join UserRole ur (nolock) on camsal.SalesmanID = ur.UserID
			where ur.RoleID in (1,47) and cam.state in (2,3)
			and not exists (select null from ActiveCampaignSalesman a (nolock) where a.campaignID = camsal.CampaignID and a.SalesmanID = camsal.SalesmanID)
			and exists (
			select null
			from ViewSalesMarketActiveCampaign x
			where x.CampaignID = camsal.CampaignID 
			--and (x.CampaignStartedOn <= @currentDate and x.CampaignClosedOn >= @currentDate
			--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskEditorState > 0 and x.TaskTypeId in (146,151)
			--or x.CampaignClosedOn < @currentDate and x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151)) 
			 and x.ActualOwnerID = camsal.SalesmanID and x.IsReleased = 1  
			 and (x.CampaignState = 2 or x.CampaignState = 3 and (x.TaskTypeId not in (146,151) or x.TaskTypeId in (146,151) and x.TaskEditorState > 0))
			 )

		commit
		SET @msg = 'ActiveCampaignSalesmanInsertEOD - END'
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
	END Try	
	BEGIN CATCH
		DECLARE @errMessage NVARCHAR(512)		    
		DECLARE @ErrorSeverity INT = ERROR_SEVERITY();
		DECLARE @ErrorState INT= ERROR_STATE();
		DECLARE @error_message NVARCHAR(100) = ERROR_MESSAGE()
		select @errMessage = 'Failure ActiveCampaignSalesmanInsertEOD: Error Message: ' +  @error_message +
						' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
						' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
						' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
						' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())
		EXEC usp_timelogger @errMessage , @ProcessID
		RAISERROR (@error_message,@ErrorSeverity,@ErrorState);
		return -1;
	END CATCH;	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Activation]
	(@processID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @serviceDate datetime, @processDescr varchar(100), @processIDAsString nvarchar(40),  @BatchActionType int
	declare @errMessage nvarchar(512), @rowCount int
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_Activation' 
	select @serviceDate = DATEADD(dd, 0, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, getdate()))
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'---Έναρξη: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
	
	BEGIN TRANSACTION
		BEGIN TRY
			declare @activationAdvIDs ActivationValues
			
			-- customersInLawer
			--Commented by kskarmoutsos 2017/02/23 - 14:18:45
			/*
			INSERT INTO @activationAdvIDs (AdvID, Category)
			select adv.ID, 1
			from Advertisement adv
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			left join [CARDINAL12].[CTCollect_XO].[dbo].CollectionToYPSCustomersInLawer v (nolock) on v.CustomerCode = bp.Code
			where adv.DeactivationDate is not null
			and adv.DeactivationReason = 3 -- XOgrWithCustomerStatus
			and v.CustomerCode is null
			and adv.AdvEndDate > @serviceDate
			*/
		    
			-- EBSToYPSInvoicePayment χωρίς γραμμή για το Contract
			INSERT INTO @activationAdvIDs (AdvID, Category)
			select adv.ID, 2
			from Advertisement adv
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			left join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToYPSInvoicePayment v (nolock) on v.ContractCode = CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20))
			where adv.DeactivationDate is not null
			and adv.DeactivationReason in (1,2)
			and v.ContractCode is null
			and adv.AdvEndDate > @serviceDate
			and not exists (select null from @activationAdvIDs as tmp where tmp.AdvID = adv.ID)
		    
			-- EBSToYPSInvoicePayment & Website
			INSERT INTO @activationAdvIDs (AdvID, Category)
			select adv.ID, 3
			from Advertisement adv
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			left join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToYPSInvoicePayment v (nolock) on v.ContractCode = CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20))
				--and DATEADD(dd,60,v.InvoicePaymentDate) > @serviceDate
			where adv.DeactivationDate is not null
			and adv.DeactivationReason = 1 -- WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate
			and adv.AdvEndDate > @serviceDate
			and (v.ContractCode is null or DATEADD(dd,60,v.InvoicePaymentDate) > @serviceDate)
			and not exists (select null from @activationAdvIDs as tmp where tmp.AdvID = adv.ID)
		    
			-- EBSToYPSInvoicePayment & Google Adwords/Yandex/SEO
			INSERT INTO @activationAdvIDs (AdvID, Category)
			select adv.ID, 4
			from Advertisement adv
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			left outer join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToYPSInvoicePayment v (nolock) on v.ContractCode = CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20))
				--and DATEADD(dd,15,v.InvoicePaymentDate) > @serviceDate
			where adv.DeactivationDate is not null
			and adv.DeactivationReason = 2 -- GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate
			and adv.AdvEndDate > @serviceDate
			and (v.ContractCode is null or DATEADD(dd,15,v.InvoicePaymentDate) > @serviceDate)
			and not exists (select null from @activationAdvIDs as tmp where tmp.AdvID = adv.ID)
		   
			UPDATE adv
				set DeactivationDate = null, DeactivationReason = null
			from Advertisement adv
			join @activationAdvIDs tmp on adv.ID = tmp.AdvID
			
			declare @inLawerCount int
			select @inLawerCount = count(*) from @activationAdvIDs where Category = 1
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@inLawerCount,1,0, 'Ενημέρωση προβολών χωρίς γραμμή για το Ε.Σ.'
		    		    
			declare @notFoundCount int
			select @notFoundCount = count(*) from @activationAdvIDs where Category = 2
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			SELECT @processID,@BatchActionType,GETDATE(),@notFoundCount,1,0, 'Ενημέρωση προβολών χωρίς γραμμή για το Contract'
			
			DECLARE @websiteCount INT
			SELECT @websiteCount = COUNT(*) FROM @activationAdvIDs WHERE Category = 3
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			SELECT @processID,@BatchActionType,GETDATE(),@websiteCount,1,0, 'Ενημέρωση προβολών για websites'
			
			DECLARE @otherCount INT
			SELECT @otherCount = COUNT(*) FROM @activationAdvIDs WHERE Category = 4
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			SELECT @processID,@BatchActionType,GETDATE(),@otherCount,1,0, 'Ενημέρωση προβολών για Gads,Yandex,SEO'
			
			-- Just for checking
			DECLARE @advIDsCount INT
			SELECT @advIDsCount = COUNT(*) FROM @activationAdvIDs
			
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			SELECT @processID,@BatchActionType,GETDATE(),@advIDsCount,1,0,'Advertisement_Activation advIDs: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),@advIDsCount)
			
			/* START PROCEDURE FOR OPEN-CLOSED TASKS */
			EXEC Advertisement_Auto_ActivationTasks @activationAdvIDs, @processID
			
			SELECT @rowCount = @inLawerCount + @notFoundCount + @websiteCount + @otherCount
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			SELECT @processID,@BatchActionType,GETDATE(),@rowCount,1,0,'---Ολοκλήρωση: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
			
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SELECT @errMessage = 'Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
			' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
			' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
			' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
			' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())			
		
			IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
				ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;
			
		END CATCH
			
		IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
			COMMIT TRANSACTION;
			
		IF @errMessage IS NOT NULL
		BEGIN	
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			SELECT @ProcessID,@BatchActionType,GETDATE(),0,0,0,@errMessage		
		END
END

named_assets.name: dbo.Advertisement_Auto_ActivationTasks

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Auto_ActivationTasks]
	(@advIDs ActivationValues readonly, @mainProcessID uniqueidentifier)
AS
BEGIN
	
	declare @BatchActionType int, @mainProcessIDAsString nvarchar(50), @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100) 
	declare @initiatorID int, @errMessage nvarchar(512)
	declare @websiteMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@gadsMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@yandexMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@seoMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@facebookMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@baiduMediumCode varchar(10),			
			@ppcMediumCode varchar(10),
			@emmMediumCode varchar(10) -- BI-1259
	select @websiteMediumCode = '9', 
			@gadsMediumCode = '73', 
			@yandexMediumCode = '74', 
			@seoMediumCode = '75', 
			@facebookMediumCode = '76', 
			@baiduMediumCode = '77',
			@ppcMediumCode = '111',
			@emmMediumCode = '112' --BI-1259
	select @mainProcessIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @mainProcessID)
	select @mainProcessDescr = 'Advertisement_Auto_ActivationTasks'
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'Έναρξη: ' + @mainProcessDescr + '-' + @mainProcessIDAsString
	
	-- αν υπάρχει ανοιχτό task ‘Διακοπή Προβολής’ ή 'Έλεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής', 
	-- θα κλείνει το συγκεκριμένο task και θα δημιουργείται νέο task ‘Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής’ στον Google Ads Expert.
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 607, 561, 616, @gadsMediumCode, 'GADS'
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 608, 564, 617, @yandexMediumCode, 'YANDEX'
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 620, 621, 622, @baiduMediumCode, 'BAIDU'
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 610, 565, 619, @seoMediumCode, 'SEO'
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 609, 575, 618, @facebookMediumCode, 'FACEBOOK'
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 605, 566, 615, @websiteMediumCode, 'WEBSITE DEACTIVATION'
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 626, 627, 628, @ppcMediumCode, 'PPC'

	exec Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 639, 640, 641, @emmMediumCode, 'EMM' --BI-1259
	-- αν δεν υπάρχει ανοιχτό task ‘Διακοπή Προβολής’ ή 'Έλεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής', 
	-- θα δημιουργείται νέο task ‘Ανανέωση Προβολής’ στον Google Ads Expert.
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 607, 561, 614, @gadsMediumCode, 'GADS', 616
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 608, 564, 613, @yandexMediumCode, 'YANDEX', 617
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 620, 621, 624, @baiduMediumCode, 'BAIDU', 622
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 610, 565, 611, @seoMediumCode, 'SEO', 619
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 609, 575, 612, @facebookMediumCode, 'FACEBOOK', 618
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 605, 566, 606, @websiteMediumCode, 'WEBSITE DEACTIVATION', 615
	
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 626, 627, 630, @ppcMediumCode, 'PPC', 628
				
	exec Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 639, 640, 643, @emmMediumCode, 'EMM', 641 --BI-1259

	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'Ολοκλήρωση: ' + @mainProcessDescr + '-' + @mainProcessIDAsString
			
			
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Auto_WebsiteDeactivation]
	(@processID uniqueidentifier)
AS
BEGIN
	/* Αυτόματο κλείσιμο των tasks 'Διερεύνηση Αιτήματος Απενεργοποίησης Website' με την πάροδο 30 ημερών ... */
	declare @processDescr nvarchar(100),@errMessage nvarchar(512), @processIDAsString nvarchar(40), @serviceDate datetime, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_Auto_WebsiteDeactivation'
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @serviceDate = DATEADD(dd, 0, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, getdate()))
	
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription
	into #openTasks
	from Task t
	where t.TaskTypeID = 562
	and t.[Status] = 0
	and @serviceDate >= DATEADD(day, 30, t.CreatedOn) 
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from #openTasks
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
	
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Έναρξη: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
	
		BEGIN TRANSACTION	 
			BEGIN TRY
		
			update t
				set [Status] = 1,
					CompletedOn = getdate(),
					Outcome = 'Απενεργοποίηση',
					DMCharKey = @processDescr
			from Task t
			join #openTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join #openTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
			
			-- Create new tasks 'Απενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website - T07'
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, DMCharKey, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Απενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website', getdate(), 0, c.ID, 605, tmp.DynamicCode, tmp.DynamicDescription, @processIDAsString, @processDescr, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join #openTasks tmp on c.ID = tmp.CaseID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 605 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, @processIDAsString, @processDescr
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
				
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Ολοκλήρωση: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
			
			END TRY
			BEGIN CATCH
				select @errMessage = 'Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
				' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
				' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
				' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
				' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())			
			
				IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
					ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;
				
			END CATCH
			
			IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
			COMMIT TRANSACTION;
			
			IF @errMessage IS NOT NULL
			BEGIN	
				INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
				select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,0,0,@errMessage		
			END	
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('#openTasks') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #openTasks
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Auto_WebsiteDeactivation]
	(@processID uniqueidentifier)
AS
BEGIN
	/* Αυτόματο κλείσιμο των tasks 'Διερεύνηση Αιτήματος Απενεργοποίησης Website' με την πάροδο 30 ημερών ... */
	declare @processDescr nvarchar(100),@errMessage nvarchar(512), @processIDAsString nvarchar(40), @serviceDate datetime, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_Auto_WebsiteDeactivation'
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @serviceDate = DATEADD(dd, 0, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, getdate()))
	
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription
	into #openTasks
	from Task t
	where t.TaskTypeID = 562
	and t.[Status] = 0
	and @serviceDate >= DATEADD(day, 30, t.CreatedOn) 
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from #openTasks
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
	
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Έναρξη: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
	
		BEGIN TRANSACTION	 
			BEGIN TRY
		
			update t
				set [Status] = 1,
					CompletedOn = getdate(),
					Outcome = 'Απενεργοποίηση',
					DMCharKey = @processDescr
			from Task t
			join #openTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join #openTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
			
			-- Create new tasks 'Απενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website - T07'
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, DMCharKey, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Απενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website', getdate(), 0, c.ID, 605, tmp.DynamicCode, tmp.DynamicDescription, @processIDAsString, @processDescr, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join #openTasks tmp on c.ID = tmp.CaseID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 605 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, @processIDAsString, @processDescr
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
				
			INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
			select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Ολοκλήρωση: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
			
			END TRY
			BEGIN CATCH
				select @errMessage = 'Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
				' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
				' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
				' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
				' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())			
			
				IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
					ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;
				
			END CATCH
			
			IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
			COMMIT TRANSACTION;
			
			IF @errMessage IS NOT NULL
			BEGIN	
				INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
				select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,0,0,@errMessage		
			END	
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('#openTasks') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #openTasks
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_CloseActivationTasks](
    @advIDs DeactivationValues readonly,
    @confirmationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @confirmationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER
) AS BEGIN
/* Αυτόματο κλείσιμο tasks 'Επιβεβαίωση ενεργής προβολής' και 'Ενεργοποίηση προβολής' στην PR10.0 */
declare @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @processDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_CloseActivationTasks'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1
	
	select @processID = newid()
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0, @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
	
	declare @advIDsCount int
	select @advIDsCount = count(*) from @advIDs
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@advIDsCount,1,0, 'AdvIDs: ' + Convert(varchar(5), @advIDsCount)
		
	-- ανοικτά tasks 'Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής' & 'Έλεγχος Επιβεβαίωσης Ανανέωσης Προβολής'
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID
	into #confirmationTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
	where c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	and t.[Status] = 0
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@confirmationTaskTypeID1, @confirmationTaskTypeID2)
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #confirmationTasks
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0, 'Aνοικτά tasks Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής & Έλεγχος Επιβεβαίωσης Ανανέωσης Προβολής: ' + convert(varchar(5),@rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
		update t
			set [Status] = 1,
				CompletedOn = getdate(),
				DMCharKey = @processDescr
		from Task t
		join #confirmationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		join #confirmationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
	end
	
	-- ανοικτά tasks 'Ανανέωση Προβολής' & 'Έλεγχος Ανανέωσης Προβολής'
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID
	into #activationTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
	where c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	and t.[Status] = 0
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@activationTaskTypeID1,@activationTaskTypeID2)
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #activationTasks
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0, 'Aνοικτά tasks Ανανέωση Προβολής & Έλεγχος Ανανέωσης Προβολής: ' + convert(varchar(5),@rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
		update t
			set [Status] = 1,
				CompletedOn = getdate(),
				DMCharKey = @processDescr
		from Task t
		join #activationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		join #activationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
	end
	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks](
    @advIDs ActivationValues readonly,
    @mainProcessID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    @deactivationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @deactivationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID INTEGER,
    @mediumCode VARCHAR(10),
    @category VARCHAR(50),
    @confirmationTaskTypeID INTEGER
) AS BEGIN
declare @processID uniqueidentifier, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	declare @taskDescription varchar(100)
	select @mainProcessDescr = 'Advertisement_Auto_ActivationTasks'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1

	select distinct t.CaseID, c.ContextEntityID
	into #closedTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
    join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
    join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
    join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
    where me.Code = @mediumCode
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@deactivationTaskTypeID1, @deactivationTaskTypeID2)
	and t.[Status] = 1
	and not exists (
		select null as [empty]
		from Task t2
		join [Case] c2 on t2.CaseID = c2.ID
		join Advertisement adv2 on c2.ContextEntityID = adv2.ID and c2.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		where adv2.ID = adv.ID
		and t2.tasktypeid = @confirmationTaskTypeID
		and t2.[status] = 0
	)
	
	select @rowCount = count(CaseID) from #closedTasks
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Κλειστά tasks Διακοπή & Ελεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής ' + @category + ': ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin	
		select @processID = newid()
		select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
		
		-- Create new case 'Ενεργοποίηση Προβολής Πελάτη - PR010'
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
		insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
		select 109, 0, @currentDate, @mainProcessDescr, advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
		
		update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create code tasks 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01'
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
		select 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, 563, 'Closed' + @category, @currentDate, c.DMTable
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID 
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create tasks 'Ανανέωση Προβολής (No outcome)'
		if @mediumCode = '9'
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επανενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website'
			end
		ELSE
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Ανανέωση Προβολής ' + @category
			end
		
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
		select @taskDescription, @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @activationTaskTypeID,  mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @activationTaskTypeID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)
		select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, @processIDAsString, @mainProcessDescr
		from Task t
		join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Eνεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),@currentDate,103) + ' Reason έγινε null', t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString		
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#closedTasks', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #closedTasks
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_CreateActivationTasks]
	(@advIDs ActivationValues readonly, @mainProcessID uniqueidentifier, 
		@deactivationTaskTypeID1 int, @deactivationTaskTypeID2 int, @activationTaskTypeID int, 
		@mediumCode varchar(10),
		@category varchar(50),
		@confirmationTaskTypeID int)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @processID uniqueidentifier, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	declare @taskDescription varchar(100)
	select @mainProcessDescr = 'Advertisement_Auto_ActivationTasks'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1

	select distinct t.CaseID, c.ContextEntityID
	into #closedTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
    join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
    join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
    join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
    where me.Code = @mediumCode
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@deactivationTaskTypeID1, @deactivationTaskTypeID2)
	and t.[Status] = 1
	and not exists (
		select null as [empty]
		from Task t2
		join [Case] c2 on t2.CaseID = c2.ID
		join Advertisement adv2 on c2.ContextEntityID = adv2.ID and c2.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		where adv2.ID = adv.ID
		and t2.tasktypeid = @confirmationTaskTypeID
		and t2.[status] = 0
	)
	
	select @rowCount = count(CaseID) from #closedTasks
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Κλειστά tasks Διακοπή & Ελεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής ' + @category + ': ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin	
		select @processID = newid()
		select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
		
		-- Create new case 'Ενεργοποίηση Προβολής Πελάτη - PR010'
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
		insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
		select 109, 0, @currentDate, @mainProcessDescr, advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
		
		update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create code tasks 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01'
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
		select 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, 563, 'Closed' + @category, @currentDate, c.DMTable
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID 
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create tasks 'Ανανέωση Προβολής (No outcome)'
		if @mediumCode = '9'
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επανενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website'
			end
		ELSE
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Ανανέωση Προβολής ' + @category
			end
		
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
		select @taskDescription, @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @activationTaskTypeID,  mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @activationTaskTypeID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)
		select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, @processIDAsString, @mainProcessDescr
		from Task t
		join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Eνεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),@currentDate,103) + ' Reason έγινε null', t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString		
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#closedTasks', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #closedTasks
END

    @deactivationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID INTEGER,
    @mediumCode VARCHAR(10),
    @category VARCHAR(50)
) AS BEGIN
declare @processID uniqueidentifier, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	declare @taskDescription varchar(100)
	select @mainProcessDescr = 'Advertisement_CreateConfirmationTasks'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1
	
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID
	into #openTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
	join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
    join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
    join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
    join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
    where me.Code = @mediumCode
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@deactivationTaskTypeID1, @deactivationTaskTypeID2)
	and t.[Status] = 0
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #openTasks
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])

	if @rowCount > 0

		set [Status] = 1,
			CompletedOn = @currentDate,

		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID

		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
		
		update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create code tasks 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01'
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
		select 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, 563, 'Open' + @category, @currentDate, c.DMTable
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create tasks 'Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής (No outcome)'
		if @mediumCode = '9'
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επιβεβαίωση Επανενεργοποίησης Προβολής Website'
			end
		ELSE
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής ' + @category
			end
		
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
		select @taskDescription, @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @activationTaskTypeID, mv.Code , '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @activationTaskTypeID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
		--join #openTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID --TODO:check this
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)

		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Eνεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),@currentDate,103) + ' Reason έγινε null', t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#openTasks', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #openTasks
