CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_CreateDeactivationCases]
	@advIDs DeactivationValues readonly,
	@sourceID int
AS
BEGIN
	
	declare @PR090_CASE_TYPEID int, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID int, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID int, @currentDate datetime, @initiatorID int
	declare @errMessage nvarchar(512), @BatchActionType int, @processDescr nvarchar(100), @rowCount int, @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(40)
	select @PR090_CASE_TYPEID = 108, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID = 560, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID = 562
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @initiatorID = 1
	select @BatchActionType = 3
		
	select @processID = newid()
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = convert(nvarchar(5),@sourceID) + '-CreateDeactivationCases-' + @processIDAsString
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @advIDs
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Έναρξη διαδικασίας: ' + @processDescr
	
	BEGIN TRANSACTION	 
		BEGIN TRY
		
		if @sourceID <> 1 -- not XO.GR
		begin
			update adv
				set 
				--DeactivationDate = advIDs.DeactivationDate, -- //BI-1089
					DeactivationReason = advIDs.DeactivationReason
			from @advIDs advIDs
			join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID 
		end
		else
		begin
			update adv
				set 
					DeactivationDate = advIDs.DeactivationDate,
					DeactivationReason = advIDs.DeactivationReason
			from @advIDs advIDs
			join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID 
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 1 -- XO.GR
		begin
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMTable)
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 1, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID, CompletedBy = 'CreateDeactivationCases', CompletedOn = @currentDate where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'XO.GR', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 2 -- GOOGLE ADWORDS (GADS)
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'GADS', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής GADS - Τ08 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής GADS', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 607, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 607 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 3 -- YANDEX
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'YANDEX', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX - Τ09 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 608, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 608 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 4 -- SEO
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'SEO', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής SEO - Τ11 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής SEO', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 610, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 610 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t

		begin

			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString

			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής BAIDU - Τ12 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής BAIDU', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 620, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 620 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString

			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		

		if @sourceID = 9 -- EMM BI-1259
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'EMM', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής EMM (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής EMM', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 639, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 639 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)

			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end

		if @sourceID = 10 -- PPC
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'PPC', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής PPC (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής PPC', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 626, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 626 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end

		if @sourceID = 5 -- WEBSITE DEACTIVATION
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'WEBSITE DEACTIVATION', @currentDate, c.DMTable

			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Απενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website - Τ07 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Απενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 605, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 605 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)

			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 6 -- WEBSITE EXPIRATION
		begin

			--Devops11297, --Devops11271
			IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#advIDsBO') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #advIDsBO;
			SELECT advIDs.*
			INTO #advIDsBO
			FROM @advIDs advIDs
			join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID
			join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID
			join Contract co on co.ID = cp.RelatedContractID
			join [product] p on p.ID = cp.ProductID
			join Udac u on u.ID = p.UdacID
			JOIN dbo.ProductType pt on pt.ID = u.ProductTypeID
			where pt.Description in (
			'WST Basic','WST - Power','WST Premium','WST - PRO','WST - PRO extra','WST Single Page',
			'WST - Basic Bundle','WST - Power Bundle','WST - Premium Bundle','WST - PRO Bundle',
			'WST - PRO extra Bundle','WST - Single Page Bundle','WST - Basic Renewal',
			'WST Bookings','WST - Bookings Renewal','WST - Premium Renewal','WST - Single Page Renewal',
			'WST Basic-to-Advance','WST Basic-to-Basic','WST E-Shop',
			'WST Product Catalogue','WST Product Catalogue Websplanet',
			'WST Single Page New Promo','WST Single Page Promo XO') --Devops11297
			--AND co.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 --Devops11271
			AND (co.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 OR ((co. IsSubscriptionBased = 1 AND co.State = 3) OR (co. IsSubscriptionBased = 1 AND co.SubscriptionState NOT IN ( 0, 1 ))))--Devops11627

			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMTable)
			select @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from #advIDsBO advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
						
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'WEBSITE EXPIRATION', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διερεύνηση Αιτήματος Απενεργοποίησης Website - Τ02 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διερεύνηση Αιτήματος Απενεργοποίησης Website', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join #advIDsBO advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString 
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString

			IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#advIDsBO') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #advIDsBO;
		end
		
		select @rowCount = count(*) from @advIDs
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Ολοκλήρωση διαδικασίας: ' + @processDescr
			
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			select @errMessage = 'Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
			' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
			' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
			' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
			' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())			
		
			IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
				ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;
			
		END CATCH
		
	IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
		COMMIT TRANSACTION;
		
	IF @errMessage IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN	
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,0,0,@errMessage		
	END
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_CreateDeactivationCases]
	@advIDs DeactivationValues readonly,
	@sourceID int
AS
BEGIN
	
	declare @PR090_CASE_TYPEID int, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID int, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID int, @currentDate datetime, @initiatorID int
	declare @errMessage nvarchar(512), @BatchActionType int, @processDescr nvarchar(100), @rowCount int, @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(40)
	select @PR090_CASE_TYPEID = 108, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID = 560, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID = 562
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @initiatorID = 1
	select @BatchActionType = 3
		
	select @processID = newid()
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = convert(nvarchar(5),@sourceID) + '-CreateDeactivationCases-' + @processIDAsString
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @advIDs
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Έναρξη διαδικασίας: ' + @processDescr
	
	BEGIN TRANSACTION	 
		BEGIN TRY
		
		if @sourceID <> 1 -- not XO.GR
		begin
			update adv
				set 
				--DeactivationDate = advIDs.DeactivationDate, -- //BI-1089
					DeactivationReason = advIDs.DeactivationReason
			from @advIDs advIDs
			join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID 
		end
		else
		begin
			update adv
				set 
					DeactivationDate = advIDs.DeactivationDate,
					DeactivationReason = advIDs.DeactivationReason
			from @advIDs advIDs
			join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID 
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 1 -- XO.GR
		begin
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMTable)
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 1, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID, CompletedBy = 'CreateDeactivationCases', CompletedOn = @currentDate where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'XO.GR', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 2 -- GOOGLE ADWORDS (GADS)
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'GADS', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής GADS - Τ08 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής GADS', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 607, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 607 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 3 -- YANDEX
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'YANDEX', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
			select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX - Τ09 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 608, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 608 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t

			--Devops11297, --Devops11271

			INTO #advIDsBO
			FROM @advIDs advIDs
			join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID
			join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID
			join Contract co on co.ID = cp.RelatedContractID
			join [product] p on p.ID = cp.ProductID
			join Udac u on u.ID = p.UdacID
			JOIN dbo.ProductType pt on pt.ID = u.ProductTypeID
			where pt.Description in (
			'WST Basic','WST - Power','WST Premium','WST - PRO','WST - PRO extra','WST Single Page',
			'WST - Basic Bundle','WST - Power Bundle','WST - Premium Bundle','WST - PRO Bundle',

			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διερεύνηση Αιτήματος Απενεργοποίησης Website', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join #advIDsBO advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString 
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString

			IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#advIDsBO') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #advIDsBO;
		end
		
		select @rowCount = count(*) from @advIDs
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Ολοκλήρωση διαδικασίας: ' + @processDescr
			
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			select @errMessage = 'Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
			' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
			' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
			' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
			' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())			
		
			IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
				ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;
			
		END CATCH
		
	IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
		COMMIT TRANSACTION;
		
	IF @errMessage IS NOT NULL
	BEGIN	
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,0,0,@errMessage		
	END
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Deactivation](
    @processID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
) AS BEGIN
declare @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @processDescr varchar(100), @BatchActionType int, @rowCount int
	declare @xogrMediumCode varchar(10), @websiteMediumCode varchar(10), @gadsMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@yandexMediumCode varchar(10), @seoMediumCode varchar(10), @facebookMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@baiduMediumCode varchar(10), @emmMediumCode varchar(10),
		@ppcMediumCode varchar(10)
	declare @ContractExpiration int, @WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate int, @GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate int, @XOgrWithCustomerStatus int, @CancelledOrInterrupted int
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_Deactivation'
	select @ContractExpiration = 0, 
		@WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate = 1, 
		@GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate = 2, 
		@XOgrWithCustomerStatus = 3, 
		@CancelledOrInterrupted = 4
	select @xogrMediumCode = '10', 
		@websiteMediumCode = '9', 
		@gadsMediumCode = '73', 
		@yandexMediumCode = '74', 
		@seoMediumCode = '75', 
		@facebookMediumCode = '76', 
		@baiduMediumCode = '77',
		@emmMediumCode = '112',
		@ppcMediumCode = '111'
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	
	insert into [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'---Έναρξη: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
		
	/* XO.GR */
	declare @xogrAdvIDs DeactivationValues
	
	insert into @xogrAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @ContractExpiration, @xogrMediumCode, @xogrAdvIDs
	
	insert into @xogrAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @CancelledOrInterrupted, @xogrMediumCode, @xogrAdvIDs
	
	--insert into @xogrAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	--exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @XOgrWithCustomerStatus, @xogrMediumCode, @xogrAdvIDs
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @xogrAdvIDs
	if (@rowCount > 0)
	begin
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'xogr AdvIDs: ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
		exec Advertisement_CreateDeactivationCases @xogrAdvIDs, 1
	end
	
	/* GOOGLE ADWORDS (GADS)  */
	declare @gadsAdvIDs DeactivationValues
	
	insert into @gadsAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @ContractExpiration, @gadsMediumCode, @gadsAdvIDs
	
	insert into @gadsAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @CancelledOrInterrupted, @gadsMediumCode, @gadsAdvIDs
	
	--insert into @gadsAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	--exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate, @gadsMediumCode, @gadsAdvIDs

	select @rowCount = count(*) from @gadsAdvIDs
	if (@rowCount > 0)
	begin
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'gads AdvIDs: ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
		exec Advertisement_CreateDeactivationCases @gadsAdvIDs, 2
	end
	
	/* YANDEX */
	declare @yandexAdvIDs DeactivationValues
	
	insert into @yandexAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @ContractExpiration, @yandexMediumCode, @yandexAdvIDs
	
	insert into @yandexAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @CancelledOrInterrupted, @yandexMediumCode, @yandexAdvIDs
	
	--insert into @yandexAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription)
	--exec Advertisement_Deactivation_Data @GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate, @yandexMediumCode, @yandexAdvIDs
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @yandexAdvIDs
	if (@rowCount > 0)
	begin 
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'yandex AdvIDs: ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
		exec Advertisement_CreateDeactivationCases @yandexAdvIDs, 3
	end
	
	/* SEO */

	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'---Ολοκλήρωση: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString

END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Deactivation_Data]
	(@deactivationReason int, @mediumCode varchar(10), @advIDs DeactivationValues readonly)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @serviceDate datetime, @THRESHOLD_DATE datetime
	declare @PRICE_PERCENTAGE int;
	declare @ppcMediumCode nvarchar(20) = '111'; -- //BI-1506
	select @serviceDate = DATEADD(dd, 0, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, getdate()))
	
	IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE NAME = 'Deactivation.ThresholdDate')	
	BEGIN
		SELECT @THRESHOLD_DATE = CONVERT(DATETIME, ISNULL(Parameter,'20240101')) FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE Name = 'Deactivation.ThresholdDate'
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		SELECT @THRESHOLD_DATE = CONVERT(DATETIME, '20240101')
	END
	
	IF @mediumCode = @ppcMediumCode and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE NAME = 'Deactivation.PPC.ThresholdDate')	
	BEGIN
		SELECT @THRESHOLD_DATE = CONVERT(DATETIME, ISNULL(Parameter,'20240101')) FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE Name = 'Deactivation.PPC.ThresholdDate'
	END

	IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE NAME = 'Deactivation.PricePercentage')	
	BEGIN
		SELECT @PRICE_PERCENTAGE = CONVERT(INT,Parameter) FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE Name = 'Deactivation.PricePercentage'
	END
	
	/* Prepare Classifications */
	;with data as (
		select data.StringValue, sdata.FieldValue , RankID = RANK() over (partition by data.StringValue order by FieldValue)
		from dbo.fn_GetConfigurationParameterList ('Deactivation.Classifications', 0) data
		outer apply dbo.fn_SplitString (data.StringValue, ':') sdata
	)
	select ClassifierID = classifiers.FieldValue, ClassifierNodeID = nodes.FieldValue
	into #cls
	from (select * from data where RankID = 1) classifiers
	join (select * from data where RankID = 2) nodes on classifiers.StringValue = nodes.StringValue
	
	
	if @deactivationReason = 0 -- ContractExpiration
	begin
		select adv.ID, adv.AdvEndDate, @deactivationReason, mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and adv.AdvEndDate <= @serviceDate
		and adv.AdvEndDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 1 -- WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate
	begin
		select adv.ID, DATEADD(dd,60,v.InvoicePaymentDate), @deactivationReason,
		mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
		join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToYPSInvoicePayment v (nolock) on CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20)) = v.ContractCode
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and DATEADD(dd,60,v.InvoicePaymentDate) <= @serviceDate
		and v.InvoicePaymentDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
		and tmp.AdvID is null
		and not exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from Classification cf
			join #cls cls on cf.ClassifierID = cls.ClassifierID and cf.ClassifierNodeID = cls.ClassifierNodeID
			where cf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
		)
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 2 -- GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate
	begin
		select adv.ID, DATEADD(dd,15,v.InvoicePaymentDate), @deactivationReason,
		mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
		join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].OverdueContracts v (nolock) on CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20)) = v.ContractCode
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and DATEADD(dd,15,v.InvoicePaymentDate) <= @serviceDate
		and v.InvoicePaymentDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
		and tmp.AdvID is null
		and exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from ContractProduct cp2
			where cp2.relatedContractID = cp.relatedContractID
			having ISNULL(v.OpenAmount,0) > ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(cp2.Price,0) - ISNULL(cp2.Discount,0) - ISNULL(cp2.RulesDiscount,0)) * @PRICE_PERCENTAGE / 100, -1)
		)
		and not exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from Classification cf
			join #cls cls on cf.ClassifierID = cls.ClassifierID and cf.ClassifierNodeID = cls.ClassifierNodeID
			where cf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
		)
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 3 -- XOgrWithCustomerStatus
	begin
		select adv.ID, v.[Assign Date] as AssignDate, @deactivationReason,
		mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
		join [CARDINAL12].[OC_XO_UPGRADE].[dbo].CollectionToYPSCustomersInLawer v (nolock) on bp.Code = v.[Κωδικός Πελάτη] --Devops 11433 - 2025-01-20
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and tmp.AdvID is null
		and v.[Assign Date] >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
		and not exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from Classification cf
			join #cls cls on cf.ClassifierID = cls.ClassifierID and cf.ClassifierNodeID = cls.ClassifierNodeID
			where cf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
		)
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 4 -- CancelledOrInterrupted
	begin
		if @mediumCode = '10' -- XO.GR
		begin
			select adv.ID,  
				case when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is null then cp.InterruptionDate
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is null and cp.CancelledOn is not null then cp.CancelledOn
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, cp.InterruptionDate,cp.CancelledOn) > 0) then cp.InterruptionDate else cp.CancelledOn
				end,
				@deactivationReason,
				mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
			from Advertisement adv
			join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
			where me.Code = @mediumCode
			and co.[Type] != 5
			and ISNULL(co.RelatedContractType, '') not in ('Αλλαγή ΑΦΜ','Ανακατασκευή')
			and me.IsActive = 1
			and pr.IsComposite = 0
			and adv.QA = 1
			and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
			and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
			and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
			and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
			and tmp.AdvID is null
		end
		
		if @mediumCode = '9' -- websiteMediumCode
		begin
			select adv.ID,
				case when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is null then cp.InterruptionDate
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is null and cp.CancelledOn is not null then cp.CancelledOn
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, cp.InterruptionDate,cp.CancelledOn) > 0) then cp.InterruptionDate else cp.CancelledOn
				end,
				@deactivationReason,
				mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
			from Advertisement adv
			join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			where me.Code = @mediumCode
			and co.[Type] != 5
			and ISNULL(co.RelatedContractType, '') not in ('Αλλαγή ΑΦΜ','Ανακατασκευή')
			and me.IsActive = 1
			and pr.IsComposite = 0
			and adv.QA = 1
			and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
			and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
			and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
			and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
		end
		
		if (@mediumCode != '9' and @mediumCode != '10') -- gads, yandex, seo, facebook	
		begin
			select adv.ID,  
				case when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is null then cp.InterruptionDate
				 when cp.InterruptionDate is null and cp.CancelledOn is not null then cp.CancelledOn
				 when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, cp.InterruptionDate,cp.CancelledOn) > 0) then cp.InterruptionDate else cp.CancelledOn
			end,
			@deactivationReason,
			mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
			from Advertisement adv
			join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			and ISNULL(co.RelatedContractType, '') not in ('Αλλαγή ΑΦΜ','Ανακατασκευή')
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
			where me.Code = @mediumCode
			and co.[Type] != 5
			and me.IsActive = 1
			and pr.IsComposite = 0
			and adv.QA = 1
			and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
			and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
			and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
			and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
			--and not exists (select null from @xogrAdvIDs as tmp where tmp.AdvID = adv.ID)
			and tmp.AdvID is null
		end
			
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#cls', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #cls
	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_Deactivation_Data]
	(@deactivationReason int, @mediumCode varchar(10), @advIDs DeactivationValues readonly)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @serviceDate datetime, @THRESHOLD_DATE datetime
	declare @PRICE_PERCENTAGE int;
	declare @ppcMediumCode nvarchar(20) = '111'; -- //BI-1506
	select @serviceDate = DATEADD(dd, 0, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, getdate()))
	
	IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE NAME = 'Deactivation.ThresholdDate')	
	BEGIN
		SELECT @THRESHOLD_DATE = CONVERT(DATETIME, ISNULL(Parameter,'20240101')) FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE Name = 'Deactivation.ThresholdDate'
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		SELECT @THRESHOLD_DATE = CONVERT(DATETIME, '20240101')
	END
	
	IF @mediumCode = @ppcMediumCode and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE NAME = 'Deactivation.PPC.ThresholdDate')	
	BEGIN
		SELECT @THRESHOLD_DATE = CONVERT(DATETIME, ISNULL(Parameter,'20240101')) FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE Name = 'Deactivation.PPC.ThresholdDate'
	END

	IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE NAME = 'Deactivation.PricePercentage')	
	BEGIN
		SELECT @PRICE_PERCENTAGE = CONVERT(INT,Parameter) FROM ConfigurationParameter WHERE Name = 'Deactivation.PricePercentage'
	END
	
	/* Prepare Classifications */
	;with data as (
		select data.StringValue, sdata.FieldValue , RankID = RANK() over (partition by data.StringValue order by FieldValue)
		from dbo.fn_GetConfigurationParameterList ('Deactivation.Classifications', 0) data
		outer apply dbo.fn_SplitString (data.StringValue, ':') sdata
	)
	select ClassifierID = classifiers.FieldValue, ClassifierNodeID = nodes.FieldValue
	into #cls
	from (select * from data where RankID = 1) classifiers
	join (select * from data where RankID = 2) nodes on classifiers.StringValue = nodes.StringValue
	
	
	if @deactivationReason = 0 -- ContractExpiration
	begin
		select adv.ID, adv.AdvEndDate, @deactivationReason, mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and adv.AdvEndDate <= @serviceDate
		and adv.AdvEndDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 1 -- WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate
	begin
		select adv.ID, DATEADD(dd,60,v.InvoicePaymentDate), @deactivationReason,
		mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
		join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToYPSInvoicePayment v (nolock) on CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20)) = v.ContractCode
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and DATEADD(dd,60,v.InvoicePaymentDate) <= @serviceDate
		and v.InvoicePaymentDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
		and tmp.AdvID is null
		and not exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from Classification cf
			join #cls cls on cf.ClassifierID = cls.ClassifierID and cf.ClassifierNodeID = cls.ClassifierNodeID
			where cf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
		)
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 2 -- GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate
	begin
		select adv.ID, DATEADD(dd,15,v.InvoicePaymentDate), @deactivationReason,
		mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
		join [CARDINAL12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].OverdueContracts v (nolock) on CAST(co.ID as nvarchar(20)) = v.ContractCode
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and DATEADD(dd,15,v.InvoicePaymentDate) <= @serviceDate
		and v.InvoicePaymentDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
		and tmp.AdvID is null
		and exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from ContractProduct cp2
			where cp2.relatedContractID = cp.relatedContractID
			having ISNULL(v.OpenAmount,0) > ISNULL(SUM(ISNULL(cp2.Price,0) - ISNULL(cp2.Discount,0) - ISNULL(cp2.RulesDiscount,0)) * @PRICE_PERCENTAGE / 100, -1)
		)
		and not exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from Classification cf
			join #cls cls on cf.ClassifierID = cls.ClassifierID and cf.ClassifierNodeID = cls.ClassifierNodeID
			where cf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
		)
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 3 -- XOgrWithCustomerStatus
	begin
		select adv.ID, v.[Assign Date] as AssignDate, @deactivationReason,
		mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
		from Advertisement adv
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
		join [CARDINAL12].[OC_XO_UPGRADE].[dbo].CollectionToYPSCustomersInLawer v (nolock) on bp.Code = v.[Κωδικός Πελάτη] --Devops 11433 - 2025-01-20
		where cp.[State] not in (3,4)
		and co.[Type] != 5
		and me.Code = @mediumCode
		and me.IsActive = 1
		and pr.IsComposite = 0
		and adv.QA = 1
		and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
		and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
		and tmp.AdvID is null
		and v.[Assign Date] >= @THRESHOLD_DATE --new
		and not exists (
			select null as [empty]
			from Classification cf
			join #cls cls on cf.ClassifierID = cls.ClassifierID and cf.ClassifierNodeID = cls.ClassifierNodeID
			where cf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
		)
	end
	
	if @deactivationReason = 4 -- CancelledOrInterrupted
	begin
		if @mediumCode = '10' -- XO.GR
		begin
			select adv.ID,  
				case when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is null then cp.InterruptionDate
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is null and cp.CancelledOn is not null then cp.CancelledOn
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, cp.InterruptionDate,cp.CancelledOn) > 0) then cp.InterruptionDate else cp.CancelledOn
				end,
				@deactivationReason,
				mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
			from Advertisement adv
			join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
			where me.Code = @mediumCode
			and co.[Type] != 5
			and ISNULL(co.RelatedContractType, '') not in ('Αλλαγή ΑΦΜ','Ανακατασκευή')
			and me.IsActive = 1
			and pr.IsComposite = 0
			and adv.QA = 1
			and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
			and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
			and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
			and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
			and tmp.AdvID is null
		end
		
		if @mediumCode = '9' -- websiteMediumCode
		begin
			select adv.ID,
				case when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is null then cp.InterruptionDate
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is null and cp.CancelledOn is not null then cp.CancelledOn
					 when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, cp.InterruptionDate,cp.CancelledOn) > 0) then cp.InterruptionDate else cp.CancelledOn
				end,
				@deactivationReason,
				mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
			from Advertisement adv
			join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			where me.Code = @mediumCode
			and co.[Type] != 5
			and ISNULL(co.RelatedContractType, '') not in ('Αλλαγή ΑΦΜ','Ανακατασκευή')
			and me.IsActive = 1
			and pr.IsComposite = 0
			and adv.QA = 1
			and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
			and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
			and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
			and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
		end
		
		if (@mediumCode != '9' and @mediumCode != '10') -- gads, yandex, seo, facebook	
		begin
			select adv.ID,  
				case when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is null then cp.InterruptionDate
				 when cp.InterruptionDate is null and cp.CancelledOn is not null then cp.CancelledOn
				 when cp.InterruptionDate is not null and cp.CancelledOn is not null and (DATEDIFF(day, cp.InterruptionDate,cp.CancelledOn) > 0) then cp.InterruptionDate else cp.CancelledOn
			end,
			@deactivationReason,
			mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code
			from Advertisement adv
			join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
			join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
			join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
			and ISNULL(co.RelatedContractType, '') not in ('Αλλαγή ΑΦΜ','Ανακατασκευή')
			join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
			join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
			join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
			join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
			left join @advIDs tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
			where me.Code = @mediumCode
			and co.[Type] != 5
			and me.IsActive = 1
			and pr.IsComposite = 0
			and adv.QA = 1
			and adv.DeactivationReason is null -- //BI-1614
			and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
			and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
			and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
			--and not exists (select null from @xogrAdvIDs as tmp where tmp.AdvID = adv.ID)
			and tmp.AdvID is null
		end
			
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#cls', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #cls
	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_ActivationTasks]
	(@advData AdvActivationData readonly)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @mainProcessID uniqueidentifier;
	set @mainProcessID = NewID();
	declare @BatchActionType int, @mainProcessIDAsString nvarchar(50), @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100) 
	declare @initiatorID int, @errMessage nvarchar(512)
	declare @websiteMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@gadsMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@yandexMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@seoMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@facebookMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@baiduMediumCode varchar(10),
			@emmMediumCode varchar(10), -- BI-1259
			@xoGrMediumCode varchar(10),
			@ppcMediumCode varchar(10)
	select @websiteMediumCode = '9', 
			@gadsMediumCode = '73', 
			@yandexMediumCode = '74', 
			@seoMediumCode = '75', 
			@facebookMediumCode = '76', 
			@baiduMediumCode = '77',
			@emmMediumCode = '112', --BI-1259
			@ppcMediumCode = '111',
			@xoGrMediumCode = '10'
	select @mainProcessIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @mainProcessID)
	select @mainProcessDescr = 'Advertisement_List_ActivationTasks'
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'Έναρξη: ' + @mainProcessDescr + '-' + @mainProcessIDAsString
	declare @advIDs AdvActivationValues
	insert into @advIDs (AdvID,TaskID)
	select AdvID,TaskID
	from @advData
	-- αν υπάρχει ανοιχτό task ‘Διακοπή Προβολής’ ή 'Έλεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής', 
	-- θα κλείνει το συγκεκριμένο task και θα δημιουργείται νέο task ‘Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής’ στον Google Ads Expert.
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 607, 561, 616, @gadsMediumCode, 'GADS'
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 608, 564, 617, @yandexMediumCode, 'YANDEX'
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 620, 621, 622, @baiduMediumCode, 'BAIDU'
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 610, 565, 619, @seoMediumCode, 'SEO'
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 609, 575, 618, @facebookMediumCode, 'FACEBOOK'
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 605, 566, 615, @websiteMediumCode, 'WEBSITE DEACTIVATION'
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 639, 640, 641, @emmMediumCode, 'EMM' --BI-1259
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 626, 627, 628, @ppcMediumCode, 'PPC'
	-- αν δεν υπάρχει ανοιχτό task ‘Διακοπή Προβολής’ ή 'Έλεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής', 
	-- θα δημιουργείται νέο task ‘Ανανέωση Προβολής’ στον Google Ads Expert.
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 607, 561, 614, @gadsMediumCode, 'GADS', 616
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 608, 564, 613, @yandexMediumCode, 'YANDEX', 617
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 620, 621, 624, @baiduMediumCode, 'BAIDU', 622
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 610, 565, 611, @seoMediumCode, 'SEO', 619
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 609, 575, 612, @facebookMediumCode, 'FACEBOOK', 618
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 605, 566, 606, @websiteMediumCode, 'WEBSITE DEACTIVATION', 615
				
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 639, 640, 643, @emmMediumCode, 'EMM', 641 --BI-1259
	
	exec Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks @advIDs, @mainProcessID, 626, 627, 630, @ppcMediumCode, 'PPC', 628
		
	update adv set DeactivationReason = null, DeactivationDate = null
	from Advertisement adv
	join @advData d on adv.ID = d.AdvID	
	join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
	join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
	join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID	
	where me.Code = @xoGrMediumCode	

	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'Ολοκλήρωση: ' + @mainProcessDescr + '-' + @mainProcessIDAsString
	
			
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_CloseActivationTasks](
    @advIDs AdvDeactivationValues readonly,
    @confirmationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @confirmationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER
) AS BEGIN
/* Αυτόματο κλείσιμο tasks 'Επιβεβαίωση ενεργής προβολής' και 'Ενεργοποίηση προβολής' στην PR10.0 */
declare @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @processDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_CloseActivationTasks'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1
	
	select @processID = newid()
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0, @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
	
	declare @advIDsCount int
	select @advIDsCount = count(*) from @advIDs
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@advIDsCount,1,0, 'AdvIDs: ' + Convert(varchar(5), @advIDsCount)
		
	-- ανοικτά tasks 'Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής' & 'Έλεγχος Επιβεβαίωσης Ανανέωσης Προβολής'
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID
	into #confirmationTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
	where c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	and t.[Status] = 0
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@confirmationTaskTypeID1, @confirmationTaskTypeID2)
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #confirmationTasks
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0, 'Aνοικτά tasks Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής & Έλεγχος Επιβεβαίωσης Ανανέωσης Προβολής: ' + convert(varchar(5),@rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
		update t
			set [Status] = 1,
				CompletedOn = getdate(),
				DMCharKey = @processDescr
		from Task t
		join #confirmationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		join #confirmationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
	end
	
	-- ανοικτά tasks 'Ανανέωση Προβολής' & 'Έλεγχος Ανανέωσης Προβολής'
	select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID, advIDs.TaskID
	into #activationTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
	where c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	and t.[Status] = 0
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@activationTaskTypeID1,@activationTaskTypeID2)
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #activationTasks
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0, 'Aνοικτά tasks Ανανέωση Προβολής & Έλεγχος Ανανέωσης Προβολής: ' + convert(varchar(5),@rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
		update t
			set [Status] = 1,
				CompletedOn = getdate(),
				DMCharKey = @processDescr
		from Task t
		join #activationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, tmp.TaskID, 'PastDueDeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(tmp.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
		from Task t
		join #activationTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
	end
	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks](
    @advIDs AdvActivationValues readonly,
    @mainProcessID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    @deactivationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @deactivationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID INTEGER,
    @mediumCode VARCHAR(10),
    @category VARCHAR(50),
    @confirmationTaskTypeID INTEGER
) AS BEGIN
declare @processID uniqueidentifier, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	declare @taskDescription varchar(100)
	select @mainProcessDescr = 'Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1

	select *
	into #closedTasks
	from 
	(select t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID,
	RANK() OVER (partition by advIDs.AdvID ORDER BY t.ID desc) AS Rank
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
    join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
    join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
    join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
    where me.Code = @mediumCode
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@deactivationTaskTypeID1, @deactivationTaskTypeID2)
	and t.[Status] = 1
	and not exists (
		select null as [empty]
		from Task t2
		join [Case] c2 on t2.CaseID = c2.ID
		join Advertisement adv2 on c2.ContextEntityID = adv2.ID and c2.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		where adv2.ID = adv.ID
		and t2.tasktypeid = @confirmationTaskTypeID
		and t2.[status] = 0
	)
	) as s
	where s.Rank = 1
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #closedTasks
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Κλειστά tasks Διακοπή & Ελεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής ' + @category + ': ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin	
		select @processID = newid()
		select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
		
		-- Create new case 'Ενεργοποίηση Προβολής Πελάτη - PR010'
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
		insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
		select 109, 0, @currentDate, @mainProcessDescr, advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
		
		update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create code tasks 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01'
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
		select 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, 563, 'Closed' + @category, @currentDate, c.DMTable
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID 
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		--insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
		--select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDuedeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
		--from Task t
		--join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
		--join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
		--where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create tasks 'Ανανέωση Προβολής (No outcome)'
		if @mediumCode = '9'
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επανενεργοποίηση Προβολής Website'
			end
		ELSE
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Ανανέωση Προβολής ' + @category
			end
		
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
		select @taskDescription, @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @activationTaskTypeID,  mv.Code, '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @activationTaskTypeID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)
		select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, @processIDAsString, @mainProcessDescr
		from Task t
		join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Eνεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),@currentDate,103) + ' Reason έγινε null', t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDuedeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
		from Task t
		join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
		join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString		
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#closedTasks', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #closedTasks
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_CreateActivationTasks]
	(@advIDs AdvActivationValues readonly, @mainProcessID uniqueidentifier, 
		@deactivationTaskTypeID1 int, @deactivationTaskTypeID2 int, @activationTaskTypeID int, 
		@mediumCode varchar(10),
		@category varchar(50),
		@confirmationTaskTypeID int)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @processID uniqueidentifier, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime

	RANK() OVER (partition by advIDs.AdvID ORDER BY t.ID desc) AS Rank
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
	join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
    join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
    join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
    join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
    where me.Code = @mediumCode
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@deactivationTaskTypeID1, @deactivationTaskTypeID2)

		from Task t2
		join [Case] c2 on t2.CaseID = c2.ID

		where adv2.ID = adv.ID
		and t2.tasktypeid = @confirmationTaskTypeID
		and t2.[status] = 0
	)
	) as s
	where s.Rank = 1
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #closedTasks
	
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Κλειστά tasks Διακοπή & Ελεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής ' + @category + ': ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0

		-- Create new case 'Ενεργοποίηση Προβολής Πελάτη - PR010'

		select 109, 0, @currentDate, @mainProcessDescr, advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID

		select 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, 563, 'Closed' + @category, @currentDate, c.DMTable
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID 
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join #closedTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString

		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Eνεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),@currentDate,103) + ' Reason έγινε null', t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDuedeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
		from Task t
		join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
		join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString		
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#closedTasks', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #closedTasks
END
