CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks](
    @advIDs AdvActivationValues readonly,
    @mainProcessID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER,
    @deactivationTaskTypeID1 INTEGER,
    @deactivationTaskTypeID2 INTEGER,
    @activationTaskTypeID INTEGER,
    @mediumCode VARCHAR(10),
    @category VARCHAR(50)
) AS BEGIN
declare @processID uniqueidentifier, @rowCount int, @BatchActionType int, @initiatorID int, @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @mainProcessDescr nvarchar(100), @currentDate datetime
	declare @taskDescription varchar(100)
	select @mainProcessDescr = '[Advertisement_List_CreateConfirmationTasks]'
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	select @initiatorID = 1
	
	select distinct t.ID, t.CaseID, t.[Description], t.DynamicCode, t.DynamicDescription, c.ContextEntityID
	into #openTasks
	from Task t
	join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
	join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
	join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
    join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
    join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
    join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
    where me.Code = @mediumCode
	and t.TaskTypeID in (@deactivationTaskTypeID1, @deactivationTaskTypeID2)
	and t.[Status] = 0
	
	select @rowCount = count(distinct ID) from #openTasks
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @mainProcessID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Ανοιχτά tasks Διακοπή & Ελεγχος Διακοπής Προβολής ' + @category + ': ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
	if @rowCount > 0
	begin
		select @processID = newid()
		select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
		
		update t
		set [Status] = 1,
			CompletedOn = @currentDate,
			DMCharKey = @mainProcessDescr
		from Task t
		join #openTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable)
		select t.ID, t.CompletedOn, t.Outcome, t.DMTable
		from Task t
		join #openTasks tmp on t.ID = tmp.ID
		
		-- Create new case 'Ενεργοποίηση Προβολής Πελάτη - PR010'
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
		insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
		select 109, 0, @currentDate, @mainProcessDescr, advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on advIDs.AdvID = adv.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
		
		update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create code tasks 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01'
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
		select 'Code Task for PR10.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, 563, 'Open' + @category, @currentDate, c.DMTable
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		--insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
		--select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDuedeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
		--from Task t
		--join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
		--join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
		--where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		-- Create tasks 'Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής (No outcome)'
		if @mediumCode = '9'
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επιβεβαίωση Επανενεργοποίησης Προβολής Website'
			end
		ELSE
			begin
				set @taskDescription = 'Επιβεβαίωση Ανανέωσης Προβολής ' + @category
			end
		
		insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
		select @taskDescription, @currentDate, 0, c.ID, @activationTaskTypeID, mv.Code , '['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
		from [Case] c
		join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
		join Advertisement adv on adv.id = c.ContextEntityID
		join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
		join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
		join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
		join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
		join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
		join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
		join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
		join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = @activationTaskTypeID and tta.AssignmentType = 2
		--join #openTasks tmp on c.ContextEntityID = tmp.ContextEntityID --TODO:check this
		where me.Code = @mediumCode
		and c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable, DMCharKey)
		select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, @processIDAsString, @mainProcessDescr
		from Task t
		join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Eνεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),@currentDate,103) + ' Reason έγινε null', t.DMTable
		from Task t
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		
		insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
		select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDuedeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
		from Task t
		join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
		join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
		where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
	end
	
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#openTasks', N'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #openTasks
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_CreateDeactivationCases]
	@advIDs AdvDeactivationValues readonly,
	@sourceID int
AS
BEGIN
	
	declare @PR090_CASE_TYPEID int, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID int, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID int, @currentDate datetime, @initiatorID int
	declare @errMessage nvarchar(512), @BatchActionType int, @processDescr nvarchar(100), @rowCount int, @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(40)
	select @PR090_CASE_TYPEID = 108, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID = 560, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID = 562
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @initiatorID = 1
	select @BatchActionType = 3
		
	select @processID = newid()
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = convert(nvarchar(5),@sourceID) + '-CreateDeactivationCases-' + @processIDAsString
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @advIDs
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Έναρξη διαδικασίας: ' + @processDescr
	
	BEGIN TRANSACTION	 
		BEGIN TRY
			
		update adv
			set 
			--DeactivationDate = advIDs.DeactivationDate, --//BI-1089
				DeactivationReason = advIDs.DeactivationReason
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID 
		
		
		if @sourceID = 1 -- XO.GR
		begin
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMTable)
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 1, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID, CompletedBy = 'CreateDeactivationCases', CompletedOn = @currentDate where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'XO.GR', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDueDeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
			from Task t
			join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 2 -- GOOGLE ADWORDS (GADS)
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'GADS', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString			
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής GADS - Τ08 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής GADS', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 607, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 607 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable, DMKey)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'PastDueDeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10)), t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 3 -- YANDEX
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'YANDEX', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString			
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX - Τ09 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 608, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 608 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDueDeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
			from Task t
			join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 4 -- SEO
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'SEO', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString			
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής SEO - Τ11 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής SEO', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 610, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 610 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)

			select @errMessage = 'Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +

			' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +

	IF @errMessage IS NOT NULL

		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])

	END
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_CreateDeactivationCases]
	@advIDs AdvDeactivationValues readonly,
	@sourceID int
AS
BEGIN
	
	declare @PR090_CASE_TYPEID int, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID int, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID int, @currentDate datetime, @initiatorID int
	declare @errMessage nvarchar(512), @BatchActionType int, @processDescr nvarchar(100), @rowCount int, @processID uniqueidentifier, @processIDAsString nvarchar(40)
	select @PR090_CASE_TYPEID = 108, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID = 560, @PR090_CHECKDEACTIVATION_ΤΟ2_TYPEID = 562
	select @currentDate = getdate()
	select @initiatorID = 1
	select @BatchActionType = 3
		
	select @processID = newid()
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = convert(nvarchar(5),@sourceID) + '-CreateDeactivationCases-' + @processIDAsString
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @advIDs
	INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'Έναρξη διαδικασίας: ' + @processDescr
	
	BEGIN TRANSACTION	 
		BEGIN TRY
			
		update adv
			set 
			--DeactivationDate = advIDs.DeactivationDate, --//BI-1089
				DeactivationReason = advIDs.DeactivationReason
		from @advIDs advIDs
		join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = advIDs.AdvID 
		
		
		if @sourceID = 1 -- XO.GR
		begin
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMTable)
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 1, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID, CompletedBy = 'CreateDeactivationCases', CompletedOn = @currentDate where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'XO.GR', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, DMTable, DMKey, [Text])
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID, 'PastDueDeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10))
			from Task t
			join [case] c on t.caseid = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on advIDs.AdvID = c.ContextEntityID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 2 -- GOOGLE ADWORDS (GADS)
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'GADS', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString			
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής GADS - Τ08 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)
			select 'Διακοπή Προβολής GADS', @currentDate, 0, c.ID, 607, advIDs.DynamicCode, advIDs.DynamicDescription, c.DMTable, tta.RoleID
			from [Case] c
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			join TaskTypeAssignment tta on tta.TaskTypeID = 607 and tta.AssignmentType = 2
			where c.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskAssignment (TaskID, RoleID, AssignmentType, DMTable)
			select t.ID, ta.RoleID, ta.AssignmentType, t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join TaskTypeAssignment ta on t.TaskTypeID = ta.TaskTypeID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'Απενεργοποίηση στις ' + convert(varchar(20),advIDs.DeactivationDate,103) + ' με Reason ' + convert(varchar(5),advIDs.DeactivationReason), t.DMTable
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString
			
			insert into TaskLog (TaskID, [Timestamp], Outcome, [Text], DMTable, DMKey)
			select t.ID, @currentDate, t.Outcome, 'PastDueDeactivationProcess Taskid:' + cast(advIDs.TaskID as nvarchar(10)), t.DMTable, advIDs.TaskID
			from Task t
			join [Case] c on t.CaseID = c.ID
			join @advIDs advIDs on c.ContextEntityID = advIDs.AdvID
			where t.DMTable = @processIDAsString	
		end
		
		if @sourceID = 3 -- YANDEX
		begin
		
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110
			insert into [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, [DMTable])
			select  @PR090_CASE_TYPEID, 0, @currentDate, 'CreateDeactivationCases', advIDs.AdvID, @initiatorID, 'ADV', @processIDAsString 
			from @advIDs advIDs
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
			
			update [Case] set MasterCaseID = ID where DMTable = @processIDAsString
						
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, Outcome, CompletedOn, DMTable)
			select 'Code Task for PR09.0 - CT01', @currentDate, 1, c.ID, @PR090_CT01_TYPEID, 'YANDEX', @currentDate, c.DMTable
			from [Case] c
			where DMTable = @processIDAsString			
			
			-- Διακοπή Προβολής YANDEX - Τ09 (No outcome)
			insert into Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, DMTable, ActualRoleID)

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_Deactivation]
	(@advDeactData AdvDeactivationData readonly)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @processID uniqueidentifier;
	set @processID = NewID();
	declare @processIDAsString nvarchar(50), @processDescr varchar(100), @BatchActionType int, @rowCount int
	declare @xogrMediumCode varchar(10), @websiteMediumCode varchar(10), @gadsMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@yandexMediumCode varchar(10), @seoMediumCode varchar(10), @facebookMediumCode varchar(10), 
			@baiduMediumCode varchar(10), @emmMediumCode varchar(10),
			@ppcMediumCode varchar(10)
	declare @ContractExpiration int, @WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate int, @GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate int, @XOgrWithCustomerStatus int, @CancelledOrInterrupted int
	select @processIDAsString = convert(nvarchar(50), @processID)
	select @processDescr = 'Advertisement_List_Deactivation'
	select @ContractExpiration = 0, 
		@WebsiteAfterInvoicePaymentDate = 1, 
		@GadsYandexSEOAfterInvoicePaymentDate = 2, 
		@XOgrWithCustomerStatus = 3, 
		@CancelledOrInterrupted = 4
	select @xogrMediumCode = '10', 
		@websiteMediumCode = '9', 
		@gadsMediumCode = '73', 
		@yandexMediumCode = '74', 
		@seoMediumCode = '75', 
		@facebookMediumCode = '76', 
		@baiduMediumCode = '77',
		@emmMediumCode = '112',
		@ppcMediumCode = '111'
	select @BatchActionType = 3
	
	insert into [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
	select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),0,1,0,'---Έναρξη: ' + @processDescr + '-' + @processIDAsString
		
	/* XO.GR */
	declare @xogrAdvIDs AdvDeactivationValues
	
	insert into @xogrAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, TaskID)
	exec [Advertisement_List_Deactivation_Data] @xogrMediumCode, @advDeactData	
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @xogrAdvIDs
	if (@rowCount > 0)
	begin
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'xogr AdvIDs: ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
		exec Advertisement_List_CreateDeactivationCases @xogrAdvIDs, 1
	end
	
	/* GOOGLE ADWORDS (GADS)  */
	declare @gadsAdvIDs AdvDeactivationValues
	
	insert into @gadsAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, TaskID)
	exec [Advertisement_List_Deactivation_Data] @gadsMediumCode, @advDeactData	
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @gadsAdvIDs
	if (@rowCount > 0)
	begin
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])
		select @processID,@BatchActionType,getdate(),@rowCount,1,0,'gads AdvIDs: ' + convert(varchar(20), @rowCount)
	
		exec Advertisement_List_CreateDeactivationCases @gadsAdvIDs, 2
	end
	
	/* YANDEX */
	declare @yandexAdvIDs AdvDeactivationValues
	
	insert into @yandexAdvIDs (AdvID, DeactivationDate, DeactivationReason, DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, TaskID)
	exec [Advertisement_List_Deactivation_Data] @yandexMediumCode, @advDeactData		
	
	select @rowCount = count(*) from @yandexAdvIDs
	if (@rowCount > 0)
	begin 
		INSERT INTO [BatchActionHistory] ([BatchID],BatchActionType,[TimeStamp],[RowsAffected],[Status],[Type],[Text])

/* and co.[Type] != 5 */ /* and me.IsActive = 1 */ /* and pr.IsComposite = 0 */ /* and adv.QA = 1 */ /* and adv.DeactivationDate is null */ /* and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null */ /* and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate) */ /* and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new */ /* and tmp.AdvID is null */
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_Deactivation_Data](
    @mediumCode VARCHAR(10),
    @advDeactData AdvDeactivationData readonly
) AS BEGIN
SELECT
  adv.ID,
  CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) AS DeactivationDate,
  tmp.DeactivationReason AS DeactivationReason,
  mv.Code AS DynamicCode,
  '[' + pr.Code + ']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code AS DynamicDescription,
  tmp.TaskID AS TaskID
FROM Advertisement AS adv
JOIN Product AS pr
  ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID
JOIN ContractProduct AS cp
  ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
JOIN [Contract] AS co
  ON cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp
  ON co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
JOIN VersionSection AS vs
  ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
JOIN MediumVersion AS mv
  ON vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
JOIN Medium AS me
  ON mv.MediumID = me.ID
JOIN @advDeactData AS tmp
  ON tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
WHERE
  me.Code = @mediumCode END
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Advertisement_List_Deactivation_Data]
	(@mediumCode varchar(10), @advDeactData AdvDeactivationData readonly)
AS
BEGIN
	select adv.ID,  
		CONVERT(date, getdate()) as DeactivationDate,
		tmp.DeactivationReason as DeactivationReason,
		mv.Code as DynamicCode, 
		'['+pr.Code +']-' + pr.Name + '-' + bp.Code as DynamicDescription,
		tmp.TaskID as TaskID
	from Advertisement adv
	join Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.ID
	join ContractProduct cp on adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID
	join [Contract] co on cp.RelatedContractID = co.ID
	join BusinessPoint bp on co.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID
	join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID
	join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
	join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID
	join @advDeactData tmp on tmp.AdvID = adv.ID
	where me.Code = @mediumCode
	--and co.[Type] != 5
	--and me.IsActive = 1
	--and pr.IsComposite = 0
	--and adv.QA = 1
	--and adv.DeactivationDate is null
	--and adv.ReactivatedContractID is null
	--and (cp.InterruptionDate <= @serviceDate or cp.CancelledOn <= @serviceDate)
	--and (cp.InterruptionDate >= @THRESHOLD_DATE or cp.CancelledOn >= @THRESHOLD_DATE) --new
	--and tmp.AdvID is null

END

named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[CampaignASM_CloseCases]
(	
	 @PerformerID	INT
	,@CampaignID	INT
	,@ProcessName	NVARCHAR(50)						
	,@BatchID		UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
    ,@TGIVs			CampaignASM_TGIV readonly
)
AS 
BEGIN

BEGIN Try		
		declare	@ProcessID nvarchar(50) SET @ProcessID = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), @BatchID)
		declare @msg nvarchar(200)
		select @msg = 'CampaignASM_CloseCases start - ' + @ProcessName
		exec usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID

		select @msg = 'PerformerID  = ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),@PerformerID)
		exec usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		select @msg = 'CampaignID  = ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),@CampaignID)
		exec usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		
		--FYI: Close Cases
			UPDATE c Set c.State = 1
			FROM [Case] as c
			JOIN TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
			JOIN TargetGroupItem as tgi on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
			JOIN @TGIVs as ids on tgiv.ID = ids.TGIV_ID
			WHERE tgi.CampaignID = @CampaignID
			
			UPDATE t Set t.Status = 1
			FROM [Case] as c
			JOIN Task as t on c.ID = t.CaseID
			JOIN TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
			JOIN TargetGroupItem as tgi on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID
			JOIN @TGIVs as ids on tgiv.ID = ids.TGIV_ID
			WHERE tgi.CampaignID = @CampaignID
		--FYI: Close Tasks		
		
END Try	
BEGIN CATCH
		DECLARE @errMessage NVARCHAR(512)		    
		DECLARE @ErrorSeverity INT = ERROR_SEVERITY();
		DECLARE @ErrorState INT= ERROR_STATE();
		select @errMessage = 'Failure CampaignASM_CloseCases: Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
						' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
						' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
						' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
						' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())
		exec usp_timelogger @errMessage , @ProcessID
		RAISERROR (@errMessage,@ErrorSeverity,@ErrorState);
		return -1;
	END CATCH;	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[CampaignASM_CreateCases]
(	
	 @PerformerID						INT
	,@CampaignID						INT
    ,@ProcessName						NVARCHAR(50)
	,@BatchID							UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
    ,@TGIVs								CampaignASM_TGIV readonly
)
AS 
BEGIN

BEGIN Try		
		declare	@ProcessID nvarchar(50) SET @ProcessID = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), @BatchID)
		declare @msg nvarchar(200)
		SET @msg = 'CampaignASM_CreateCases start - ' + @ProcessName
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID

		SET @msg = 'PerformerID  = ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),@PerformerID)
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		SET @msg = 'CampaignID  = ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),@CampaignID)
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		

	 IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM @TGIVs)
	 BEGIN
		EXEC usp_timelogger 'NO TGIVS FOUND TO CREATE CASES' , @ProcessID
	 END
	 ELSE
	 BEGIN
		 DECLARE @CASE_P003_TYPEID int,
					@CASE_P004_TYPEID int,
					@TASK_P003T03_TYPEID int,
					@TASK_P004T03_TYPEID int,
					@TASK_P003T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION nvarchar(100),
					@TASK_P004T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION nvarchar(100),
					@CASE_P003_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100) =  'Case.P003.TypeID',
					@CASE_P004_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100) = 'Case.P004.TypeID',
					@startedOn datetime = getdate(),
					@performerUserName nvarchar(100) = (SELECT UserName FROM [User] where ID=@performerID)

			DECLARE @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100)  SET @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID_NAME =  'Task.P003T03.TypeID'
			DECLARE @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100)  SET @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID_NAME =  'Task.P004T03.TypeID'
			
			
			
			SELECT @CASE_P003_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @CASE_P003_TYPEID_NAME 
			SELECT @CASE_P004_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @CASE_P004_TYPEID_NAME 
			---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
			SELECT @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID_NAME  
			SELECT @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID_NAME 
			--------------------------------------------------------------------
			SELECT @TASK_P003T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION = [DESCRIPTION] 
			  FROM TaskType
			 WHERE ID = @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID   

			SELECT @TASK_P004T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION = [DESCRIPTION] 
			  FROM TaskType
			 WHERE ID = @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID 
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			--Start Create Case, Task, TaskAssignment
			--FYI: This is used to disable the trigger from trying to update the MasterCaseID
	            
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110

			INSERT INTO [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMKey, DMTable, DMCharKey)
			SELECT  CASE WHEN ids.IsTele = 1 THEN @CASE_P004_TYPEID
						 WHEN ids.IsTele = 0 THEN @CASE_P003_TYPEID
						 ELSE NULL END, 
					0, 
					@startedOn,
					@performerUserName,
					ids.TGIV_ID, 
					ids.SalesmanID,  
					'TGIV',
					DMKey = ids.ID,
					DMTable = @ProcessID,
					DMCharKey = @ProcessName
					
			FROM @TGIVs as ids
				
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'Case Inserted' , @ProcessID
			
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
            
			UPDATE cs SET MasterCaseID = cs.ID  
			FROM [Case] as cs
			JOIN @TGIVs as ids on cs.ContextEntityID = ids.TGIV_ID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
			WHERE cs.DMKey = ids.ID 
			  AND cs.DMTable = @ProcessID
			
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'MasterCase Updated' , @ProcessID
			
			INSERT INTO Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, ActualOwnerID, ActualOwnerModifiedOn ,DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, SenderID, DMKey, DMTable, DMCharKey,ActualRoleID) 
			SELECT
					[Description] = CASE WHEN ids.IsTele = 1 THEN @TASK_P004T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
										WHEN ids.IsTele = 0 THEN @TASK_P003T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
										ELSE NULL END, 
					CreatedOn = @startedOn, 
					[Status] = 0, 
					CaseID = c.ID, 
					TaskTypeID = CASE WHEN c.CaseTypeID = @CASE_P003_TYPEID THEN @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID 
										WHEN c.CaseTypeID = @CASE_P004_TYPEID THEN @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID 
										ELSE NULL END,
					ActualOwnerID = c.InitiatorID, 
					ActualOwnerModifiedOn = @startedOn,
					DynamicCode = cmp.Code, 						
					DynamicDescription = ISNULL(cmp.Name+ ' :','') + bp.Code + ' - ' + ISNULL(bp.Name,'') COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AI, 
					SenderID = @performerID,
					DMKey = ids.ID,
					DMTable = @ProcessID,
					DMCharKey = @ProcessName,
					tts.RoleID  ----//BI-1453
			 FROM @TGIVs as ids
			 JOIN TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on ids.TGIV_ID = tgiv.ID
			 JOIN TargetGroupItem tgi on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
			 Join BusinessPoint as bp on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
			 JOIN Campaign cmp on cmp.ID = tgi.CampaignID 
			 JOIN [Case] c on c.ContextEntityID = ids.TGIV_ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'	
			 join (
				select 0 isTele, ta.TaskTypeID, ta.RoleID 
				from TaskTypeAssignment ta
				where ta.AssignmentType = 2 and ta.TaskTypeID = 146
				union
				select 1 isTele, ta.TaskTypeID, ta.RoleID 
				from TaskTypeAssignment ta
				where ta.AssignmentType = 2 and ta.TaskTypeID = 151
			) tts on tts.IsTele = ids.IsTele ----//BI-1453
			WHERE c.DMKey = ids.ID and c.DMTable = @ProcessID
			 			
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'Task Inserted' , @ProcessID
			
			  INSERT INTO TaskAssignment (TaskID, AssignmentType, UserID)
			  SELECT  TaskID = t.ID, 
					  AssignmentType = 1, 
					  UserID = tgiv.Supervisor
				FROM @TGIVs as ids
				JOIN TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on ids.TGIV_ID = tgiv.ID
				JOIN [Case] c on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
				JOIN Task t on t.CaseID = c.ID
				WHERE t.DMKey = ids.ID and c.DMTable = @ProcessID
				
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'TaskAssignment Inserted' , @ProcessID
		--End Create Case, Task, TaskAssignment
	END
	SET @msg = 'CampaignASM_CreateCases end - ' + @ProcessName
	EXEC usp_timelogger 'TaskAssignment Inserted' , @ProcessID
		
END Try	
BEGIN CATCH
		DECLARE @errMessage NVARCHAR(512)		    
		DECLARE @ErrorSeverity INT = ERROR_SEVERITY();
		DECLARE @ErrorState INT= ERROR_STATE();
		select @errMessage = 'Failure CampaignASM_CreateCases: Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
						' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
						' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
						' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
						' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())
		EXEC usp_timelogger @errMessage , @ProcessID
		RAISERROR (@errMessage,@ErrorSeverity,@ErrorState);
		return -1;
	END CATCH;	


END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[CampaignASM_CreateCases]
(	
	 @PerformerID						INT
	,@CampaignID						INT
    ,@ProcessName						NVARCHAR(50)
	,@BatchID							UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
    ,@TGIVs								CampaignASM_TGIV readonly
)
AS 
BEGIN

BEGIN Try		
		declare	@ProcessID nvarchar(50) SET @ProcessID = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), @BatchID)
		declare @msg nvarchar(200)
		SET @msg = 'CampaignASM_CreateCases start - ' + @ProcessName
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID

		SET @msg = 'PerformerID  = ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),@PerformerID)
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		SET @msg = 'CampaignID  = ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20),@CampaignID)
		EXEC usp_timelogger @msg , @ProcessID
		

	 IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM @TGIVs)
	 BEGIN
		EXEC usp_timelogger 'NO TGIVS FOUND TO CREATE CASES' , @ProcessID
	 END
	 ELSE
	 BEGIN
		 DECLARE @CASE_P003_TYPEID int,
					@CASE_P004_TYPEID int,
					@TASK_P003T03_TYPEID int,
					@TASK_P004T03_TYPEID int,
					@TASK_P003T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION nvarchar(100),
					@TASK_P004T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION nvarchar(100),
					@CASE_P003_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100) =  'Case.P003.TypeID',
					@CASE_P004_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100) = 'Case.P004.TypeID',
					@startedOn datetime = getdate(),
					@performerUserName nvarchar(100) = (SELECT UserName FROM [User] where ID=@performerID)

			DECLARE @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100)  SET @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID_NAME =  'Task.P003T03.TypeID'
			DECLARE @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID_NAME nvarchar(100)  SET @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID_NAME =  'Task.P004T03.TypeID'
			
			
			
			SELECT @CASE_P003_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @CASE_P003_TYPEID_NAME 
			SELECT @CASE_P004_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @CASE_P004_TYPEID_NAME 
			---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
			SELECT @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID_NAME  
			SELECT @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID = CONVERT(INT, Parameter) 
			  FROM ConfigurationParameter
			 WHERE Name = @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID_NAME 
			--------------------------------------------------------------------
			SELECT @TASK_P003T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION = [DESCRIPTION] 
			  FROM TaskType
			 WHERE ID = @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID   

			SELECT @TASK_P004T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION = [DESCRIPTION] 
			  FROM TaskType
			 WHERE ID = @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID 
	-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			--Start Create Case, Task, TaskAssignment
			--FYI: This is used to disable the trigger from trying to update the MasterCaseID
	            
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0x11110

			INSERT INTO [Case] (CaseTypeID, [State], CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ContextEntityID, InitiatorID, ContextEntityType, DMKey, DMTable, DMCharKey)
			SELECT  CASE WHEN ids.IsTele = 1 THEN @CASE_P004_TYPEID
						 WHEN ids.IsTele = 0 THEN @CASE_P003_TYPEID
						 ELSE NULL END, 
					0, 
					@startedOn,
					@performerUserName,
					ids.TGIV_ID, 
					ids.SalesmanID,  
					'TGIV',
					DMKey = ids.ID,
					DMTable = @ProcessID,
					DMCharKey = @ProcessName
					
			FROM @TGIVs as ids
				
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'Case Inserted' , @ProcessID
			
			SET CONTEXT_INFO 0
            
			UPDATE cs SET MasterCaseID = cs.ID  
			FROM [Case] as cs
			JOIN @TGIVs as ids on cs.ContextEntityID = ids.TGIV_ID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
			WHERE cs.DMKey = ids.ID 
			  AND cs.DMTable = @ProcessID
			
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'MasterCase Updated' , @ProcessID
			
			INSERT INTO Task ([Description], CreatedOn, [Status], CaseID, TaskTypeID, ActualOwnerID, ActualOwnerModifiedOn ,DynamicCode, DynamicDescription, SenderID, DMKey, DMTable, DMCharKey,ActualRoleID) 
			SELECT
					[Description] = CASE WHEN ids.IsTele = 1 THEN @TASK_P004T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
										WHEN ids.IsTele = 0 THEN @TASK_P003T03_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
										ELSE NULL END, 
					CreatedOn = @startedOn, 
					[Status] = 0, 
					CaseID = c.ID, 
					TaskTypeID = CASE WHEN c.CaseTypeID = @CASE_P003_TYPEID THEN @TASK_P003T03_TYPEID 
										WHEN c.CaseTypeID = @CASE_P004_TYPEID THEN @TASK_P004T03_TYPEID 
										ELSE NULL END,
					ActualOwnerID = c.InitiatorID, 
					ActualOwnerModifiedOn = @startedOn,
					DynamicCode = cmp.Code, 						
					DynamicDescription = ISNULL(cmp.Name+ ' :','') + bp.Code + ' - ' + ISNULL(bp.Name,'') COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AI, 
					SenderID = @performerID,
					DMKey = ids.ID,
					DMTable = @ProcessID,
					DMCharKey = @ProcessName,
					tts.RoleID  ----//BI-1453
			 FROM @TGIVs as ids
			 JOIN TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on ids.TGIV_ID = tgiv.ID
			 JOIN TargetGroupItem tgi on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID
			 Join BusinessPoint as bp on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
			 JOIN Campaign cmp on cmp.ID = tgi.CampaignID 
			 JOIN [Case] c on c.ContextEntityID = ids.TGIV_ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'	
			 join (
				select 0 isTele, ta.TaskTypeID, ta.RoleID 
				from TaskTypeAssignment ta
				where ta.AssignmentType = 2 and ta.TaskTypeID = 146
				union
				select 1 isTele, ta.TaskTypeID, ta.RoleID 
				from TaskTypeAssignment ta
				where ta.AssignmentType = 2 and ta.TaskTypeID = 151
			) tts on tts.IsTele = ids.IsTele ----//BI-1453
			WHERE c.DMKey = ids.ID and c.DMTable = @ProcessID
			 			
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'Task Inserted' , @ProcessID
			
			  INSERT INTO TaskAssignment (TaskID, AssignmentType, UserID)
			  SELECT  TaskID = t.ID, 
					  AssignmentType = 1, 
					  UserID = tgiv.Supervisor
				FROM @TGIVs as ids
				JOIN TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on ids.TGIV_ID = tgiv.ID
				JOIN [Case] c on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
				JOIN Task t on t.CaseID = c.ID
				WHERE t.DMKey = ids.ID and c.DMTable = @ProcessID
				
			EXEC usp_timelogger 'TaskAssignment Inserted' , @ProcessID
		--End Create Case, Task, TaskAssignment
	END
	SET @msg = 'CampaignASM_CreateCases end - ' + @ProcessName
	EXEC usp_timelogger 'TaskAssignment Inserted' , @ProcessID
		
END Try	
BEGIN CATCH
		DECLARE @errMessage NVARCHAR(512)		    
		DECLARE @ErrorSeverity INT = ERROR_SEVERITY();
		DECLARE @ErrorState INT= ERROR_STATE();
		select @errMessage = 'Failure CampaignASM_CreateCases: Error Message: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() +
						' Error Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_LINE()) +
						' Error Number: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_NUMBER()) +
						' ErrorSeverity: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),ERROR_SEVERITY()) +
						' ErrorState: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ERROR_STATE())
		EXEC usp_timelogger @errMessage , @ProcessID
		RAISERROR (@errMessage,@ErrorSeverity,@ErrorState);
		return -1;
	END CATCH;	


END
